Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，挥舞长枪可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，并大幅击退目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, swing the long spear to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back a significant distance.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行四次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row in the air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻(存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，会触发破击。
下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害；落地时对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并浮空目标。
触发时离地距离越高，伤害越高，最高可达<shuzhi>600%</>伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Crashing Drive.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and suspend the target.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

Desc.SourceString:
普攻第三下后，长按普攻可触发乱枪狂舞。
命中目标会<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害；再次点击对浮空目标连续攻击，对单个目标最多可造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
After the third normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger Spear Flurry.
Upon hit, <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Tap again to continue attacking the airborne target, dealing up to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> damage to a single target.

Desc.SourceString: 长枪刺出，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Thrust the long spear forward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
使用方向键加闪避按钮触发前闪避的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发飞踢。
飞踢命中目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，大幅击退目标并对怪物造成<shuzhi>1</>秒，对玩家造成<shuzhi>0.5</>秒<shuzhi>强控眩晕</>效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Flying Kick.
Once hit the target, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, knock the enemies back significantly, and <shuzhi>stun</> enemies for <shuzhi>1</> second or <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds to Wanderers.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发挑击。
将目标挑起并砸地浮空，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Lunging Smash.
Pick up the target, then smash it into the ground and suspend it, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，抓取目标，并将目标多次甩动，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，最后一击附带<shuzhi>强控浮空</>效果，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon from another, <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the Wanderer</>, pulls the target, and swings it multiple times, dealing <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage. The final strike <shuzhi>knocks them airborne</>. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (not applicable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString: 旋风一般将目标<shuzhi>强控浮空</>，并使拓荒者滞空，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，冷却<shuzhi>{2}</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: <shuzhi>Strongly suspend</> targets and go airborne, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>{2}</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 射出一只机械手臂，将目标拉至自己身旁，并对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，冷却<shuzhi>{2}</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Fire a Cybernetic Arm at a target, dragging the target to your location and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>{2}</> seconds.

在地面时，挥舞短剑可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。

第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，造成<shuzhi>击飞</>效果。

Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and <shuzhi>launch</> the target.

第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并造成<shuzhi>强控击倒</>效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and deliver a <shuzhi>knockdown</>.

Desc.SourceString:
普攻后长按可触发气旋。
命中目标会浮空目标，气旋可对单个目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold the normal attack button after normal attacks to trigger Cyclone.
Upon hit, suspend the target and deal <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to a single target.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻，攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，会触发落斩。
下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害；落地时对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并击退目标。
触发时离地距离越高，伤害越高，最高可达<shuzhi>600%</>伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne, or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Diving Edge.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to surrounding targets and knock them back.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

Desc.SourceString: 处于下蹲状态时靠近敌人身后，点击普攻可触发偷袭，刺出短剑，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to trigger Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却15秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发飞身一击。
拓荒者向前挥刀冲刺对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标并使自己滞空，再次对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Leap Attack.
The Wanderer swings their blade forward and deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target, <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> them while going airborne. Then, deal additional damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to the target.

Desc.SourceString: 挥舞短剑穿梭于目标之间，最多可对<shuzhi>5</>个目标总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，最后一击浮空目标，技能期间免疫硬直效果，对同一目标造成的伤害依次递减<shuzhi>40%</>，冷却<shuzhi>{2}</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Roam between targets, dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to up to <shuzhi>5</> targets, with the last hit suspending the target. Immune to hitstun while active. Reduce damage dealt to the same target by <shuzhi>40%</> each time. <shuzhi>{2}</>-second cooldown.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，冲向目标并将目标<shuzhi>强控浮空</>，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon from another, <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and dashes to the target, <shuzhi>knocking them airborne</> and dealing <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (not applicable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，冲向目标并将目标<shuzhi>强控浮空</>，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon from another, <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and dashes to the target, <shuzhi>knocking them airborne</> and dealing <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (not applicable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，挥舞短剑可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，造成<shuzhi>击飞</>效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, swing the blade to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and <shuzhi>launch</> the target.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空后，点击普攻可在空中连续进行四次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并造成<shuzhi>强控击倒</>效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and deliver a <shuzhi>knockdown</>.

Desc.SourceString:
普攻后长按可触发气旋。
命中目标会浮空目标，气旋可对单个目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold the normal attack button after normal attacks to trigger Cyclone.
Upon hit, suspend the target and deal <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to a single target.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻，攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，会触发落斩。
下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害；落地时对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并击退目标。
触发时离地距离越高，伤害越高，最高可达<shuzhi>600%</>伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne, or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Diving Edge.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to surrounding targets and knock them back.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

Desc.SourceString: 处于下蹲状态时靠近敌人身后，点击普攻可触发偷袭，刺出短剑，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to trigger Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却15秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 挥舞短剑穿梭于目标之间，最多可对<shuzhi>5</>个目标总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，最后一击浮空目标，技能期间免疫硬直效果，对同一目标造成的伤害依次递减<shuzhi>40%</>，冷却<shuzhi>{2}</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Roam between targets, dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to up to <shuzhi>5</> targets, with the last hit suspending the target. Immune to hitstun while active. Reduce damage dealt to the same target by <shuzhi>40%</> each time. <shuzhi>{2}</>-second cooldown.

拓荒者向前挥刀冲刺对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标并使自己滞空，再次对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Leap Attack.
The Wanderer swings their blade forward and deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target, <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> them while going airborne. Then, deal additional damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to the target.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，挥舞大锤可连续进行四次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并击飞目标。
开启喷气状态下，挥舞大锤可连续进行四次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{11}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{12}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{13}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{14}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{15}</>点伤害，并造成<shuzhi>强控浮空</>效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, swing the maul to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and launch the target.
While Outburst is active, swing the maul to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{13}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{14}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{15}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，点击普攻触发跳跃攻击，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
开启喷气状态下，造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害并<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标。
触发时离地距离越高，伤害越高，最高可达<shuzhi>600%</>伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to trigger Jumping Blast. Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>and suspend the target.
While Outburst is active, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空长按，二段跳或附近有目标时在空中短按，攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，触发震荡波，<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标<shuzhi>4</>次，每次造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，消耗<shuzhi>250</>点耐力。
开启喷气状态下，触发震荡波，<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标<shuzhi>5</>次，每次造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
触发时离地距离越高，伤害越高，最高可达<shuzhi>600%</>伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tapping and holding while airborne, double-jumping, short tapping in the air when there are targets nearby, climbing, jumping backward, or attacking while using the Jetpack will trigger a Shockwave. <shuzhi>Strongly suspend</> the target <shuzhi>4</> times, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK+ <shuzhi>{1}</> each time. Cost <shuzhi>250</> endurance.
While Outburst is active, Shockwave <shuzhi>strongly suspends</> the target <shuzhi>5</> times, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of *ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> each time.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

Desc.SourceString: 处于下蹲状态时靠近敌人身后，点击普攻可触发偷袭，挥舞重锤，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to use Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
长按普攻，可触发蓄力重击，最多可蓄力三层，蓄力期间开启霸体和免控效果。
第一层，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并浮空目标；
第二层，对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标；
第三层，对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标。
开启喷气的状态下，长按普攻触发怒气连击，造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并造成<shuzhi>强控浮空</>效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack to trigger Focus Smash (can be charged up to 3 stacks). Grant immunity to all control effects and hyperbody while charging.
First Stack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and suspend the target.
Second Stack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target.
Third Stack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target.
While Outburst is active, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Furious Strikes, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target.

Desc.SourceString: 使用方向键加闪避按钮触发跳跃重击，触发震荡波，浮空目标<shuzhi>4</>次，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Use the arrow buttons and the dodge button to trigger Jumping Smash, unleashing a Shockwave that suspends the enemy <shuzhi>4</> times, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发破击长空，向前方释放出<shuzhi>3</>个震荡波，每段造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并浮空目标。
开启喷气状态下，可向前方释放出<shuzhi>5</>个震荡波，每段造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并浮空目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap normal attack during the short period of time after a dodge to trigger Worldsplitter, unleashing <shuzhi>3</> shockwaves forward, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, and suspending the targets.
While in Outburst mode, fire <shuzhi>5</> shockwaves forward, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and suspending the target.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却15秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
大锤切换为喷气状态，伤害得到增强，持续<shuzhi>25</>秒。
喷气状态下，使用技能触发乘风重击，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害并<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标，同时在地面形成流风，自身在流风里使用闪避不消耗闪避次数，技能冷却<shuzhi>{2}</>秒，乘风重击冷却<shuzhi>10</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Switch to activate Outburst, increasing damage dealt for <shuzhi>25</> seconds.
While Outburst is active, skills trigger Windfury, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> the target and creating an air current on the ground. While standing in the current, dodging has no cost. Cooldown: <shuzhi>{2}</> seconds (Windfury's cooldown: <shuzhi>10</> seconds).

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，<shuzhi>强控浮空</>近身范围的目标并造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并在周围目标头顶召唤大锤从天而降，再次造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Authorizer</> and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby enemies, <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> targets within range. Additionally, summon a hammer to fall, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，挥舞大锤可连续进行四次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并击飞目标。
开启喷气状态下，挥舞大锤可连续进行四次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{11}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{12}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{13}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{14}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{15}</>点伤害，并造成<shuzhi>强控浮空</>效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, swing the maul to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and launch the target.
While Outburst is active, swing the maul to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{13}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{14}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{15}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，点击普攻触发跳跃攻击，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
开启喷气状态下，造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害并<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标。
触发时离地距离越高，伤害越高，最高可达<shuzhi>600%</>伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to trigger Jumping Blast. Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>and suspend the target.
While Outburst is active, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空长按，二段跳或附近有目标时在空中短按，攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，触发震荡波，<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标<shuzhi>4</>次，每次造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，消耗<shuzhi>250</>点耐力。
开启喷气状态下，触发震荡波，<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标<shuzhi>5</>次，每次造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
触发时离地距离越高，伤害越高，最高可达<shuzhi>600%</>伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tapping and holding while airborne, double-jumping, short tapping in the air when there are targets nearby, climbing, jumping backward, or attacking while using the Jetpack will trigger a Shockwave. <shuzhi>Strongly suspend</> the target <shuzhi>4</> times, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK+ <shuzhi>{1}</> each time. Cost <shuzhi>250</> endurance.
While Outburst is active, Shockwave <shuzhi>strongly suspends</> the target <shuzhi>5</> times, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of *ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> each time.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

Desc.SourceString: 处于下蹲状态时靠近敌人身后，点击普攻可触发偷袭，挥舞重锤，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to use Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
长按普攻，可触发蓄力重击，最多可蓄力三层，蓄力期间开启霸体和免控效果。
第一层，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并浮空目标；
第二层，对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标；
第三层，对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标。
开启喷气的状态下，长按普攻触发怒气连击，造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并造成<shuzhi>强控浮空</>效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack to trigger Focus Smash (can be charged up to 3 stacks). Grant immunity to all control effects and hyperbody while charging.
First Stack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and suspend the target.
Second Stack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target.
Third Stack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target.
While Outburst is active, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Furious Strikes, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target.

Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
大锤切换为喷气状态，伤害得到增强，持续<shuzhi>25</>秒。
喷气状态下，使用技能触发乘风重击，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害并<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标，同时在地面形成流风，自身在流风里使用闪避不消耗闪避次数，技能冷却<shuzhi>{2}</>秒，乘风重击冷却<shuzhi>10</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Switch to activate Outburst, increasing damage dealt for <shuzhi>25</> seconds.
While Outburst is active, skills trigger Windfury, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> the target and creating an air current on the ground. While standing in the current, dodging has no cost. Cooldown: <shuzhi>{2}</> seconds (Windfury's cooldown: <shuzhi>10</> seconds).

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，<shuzhi>强控浮空</>近身范围的目标并造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并在周围目标头顶创建大锤从天而降，再次造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Authorizer</> and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby enemies, <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> targets within range. Additionally, create a hammer to fall, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，挥舞大剑可连续进行四次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，造成<shuzhi>强控击飞</>，落地并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, swing a greatsword to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>, <shuzhi>strongly launch</> the target, then launch them upon landing.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，点击普攻可在空中连续进行四次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，造成<shuzhi>强控击倒</>，落地并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and deliver a <shuzhi>knockdown</>, launch the target upon landing.

Desc.SourceString:
普攻第三下后，长按普攻可触发腾空斩。
命中目标会<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标并使拓荒者滞空，总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
After the third normal attack, hold normal attack to trigger Rising Slash.
Upon hit, <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target and go airborne, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</>of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻(存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，触发落月斩。
下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害；落地时对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，造成击飞效果。
触发时离地距离越高，伤害越高，最高可达<shuzhi>600%</>伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Moonset Slash.
While falling, each hit deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and launch targets.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

Desc.SourceString: 处于下蹲状态时靠近敌人身后，点击普攻可触发偷袭，大剑劈斩，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to use Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString: 当拓荒者处于站立或移动状态时，长按普攻，可触发旋风斩，每<shuzhi>0.5</>秒对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，期间免疫控制和硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: While standing still or moving, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Whirlwind, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds to the target. Grant hitstun immunity while in use.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却15秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
使用方向键加闪避按钮触发前闪避的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发破斩。
破斩每段命中目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并造成<shuzhi>击飞</>效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Devastate.
Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each hit and <shuzhi>launch</> targets.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发半月斩。
挥舞大剑向前方斩出剑气，每道剑气造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Crescent Slash.
Swing the greatsword to unleash sword auras forward, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，召唤一阵剑雨，对自身周围的目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并浮空目标，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon from another, <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the Wanderer</>, summoning a rain of blades that deals <shuzhi>{0}%</>of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage to nearby enemies and knocks them airborne. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (not applicable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString: 连续挥舞大剑，对身前范围发射剑气。每次造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，技能期间免疫硬直效果，冷却<shuzhi>{2}</>秒；
Desc.LocalizedString: Swing the greatsword to launch sword auras forward, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, and granting hitstun immunity while using this Skill. Cooldown: <shuzhi>{2}</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 当拓荒者处于站立或移动状态时，长按普攻，可触发旋风斩，每<shuzhi>0.5</>秒对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，期间免疫控制和硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: While standing still or moving, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Whirlwind, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds to the target. Grant hitstun immunity while in use.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却15秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
使用方向键加闪避按钮触发前闪避的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发破斩。
破斩每段命中目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并造成<shuzhi>击飞</>效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Devastate.
Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each hit and <shuzhi>launch</> targets.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发半月斩。
挥舞大剑向前方斩出剑气，每道剑气造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Crescent Slash.
Swing the greatsword to unleash sword auras forward, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，召唤一阵剑雨，对自身周围的目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并浮空目标，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon from another, <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the Wanderer</>, summoning a rain of blades that deals <shuzhi>{0}%</>of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage to nearby enemies and knocks them airborne. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (not applicable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString: 连续挥舞大剑，对身前范围发射剑气。每次造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，技能期间免疫硬直效果，冷却<shuzhi>{2}</>秒；
Desc.LocalizedString: Swing the greatsword to launch sword auras forward, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, and granting hitstun immunity while using this Skill. Cooldown: <shuzhi>{2}</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 后空翻并向前方射出<shuzhi>1</>支穿透箭，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并击退目标，冷却<shuzhi>{2}</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Backflips and fires <shuzhi>1</> piercing shot forward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knocking the target back. <shuzhi>{2}</>-second cooldown.

Desc.SourceString: 后空翻并向前方射出<shuzhi>1</>支穿透箭，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并击退目标，冷却<shuzhi>{2}</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Backflips and fires <shuzhi>1</> piercing shot forward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knocking the target back. <shuzhi>{2}</>-second cooldown.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，向目标射出爆裂箭雨，对单个目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and unleash Explosive Barrage on the target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
On the ground, use normal attack to launch 5 attacks in a row.
The first attack deals total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.
The second attack deals total damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</>.
The third attack deals total damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</>.
The fourth attack deals total damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</> .
The fifth attack deals total damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</>.

Desc.SourceString: 长按普攻，进入蓄力攻击状态，松手时发射子弹，可对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害;三秒后（或目标死亡时）爆炸，对附近的敌方单位造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力伤害，期间目标每受到一次伤害，伤害范围扩大一倍（最多扩大<shuzhi>4</>次），并提升伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Tap and hold normal attack to charge an attack and release to fire rounds, dealing <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage, plus an explosion 3 seconds later (or if the target dies), dealing <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK as damage to nearby enemies. Each time the target is dealt damage during the explosion (up to <shuzhi>4</> times), AoE is doubled and damage is increased.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，可以发动跳跃攻击。
向前方扔出一枚炸弹，对前方圆形范围内的敌人造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标，消耗<shuzhi>250</>点耐力。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne or after jumping once, launch Jumping Blast.
Toss a bomb that deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to enemies in a circle ahead, knocking them back a short distance. Consumes <shuzhi>250</> endurance.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者使用二段跳之后，可以在空中发动空中攻击。
向下方发射出一道原能光线，并向前扫射，对扫过的敌人造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
After double-jumping, launch Aerial Discharge in mid-air.
Fire an Omnium beam downward. The beam then sweeps forward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString: 在普通攻击过程中，长按普攻，向前方扫射，对扫过的敌人总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点范围伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Hold attack button during a normal attack to unleash Suppressing Fire in front, dealing enemies AoE damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> in total.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。

The third attack deals total damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</>.

Desc.LocalizedString:
After the third normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger Rapid Lunge.
Upon hit, <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target, dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻(存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，会触发旋转利刃。
下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Spiral Drive.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each hit.

Desc.SourceString:
召唤浮游冰炮，持续<shuzhi>20</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>90</>秒。浮游冰炮出场造成<shuzhi>576%</>*攻击力伤害，拥有技能：<yellow_lbl_14_1>激光束</>。
<yellow_lbl_14_1>激光束</>：发射激光，每次对目标造成<shuzhi>152%</>*攻击力伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Summons a Hovering Cannon for <shuzhi>20</>s. Cooldown: <shuzhi>90</>s. Upon deployment, the Hovering Cannon deals damage equal to <shuzhi>576%</> of ATK and has the skill: <yellow_lbl_14_1>Laser Beam</>.
 <yellow_lbl_14_1>Laser Beam</>: Fires a laser, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>152%</> of ATK to the target per shot.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，挥舞法杖可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, swing the staff to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻，会触发落月击。
落地时对周围目标每<shuzhi>0.2</>秒造成一次伤害，共计<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne to trigger Moonfall.
Upon landing, deal damage once every <shuzhi>0.2</> seconds, for a total of <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage.

Desc.SourceString:
普攻第三下后，长按普攻可触发分支攻击，消耗<shuzhi>300</>点耐力。
第一下分支将前方附近的怪物聚拢（<shuzhi>强制浮空</>）并每<shuzhi>0.3</>秒造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害(最多<shuzhi>4</>次)。
第二下分支对目标位置及其附近的敌方单位每<shuzhi>0.3</>秒造成一次<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
After the third normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger branch attacks, consuming <shuzhi>300</> points of endurance.
First Attack: Pull in enemies in front of the user, <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> them and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> every <shuzhi>0.3</> seconds (up to <shuzhi>4</> times).
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> at the target location and to nearby enemies every <shuzhi>0.3</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却15秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
使用方向键加闪避按钮触发前闪避的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发涌现。
每个能量波动命中目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
释放立即获得<shuzhi>75</>点武器充能值。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Surge.
Each energy pulse deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets.
Grant <shuzhi>75</> weapon charge points upon use.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发后闪攻击。
拓荒者向前放释放一个能量球，对经过的敌方单位每<shuzhi>0.3</>秒造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害(最多五次)。
释放立即获得<shuzhi>75</>点武器充能值。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Evasive Blast.
Fire an energy orb forward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets in its path every <shuzhi>0.3</> seconds (up to 5 times).
Grant <shuzhi>75</> weapon charge points upon use.

Desc.SourceString: 在原地释放一个能量护盾，对护盾中的友方单位每秒恢复<shuzhi>{3}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{4}</>点生命值，并降低<shuzhi>{0}%</>受到的伤害，持续<shuzhi>10</>秒。冷却<shuzhi>60</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Create an energy shield at the Wanderer's location. Heal allies within the shield for <shuzhi>{3}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{4}</> every second and reduce their damage taken by <shuzhi>{0}%</> for <shuzhi>10</> seconds. <shuzhi>60</>-second cooldown.

Desc.SourceString: 在原地释放一个能量护盾，对护盾中的友方单位每秒恢复<shuzhi>{3}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{4}</>点生命值，并降低<shuzhi>{0}%</>受到的伤害，持续<shuzhi>10</>秒。冷却<shuzhi>60</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Create an energy shield at the Wanderer's location. Heal allies within the shield for <shuzhi>{3}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{4}</> every second and reduce their damage taken by <shuzhi>{0}%</> for <shuzhi>10</> seconds. <shuzhi>60</>-second cooldown.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，设置权杖持续清除拓荒者和友方的负面效果，并治疗附近拓荒者和友方目标<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点生命，持续<shuzhi>7</>秒，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon from another, <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the Wanderer</>. The staff continuously removes negative effects from the Wanderer and allies while providing healing to them within range, restoring <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> HP for <shuzhi>7</> seconds. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (not applicable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，设置权杖持续清除拓荒者和友方的负面效果，并治疗附近拓荒者和友方目标<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点生命，持续<shuzhi>7</>秒，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon from another, <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the Wanderer</>. The staff continuously removes negative effects from the Wanderer and allies while providing healing to them within range, restoring <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> HP for <shuzhi>7</> seconds. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (not applicable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，挥舞镰刀可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标并使拓荒者滞空。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, swing the scythe to launch 5 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>, <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target, and cause the Wanderer to go airborne.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，在空中连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，并将目标击落，触发时离地距离越高，伤害越高，最高可达<shuzhi>600%</>伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne or after jumping once, attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target down. The higher the location is when triggered, the more damage is dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻(存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，触发飞镰重击。
下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害；落地时对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并造成<shuzhi>强控击倒</>效果。
触发时离地距离越高，伤害越高，最高可达<shuzhi>600%</>伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Asunder.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and deliver a <shuzhi>knockdown</>.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

Desc.SourceString:
普攻第四下后，长按普攻可触发回旋链刃。
切换为链刃状态，对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并将附近的怪物拉扯至身边。
Desc.LocalizedString:
After the fourth normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger Returning Chainblade.
Transform into a chainblade, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and pulling them in.

Desc.SourceString: 处于下蹲状态时靠近敌人身后，点击普攻可触发偷袭，挥舞镰刀，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to use Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
使用方向键加闪避按钮触发前闪避的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发闪击。
命中目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并将附近的怪物拉扯至身边。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Rapid Lunge.
Deal up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage and pull in nearby enemies.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避时在原地召唤蝙蝠领域，将目标拉扯至中心。闪避时的短暂时间内点击普攻，挥舞镰刀，对身前目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: When dodging, summon a domain of the bat that pulls the target into the center. Tap normal attack during the short period after dodging to swing the scythe, dealing up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage to the target.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却15秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时，挥舞巨镰对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害并触发幻时。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, swing the massive scythe at nearby enemies, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and triggering Phantasia.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时，挥舞巨镰对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害并触发幻时。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, swing the massive scythe at nearby enemies, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and triggering Phantasia.

Desc.SourceString: 向前突进一小段距离挥舞镰刀对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并掷出镰刀对碰撞的目标最多再次造成<shuzhi>{3}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{4}</>点伤害，技能期间自身受到伤害减少<shuzhi>80%</>，冷却<shuzhi>45</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Rush forward a short distance before swinging the scythe at nearby enemies, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> before throwing the scythe, which deals up to <shuzhi>{3}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{4}</> damage to enemies it strikes. While using this Skill, take <shuzhi>80%</> less damage. Cooldown: <shuzhi>45</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 向前突进一小段距离挥舞镰刀对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并掷出镰刀对碰撞的目标最多再次造成<shuzhi>{3}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{4}</>点伤害，技能期间自身受到伤害减少<shuzhi>80%</>，冷却<shuzhi>45</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Rush forward a short distance before swinging the scythe at nearby enemies, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> before throwing the scythe, which deals up to <shuzhi>{3}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{4}</> damage to enemies it strikes. While using this Skill, take <shuzhi>80%</> less damage. Cooldown: <shuzhi>45</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 镰刀插地，对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，<shuzhi>3</>秒内持续吸附周围敌人，最多造成<shuzhi>{3}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{4}</>点伤害，被吸附的敌人无法进行操作，附带<shuzhi>3</>秒<shuzhi>50%</>减速，持续期间自身霸体且受到伤害减少<shuzhi>80%</>，冷却<shuzhi>45</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Drive the scythe into the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and drawing enemies into the area for <shuzhi>3</> seconds. Enemies who are drawn in take up to <shuzhi>{3}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{4}</> damage, unable to perform actions, and are slowed by <shuzhi>50%</> for <shuzhi>3</> seconds. While using this Skill, gain hyperbody and take <shuzhi>80%</> less damage. Cooldown: <shuzhi>45</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 镰刀插地，对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，<shuzhi>3</>秒内持续吸附周围敌人，最多造成<shuzhi>{3}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{4}</>点伤害，被吸附的敌人无法进行操作，附带<shuzhi>3</>秒<shuzhi>50%</>减速，持续期间自身霸体且受到伤害减少<shuzhi>80%</>，冷却<shuzhi>45</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Drive the scythe into the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and drawing enemies into the area for <shuzhi>3</> seconds. Enemies who are drawn in take up to <shuzhi>{3}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{4}</> damage, unable to perform actions, and are slowed by <shuzhi>50%</> for <shuzhi>3</> seconds. While using this Skill, gain hyperbody and take <shuzhi>80%</> less damage. Cooldown: <shuzhi>45</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，连续拉弓进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, draw the bow repeatedly to attack 5 times.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back a short distance.

Desc.SourceString: 长按普攻，进入蓄力攻击状态，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点基础伤害，蓄力每增加<shuzhi>1</>秒，伤害增加<shuzhi>0.5</>倍，蓄力<shuzhi>3</>秒后达到伤害最大值，若命中怪物头部或者弱点，触发爆头效果（爆头效果对拓荒者无效），造成双倍伤害，并击倒目标。
Desc.LocalizedString: Tap and hold normal attack to charge an attack. Deal base damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, and <shuzhi>50%</> more for each <shuzhi>1</> second spent charging, up to <shuzhi>3</> seconds. Deal double damage when scoring a headshot or when hitting an enemy's weak point, and knock the target down (headshots are ineffective against Wanderers).

Desc.SourceString: 任意一段普攻后长按普攻，释放箭雨造成范围伤害，对目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: After any normal attack, hold the normal attack button to unleash Arrow Rain, dealing up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> area damage to targets.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行四次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row in the air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却15秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避后，点击攻击，可触发蓄力一击效果，小幅击退目标，并对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Tap attack after dodging to trigger Loaded Arrow, knocking the target back by a short distance and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却15秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 当命中敌方单位超过<shuzhi>3</>人时，获得<shuzhi>10%</>伤害提升，持续<shuzhi>2.5</>秒；并在<shuzhi>2.5</>秒内免疫硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: After hitting more than <shuzhi>3</> enemies, increase damage by <shuzhi>10%</> for <shuzhi>2.5</> seconds and gain hitstun immunity for the next <shuzhi>2.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
使用巨擎手臂战斗，持续<shuzhi>15</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>60</>秒，战斗期间免疫硬直，再次点击技能取消使用。
普攻总计可造成<shuzhi>4140%</>*攻击力的伤害和强控击飞效果；技能造成<shuzhi>2008%</>*攻击力的伤害和强控浮空效果，冷却<shuzhi>10</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Summons a Colossus Arm to fight for <shuzhi>15</>s. Cooldown: <shuzhi>60</>s. Grants hitstun immunity during its active time. Press again to cancel.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>4140%</> of ATK with normal attacks, knocking enemies up. Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>2008%</> of ATK with skills, strongly suspending enemies. Cooldown: <shuzhi>10</>s.

Desc.SourceString: 食用强化罐头，使玩家在<shuzhi>6</>秒内不能进行除了使用源器外的其他操作，并每秒恢复<shuzhi>2%</>最大生命值，期间受到伤害恢复等量伤害的生命值，冷却<shuzhi>30</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: After eating a can of empowering vegetables, the Wanderer will be unable to act for <shuzhi>6</> seconds except to use Relics, but recover <shuzhi>2%</> of Max HP every second. When receiving damage during this time, restore the same value of HP as the damage received. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 拓荒者的移动速度得到大幅度强化，移动速度提升<shuzhi>20%</>，持续<shuzhi>5</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>35</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Greatly enhances the Wanderer's speed. Increase speed by <shuzhi>20%</> for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>35</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 拓荒者使抑制器能量过载形成电磁护盾，使拓荒者免疫<shuzhi>20%</>的伤害，持续<shuzhi>5</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>30</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: The Wanderer overloads their Suppressor to create an EM shield, reducing damage received by <shuzhi>20%</> for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 开启炮台模式，射出能量巨大的炮弹，每发炮弹造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并击飞目标，冷却<shuzhi>{2}</>秒，架设炮台时免疫硬直和控制效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Enable turret mode and fire large energy orbs, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and launching the target into the air. Become immune to hitstun and control effects while setting up the turret. Cooldown: <shuzhi>{2}</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 开启炮台模式，射出能量巨大的炮弹，每发炮弹造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并击飞目标，冷却<shuzhi>{2}</>秒，架设炮台时免疫硬直和控制效果。

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，切换到该武器时，连续向身前进行扫射，每发子弹造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, unleash continuous Suppressing Fire in front upon switching to this weapon, with each bullet dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，切换到该武器时，连续向身前进行扫射，每发子弹造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，向前方发出一束极寒激光，命中造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>伤害，附带<shuzhi>3</>秒<shuzhi>强控冰冻</>效果，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and fire an Arctic Beam, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and <shuzhi>strongly freezing</> the target for <shuzhi>3</> seconds. Meanwhile, gain hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5 seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，切换到该武器时，连续向身前进行扫射，每发子弹造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。

Desc.SourceString: 点击普攻进入到瞄准状态，长按普攻，可进行连续射击，最多可连续射击<shuzhi>40</>发子弹。每发子弹造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。若命中怪物头部或者弱点，触发爆头效果（爆头效果对拓荒者无效），造成双倍伤害，并击倒目标
Desc.LocalizedString: Tap normal attack to enter aiming mode. Hold normal attack to fire continuously, up to <shuzhi>40</> rounds. Each shot deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Deal double damage when scoring a headshot or hitting an enemy's weak point, and knock the target down (headshots are ineffective against Wanderers).

Desc.SourceString: 点击普攻进入到瞄准状态，长按普攻，可进行连续射击，最多可连续射击<shuzhi>40</>发子弹。每发子弹造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。若命中怪物头部或者弱点，触发爆头效果（爆头效果对拓荒者无效），造成双倍伤害，并击倒目标
Desc.LocalizedString: Tap normal attack to enter aiming mode. Hold normal attack to fire continuously, up to <shuzhi>40</> rounds. Each shot deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Deal double damage when scoring a headshot or hitting an enemy's weak point, and knock the target down (headshots are ineffective against Wanderers).

Desc.SourceString: 召唤山岳重压目标，链接周围目标并持续造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，若3秒后没有脱离链接状态，则会注视目标。
Desc.LocalizedString: Summon the weight of a mountain on the target, linking all nearby targets and continuously dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. After 3 seconds, lock onto targets that fail to break their links.

Desc.SourceString: 使用喷子攻击对手，链接周围目标并持续造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，若3秒后没有脱离链接状态，则会注视目标。
Desc.LocalizedString: Spray opponents in an area, linking all nearby targets and continuously dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. After 3 seconds, lock onto targets that fail to break their links.

Desc.SourceString:
驾驶机器人进行战斗，持续<shuzhi>15</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>60</>秒，战斗期间免疫硬直，再次点击技能取消驾驶并引爆机器人，造成<shuzhi>250.2%</>*攻击力伤害。机器人拥有技能：<yellow_lbl_14_1>瞄准射击</>。
<yellow_lbl_14_1>瞄准射击</>：高频发射火焰子弹，每次命中造成<shuzhi>48.1%</>*攻击力伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Pilots a Mecha for <shuzhi>15</>s. Grants hitstun immunity while active. Cooldown: <shuzhi>60</>s. Press again to exit and detonate, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>250.2%</> of ATK. Mecha Skill: <yellow_lbl_14_1>Aimed Shot</>.
 <yellow_lbl_14_1>Aimed Shot</>: Shoots rapidly to deal damage equal to <shuzhi>48.1%</> of ATK per hit.

使用巨擎手臂战斗，持续<shuzhi>15</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>60</>秒，战斗期间免疫硬直，再次点击技能取消使用。

<yellow_lbl_14_1>激光束</>：发射激光，每次对目标造成<shuzhi>152%</>*攻击力伤害。

Summons a Hovering Cannon for <shuzhi>20</>s. Cooldown: <shuzhi>90</>s. Upon deployment, the Hovering Cannon deals damage equal to <shuzhi>576%</> of ATK and has the skill: <yellow_lbl_14_1>Laser Beam</>.
 <yellow_lbl_14_1>Laser Beam</>: Fires a laser, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>152%</> of ATK to the target per shot.

Desc.SourceString: 竖起一道坚盾持续<shuzhi>15</>秒，可阻挡子弹穿透。盾有<shuzhi>350%</>*拓荒者最大生命值的能量值，若敌方目标穿过原能护盾，会被减速<shuzhi>50%</>持续<shuzhi>5</>秒；拓荒者及友方穿过原能护盾则会获得伤害提升<shuzhi>10%</>持续<shuzhi>10</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>50</>秒；无法阻挡铳枪的子弹。

Upon breaking, slows the attacker by <shuzhi>50%</> for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. While inside the Omnium Shield, allies deal <shuzhi>10%</> more damage for <shuzhi>10</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>50</> seconds. Cannot stop firearm rounds.

Desc.SourceString: 向前方抛出熔岩炸弹轰击目标，造成<shuzhi>802.6%</>*攻击力伤害，附带强控击飞，冷却<shuzhi>45</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Throws a Lava Bomb forward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>802.6%</> of ATK and knocking the target up. Cooldown: <shuzhi>45</>s.

Desc.SourceString: 向指定位置射出<shuzhi>1</>枚机械原能炮弹，命中地面或水面生成一个可攀爬的机械原能柱，原能柱最多存在<shuzhi>20</>秒。每<shuzhi>50</>秒获得<shuzhi>1</>次充能，可积攒<shuzhi>2</>次充能。
Desc.LocalizedString: Launch <shuzhi>1</> Omnium bomb at target location and create a scalable energy pillar upon striking the ground or water surface for up to <shuzhi>20</> seconds. Gain <shuzhi>1</> charge every <shuzhi>50</> seconds. Can store up to <shuzhi>2</> charges.

Desc.SourceString: 向指定位置射出<shuzhi>1</>枚机械原能炮弹，命中地面或水面生成一个可攀爬的机械原能柱，原能柱最多存在<shuzhi>20</>秒。每<shuzhi>50</>秒获得<shuzhi>1</>次充能，可积攒<shuzhi>2</>次充能。
Desc.LocalizedString: Launch <shuzhi>1</> Omnium bomb at target location and create a scalable energy pillar upon striking the ground or water surface for up to <shuzhi>20</> seconds. Gain <shuzhi>1</> charge every <shuzhi>50</> seconds. Can store up to <shuzhi>2</> charges.

Desc.SourceString: 向指定位置射出<shuzhi>1</>枚机械原能炮弹，命中地面或水面生成一个可攀爬的机械原能柱，原能柱最多存在<shuzhi>20</>秒。每<shuzhi>50</>秒获得<shuzhi>1</>次充能，可积攒<shuzhi>2</>次充能。
Desc.LocalizedString: Launch <shuzhi>1</> Omnium bomb at target location and create a scalable energy pillar upon striking the ground or water surface for up to <shuzhi>20</> seconds. Gain <shuzhi>1</> charge every <shuzhi>50</> seconds. Can store up to <shuzhi>2</> charges.

Desc.SourceString: 进入量子态，使敌人无法通过光学手段观测到自身，持续<shuzhi>10</>秒。发动攻击会解除此效果，冷却<shuzhi>90</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Enter a quantum state for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, during which enemies cannot detect the wearer. The wearer exits quantum state after attacking once. Cooldown: <shuzhi>90</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 冷却缩短至<shuzhi>80</>秒
Desc.LocalizedString: Reduce cooldown to <shuzhi>80</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 全源器减伤<shuzhi>1%</>
Desc.LocalizedString: All Relics gain <shuzhi>1%</> damage reduction.

Desc.SourceString: 量子态下发动的攻击伤害增加<shuzhi>100%</>，<shuzhi>1</>次伤害后解除此效果
Desc.LocalizedString: +<shuzhi>100%</> damage in Quantum state, negated after <shuzhi>1</> successful attack.

Desc.SourceString: 量子态持续<shuzhi>20</>秒
Desc.LocalizedString: Quantum state lasts for <shuzhi>20</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 量子态下<shuzhi>3</>次伤害后解除伤害增加<shuzhi>100%</>效果
Desc.LocalizedString: +<shuzhi>100%</> damage in Quantum state, negated after <shuzhi>3</> successful attacks.

Desc.SourceString: 弹射出机械手臂，将指定目标拉至身边，或将自身牵引至目标身边，命中造成<shuzhi>100%</>伤害，附带<shuzhi>强控浮空</>效果；也可利用机械手臂到达一些难以去到的地方。每<shuzhi>30</>秒获得<shuzhi>1</>次充能，可积攒<shuzhi>2</>次充能。
Desc.LocalizedString: Fire a Cybernetic Arm to draw in the selected target to the Wanderer, or the Wanderer to the target. Deal <shuzhi>100%</> damage on hit, <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target. Can be used to access hard-to-reach areas. Gain <shuzhi>1</> charge every <shuzhi>30</> seconds. Can store up to <shuzhi>2</> charges.

Desc.SourceString: 使用后获得电磁护盾，使自身受到伤害减少<shuzhi>20%</>，持续<shuzhi>7</>秒
Desc.LocalizedString: Produce an EM shield that reduces damage taken by <shuzhi>20%</> for <shuzhi>7</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 全源器增伤<shuzhi>1%</>
Desc.LocalizedString: All Relics now increase damage dealt by an additional <shuzhi>1%</>.

Desc.SourceString: 每<shuzhi>15</>秒恢复<shuzhi>1</>次充能
Desc.LocalizedString: Regain <shuzhi>1</> charge every <shuzhi>15</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 最多可积攒<shuzhi>3</>次
Desc.LocalizedString: Store up to <shuzhi>3</> charges.

Desc.SourceString: 命中使目标在<shuzhi>7</>秒内最终伤害降低<shuzhi>30%</>
Desc.LocalizedString: Reduce final damage of targets hit by <shuzhi>30%</> for <shuzhi>7</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 自身耐力回复速度提高<shuzhi>50%</>，持续<shuzhi>10</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>20</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Increase endurance recovery speed by <shuzhi>50%</> for <shuzhi>10</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>20</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，旋转飞刃造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害；并掷出<shuzhi>2</>个飞刃围绕拓荒者旋转，对每次触碰的目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and fire spinning blades. Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and throw <shuzhi>2</> blades that orbit around the Wanderer, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to those that touch them.

Desc.SourceString:
使用方向键加闪避按钮触发前闪避的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发飞刃。
命中目标会<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标并造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害；再次点击掷出飞刃，飞刃每次命中目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，最多<shuzhi>6</>次。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Flying Blades.
Upon hit, <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Keep tapping to throw up to <shuzhi>6</> more Flying Blades, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却15秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，挥舞双刀可连续进行5次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, brandish the dual blades to launch 5 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back a short distance.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，点击普攻可在空中连续进行四次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
普攻第三下后，长按普攻可触发闪击。
命中目标会<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标，总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
After the third normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger Rapid Lunge.
Upon hit, <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target, dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻(存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，会触发旋转利刃。
下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Spiral Drive.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each hit.

Desc.SourceString: 处于下蹲状态时靠近敌人身后，点击普攻可触发偷袭，双刀刺击，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to use Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString: 向四周射出<shuzhi>6</>个回旋飞刃，每个飞刃造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，冷却<shuzhi>{2}</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Fire <shuzhi>6</> Returning Blades in all directions, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. <shuzhi>{2}</>-second cooldown.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，向目标射出爆裂箭雨，对单个目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and unleash Explosive Barrage on the target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却15秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避后，点击攻击，可触发蓄力一击效果，小幅击退目标，并对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Tap attack after dodging to trigger Loaded Arrow, knocking the target back by a short distance and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却15秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，连续拉弓进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, draw the bow repeatedly to attack 5 times.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back a short distance.

Desc.SourceString: 长按普攻，进入蓄力攻击状态，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点基础伤害，蓄力每增加<shuzhi>1</>秒，伤害增加<shuzhi>0.5</>倍，蓄力<shuzhi>3</>秒后达到伤害最大值，若命中怪物头部或者弱点，触发爆头效果（爆头效果对拓荒者无效），造成双倍伤害，并击倒目标。
Desc.LocalizedString: Tap and hold normal attack to charge an attack. Deal base damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, and <shuzhi>50%</> more for each <shuzhi>1</> second spent charging, up to <shuzhi>3</> seconds. Deal double damage when scoring a headshot or when hitting an enemy's weak point, and knock the target down (headshots are ineffective against Wanderers).

Desc.SourceString: 任意一段普攻后长按普攻，释放箭雨造成范围伤害，对目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: After any normal attack, hold the normal attack button to unleash Arrow Rain, dealing up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> area damage to targets.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行四次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row in the air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.

Desc.SourceString: 后空翻并向前方射出<shuzhi>1</>支穿透箭，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并击退目标，冷却<shuzhi>{2}</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Backflips and fires <shuzhi>1</> piercing shot forward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knocking the target back. <shuzhi>{2}</>-second cooldown.

Desc.SourceString: 后空翻并向前方射出<shuzhi>1</>支穿透箭，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并击退目标，冷却<shuzhi>{2}</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Backflips and fires <shuzhi>1</> piercing shot forward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knocking the target back. <shuzhi>{2}</>-second cooldown.

Desc.SourceString: 在身后空投一个飞弹发射器，持续<shuzhi>8</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>60</>秒。释放多枚飞弹攻击附近敌方单位，每发飞弹造成<shuzhi>62%</>*攻击力伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Places a missile launcher behind the caster for <shuzhi>8</>s. Fires multiple missiles at nearby enemies, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>62%</> of ATK. Cooldown: <shuzhi>60</>s.

Desc.SourceString: 在身后空投一个飞弹发射器，持续<shuzhi>8</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>60</>秒。释放多枚飞弹攻击附近敌方单位，每发飞弹造成<shuzhi>62%</>*攻击力伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Places a missile launcher behind the caster for <shuzhi>8</>s. Fires multiple missiles at nearby enemies, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>62%</> of ATK. Cooldown: <shuzhi>60</>s.

Desc.SourceString: 在身后空投一个飞弹发射器，持续<shuzhi>8</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>60</>秒。释放多枚飞弹攻击附近敌方单位，每发飞弹造成<shuzhi>62%</>*攻击力伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Places a missile launcher behind the caster for <shuzhi>8</>s. Fires multiple missiles at nearby enemies, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>62%</> of ATK. Cooldown: <shuzhi>60</>s.

Desc.SourceString: 引爆磁性炸弹，对目标造成<shuzhi>415.7%</>*攻击力伤害和强控击飞效果，并使自身在<shuzhi>5</>秒内免疫硬直效果，冷却<shuzhi>30</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Detonates a Magnetic Bomb, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>415.7%</> of ATK and knocking the target up. Grants immunity to hitstun for <shuzhi>5</>s. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</>s.

Desc.SourceString: 竖起一道原能护盾，持续<shuzhi>10</>秒，可阻挡子弹穿透。护盾有<shuzhi>200%</>*拓荒者最大生命值的能量值，冷却<shuzhi>90</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Generate an Omnium shield that stops projectiles for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, with starting energy equal to <shuzhi>200%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP and a <shuzhi>90</>-second cooldown.

Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.
