Desc.SourceString: 后空翻并向前方射出<shuzhi>3</>支穿透箭，主箭对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，另外两支箭造成60%的伤害，并<shuzhi>强制击退</>目标，目标在击退过程中碰到阻挡则会进入<shuzhi>5</>秒晕眩，冷却<shuzhi>25</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Perform a backflip and fire <shuzhi>3</> piercing shots, with the main shot dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK, and the other two shots dealing 60% damage. In addition, <shuzhi>knock targets back</> and stun them for <shuzhi>5</> seconds if they collide with an obstacle. Cooldown: <shuzhi>25</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，在目标位置降下持续冰雹，对单个目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，冰雹攻击有<shuzhi>10%</>几率使附带<shuzhi>2</>秒<shuzhi>强控冰冻</>效果，同时自身进入强冷状态，造成伤害提高<shuzhi>12%</>，持续<shuzhi>55</>秒，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and create a hailstorm at the target location, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to each target. The storm has a <shuzhi>10%</> chance to inflict a <shuzhi>2</>-second <shuzhi>strong freeze effect</>. Enter the Cold Front state, increase damage dealt by <shuzhi>12%</> for <shuzhi>55</> seconds. Meanwhile, gain hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5 seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却25秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of targets in the area. Cooldown: 25 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避后，点击攻击，可触发蓄力一击效果，<shuzhi>强制击退</>目标，并对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Tap attack after dodging to trigger a Loaded Arrow, which <shuzhi>knocks the target back</> and deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却25秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of targets in the area. Cooldown: 25 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，连续拉弓进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, draw the bow to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK, and knock the target back a short distance.

Desc.SourceString: 长按普攻，进入蓄力攻击状态，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的基础伤害，蓄力每增加<shuzhi>1</>秒，伤害增加<shuzhi>0.5</>倍，蓄力<shuzhi>3</>秒后达到伤害最大值，若命中怪物头部或者弱点，触发爆头效果（爆头效果对拓荒者无效），造成双倍伤害，并击倒目标。
Desc.LocalizedString: Tap and hold normal attack to charge an attack. Deal base damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK, and <shuzhi>50%</> more for each <shuzhi>1</> second spent charging, up to <shuzhi>3</> seconds. Deal double damage when scoring a headshot or when hitting an enemy's weak point, and knock the target down (headshots are ineffective against Wanderers).

Desc.SourceString: 任意一段普攻后长按普攻，释放箭雨造成范围伤害，对目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: After any normal attack, tap and hold the normal attack button to unleash Arrow Rain, dealing area damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行四次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row in mid-air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
挥舞大锤可连续进行4次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{11}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{12}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{13}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{14}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{15}</>点伤害，并浮空目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Swing the maul to launch 4 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{13}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{14}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{15}</> and suspend the target.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，点击普攻触发跳跃攻击，造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害并<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标。
触发时离地距离越高，伤害越高，最高可达<shuzhi>600%</>伤害，并造成<shuzhi>强控浮空</>效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to trigger Jumping Blast. Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and <shuzhi> strongly suspend</> the target.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage, and also <shuzhi> strongly suspends</> targets.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空长按，二段跳或附近有目标时在空中短按，攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，触发震荡波，<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标<shuzhi>4</>次，每次造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，消耗<shuzhi>250</>点耐力。
触发时离地距离越高，伤害越高，最高可达<shuzhi>600%</>伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tapping and holding while airborne, double-jumping, short tapping in the air when there are targets nearby, climbing, jumping backward, or attacking while using the Jetpack will trigger a Shockwave. <shuzhi>Strongly suspend</> the target <shuzhi>4</> times, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK+ <shuzhi>{3}</> each time. Cost <shuzhi>250</> endurance.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

Desc.SourceString: 下蹲靠近敌人身后时，点击普攻可触发偷袭，挥舞重锤，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to trigger Sneak Attack. Swing a hammer to deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString: 长按普攻触发怒气连击，造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Hold the normal attack button to trigger Furious Strikes. Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.

Desc.SourceString: 使用方向键加闪避按钮触发跳跃重击，触发震荡波，浮空目标<shuzhi>4</>次，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Use the arrow buttons and the dodge button to trigger Jumping Smash, unleashing a Shockwave that suspends the enemy <shuzhi>4</> times, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发破击长空，可向前方释放出5个震荡波，每段造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并浮空目标。
Desc.LocalizedString: Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Worldsplitter, which unleashes 5 Shockwave that each deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and suspends enemies.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却15秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 用技能触发乘风重击，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标，同时在地面形成大范围流风（持续吸附敌方），自身在流风里使用闪避不消耗闪避次数。
Desc.LocalizedString: Use a Skill to trigger Windfury, which deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets and <shuzhi>strongly suspends</> them. In addition, leave an air current on the ground that constantly draws in enemies, while standing in the air current, dodging has no cost.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时，释放雷弧冲击，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害与浮空，同时提高自身30%全抗，在此期间自身攻击额外附带20%雷抗伤害，持续10秒，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon from another, unleashes a lightning arc impact, dealing <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage and knocking the target airborne. Gains 30% All Resistance and 20% Volt Damage bonus for 10 seconds. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (not applicable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，挥舞长枪可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，并大幅击退目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, swing the long spear to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back a significant distance.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行四次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row in the air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻(存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，会触发破击。
下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害；落地时对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并击倒目标。
触发时离地距离越高，伤害越高，最高可达<shuzhi>600%</>伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Crashing Drive.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target down.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

Desc.SourceString:
普攻第三下后，长按普攻可触发乱枪狂舞。
命中目标会<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害；再次点击对浮空目标连续攻击，对单个目标最多可造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
After the third normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger Spear Flurry.
Upon hit, <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Tap again to continue attacking the airborne target, dealing up to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> damage to a single target.

Desc.SourceString: 长枪刺出，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Thrust the long spear forward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
使用方向键加闪避按钮触发前闪避的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发飞踢。
飞踢命中目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，大幅击退目标并对怪物造成<shuzhi>1</>秒，对玩家造成<shuzhi>0.5</>秒<shuzhi>强控眩晕</>效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Flying Kick.
Once hit the target, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, knock the enemies back significantly, and <shuzhi>stun</> enemies for <shuzhi>1</> second or <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds to Wanderers.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发挑击。
挥舞长枪砸地造成<shuzhi>强控浮空</>，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Lunging Smash.
Slam the long spear into the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> targets.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时，会闪烁到目标位置进行多段攻击，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，最后一击附带<shuzhi>强控浮空</>效果，技能期间免疫硬直效果，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon from another, blinks to the target location, and launches multiple attacks, dealing <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage. The final strike <shuzhi>knocks the targets airborne</>. During the skill, gains hitstun and damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (not applicable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，跳向空中，蓄力后向目标位置投掷出雷电长枪，落地会产生范围爆炸，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，且<shuzhi>强控麻痹</>目标<shuzhi>1</>秒，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</>, jump in the air and throw a thunderous spear that explodes upon hitting the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and <shuzhi>strongly paralyzing</> targets for <shuzhi>1</> second. Meanwhile, gain hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5 seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 旋风一般将目标<shuzhi>强控浮空</>，并使拓荒者滞空，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害与浮空，冷却<shuzhi>25</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: <shuzhi>Strongly suspend</> targets and go airborne, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>25</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，挥舞短剑可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，造成<shuzhi>击飞</>效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, swing the blade to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and <shuzhi>launch</> the target.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空后，点击普攻可在空中连续进行四次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并造成<shuzhi>强控击倒</>效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and deliver a <shuzhi>knockdown</>.

Desc.SourceString:
普攻后长按可触发气旋。
命中目标会浮空目标，气旋可对单个目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold the normal attack button after normal attacks to trigger Cyclone.
Upon hit, suspend the target and deal <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to a single target.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻，攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，会触发落斩。
下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害；落地时对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并击退目标。
触发时离地距离越高，伤害越高，最高可达<shuzhi>600%</>伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne, or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Diving Edge.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to surrounding targets and knock them back.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

Desc.SourceString: 处于下蹲状态时靠近敌人身后，点击普攻可触发偷袭，刺出短剑，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to trigger Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却15秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发飞身一击。
拓荒者向前挥刀冲刺对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标并使自己滞空，再次对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Leap Attack.
The Wanderer swings their blade forward and deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target, <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> them while going airborne. Then, deal additional damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to the target.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，冲向目标并将目标<shuzhi>强控浮空</>，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，同时留下剑刃风暴，对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，自身在<shuzhi>5</>秒内免疫重伤/冰冻/灼烧/感电效果，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Authorizer</> and allow the Authorizer to rush to the target, <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> the target and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. A bladestorm follows, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>. Gain immunity to Grievous, Freeze, Burn, and Electrify effects for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString: 当拓荒者没有触发剑气纵横，切换到该武器时，触发乱舞效果，对周围目标造成总计<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: When the Wanderer has not triggered Unbridled Flurry, trigger Flurry after switching to this weapon instead, which deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString: 挥舞短剑穿梭于目标之间，最多可对<shuzhi>5</>个目标总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，技能期间免疫控制效果，且受到伤害减少<shuzhi>50%</>，对同一目标造成的伤害依次递减<shuzhi>20%</>，穿梭完成后斩击前方空间，造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点范围伤害，并浮空目标，冷却<shuzhi>15</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Roam through targets while swinging the blade, dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to up to <shuzhi>5</> targets (damage dealt by each consecutive hit on the same target will be reduced by <shuzhi>20%</> from the previous hit). After Roam has concluded, slash the space in front, dealing area damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to surrounding targets and suspending them. Become immune to control effects while skill is in use, and all damage taken is reduced by <shuzhi>50%</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>15</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，挥舞双刀可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, brandish the pair of dual blades to launch up to 5 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back a short distance.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，点击普攻可在空中连续进行4次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
普攻第三下后，长按普攻可触发闪击。
命中目标会<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标，总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
After the third normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger Rapid Lunge.
Upon hit, <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target, dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻(存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，会触发旋转利刃。
下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Spiral Drive.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each hit.

Desc.SourceString: 处于下蹲状态时靠近敌人身后，点击普攻可触发偷袭，双刀刺击，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to use Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
使用方向键加闪避按钮触发前闪避的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发飞刃。
对单个目标瞬切斩<shuzhi>5</>次，每次切斩造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，瞬切斩过程中免疫控制效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Flying Blades.
Slash a target <shuzhi>5</> times, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Grant immunity to control effects while phasing.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却15秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，闪烁到目标位置发动攻击，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，同时给目标添加电刑效果（<shuzhi>5</>秒后额外造成已损失血量<shuzhi>15%</>的雷电伤害，最高不超过拓荒者攻击力的<shuzhi>350%</>，属于异常状态，可被驱散），并掷出3个飞刃围绕拓荒者旋转，对每次触碰的目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Authorizer</> and teleport the Authorizer to the target position to launch an assault, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> with an additional Electrocution effect. (Electrocution: After <shuzhi>5</> seconds, deals volt damage equal to <shuzhi>15%</> of lost HP, up to <shuzhi>350%</> of the Authorizer's ATK. Can be dispelled.) Additionally, summon 3 flying blades spinning around the Authorizer, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> upon hit. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString: 向四周射出<shuzhi>6</>个回旋飞刃，每个飞刃造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，自身获得最长可持续<shuzhi>8</>秒的<shuzhi>霸体</>效果，释放的飞刃在外停留较长时间，飞刃返回自身时移除霸体效果，冷却<shuzhi>45</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Fire <shuzhi>6</> returning blades, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Gains <shuzhi>hyperbody</> for up to <shuzhi>8</> seconds, and the effect is removed when the blades return. <shuzhi>45</> -second cooldown.

Desc.SourceString: 连续挥舞大剑，对身前范围发射剑气，每次造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，每道剑气造成伤害依次递增<shuzhi>5%</>，技能期间免疫控制效果，冷却<shuzhi>30</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Swing the greatsword to launch sword auras forward, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and dealing increasing damage of <shuzhi>5%</> with each hit. Immune to control effects while active. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却15秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
使用方向键加闪避按钮触发前闪避的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发破斩。
破斩每段命中目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并造成<shuzhi>击飞</>效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Devastate.
Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each hit and <shuzhi>launch</> targets.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发半月斩。
挥舞大剑向前方斩出剑气，每道剑气造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Crescent Slash.
Swing the greatsword to unleash sword auras forward, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，挥舞大剑可连续进行四次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。

第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，造成<shuzhi>强控击飞</>，落地并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, swing a greatsword to attack 4 times in a row.

Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，点击普攻可在空中连续进行四次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。

Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.

普攻第三下后，长按普攻可触发腾空斩。

Desc.LocalizedString:
After the third normal attack, hold normal attack to trigger Rising Slash.
Upon hit, <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target and go airborne, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</>of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻(存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，触发落月斩。

触发时离地距离越高，伤害越高，最高可达<shuzhi>600%</>伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Moonset Slash.
While falling, each hit deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and launch targets.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

Desc.SourceString: 处于下蹲状态时靠近敌人身后，点击普攻可触发偷袭，大剑劈斩，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to use Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.LocalizedString: While standing still or moving, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Whirlwind, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds to the target. Grant hitstun immunity while in use.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，重击地面，形成冰墙，对范围内敌人造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并浮空目标，附带<shuzhi>50%</>减速，且无法使用闪避和跳跃技能，冰墙可以阻挡子弹，冰墙持续<shuzhi>5</>秒，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon from another, <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and strikes the ground, creating an ice wall. The impact deals <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage to enemies within range, knocking them airborne and applying a <shuzhi>50%</> Slow effect. Affected enemies cannot use Dodge or Jump skills. The ice wall blocks bullets and lasts for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. During the skill, grants damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (not applicable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，挥舞镰刀可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。

第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标并使拓荒者滞空。

While on the ground, swing the scythe to launch 5 consecutive attacks.

Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>, <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target, and cause the Wanderer to go airborne.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，在空中连续进行五次攻击。

下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害；落地时对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并造成<shuzhi>强控击倒</>效果。

Desc.LocalizedString:
After the fourth normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger Returning Chainblade.
Transform into a chainblade, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and pulling them in.

Desc.SourceString: 处于下蹲状态时靠近敌人身后，点击普攻可触发偷袭，挥舞镰刀，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to use Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
使用方向键加闪避按钮触发前闪避的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发闪击。
命中目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并将附近的怪物拉扯至身边。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Rapid Lunge.
Deal up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage and pull in nearby enemies.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避时在原地召唤蝙蝠领域，将目标拉扯至中心。闪避时的短暂时间内点击普攻，挥舞镰刀，对身前目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: When dodging, summon a domain of the bat that pulls the target into the center. Tap normal attack during the short period after dodging to swing the scythe, dealing up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage to the target.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时，挥舞巨镰对将范围内的目标与自身相连10秒（超出一定范围后解除），技能期间首次<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，持续期间内每秒<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，当目标被链接的时间超过5秒或断开链接时，会进入2秒晕眩
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, swing the scythe around and connect targets to the user for 10 seconds (leaving the area will negate the effect). Deal initial damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, then deal <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> damage every second, and stun targets for 2 seconds if they remain connected for longer than 5 seconds or break the connection.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时，挥舞巨镰对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害并触发幻时。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, swing the massive scythe at nearby enemies, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and triggering Phantasia.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，形成焰镰领域，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，领域存在<shuzhi>10</>秒，每隔<shuzhi>2</>秒生成焰镰，焰镰会牵引岩浆，形成熔岩喷发，造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害与浮空，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Authorizer</> and create a Flaming Scythe field, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. The field lasts for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, in which volcanic eruptions occur every <shuzhi>2</> seconds, knocking enemies airborne and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，形成焰镰领域，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，领域存在<shuzhi>10</>秒，每隔<shuzhi>2</>秒生成焰镰，焰镰会牵引岩浆，形成熔岩喷发，造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害与浮空，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。

The field lasts for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, in which volcanic eruptions occur every <shuzhi>2</> seconds, knocking enemies airborne and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString: 挥舞镰刀，超大范围切斩，对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，冷却<shuzhi>45</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Swing the scythe, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>45</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 挥舞镰刀，超大范围切斩，对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，冷却<shuzhi>45</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Swing the scythe, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>45</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，挥舞法杖可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, swing the staff to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻，会触发落月击。
落地时对周围目标每<shuzhi>0.2</>秒造成一次伤害，共计<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne to trigger Moonfall.
Upon landing, deal damage once every <shuzhi>0.2</> seconds, for a total of <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage.

Desc.SourceString:
普攻第三下后，长按普攻可触发分支攻击，消耗<shuzhi>300</>点耐力。
第一下分支将前方附近的怪物聚拢（<shuzhi>强制浮空</>）并每<shuzhi>0.3</>秒造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害(最多<shuzhi>4</>次)。
第二下分支对目标位置及其附近的敌方单位每<shuzhi>0.3</>秒造成一次<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
After the third normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger branch attacks, consuming <shuzhi>300</> points of endurance.
First Attack: Pull in enemies in front of the user, <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> them and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> every <shuzhi>0.3</> seconds (up to <shuzhi>4</> times).
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> at the target location and to nearby enemies every <shuzhi>0.3</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却15秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
使用方向键加闪避按钮触发前闪避的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发涌现。
每个能量波动命中目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
释放立即获得<shuzhi>75</>点武器充能值。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Surge.
Each energy pulse deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets.
Grant <shuzhi>75</> weapon charge points upon use.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发后闪攻击。
拓荒者向前放释放一个能量球，对经过的敌方单位每<shuzhi>0.3</>秒造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害(最多五次)。
释放立即获得<shuzhi>75</>点武器充能值。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Evasive Blast.
Fire an energy orb forward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets in its path every <shuzhi>0.3</> seconds (up to 5 times).
Grant <shuzhi>75</> weapon charge points upon use.

Desc.SourceString: 释放治疗领域，持续治疗周围的全体队友，跟随拓荒者移动，每<shuzhi>0.5</>秒治疗一次，每次治疗<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点的生命，持续<shuzhi>6</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>60</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Create a healing zone that moves with the Wanderer and heals nearby allies for <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> once every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds for <shuzhi>6</> seconds. <shuzhi>60</>-second cooldown.

Desc.SourceString: 释放治疗领域，持续治疗周围的全体队友，跟随拓荒者移动，每<shuzhi>0.5</>秒治疗一次，每次治疗<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点的生命，持续<shuzhi>6</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>60</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Create a healing zone that moves with the Wanderer and heals nearby allies for <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> once every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds for <shuzhi>6</> seconds. <shuzhi>60</>-second cooldown.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，设置权杖持续清除拓荒者和友方的负面效果，并持续治疗附近拓荒者和友方目标<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点生命，持续<shuzhi>7</>秒，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon from another, <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the Wanderer</>. The staff continuously removes negative effects from the Wanderer and allies while providing healing to them within range, restoring <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> HP per second for <shuzhi>7</> seconds. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (not applicable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，设置权杖持续清除拓荒者和友方的负面效果，并持续治疗附近拓荒者和友方目标<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点生命，持续<shuzhi>7</>秒，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。

The staff continuously removes negative effects from the Wanderer and allies while providing healing to them within range, restoring <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> HP per second for <shuzhi>7</> seconds. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (not applicable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时，挥舞巨镰对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害并将范围内的目标与自身相连10秒（超出一定范围立即解除），被链接的单位对自身攻击会反弹40%伤害,（最高不超过自身5%最大生命），技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon from another,other, switching to this weapon swings the giant scythe, dealing <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage to nearby enemies and linking them with the Wanderer for 10 seconds (leaving the area of effect will negate the effect). When the Wanderer takes damage from a linked enemy, 40% of the damage received is reflected back to the attacker, up to 5% of the Wanderer’s max HP. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (not applicable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时，挥舞巨镰对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害并触发幻时。

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，向目标释放环海轮刃，命中目标附带范围<shuzhi>1</>秒<shuzhi>强控眩晕</>，同时每秒对最多<shuzhi>3</>个单位攻击<shuzhi>1</>次（攻击有<shuzhi>10%</>几率使敌人进入<shuzhi>1</>秒<shuzhi>强控眩晕</>），造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，持续<shuzhi>10</>秒，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</>. It then launches Chakram of the Seas towards the target, applying an AoE <shuzhi>stun</> for <shuzhi>1</> second upon hit. Additionally, it attacks up to <shuzhi>3</> targets <shuzhi>1</> time every second (each attack has <shuzhi>10%</> chance of <shuzhi>strongly stunning</> the target for <shuzhi>1</> second), dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK for <shuzhi>10</> seconds. Meanwhile, gain hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5 seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，切换到该武器时释放环形火焰造成伤害，同时自身获得火焰强化（造成火焰伤害提高，释放时获得10%，每命中一个目标额外增加5%，火焰伤害最多可增加25%），持续7秒，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon from another,other, releases a ring of flame that deals damage and grants Flame bonus for 7 seconds, increasing base Flame Damage by 10%, with an additional 5% for each target hit, up to 25%. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (not applicable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，切换到该武器时释放环形火焰造成伤害，同时自身获得火焰强化（造成火焰伤害提高，释放时获得10%，每命中一个目标额外增加5%，火焰伤害最多可增加25%），持续7秒，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon from another,other, releases a ring of flame that deals damage and grants Flame bonus for 7 seconds, increasing base Flame Damage by 10%, with an additional 5% for each target hit, up to 25%. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (not applicable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，向前方发出<shuzhi>3</>枚榴弹，命中总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点范围伤害，附带<shuzhi>击飞</>效果，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。

During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (not applicable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，连续拉弓进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, draw the bow repeatedly to attack 5 times.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back a short distance.

Desc.SourceString: 长按普攻，进入蓄力攻击状态，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点基础伤害，蓄力每增加<shuzhi>1</>秒，伤害增加<shuzhi>0.5</>倍，蓄力<shuzhi>3</>秒后达到伤害最大值，若命中怪物头部或者弱点，触发爆头效果（爆头效果对拓荒者无效），造成双倍伤害，并击倒目标。
Desc.LocalizedString: Tap and hold normal attack to charge an attack. Deal base damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, and <shuzhi>50%</> more for each <shuzhi>1</> second spent charging, up to <shuzhi>3</> seconds. Deal double damage when scoring a headshot or when hitting an enemy's weak point, and knock the target down (headshots are ineffective against Wanderers).

Desc.SourceString: 任意一段普攻后长按普攻，释放箭雨造成范围伤害，对目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: After any normal attack, hold the normal attack button to unleash Arrow Rain, dealing up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> area damage to targets.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行四次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却15秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。

Desc.SourceString: 后空翻并向前方射出<shuzhi>1</>支穿透箭，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并击退目标，冷却<shuzhi>{2}</>秒。

Meanwhile, gain hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5 seconds.

After the third normal attack, hold normal attack to trigger Rising Slash.

滞空时长按普攻(存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，触发落月斩。

Desc.SourceString:
使用方向键加闪避按钮触发前闪避的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发飞踢。
飞踢命中目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，大幅击退目标并对怪物造成<shuzhi>1</>秒，对玩家造成<shuzhi>0.5</>秒<shuzhi>强控眩晕</>效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Flying Kick.
Once hit the target, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, knock the enemies back significantly, and <shuzhi>stun</> enemies for <shuzhi>1</> second or <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds to Wanderers.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发挑击。
挥舞长枪砸地造成<shuzhi>强控浮空</>效果，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Lunging Smash.
Slam the long spear into the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> targets.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 旋风一般将目标<shuzhi>强控浮空</>，并使拓荒者滞空，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，冷却<shuzhi>{2}</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: <shuzhi>Strongly suspend</> targets and go airborne, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>{2}</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，抓取目标，并将目标多次甩动，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，最后一击附带<shuzhi>强控浮空</>效果，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon from another, <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the Wanderer</>, pulls the target, and swings it multiple times, dealing <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage. The final strike <shuzhi>knocks them airborne</>. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (not applicable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，挥舞双刀可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, brandish the pair of dual blades to launch up to 5 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back a short distance.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，点击普攻可在空中连续进行四次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
普攻第三下后，长按普攻可触发闪击。
命中目标会<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标，总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
After the third normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger Rapid Lunge.
Upon hit, <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target, dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻(存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，会触发旋转利刃。
下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Spiral Drive.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each hit.

Desc.SourceString: 处于下蹲状态时靠近敌人身后，点击普攻可触发偷袭，双刀刺击，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to use Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
使用方向键加闪避按钮触发前闪避的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发飞刃。
命中目标会<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标并造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害；再次点击掷出飞刃，飞刃每次命中目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，最多<shuzhi>6</>次。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Flying Blades.
Upon hit, <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Keep tapping to throw up to <shuzhi>6</> more Flying Blades, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却15秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 向四周射出<shuzhi>6</>个回旋飞刃，每个飞刃造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，冷却<shuzhi>{2}</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Fire <shuzhi>6</> Returning Blades in all directions, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. <shuzhi>{2}</>-second cooldown.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，轮转飞刃造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害；并掷出<shuzhi>2</>个飞刃围绕拓荒者旋转，对每次触碰的目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and unleash orbiting blades that deal <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage, with <shuzhi>2</> more flying blades spinning around the Wanderer to deal <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> damage to targets coming into contact. Meanwhile, gain hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5 seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 使用后向前冲刺一段距离，之后在阻力作用下逐渐减速直到停止，冲刺期间对碰撞的目标造成<shuzhi>760%</>*攻击力伤害及击飞效果。游泳状态下也可以使用喷气滑板。每<shuzhi>90</>秒获得<shuzhi>1</>次充能。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dashes forward a set distance before gradually stopping, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>760%</> of ATK to targets along the path and knocking them up. Can also be used while swimming. Restores <shuzhi>1</> charge every <shuzhi>90</>s.

Desc.SourceString: 使用后向前冲刺一段距离，之后在阻力作用下逐渐减速直到停止，冲刺期间对碰撞的目标造成<shuzhi>760%</>*攻击力伤害及击飞效果。游泳状态下也可以使用喷气滑板。每<shuzhi>90</>秒获得<shuzhi>1</>次充能。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dashes forward a set distance before gradually stopping, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>760%</> of ATK to targets along the path and knocking them up. Can also be used while swimming. Restores <shuzhi>1</> charge every <shuzhi>90</>s.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，设置权杖持续清除拓荒者和友方的负面效果，并治疗附近拓荒者和友方目标<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点生命，持续<shuzhi>7</>秒，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and the staff continues to remove debuffs from the Wanderer and allies. It heals the Wanderer and nearby allies by <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> HP for <shuzhi>7</> seconds. Meanwhile, gain hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5 seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，设置权杖持续清除拓荒者和友方的负面效果，并治疗附近拓荒者和友方目标<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点生命，持续<shuzhi>7</>秒，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon from another, <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the Wanderer</>. The staff continuously removes negative effects from the Wanderer and allies while providing healing to them within range, restoring <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> HP for <shuzhi>7</> seconds. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (not applicable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却15秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
使用方向键加闪避按钮触发前闪避的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发涌现。
每个能量波动命中目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Surge.
Each energy pulse deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发后闪攻击。
拓荒者向前放释放一个能量球，对经过的敌方单位每<shuzhi>0.3</>秒造成<shuzhi>43.3%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害(最多五次)。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Evasive Blast.
Fire an energy orb forward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>43.3%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets in its path every <shuzhi>0.3</> seconds, up to 5 times.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，挥舞法杖可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, swing the staff to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。

Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻，会触发落月击。
落地时对周围目标每<shuzhi>0.2</>秒造成一次伤害，共计<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne to trigger Moonfall.
Upon landing, deal damage once every <shuzhi>0.2</> seconds, for a total of <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage.

Desc.SourceString:
普攻第三下后，长按普攻可触发分支攻击，消耗<shuzhi>300</>点耐力。
第一下分支将前方附近的怪物聚拢（<shuzhi>强制浮空</>）并每<shuzhi>0.3</>秒造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害(最多<shuzhi>4</>次)。
第二下分支对目标位置及其附近的敌方单位每<shuzhi>0.3</>秒造成一次<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
After the third normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger branch attacks, consuming <shuzhi>300</> points of endurance.
First Attack: Pull in enemies in front of the user, <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> them and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> every <shuzhi>0.3</> seconds (up to <shuzhi>4</> times).
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> at the target location and to nearby enemies every <shuzhi>0.3</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 在原地释放一个能量护盾，对护盾中的友方单位每秒恢复<shuzhi>{3}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{4}</>点生命值，并降低<shuzhi>{0}%</>受到的伤害，持续<shuzhi>10</>秒。冷却<shuzhi>60</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Create an energy shield at the Wanderer's location. Heal allies within the shield for <shuzhi>{3}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{4}</> every second and reduce their damage taken by <shuzhi>{0}%</> for <shuzhi>10</> seconds. <shuzhi>60</>-second cooldown.

Desc.SourceString: 在原地释放一个能量护盾，对护盾中的友方单位每秒恢复<shuzhi>{3}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{4}</>点生命值，并降低<shuzhi>{0}%</>受到的伤害，持续<shuzhi>10</>秒。冷却<shuzhi>60</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Create an energy shield at the Wanderer's location. Heal allies within the shield for <shuzhi>{3}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{4}</> every second and reduce their damage taken by <shuzhi>{0}%</> for <shuzhi>10</> seconds. <shuzhi>60</>-second cooldown.

Desc.SourceString:
普攻第三下后，长按普攻可触发分支攻击，消耗<shuzhi>300</>点耐力。
第一下分支将前方附近的怪物聚拢（<shuzhi>强制浮空</>）并每<shuzhi>0.3</>秒造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害(最多<shuzhi>4</>次)。
第二下分支对目标位置及其附近的敌方单位每<shuzhi>0.3</>秒造成一次<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
After the third normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger branch attacks, consuming <shuzhi>300</> points of endurance.
First Attack: Pull in enemies in front of the user, <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> them and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> every <shuzhi>0.3</> seconds (up to <shuzhi>4</> times).
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> at the target location and to nearby enemies every <shuzhi>0.3</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，冲向目标并将目标<shuzhi>强控浮空</>，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，同时留下剑刃风暴，对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，自身在<shuzhi>5</>秒内免疫重伤/冰冻/灼烧/感电效果，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Authorizer</> and allow the Authorizer to rush to the target, <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> the target and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. A bladestorm follows, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>. Gain immunity to Grievous, Freeze, Burn, and Electrify effects for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString: 使用后向前冲刺一段距离，之后在阻力作用下逐渐减速直到停止，冲刺期间对碰撞的目标造成<shuzhi>760%</>*攻击力伤害及击飞效果。游泳状态下也可以使用喷气滑板。每<shuzhi>90</>秒获得<shuzhi>1</>次充能。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dashes forward a set distance before gradually stopping, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>760%</> of ATK to targets along the path and knocking them up. Can also be used while swimming. Restores <shuzhi>1</> charge every <shuzhi>90</>s.

Desc.SourceString: 空投一个飞弹发射器，持续<shuzhi>8</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>90</>秒。释放多枚飞弹攻击附近敌方单位，每发飞弹造成<shuzhi>30%</>*攻击力伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Summon a missile launcher for <shuzhi>8</> seconds. <shuzhi>90</>-second cooldown. Fire multiple missiles to attack nearby enemies, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>30%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
使用巨擎手臂战斗，持续<shuzhi>15</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>60</>秒，战斗期间免疫硬直，再次点击技能取消使用。
普攻总计可造成<shuzhi>4140%</>*攻击力的伤害和强控击飞效果；技能造成<shuzhi>2008%</>*攻击力的伤害和强控浮空效果，冷却<shuzhi>10</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Summons a Colossus Arm to fight for <shuzhi>15</>s. Cooldown: <shuzhi>60</>s. Grants hitstun immunity during its active time. Press again to cancel.

Desc.SourceString:
驾驶机器人进行战斗，持续<shuzhi>15</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>60</>秒，战斗期间免疫硬直，再次点击技能取消驾驶并引爆机器人，造成<shuzhi>250.2%</>*攻击力伤害。机器人拥有技能：<yellow_lbl_14_1>瞄准射击</>。
<yellow_lbl_14_1>瞄准射击</>：高频发射火焰子弹，每次命中造成<shuzhi>48.1%</>*攻击力伤害。

 <yellow_lbl_14_1>Aimed Shot</>: Shoots rapidly to deal damage equal to <shuzhi>48.1%</> of ATK per hit.

Desc.SourceString: 长按技能，按照箭头指示方向冲刺一段距离，进入滑翔状态，期间持续消耗耐力。每<shuzhi>30</>秒获得<shuzhi>1</>次充能（不受滑翔状态影响），可积攒<shuzhi>2</>次充能。
Desc.LocalizedString: Hold the skill button to dash in the indicated direction and enter Glide mode, continuously consuming Endurance. Grants <shuzhi>1</> charge every <shuzhi>30</>s (unaffected by Glide mode), up to <shuzhi>2</> charges.

Desc.SourceString: 竖起一道原能护盾，持续<shuzhi>10</>秒，可阻挡子弹穿透。护盾有<shuzhi>200%</>*拓荒者最大生命值的能量值，冷却<shuzhi>90</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Generate an Omnium shield that stops projectiles for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, with starting energy equal to <shuzhi>200%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP and a <shuzhi>90</>-second cooldown.

Desc.SourceString: 给自己及周围友方单位添加护盾，可抵挡<shuzhi>800%</>*攻击力伤害，持续<shuzhi>10</>秒，并对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害和<shuzhi>强控击飞</>效果。若释放技能时有立方，每个立方提升<shuzhi>160%</>攻击的护盾上限值并消耗掉立方，冷却<shuzhi>60</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Create shielding for self and nearby allies to block up to <shuzhi>800%</> of ATK in damage for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, deal <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage to nearby targets and <shuzhi>strongly launch</> them. Each cube in possession when this skill is used adds <shuzhi>160%</> of ATK to max shielding and exhaust the cube. Cooldown: <shuzhi>60</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 给自己及周围友方单位添加护盾，可抵挡<shuzhi>800%</>*攻击力伤害，持续<shuzhi>10</>秒，并对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害和<shuzhi>强控击飞</>效果。若释放技能时有立方，每个立方提升<shuzhi>160%</>攻击的护盾上限值并消耗掉立方，冷却<shuzhi>60</>秒。

Each cube in possession when this skill is used adds <shuzhi>160%</> of ATK to max shielding and exhaust the cube. Cooldown: <shuzhi>60</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
召唤浮游冰炮，持续<shuzhi>20</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>90</>秒。浮游冰炮出场造成<shuzhi>576%</>*攻击力伤害，拥有技能：<yellow_lbl_14_1>激光束</>。
<yellow_lbl_14_1>激光束</>：发射激光，每次对目标造成<shuzhi>152%</>*攻击力伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Summons a Hovering Cannon for <shuzhi>20</>s. Cooldown: <shuzhi>90</>s. Upon deployment, the Hovering Cannon deals damage equal to <shuzhi>576%</> of ATK and has the skill: <yellow_lbl_14_1>Laser Beam</>.
 <yellow_lbl_14_1>Laser Beam</>: Fires a laser, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>152%</> of ATK to the target per shot.

Desc.SourceString: 利用质子炸弹，坍缩身前的空间，范围内持续吸附目标<shuzhi>10</>秒，1.5秒延迟后中心区域每<shuzhi>0.5</>秒造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力伤害，冷却<shuzhi>100</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Launch a proton bomb at the target location, creating a rift in time-space that draws in targets for <shuzhi>10</> seconds. After 1.5 seconds, the center of the rift deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets caught in the area every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>100</> seconds.
