Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，向前方发出<shuzhi>3</>枚榴弹，命中总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点范围伤害，附带<shuzhi>击飞</>效果，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon from another,other, <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and launches <shuzhi>3</> grenades forward, dealing <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> AoE damage and <shuzhi>knocking up</> affected enemies. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (not applicable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却15秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避后可以在闪避位置放置地雷，敌人靠近地雷或者5秒过后，地雷爆炸并对范围内的敌人造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: After dodging, place a landmine at the current location, which detonates after 5 seconds or if an enemy draws too close to it. Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to enemies caught in the explosion.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行5次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
On the ground, use normal attack button to launch 5 attacks in a row.
The first attack deals <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage.
The second attack deals <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> damage.
The third attack deals <shuzhi>{4}%</> x ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> damage.
The fourth attack deals <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> damage.
The fifth attack deals <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> damage.

Desc.SourceString: 长按普攻，进入蓄力攻击状态，松手时发射子弹，可对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害;三秒后（或目标死亡时）爆炸，对附近的敌方单位造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力伤害，期间目标每受到一次伤害，伤害范围扩大一倍（最多扩大<shuzhi>4</>次），并提升伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Tap and hold normal attack to charge an attack and release to fire rounds, dealing <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage, plus an explosion 3 seconds later (or if the target dies), dealing <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK as damage to nearby enemies. Each time the target is dealt damage during the explosion (up to <shuzhi>4</> times), AoE is doubled and damage is increased.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，可以发动跳跃攻击。
向前方扔出一枚炸弹，对前方圆形范围内的敌人造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标，消耗<shuzhi>250</>点耐力。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne or after jumping once, launch Jumping Blast.
Toss a bomb that deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to enemies in a circle ahead, knocking them back a short distance. Consumes <shuzhi>250</> endurance.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者使用二段跳之后，可以在空中发动空中攻击。
向下方发射出一道原能光线，并向前扫射，对扫过的敌人造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
After double-jumping, launch Aerial Discharge in mid-air.
Fire an Omnium beam downward. The beam then sweeps forward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString: 在普通攻击过程中，长按普攻，向前方扫射，对扫过的敌人总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点范围伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Hold attack button during a normal attack to unleash Suppressing Fire in front, dealing enemies AoE damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> in total.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行5次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
On the ground, use normal attack button to launch 5 attacks in a row.
The first attack deals <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage.
The second attack deals <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> damage.
The third attack deals <shuzhi>{4}%</> x ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> damage.
The fourth attack deals <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> damage.
The fifth attack deals <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> damage.

Desc.SourceString: 后翻至空中，向前方发射雷暴弹，雷暴爆炸造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，随后在地面生成雷暴地带，处于雷暴地带的敌人每秒受到<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Perform a backward leap and fire a Tempest Round, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and leaving a thunderstorm on the ground, which deals an additional <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage every second to enemies caught within.

Desc.SourceString: 后翻至空中，向前方发射雷暴弹，雷暴爆炸造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，随后在地面生成雷暴地带，处于雷暴地带的敌人每秒受到<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Perform a backward leap and fire a Tempest Round, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and leaving a thunderstorm on the ground, which deals an additional <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage every second to enemies caught within.

Desc.SourceString: 召唤机器人张开一个持续<shuzhi>5</>秒的护盾。护盾<shuzhi>5</>秒后或者承受一次攻击后消失，消失时击退周围敌人并造成<shuzhi>100%</>攻击力+<shuzhi>50</>点伤害。若护盾在生成后<shuzhi>1</>秒内打碎，还会额外眩晕敌人<shuzhi>2</>秒。冷却时间<shuzhi>30</>秒，与考恩特Ⅱ共享冷却时间。
Desc.LocalizedString: Summon a droid and generate a shield for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. The shield disappears after <shuzhi>5</> seconds or after being struck once. When it disappears, it knocks back nearby enemies, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>100%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>50</>. If broken within <shuzhi>1</> second of being created, the shield will stun enemies for <shuzhi>2</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds. Share cooldown with Type II Couant.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时点击普攻，挥舞双枪可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第五次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并造成<shuzhi>击飞</>效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch up to 5 consecutive attacks the with dual pistols.
First Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.
Second Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK.
Third Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK.
Fourth Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK.
Fifth Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK and <shuzhi>launch</> the target.

Desc.SourceString: 滞空时，点击普攻可对地面目标持续射击，每次命中造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，消耗<shuzhi>200</>点耐力。
Desc.LocalizedString: While airborne, use normal attack to fire continuously at the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK, each hit consuming <shuzhi>150</> endurance.

Desc.SourceString: 长按普攻或普攻过程中长按，可对目标持续射击，命中造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，每次命中目标使自身暴击率提升<shuzhi>0.75%</>(仅超电磁双星前台攻击目标时生效)，持续<shuzhi>60</>秒，最多叠加<shuzhi>15</>层。
Desc.LocalizedString: Hold Normal Attack to maintain constant firing, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK. Each hit increases Crit Rate by <shuzhi>0.75%</> for <shuzhi>60</>s (effective only when using Dual EM Stars to attack in the main-slot), up to <shuzhi>15</> stacks.

Desc.SourceString: 滞空时长按普攻，可触发幻影飞踢，击落目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，落地时对周围目标再次造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并造成<shuzhi>强控击飞</>效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Hold Normal Attack to trigger Phantom Kick while airborne. Knocks the target down and deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK. Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to surrounding targets upon landing, and <shuzhi>knocking</> them up.

Desc.SourceString: 向前闪避后，点击普攻，<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标并造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Tap normal attack after dodging to <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 向锁定目标位置发射能量光盾，在能量范围内持续反射光束能量，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，最后一击造成<shuzhi>强控浮空</>效果，冷却<shuzhi>40</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Fire an energy shield at the locked-on target location, reflecting beams within the barrier. Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK, and the last hit <shuzhi>strongly suspends</> targets. Cooldown: <shuzhi>40</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，锁定目标位置，制造雷电领域，<shuzhi>强控浮空</>范围内的目标造成三次总计<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害并清除目标增益效果，雷电领域存在<shuzhi>3.5</>秒，每<shuzhi>0.5</>秒锁定对范围内目标并造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and create a Domain of Thunder at the locked-on target's location, <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> targets within range and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK over 3 attacks to them while dispelling their buffs. The domain lasts for <shuzhi>3.5</> seconds and deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to targets in the area every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds. Meanwhile, gain hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5 seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 护盾被打碎时，使攻击者以及附近的敌人移动速度降低<shuzhi>35%</>，持续<shuzhi>6</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: When the shield is broken, reduce the speed of the attacker and nearby enemies by <shuzhi>35%</> for <shuzhi>6</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 护盾结束（破碎）后，根据已损失的血量的百分比，增加等额的最终伤害，持续<shuzhi>10</>秒，最低<shuzhi>30%</>。
Desc.LocalizedString: After the shield breaks or ends, increase final damage by an amount equal to the percentage of HP lost. This lasts for <shuzhi>10</> seconds. Increase damage by a minimum of <shuzhi>30%</>.

Desc.SourceString: 护盾破碎时，获得<shuzhi>5</>秒的反伤效果，将受到的伤害以<shuzhi>0.6</>倍返还给攻击者。
Desc.LocalizedString: When the shield breaks, gain a <shuzhi>5</>-second damage reflection effect, reflecting <shuzhi>0.6</>× damage taken back at the attacker.

Desc.SourceString: 护盾结束（破碎）后，增加<shuzhi>30%</>的移速，持续<shuzhi>6</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: After the shield breaks or ends, increase speed by <shuzhi>30%</> for <shuzhi>6</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 生成一个持续<shuzhi>7</>秒的隔断空间，友方玩家在空间内免疫硬直效果，且受到敌方伤害使自身生命值不会低于<shuzhi>20%</>，冷却时间<shuzhi>90</>秒，离开空间则失去所有增益效果。进入过空间的<shuzhi>7</>秒后，在<shuzhi>45</>秒内无法再获得相同的空间效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Generate a Pocket Dimension for <shuzhi>7</> seconds. Allied Wanderers gain immunity to hitstun effects in the dimension, and HP will not drop below <shuzhi>20%</> from enemy attacks. Cooldown: <shuzhi>90</> seconds. Leaving the dimension removes all buffs. Once you have spent <shuzhi>7</> seconds in the dimension, you cannot be buffed by it for <shuzhi>45</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 空间生成<shuzhi>7</>秒后，在空间内的友方玩家恢复<shuzhi>6%</>的生命值
Desc.LocalizedString: Allied Wanderers in the dimension recover <shuzhi>6%</> HP <shuzhi>7</> seconds after the dimension generates.

Desc.SourceString: 友方单位在空间内时获得<shuzhi>8%</>的吸血效果，每次伤害吸血量不超过：攻击*技能倍率*<shuzhi>1.25</>*吸血率
Desc.LocalizedString: Allied Wanderers in the dimension gain <shuzhi>8%</> lifesteal. The max lifesteal amount for each hit: ATK × skill multiplier × <shuzhi>1.25</> × lifesteal rate.

Desc.SourceString: 友方玩家在空间内攻击力上升<shuzhi>20%</>
Desc.LocalizedString: Allied Wanderers in the dimension gain <shuzhi>20%</> ATK.

Desc.SourceString: 友方玩家在空间内免疫一切控制
Desc.LocalizedString: Allied Wanderers in the dimension gain immunity to all control effects.

Desc.SourceString: 提升全部源器<shuzhi>3%</>伤害，不上阵也生效
Desc.LocalizedString: Increase all Relic damage by <shuzhi>3%</>. Effective even when not deployed.

Desc.SourceString: 在空间内的友方玩家的生命值不高于<shuzhi>40%</>时，吸血率提升至<shuzhi>14%</>（每次伤害吸血量不超过：攻击*技能倍率*<shuzhi>1.25</>*吸血率），直到空间消失
Desc.LocalizedString: Before the dimension disappears, increase the lifesteal rate of allied Wanderers within to <shuzhi>14%</> if they have lower than <shuzhi>40%</> of HP. The max lifesteal amount for each hit: ATK × skill multiplier × <shuzhi>1.25</> × lifesteal rate.

Desc.SourceString: 后翻至空中，向前方发射雷暴弹，雷暴爆炸造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，随后在地面生成雷暴地带，处于雷暴地带的敌人每秒受到<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Perform a backward leap and fire a Tempest Round, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and leaving a thunderstorm on the ground, which deals an additional <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage every second to enemies caught within.

Desc.SourceString: 后翻至空中，向前方发射雷暴弹，雷暴爆炸造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，随后在地面生成雷暴地带，处于雷暴地带的敌人每秒受到<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Perform a backward leap and fire a Tempest Round, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and leaving a thunderstorm on the ground, which deals an additional <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage every second to enemies caught within.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，挥舞盾斧可连续进行四次攻击。
盾形态：第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并造成<shuzhi>击飞</>效果。
斧形态：第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{11}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{12}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{13}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{14}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{15}</>点伤害，并击退目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, swing the shield axe to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack in Shield Form: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and <shuzhi>launch the target into the air</>.
First Attack in Axe Form: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{13}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{14}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{15}</> and knock the target back.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，在空中连续进行三次攻击。
盾形态：第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
斧形态：第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{11}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne or after jumping once, attack 3 times in a row.
First Attack in Shield Form: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
First Attack in Axe Form: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
盾形态：地面长按普攻，自身不可移动（松开普攻解除），持续<shuzhi>3</>秒，此状态下自身受到伤害减少<shuzhi>50%</>，在此期间受到任何伤害后松开普攻或者长按时间达到<shuzhi>3</>秒后，向四周发出火焰冲击，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，附带<shuzhi>1</>秒<shuzhi>强控眩晕</>效果。
斧形态：用力前砸，对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并浮空目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Shield Form: While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to enter shield form (release to exit) for <shuzhi>3</> seconds, during which the Wanderer is unable to move, and all damage taken is reduced by <shuzhi>50%</>. While in shield form, releasing the normal attack button after taking damage or after holding the button for <shuzhi>3</> seconds unleashes fire crash, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and inflicting a <shuzhi>1</>-second <shuzhi>stun</> effect on the target.
Axe Form: Smash the target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and suspending the target.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻(存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，触发空中分支攻击。
盾形态：下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害；落地时对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并浮空目标。
斧形态：下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害；落地时对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并浮空目标。
触发时离地距离越高，伤害越高，最高可达<shuzhi>600%</>伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger aerial branch attacks.
Shield Form: While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and suspend the target.
Axe Form: While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and suspend the target.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发闪避攻击。
盾形态：向前发出一道火焰盾，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，击退目标，并产生范围爆炸，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，爆炸附带<shuzhi>1</>秒<shuzhi>强控眩晕</>效果，同时使目标在<shuzhi>10</>秒内被治疗效果降低<shuzhi>30%</>。
斧形态：旋转大斧，对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，同时使目标在<shuzhi>10</>秒内被治疗效果降低<shuzhi>30%</>。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Dodge Attack.
Shield Form: Unleash a flame shield, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knocking the target back. Trigger an explosion, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. The explosion inflicts a <shuzhi>1</>-second <shuzhi>stun</> on the target, and for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, reduces the target's healing received by <shuzhi>30%</>.
Axe Form: Swing the axe, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and reducing the target's healing received for the next <shuzhi>10</> seconds by <shuzhi>30%</>.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却15秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
盾之变：盾形态切换至斧形态，砸地对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并附带玩家自身<shuzhi>10%</>最大生命值的额外伤害，附带<shuzhi>强控浮空</>效果，同时在地面形成持续<shuzhi>5</>秒的大范围火焰地带，使目标持续灼烧，造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
斧之变：斧形态切换至盾形态，盾插地，对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并附带玩家自身<shuzhi>10%</>最大生命值的额外伤害，附带击退效果，同时命中的目标在<shuzhi>5</>秒内无法切换武器。
冷却<shuzhi>25</>秒，盾之变与斧之变共用冷却。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Shield Conversion: Switch from shield form to axe form. Smash the ground, <shuzhi>{0}%</>strongly suspending the enemies and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}</> of ATK plus <shuzhi></> plus <shuzhi>10%</> of the Authorizer's Max HP. In addition, create a large flame zone on the ground for <shuzhi>5</> seconds that burns enemies, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Axe Conversion: Switches from axe form to shield form. Plant the shield on the ground, knocking enemies back and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> plus <shuzhi>10%</> of Authorizer's Max HP. Enemies hit cannot switch weapons for <shuzhi>5</> seconds.
Cooldown: <shuzhi>25</> seconds. Shield Conversion and Axe Conversion share the same cooldown.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，发出火焰冲击波，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并附带玩家自身<shuzhi>10%</>最大生命值的额外伤害，嘲讽敌人，持续<shuzhi>5</>秒，期间自身获得<shuzhi>15%</>伤害减免，根据嘲讽到的目标数量，在一定范围内散落盾形态凝聚物，存在<shuzhi>20</>秒，自身拾取后获得<shuzhi>10</>秒<shuzhi>5%</>伤害减免（可叠加）且立即恢复一次闪避次数，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon from another,other, <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and unleashes a flame shockwave, dealing <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage to the target, plus an additional <shuzhi>10%</> of the Wanderer’s Max HP as damage. Taunts enemies for <shuzhi>5</> seconds and gains <shuzhi>15%</> Damage Reduction. Based on the number of taunted enemies, shield condensates scatter within a range, lasting <shuzhi>20</> seconds. Collecting them grants <shuzhi>5%</> Damage Reduction for <shuzhi>10</> seconds (stackable) and restores one dodge attempt. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (not applicable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString: 电能光束持续时间增加<shuzhi>50%</>，技能释放时会将目标拉至中心
Desc.LocalizedString: Extend the duration of Electro Field by <shuzhi>50%</> and pull targets into the center of the attack.

Desc.SourceString: 引力改变造成的伤害提升至<shuzhi>460%</>*攻击力，浮空敌人造成的伤害提升至<shuzhi>691.2%</>*攻击力
Desc.LocalizedString: Increases damage from gravity manipulation to <shuzhi>460%</> of ATK, and damage to airborne enemies to <shuzhi>691.2%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString: 开启魔方击飞敌人时，若敌人无法被击飞，则强控眩晕<shuzhi>2</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: When the Strange Cube is activated to launch an enemy into the air, stun the enemy for <shuzhi>2</> seconds if they cannot be launched.

Desc.SourceString: 开启魔方后，扣除周围敌人<shuzhi>200</>点武器充能值。
Desc.LocalizedString: After activating the Strange Cube, reduce weapon charge of nearby enemies by <shuzhi>200</>.

Desc.SourceString: 魔方的使用次数增加至<shuzhi>2</>次。
Desc.LocalizedString: Increase Strange Cube's uses to <shuzhi>2</>.

Desc.SourceString: 开启魔方后，根据已损失的生命值获得武器充能值。每失去<shuzhi>1%</>的生命值获得<shuzhi>10</>点武器充能值。
Desc.LocalizedString: After activating the enchanted cube, gain weapon charge based on HP lost. For every <shuzhi>1%</> of HP lost, gain <shuzhi>10</> weapon charge.

Desc.SourceString:
使用巨擎手臂战斗，持续<shuzhi>15</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>60</>秒，战斗期间免疫硬直，再次点击技能取消使用。
普攻总计可造成<shuzhi>4140%</>*攻击力的伤害和强控击飞效果；技能造成<shuzhi>2008%</>*攻击力的伤害和强控浮空效果，冷却<shuzhi>10</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Summons a Colossus Arm to fight for <shuzhi>15</>s. Cooldown: <shuzhi>60</>s. Grants hitstun immunity during its active time. Press again to cancel.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>4140%</> of ATK with normal attacks, knocking enemies up. Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>2008%</> of ATK with skills, strongly suspending enemies. Cooldown: <shuzhi>10</>s.

Desc.SourceString: 竖起一道原能护盾，持续<shuzhi>10</>秒，可阻挡子弹穿透。护盾有<shuzhi>200%</>*拓荒者最大生命值的能量值，冷却<shuzhi>90</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Generate an Omnium shield that stops projectiles for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, with starting energy equal to <shuzhi>200%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP and a <shuzhi>90</>-second cooldown.

Desc.SourceString:
驾驶机器人进行战斗，持续<shuzhi>15</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>60</>秒，战斗期间免疫硬直，再次点击技能取消驾驶并引爆机器人，造成<shuzhi>250.2%</>*攻击力伤害。机器人拥有技能：<yellow_lbl_14_1>瞄准射击</>。
<yellow_lbl_14_1>瞄准射击</>：高频发射火焰子弹，每次命中造成<shuzhi>48.1%</>*攻击力伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Pilots a Mecha for <shuzhi>15</>s. Grants hitstun immunity while active. Cooldown: <shuzhi>60</>s. Press again to exit and detonate, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>250.2%</> of ATK. Mecha Skill: <yellow_lbl_14_1>Aimed Shot</>.
 <yellow_lbl_14_1>Aimed Shot</>: Shoots rapidly to deal damage equal to <shuzhi>48.1%</> of ATK per hit.

Desc.SourceString: 利用质子炸弹，坍缩身前的空间，范围内持续吸附目标<shuzhi>10</>秒，1.5秒延迟后中心区域每<shuzhi>0.5</>秒造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力伤害，冷却<shuzhi>100</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Launch a proton bomb at the target location, creating a rift in time-space that draws in targets for <shuzhi>10</> seconds. After 1.5 seconds, the center of the rift deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets caught in the area every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>100</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 每<shuzhi>3</>秒会额外触发一次地震波，命中<shuzhi>浮空</>目标（跳跃可躲避）
Desc.LocalizedString: Trigger a seismic wave every <shuzhi>3</> seconds, <shuzhi>suspending targets</>. The waves can be dodged by jumping.

Desc.SourceString: 无人机持续期间，拓荒者获得攻击回复效果，<shuzhi>20%</>的伤害值转换为自身生命
Desc.LocalizedString: The Wanderer's attacks convert <shuzhi>20%</> of damage dealt into HP for the duration of the drone.

Desc.SourceString: 投影造成的伤害提升至角色的<shuzhi>100%</>，移形换位时解除自身控制
Desc.LocalizedString: Increase damage dealt by holograms to <shuzhi>100%</> of the Wanderer's damage. Transposing removes control effects.

Desc.SourceString: 在空间内的友方玩家的生命值不高于<shuzhi>40%</>时，吸血率提升至<shuzhi>14%</>（每次伤害吸血量不超过：攻击*技能倍率*<shuzhi>1.25</>*吸血率），直到空间消失
Desc.LocalizedString: Before the dimension disappears, increase the lifesteal rate of allied Wanderers within to <shuzhi>14%</> if they have lower than <shuzhi>40%</> of HP. The max lifesteal amount for each hit: ATK × skill multiplier × <shuzhi>1.25</> × lifesteal rate.

Desc.SourceString: 召唤浮游冰炮，持续<shuzhi>20</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>240</>秒。浮游炮拥有技能：激光束，每次对目标造成<shuzhi>5.6%</>*攻击力伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Summon a Hovering Cannon for <shuzhi>20</> seconds with the skill: Laser Beam, which deals <shuzhi>5.6%</> ATK damage to the target each time. Cooldown: <shuzhi>240</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 长按技能，按照箭头指示方向冲刺一段距离，进入滑翔状态，期间持续消耗耐力。每<shuzhi>30</>秒获得<shuzhi>1</>次充能（不受滑翔状态影响），可积攒<shuzhi>2</>次充能。
Desc.LocalizedString: Hold the skill button to dash in the indicated direction and enter Glide mode, continuously consuming Endurance. Grants <shuzhi>1</> charge every <shuzhi>30</>s (unaffected by Glide mode), up to <shuzhi>2</> charges.

Desc.SourceString: 命中附带<shuzhi>3</>秒<shuzhi>强控眩晕</>，给目标添加<shuzhi>10</>秒耐力灼烧，每次使用技能扣除<shuzhi>100</>点耐力。
Desc.LocalizedString: <shuzhi>Stun</> targets for <shuzhi>3</> seconds on hit and tire them for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, causing targets to lose <shuzhi>100</> endurance after every ability use.

Desc.SourceString: 使用后向前冲刺一段距离，之后在阻力作用下逐渐减速直到停止，冲刺期间对碰撞的目标造成<shuzhi>760%</>*攻击力伤害及击飞效果。游泳状态下也可以使用喷气滑板。每<shuzhi>90</>秒获得<shuzhi>1</>次充能。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dashes forward a set distance before gradually stopping, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>760%</> of ATK to targets along the path and knocking them up. Can also be used while swimming. Restores <shuzhi>1</> charge every <shuzhi>90</>s.

Desc.SourceString: 扭曲磁场，释放<shuzhi>1</>个带电核的旋风，在场景内随机路径移动，持续<shuzhi>10</>秒，将周围目标卷至空中，每秒对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力伤害，冷却<shuzhi>100</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Warp the magnetic field to unleash <shuzhi>1</> electric tornado that travels through the battlefield at random for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, throwing nearby enemies into the air and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK every second. Cooldown: <shuzhi>100</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 量子态下<shuzhi>3</>次伤害后解除伤害增加<shuzhi>100%</>效果
Desc.LocalizedString: +<shuzhi>100%</> damage in Quantum state, negated after <shuzhi>3</> successful attacks.

Desc.SourceString: 每秒释放的飞弹数量再次增加
Desc.LocalizedString: Number of missiles launched every second is further increased.

Desc.SourceString: 命中使目标在<shuzhi>7</>秒内最终伤害降低<shuzhi>30%</>
Desc.LocalizedString: Reduce final damage of targets hit by <shuzhi>30%</> for <shuzhi>7</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 护盾结束（破碎）后，增加<shuzhi>30%</>的移速，持续<shuzhi>6</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: After the shield breaks or ends, increase speed by <shuzhi>30%</> for <shuzhi>6</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 开启魔方后，根据已损失的生命值获得武器充能值。每失去<shuzhi>1%</>的生命值获得<shuzhi>10</>点武器充能值。
Desc.LocalizedString: After activating the enchanted cube, gain weapon charge based on HP lost. For every <shuzhi>1%</> of HP lost, gain <shuzhi>10</> weapon charge.

Desc.SourceString: 向指定位置射出<shuzhi>1</>枚机械原能炮弹，命中地面或水面生成一个可攀爬的机械原能柱，原能柱最多存在<shuzhi>20</>秒。每<shuzhi>50</>秒获得<shuzhi>1</>次充能，可积攒<shuzhi>2</>次充能。
Desc.LocalizedString: Launch <shuzhi>1</> Omnium bomb at target location and create a scalable energy pillar upon striking the ground or water surface for up to <shuzhi>20</> seconds. Gain <shuzhi>1</> charge every <shuzhi>50</> seconds. Can store up to <shuzhi>2</> charges.

Desc.SourceString: 引爆磁性炸弹，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的电属性伤害和<shuzhi>强控击飞</>效果，并使自己在<shuzhi>5</>秒内免疫硬直效果，冷却<shuzhi>35</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Detonate a Magnetic Bomb, dealing volt damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and <shuzhi>strongly launching</> targets. Grant the user immunity to hitstun for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>35</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，使用匕首和手枪连续进行四次攻击。
第一次攻击总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击总计造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击总计造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击总计造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害和击退效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use a dagger and handgun to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> in total.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> in total.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> in total.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> in total, and knocks back targets.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时使用普通攻击，可触发重击。
落地时，对周围命中的目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并击退目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Perform normal attack when airborne to trigger Pummel.
Deal <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage plus knockback to all struck targets in the area upon landing.

Desc.SourceString:
重立体形态时，挥舞大剑可连续进行五次攻击，大剑形态命中同一目标<shuzhi>4</>次添加<shuzhi>虚弱</>效果，持续<shuzhi>20</>秒，不可叠加。
第一次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，并击飞目标。
形态切换后，挥舞双斩可连续进行五次攻击，切换为双斩时，获得对<shuzhi>虚弱</>状态目标造成的伤害提升<shuzhi>10%</>的效果持续<shuzhi>20</>秒。
第一次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{11}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{12}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{13}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{14}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{15}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{16}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{17}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{18}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{19}</>点伤害，并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While Heavy System is active, swing a greatsword to attack 5 times in a row. Attacking the same target <shuzhi>4</> consecutive times while in greatsword form will apply <shuzhi>weakness</> to them for <shuzhi>20</> seconds (does not stack).
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>, and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>, and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>, and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>, and launch the target.
After Form Switch, swing a pair of dual blades to attack 5 times in a row. Switching to dual blades increases damage versus <shuzhi>weakened</> targets by <shuzhi>10%</> for <shuzhi>20</> seconds.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</>, and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{13}</>, and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{14}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{15}</>, and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{16}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{17}</>, and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{18}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{19}</>, and launch the target.

Desc.SourceString:
一段跳跃或滞空时长按攻击，可触发机甲重击。
落地时，对周围命中的目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标。
触发时离地距离越高，伤害越高，最高可达<shuzhi>600%</>伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold to attack when airborne or after a single jump to trigger Mecha Pummel.
Upon landing, deal <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> all targets hit in the area.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

Desc.SourceString: 长按普攻，重力体发射<shuzhi>3</>枚飞弹，命中造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，爆炸再次造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Hold attack button to fire <shuzhi>3</> missiles dealing <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage to struck target, then explode for <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> more damage.

Desc.SourceString:
普攻过程中长按普攻可触发分支攻击：
大剑形态时，跃起砸地，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害并<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标；
双刃形态时，向前冲刺，对沿途目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害并<shuzhi>强控击飞</>目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While using normal attacks, hold the normal attack button to trigger a branch attack.
While in greatsword form, leap and strike the ground to deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> targets.
While in dual blades form, dash forward and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to enemies caught in the attack's path, and <shuzhi>strongly launches</> them.

Desc.SourceString: 使用手枪瞄准目标进行射击，对命中目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Aim and fire at the target to deal <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 对沿途的目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
Desc.LocalizedString: Deal <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage plus minor knockback to all targets along the route.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
重立体一跃而下，对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并<shuzhi>强控击飞</>目标，冷却<shuzhi>20</>秒。 
被动：重立体状态下，免疫硬直效果，不可使用解控源器外的其他源器。
Desc.LocalizedString:
The Heavy System crash down, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and <shuzhi>strongly launching</> targets. <shuzhi>20</>-second cooldown.
Passive: While Heavy System is active, grant hitstun immunity and prevent the use of any Relics besides Anti-Control Relics.

Desc.SourceString: 重立体一跃而下，对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害并切换武器形态，且<shuzhi>强控击飞</>目标，冷却<shuzhi>20</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Heavy System leaps up and crashes down upon nearby targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, <shuzhi>strongly launching</> targets, and changing weapon form. Cooldown: <shuzhi>20</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
重立体一跃而下，对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并<shuzhi>强控击飞</>目标，冷却<shuzhi>20</>秒。 
被动：重立体状态下，免疫硬直效果，不可使用解控源器外的其他源器。
Desc.LocalizedString:
The Heavy System crash down, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and <shuzhi>strongly launching</> targets. <shuzhi>20</>-second cooldown.
Passive: While Heavy System is active, grant hitstun immunity and prevent the use of any Relics besides Anti-Control Relics.

Desc.SourceString:
当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，并释放大量飞弹，对命中的目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
被动：重立体状态下，免疫硬直效果，不可使用解控源器外的其他源器。
Desc.LocalizedString:
When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon from another, <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and releases a barrage of missiles, dealing <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (not applicable in Apex League).
Passive: While Heavy System is active, grants hitstun immunity and prevents the use of any Relics except anti-control Relics.

Desc.SourceString:
当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，并释放大量飞弹，对命中的目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
被动：重立体状态下，免疫硬直效果，不可使用解控源器外的其他源器。
Desc.LocalizedString:
When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon from another, <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and releases a barrage of missiles, dealing <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (not applicable in Apex League).
Passive: While Heavy System is active, grants hitstun immunity and prevents the use of any Relics except anti-control Relics.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并浮空目标。
第五次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，并<shuzhi>强控击飞</>目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Initiate 5 attacks in a row when on the ground.
The first attack deals<shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage plus minor knockback.
The second attack deals <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> damage plus knockback.
The third attack deals <shuzhi>{4}%</> x ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> damage plus minor knockback.
The fourth attack deals <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> damage plus airborne.
The fifth attack deals <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> damage plus <shuzhi>strongly launch</> the target.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
普攻第二下后，长按普攻可触发鞭腿。
高踢腿将目标浮空，短暂蓄力后使用鞭腿将目标击飞，总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold attack button after a second normal attack to unleash Lash Kick.
Launch the target into the air and backwards with a high kick after a quick charge-up, dealing <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻(存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，触发憾地。
快速位移至目标上空，向下插刀，落地时对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，附带浮空效果。
触发时离地距离越高，伤害越高，最高可达<shuzhi>600%</>伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Falling Strike.
Move rapidly to above the target and plunge downward with a sword, dealing <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>damage and suspend the target.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</>.

Desc.SourceString: 处于下蹲状态时靠近敌人身后，点击普攻可触发偷袭，横扫鞭腿，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Sneak up on the target in a crouch, then tap attack button to initiate Sneak Attack. Sweep with Lash Kick to deal <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发拔刀斩。
释放拔刀斩，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，附带击倒效果。
<shuzhi>被动：拔刀斩命中目标可立即引爆其身上的拔刺罐。</>
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap normal attack within a brief window after a dodge to unleash Blade Slash.
Blade Slash deals<shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage and knockdown.
<shuzhi>Passive: Blade Slash also detonates any cupping strike on a struck target.</>

Desc.SourceString:
向前快速位移，对目标擒拿，冷却<shuzhi>25</>秒。
<shuzhi>目标可抓取：</>抓取目标（<shuzhi>强控</>），将目标砸向地面，最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，附带浮空效果，同时给范围内所有目标添加<shuzhi>拔刺罐</>效果。
<shuzhi>目标不可抓取：</>使用点穴禁锢目标（仅不可移动），最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，附带击退效果，同时给范围内所有目标添加<shuzhi>拔刺罐</>效果。
快速位移期间霸体且免疫控制，擒拿期间自身不会受到任何伤害及负面效果。
<shuzhi>拔刺罐：</><shuzhi>5</>秒后爆炸，造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，附带<shuzhi>强控击倒</>效果，同时目标在<shuzhi>5</>秒内受到伤害增加<shuzhi>10%</>。
<shuzhi>被动：使用技能但未命中目标后，5秒内可以再使用一次，之后进入更长冷却（30秒冷却）。</>
Desc.LocalizedString:
Move forward rapidly and grab the target. Cooldown: <shuzhi>25</> seconds.
<shuzhi>Vs. Restrainable Target: </><shuzhi>Hold</> and smash the target to the ground to deal up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage and suspend the target, plus inflicting all targets in the area with <shuzhi>cupping strikes</>.
<shuzhi>Vs. Unrestrainable Target: </>Confine target (no movement only) and deal up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage and knockback, plus inflicting all targets in the area with <shuzhi>cupping strikes</>.
Gain hyperbody and immunity to control during movement, and unaffected by any damage or debuff during the grab.
<shuzhi>Suction Cups: Explode in </><shuzhi>5</> seconds, dealing <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> damage plus <shuzhi>knockdown</>, and additional <shuzhi>10%</> to all damage dealt to the target for <shuzhi>5</> seconds.
<shuzhi>Passive: You can reuse the skill in 5 seconds if it misses the target, but with a longer cooldown afterward (30 seconds).</>

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，阿赖耶识出鞘，在目标位置形成大范围力场，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，将范围内的目标禁锢在原地<shuzhi>5</>秒（仅不可移动），最多造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Authorizer</> and create a large-scale Force Field at the target position, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Additionally, immobilize enemies within for <shuzhi>5</> seconds, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，操控启明星进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use Venus to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
普攻第二段后，长按普攻可触发正向追击。
向目标发射激光导弹，对目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
After the second normal attack, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Quick Pursuit.
Shoot a laser-guided missile at the target, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString: 长按普攻，进入蓄力攻击状态，发射电荷球，命中产生范围爆炸，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Tap and hold normal attack to charge an attack and release an electrified ball that explodes on hit, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby enemies.

Desc.SourceString: 启明星每<shuzhi>8</>次普攻命中获得<shuzhi>1</>层治疗链强化，提高<shuzhi>25%</>治疗链的治疗效果，最多叠加<shuzhi>4</>层，治疗链强化效果持续<shuzhi>25</>秒。【切换武器不消失】
Desc.LocalizedString: Every <shuzhi>8</> normal attack hits from Venus grant <shuzhi>1</> stack of Healing Chain Enhance, increasing Healing Chain Enhance's effect by <shuzhi>25%</> per stack, up to <shuzhi>4</> stacks. Effect lasts for <shuzhi>25</>s. [Does not expire when switching weapons.]

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却25秒，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of targets within the area. Cooldown: 25 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发缓速磁场。
启明星发射电荷球，向前飞行一段距离/命中目标后爆炸，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，同时形成缓速磁场，持续<shuzhi>2</>秒【缓速磁场---范围内的敌方目标移动和攻击速度减少<shuzhi>35%</>】。
使用闪避的同时释放治疗链治疗附近友方单位（=拓荒者<shuzhi>{1}%</>*攻击力），后续<shuzhi>10</>秒内每隔<shuzhi>2</>秒释放小幅治疗链治疗附近友方单位（=拓荒者<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力）。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger a slowing magnetic field.
Venus fires an electrified ball that explodes after traveling forward a set distance or coming in contact with targets. Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK, and generate a slowing magnetic field for <shuzhi>2</> seconds, reducing the movement speed and attack speed of all enemies caught within by <shuzhi>35%</>.
Dodging will trigger a Healing Chain that heals nearby allies by <shuzhi>{1}%</> of the Wanderer's ATK. For the next <shuzhi>10</> seconds, a smaller Healing Chain will trigger every <shuzhi>2</> seconds that heals nearby allies by <shuzhi>{2}%</> of the Wanderer's ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
使用方向键加闪避按钮触发前闪避的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发平行光管。
启明星发射平行光管，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的穿透伤害。
使用闪避的同时释放治疗链治疗附近友方单位（=拓荒者<shuzhi>{1}%</>*攻击力），后续<shuzhi>10</>秒内每隔<shuzhi>2</>秒释放小幅治疗链治疗附近友方单位（=拓荒者<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力）。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Parallel Beams.
Venus fires a pair of parallel energy beams, dealing piercing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.
Dodging will trigger a Healing Chain that heals nearby allies by <shuzhi>{1}%</> of the Wanderer's ATK; for the next <shuzhi>10</> seconds, a small Healing Chain will trigger every <shuzhi>2</> seconds, which heals nearby allies by <shuzhi>{2}%</> of the Wanderer's ATK.

Desc.SourceString: 启明星发动导弹攻击，命中目标后产生爆炸，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，附带击倒效果，同时给附近友方单位添加<shuzhi>6</>秒持续治疗，每秒获得治疗（=拓荒者<shuzhi>{1}%</>*攻击力），冷却<shuzhi>25</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Venus fires a guided missile that explodes on contact with enemy targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and knocking down targets. At the same time, heal nearby allies by <shuzhi>{1}%</> of the Wanderer's ATK per second for <shuzhi>6</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>25</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，操控启明星，向地面发出交叉射线，地面立即形成一个不稳定的区域，敌方目标在<shuzhi>5</>秒内减速<shuzhi>70%</>，短暂时间后电磁喷发，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
连携释放后会在目标位置生成<shuzhi>1</>个“电极”，电极每<shuzhi>1.5</>秒进行一次攻击，造成<shuzhi>{1}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
电极继承玩家<shuzhi>100%</>属性，可被攻击，可被治疗，电极每秒扣除<shuzhi>3%</>最大生命值。
最多存在<shuzhi>1</>个电极。新的电极出现时，会替换之前的电极。电极造成伤害时不会提供充能效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and command Venus to fire a cross-shaped ray at the ground, creating an unstable area and slowing targets' movement speed by <shuzhi>70%</> for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. After a brief delay, unleash an electromagnetic burst that deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK. Meanwhile, gain hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5 seconds.
Using a discharge attack will spawn <shuzhi>1</> Electrode at the target's position that attacks every <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK.
The Electrode gains <shuzhi>100%</> of the Wanderer's stats, can be attacked or healed, and loses <shuzhi>3%</> of its Max HP every second.
Only <shuzhi>1</> Electrode can exist at any given time, and summoning a new Electrode will replace the previous one. The charging effect does not apply when Electrode deals damage.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，使用巴尔蒙克进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，并击倒目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, initiate 5 attacks in a row with Balmung.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target down.

当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害。

While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.

前冲一段距离横劈后再将目标攻击至浮空，自身随之滞空，对目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While using normal attack, hold normal attack to trigger Soaring Slash.
Lunge forward with a horizontal swipe, then suspend the target mid-air before going airborne with the target. Deal a maximum of <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage.

滞空时长按普攻，攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，会触发螺旋切割。
下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害；落地时对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne, or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Helix Slash.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发多重斩切。
在前方一定距离内产生多道斩切攻击，共造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap normal attack during the short perfect dodge window to trigger Multislash.
Unleash multiple slashes at a set distance in front of the user, dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.

Desc.SourceString: 斩切自身周围的空间，共造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，附带浮空和击飞效果，技能释放期间不会受到伤害，冷却<shuzhi>30</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Slash the space around the Wanderer, dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Can suspend and launch targets, and grant damage immunity while this Skill is in use. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，向前方冲刺攻击，短暂控制周围的敌人后发起一道大范围的斩击，击飞命中的目标，共造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>伤害，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon from another, <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the Wanderer</>and dashes forward to attack, briefly controlling nearby enemies. Then, unleashes a wide-area slash that deals <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage and knocks them up. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (not applicable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，使用流泉彻心进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Launch 5 Heartstream attacks while on the ground.
The first attack deals <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage to the target and knocks the target back a short distance.
The second attack deals <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> damage to the target and knocks the target back a short distance.
The third attack deals <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> damage to the target and knocks the target back a short distance.
The fourth attack deals <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> damage to the target and knocks the target back a short distance.
The fifth attack deals <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> damage to the target and launches the target into the air.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
动心流模式下，普通攻击中，长按普攻可触发。
向前冲刺并旋转自身进行多段攻击，对目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
In the Excited Flow mode, tap and hold normal attack to trigger the skill.
Dash forward with a swirling multi-attack, dealing a maximum of <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage.

Desc.SourceString:
静心流模式下，普通攻击中或立即长按普攻可触发。
长按攻击键保持蓄势，松开攻击键对目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。攻击判定期间受到攻击，可格挡自身最大生命值<shuzhi>20%</>的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
In the Silent Flow mode, hold normal attack immediately or while launching normal attacks to trigger the skill.
Hold the attack button to keep the Anticipation. Release the button to deal <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage. When hit during the attacking period, blocks <shuzhi>20%</> of your Max HP.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻，攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻可触发。
下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害；落地时对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne, or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
向前闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻。
冲刺并转身攻击目标，共造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap normal attack during the short period after dodging.
Dash and spin to attack the target, dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString: 向目标方向突进并短暂定身路径上的敌方，延迟对路径上的敌方造成至多<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，冷却<shuzhi>30</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dash toward the target and temporarily immobilize enemies along the path, dealing delayed damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
释放静心流技能进入蓄力状态，持续嘲讽周围目标，最多蓄力<shuzhi>3</>秒，蓄力期间吸收伤害，最多吸收<shuzhi>60%</>最大生命值伤害，蓄力结束时根据吸收的伤害量对目标造成一次<shuzhi>977.5%</>*冰攻+<shuzhi>50%</>*吸收的伤害量的寒冰伤害，未被消耗的<shuzhi>20%</>数值转化为生命回复，冷却<shuzhi>30</>秒。

激活坚毅共鸣时进入静心流状态，<shuzhi>动心流·凝泉掠影</>替换为<shuzhi>静心流·聚凝泉涌</>，非坚毅共鸣时为动心流状态
释放不破咲技能获得跟随自身的剑影，释放不破咲分支技或者连携技时剑影会释放【涌动】，对目标造成<shuzhi>517.5%</>*冰攻范围伤害，【涌动】冷却<shuzhi>10</>秒。
动心流状态下：玩家使用任意武器造成伤害时剑影释放【流转】，对首个命中的目标造成<shuzhi>143.7%</>*冰攻伤害并回复伤害值<shuzhi>57%</>的生命值，每次最大回复量不超过攻击的<shuzhi>100%</>，冷却<shuzhi>0.8</>秒。
静心流状态下：剑影释放【涌动】后，玩家获得<shuzhi>3</>次格挡能力，持续<shuzhi>10</>秒，格挡量最大不超过自身最大生命值的<shuzhi>15%</>，每次成功格挡对目标造成一次<shuzhi>517.5%</>*冰攻的【反击】伤害，【涌动】的破盾能力提高<shuzhi>100%</>并附加嘲讽效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Silent Flow Skill: Activate to enter a charging state for up to <shuzhi>3</> seconds, taunting nearby enemies. During this charge, absorb damage, up to <shuzhi>60%</> of Max HP. After charging, launch a strike dealing Frost DMG equal to <shuzhi>50%</> of the absorbed damage + <shuzhi>977.5%</> of Frost ATK. Unused absorption is converted into HP recovery at <shuzhi>20%</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds. 

When activating Fortitude Resonance, enter Silent Flow status.Excited Flow: <shuzhi>Flashing Stream</> is replaced by <shuzhi>Silent Flow</>: Concentrated Stream. Outside of Fortitude Resonance, the state is Excited Flow.
Sword Shadow: Triggered by using the Saki Fuwa skill, it follows the Wanderer. When using a Saki Fuwa branch or discharge skill, the Sword Shadow releases Surge, dealing <shuzhi>517.5%</> area damage. Surge cooldown: <shuzhi>10</> seconds.
In Excited Flow: Attacking with any weapon causes the Sword Shadow to release Flow, dealing <shuzhi>143.7%</> of Frost ATK damage to the first target hit and healing <shuzhi>57%</> of the damage dealt (up to <shuzhi>100%</> of ATK). Cooldown: <shuzhi>0.8</> seconds.
In Silent Flow: After Surge, gain <shuzhi>3</> instances of block for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, with a maximum block of <shuzhi>15%</> Max HP. Each successful block triggers a Counterattack, dealing <shuzhi>517.5%</> of Frost ATK damage. Surge's shield-breaking ability is increased by <shuzhi>100%</> with taunt effect.

Dash toward the target and temporarily immobilize enemies along the path, dealing delayed damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
The Wanderer can gain Sword Shadow which follows them around when using Saki Fuwa's skills. Sword Shadow will release Surge when the Wanderer uses Saki Fuwa's branch skills or discharge skills, dealing area damage equal to <shuzhi>100%</> of frost ATK. Cooldown of Surge: <shuzhi>10</> seconds.
Sword Shadow will release Flow when the Wanderer deals damage with any weapon, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>16%</> of frost ATK on the first target hit. Cooldown: <shuzhi>0.8</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 使用考恩特Ⅱ型，获得一个持续<shuzhi>5</>秒的护盾。承受1次攻击后消失，消失时击退周围敌人并造成<shuzhi>100%</>攻击力+<shuzhi>50</>点伤害，若在护盾生成1秒内被击破，则眩晕<shuzhi>2</>秒。护盾破碎后获得当前生命值百分比的增伤效果持续<shuzhi>10</>秒（最大不超过<shuzhi>60%</>），冷却<shuzhi>30</>秒，与考恩特共享冷却
Desc.LocalizedString: Summon a Type II Couant and generate a shield for <shuzhi>5</> seconds, which disappears after 5 seconds or after being struck once. Upon disappearing, the shield knocks back nearby enemies and deals damage equal to <shuzhi>100%</> of Attack +<shuzhi>50</>. If broken within 1 second of being generated, the shield will stun enemies for <shuzhi>2</> seconds. Also boost damage based on the current HP for <shuzhi>10</> seconds (up to <shuzhi>60%</> of the current HP). <shuzhi>30</>-second cooldown (shares cooldown with other Couants).

Desc.SourceString: 使用考恩特Ⅱ型，获得一个持续<shuzhi>5</>秒的护盾。承受1次攻击后消失，消失时击退周围敌人并造成<shuzhi>100%</>攻击力+<shuzhi>50</>点伤害，若在护盾生成1秒内被击破，则眩晕<shuzhi>2</>秒。护盾破碎后获得当前生命值百分比的增伤效果持续<shuzhi>10</>秒（最大不超过<shuzhi>60%</>），冷却<shuzhi>30</>秒，与考恩特共享冷却

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时点击普攻，操控斯帕克可连续进行5次攻击。
第一次攻击对每个目标总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对每个目标总计造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对每个目标总计造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对每个目标总计造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
第五次攻击对每个目标总计造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，并造成<shuzhi>击飞</>效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, tap the normal attack button to command Spark to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> against each target.
Second Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> against each target.
Third Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> against each target.
Fourth Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> against each target.
Fifth Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> against each target and <shuzhi>launches</> targets.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时点击普攻，操控斯帕克可连续进行4次攻击。
第一次攻击对每个目标总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对每个目标总计造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对每个目标总计造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对每个目标总计造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, tap the normal attack button to command Spark to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> against each target.
Second Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> against each target.
Third Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> against each target.
Fourth Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> against each target.

Desc.SourceString: 长按普攻或者在触发“禁锢领域”后长按普攻，持续射出火焰光束对瞄准方向的目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害并消耗耐力。
Desc.LocalizedString: Tap and hold normal attack or do this after Lockdown Zone is triggered to continuously fire searing energy beams at enemies in a target direction, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Consumes Wanderer's endurance.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻，触发火焰坠落。
被能量体包裹，快速坠落至地面，对周围的目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne to trigger Blazing Dive.
Envelop the body in energy before rapidly plunging into the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString: 普攻第二段后任意段长按，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并将锁定目标禁锢（非强控）并灼烧<shuzhi>3</>秒，每秒造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害（对boss不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: After the second normal attack, hold the button during any attack to deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> against the target. The locked-on target is confined and burned for <shuzhi>3</> seconds, and damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> is dealt to the target every second (ineffective against bosses).

Desc.SourceString:
斯帕克向前方射出【火花】存在15秒，在目标和玩家之间反弹并首次命中使目标动作速率减缓（非强控）持续<shuzhi>4</>秒冷却<shuzhi>15</>秒，距离越远伤害越高，命中敌人最多可造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害并施加【炙热】标记持续<shuzhi>25</>秒，同时释放4颗子弹，每颗子弹对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害；斯帕克对【炙热】标记的目标普攻伤害提高<shuzhi>110%</>。若目标存在自己施加的灼烧，则在【火花】命中时触发一次灼烧或点燃剩余总伤害<shuzhi>100%</>的额外伤害（多个灼烧或点燃合并计算）且后续会自动结算一次，结算冷却<shuzhi>6</>秒，技能冷却<shuzhi>30</>秒。
<shuzhi>被动</>：【火花】存在期间，斯帕克普攻/火花每造成1次伤害，玩家累积<shuzhi>1</>点【热能】冷却<shuzhi>0.9</>秒，至多积累<shuzhi>8</>点，当【热能】达到上限时，玩家获得【极限热能】效果，火攻增加<shuzhi>25%</>持续<shuzhi>25</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Fires a spark that lasts for 15 seconds, bouncing between the target and you. Upon the first hit, slows (non-strong control) the target for <shuzhi>4</> seconds with a <shuzhi>15</>-second cooldown. The damage increases with distance, up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, and inflicts an Emblazen mark on the target for <shuzhi>25</> seconds. At the same time, fire 4 projectiles, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>. Normal attacks against marked targets deal <shuzhi>110%</> more damage. If the target is already in burned state inflicted by you, hitting them with spark triggers an extra instance of damage equal to <shuzhi>100%</> of the remaining burn/ignite damage (multiple burn/ignite effects are combined). This additional damage triggers once every <shuzhi>6</> seconds, and the skill has a <shuzhi>30</>-second cooldown.
<shuzhi>Passive</>: When Sparks exist, each time Spark's normal attacks or Sparks deal damage, the Authorizer gains <shuzhi>1</> point of Heat with a cooldown of <shuzhi>0.9</> seconds, up to <shuzhi>8</> points. When Heat reaches the maximum, the Authorizer gains the Ultimate Heat effect, increasing flame ATK by <shuzhi>25%</> for <shuzhi>25</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避后，将多莉抛出并存在<shuzhi>10</>秒，吸附附近敌人造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害并嘲讽敌人<shuzhi>1.5</>秒（嘲讽在组队状态下不生效），使其转向攻击多莉。
Desc.LocalizedString: Throw Dolly after dodging. Dolly remains for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, drawing in nearby enemies and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> against them, as well as taunting them for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds, causing them to divert their attacks to Dolly (cannot taunt enemies when in a team).

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，斯帕克开启蓄力形态，持续向前方射出大范围火焰光束，并在结束时爆炸，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害；若目标存在自己施加的灼烧，命中时触发一次灼烧或点燃剩余总伤害<shuzhi>100%</>的额外伤害（多个灼烧或点燃合并计算）,结算冷却<shuzhi>6</>秒，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</>. Spark enters a charged state, continuously blasting wide-area searing energy beams at the target location before eventually exploding. Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. If the target has a self-inflicted burning effect, then burn or ignite it once and deal additional damage equal to <shuzhi>100%</> of the total remaining damage (multiple burning or ignition effects are counted collectively). The result calculation cooldown is <shuzhi>6</> seconds. When the skill is active, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，使用影织进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并浮空目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Launch five strikes with Shadoweave on the ground.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target and suspends them.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack while airborne to unleash five consecutive strikes in mid-air.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target.

Desc.SourceString:
地面或者空中普攻第二下后，长按普攻可触发零落成泥。
在目标位置发动攻击，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并将目标击倒。
被动：地面释放零落成泥后快速点击普攻，可立即释放（第三层）昙花一现。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack after the second Normal Attack strike on the ground of in mid-air to trigger Scattered Soil.
 Launches attack at the target position, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and knocking down the target.
 Passive: Rapidly press Normal Attack after using Scattered Soil on the ground to immediately unleash Brief Bloom (3rd stack).

Desc.SourceString:
长按普攻，可释放昙花一现，最多可蓄力三层，蓄力期间开启霸体和免控效果。
第一层，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害；
第二层，对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害；
第三层，对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack to unleash Brief Bloom. Can Charge for up to 3 levels, granting Hyperbody and immunity to control effects while charging.
 Level 1: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Level 2: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Level 3: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target.

Desc.SourceString:
空中长按普攻可触发坠影。
从空中快速下落，落地后造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并将目标击倒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack in mid-air to trigger Falling Shadow.
 Plummets from the sky, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK upon landing and knocking the target down.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
空翻位移的同时向目标发出翠意，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，命中生成昙花(随机<shuzhi>1-3</>个），同时形成持续<shuzhi>5</>秒的翠绿场域，处于翠绿场域中的敌方单位锁定拓荒者时，移动速度减少<shuzhi>50%</>。
被动：地面和空中均可释放。
被动：自身被控制时，立即解除控制，并自动释放徒留翠意（不消耗闪避次数），冷却<shuzhi>20</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Unleashes Leafy Green at the target while performing a Backflip, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK. Generates<shuzhi>1-3</> Epiphyllums upon hit and forms a Green Field that lasts for <shuzhi>5</>s. Reduces the Speed of enemies in the Green Field by <shuzhi>50%</> once they lock on the caster.
 Passive: Available both on the ground and in mid-air.
 Passive: Immediately breaks out of control effects and releases Leafy Green without using any Dodge attempts. Cooldown: <shuzhi>20</>s.

Desc.SourceString:
在自身周围形成映月之镜，持续<shuzhi>10</>秒，在映月之镜内，使用影织时造成伤害提高<shuzhi>10%</>，跳跃能力提高<shuzhi>20%</>，耐力消耗减少<shuzhi>50%</>，冷却<shuzhi>40</>秒。
处于映月之镜内使用影织时，获得特殊状态“凛空”，下落速度大幅减缓，可多次二段跳，空中同时使用摇杆和跳跃按钮，会进行一次穿梭，向目标发动一次攻击，命中造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害并生成昙花(随机<shuzhi>1-3</>个）。每个昙花造成<shuzhi>15%</>*攻击力点伤害

被动：拓荒者释放的映月之镜会间隔在一个目标附近生成昙花，每<shuzhi>0.8</>秒生成<shuzhi>1</>个。
被动：自身处于映月之镜内使用影织时，对生命低于<shuzhi>20%</>的目标造成伤害提高<shuzhi>50%</>。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Creates a Moonlight Realm around the caster, lasting for <shuzhi>10</>s. Increases the caster's Damage in the realm by <shuzhi>10%</>, Jump by <shuzhi>20%</>, and reduces Endurance consumption by <shuzhi>50%</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>40s</>.
 Grants the special state Airbloom when using Shadoweave in the realm, greatly reducing fall speed and enabling multiple double-jumps. In this state, using the directional controls and jump button while mid-air will perform a Roam and launch an attack on the target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK upon hit and randomly generating <shuzhi>1-3</> Epiphyllums, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>15%</> of ATK.

 Passive: Generates <shuzhi>1</> Epiphyllum near 1 target every <shuzhi>0.8</>s in the Moonlight Realm.
 Passive: Increases damage by <shuzhi>50%</> against targets with less than <shuzhi>20%</> HP while using Shadoweave in the Moonlight Realm.

Desc.SourceString:
在自身周围形成映月之镜，持续<shuzhi>10</>秒，在映月之镜内，使用影织时造成伤害提高<shuzhi>10%</>，跳跃能力提高<shuzhi>20%</>，耐力消耗减少<shuzhi>50%</>，冷却<shuzhi>40</>秒。
处于映月之镜内使用影织时，获得特殊状态“凛空”，下落速度大幅减缓，可多次二段跳，空中同时使用摇杆和跳跃按钮，会进行一次穿梭，向目标发动一次攻击，命中造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害并生成昙花(随机<shuzhi>1-3</>个）。每个昙花造成<shuzhi>15%</>*攻击力点伤害

被动：拓荒者释放的映月之镜会间隔在一个目标附近生成昙花，每<shuzhi>0.8</>秒生成<shuzhi>1</>个。
被动：自身处于映月之镜内使用影织时，对生命低于<shuzhi>20%</>的目标造成伤害提高<shuzhi>50%</>。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Creates a Moonlight Realm around the caster, lasting for <shuzhi>10</>s. Increases the caster's Damage in the realm by <shuzhi>10%</>, Jump by <shuzhi>20%</>, and reduces Endurance consumption by <shuzhi>50%</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>40s</>.
 Grants the special state Airbloom when using Shadoweave in the realm, greatly reducing fall speed and enabling multiple double-jumps. In this state, using the directional controls and jump button while mid-air will perform a Roam and launch an attack on the target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK upon hit and randomly generating <shuzhi>1-3</> Epiphyllums, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>15%</> of ATK.

 Passive: Generates <shuzhi>1</> Epiphyllum near 1 target every <shuzhi>0.8</>s in the Moonlight Realm.
 Passive: Increases damage by <shuzhi>50%</> against targets with less than <shuzhi>20%</> HP while using Shadoweave in the Moonlight Realm.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，释放重力编织，带有较强吸附力，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，<shuzhi>5</>秒后爆炸形成范围扩散波，造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: <shuzhi>Removes all carried debuffs</> when <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered upon switching to this weapon. Then unleashes Gravity Weave that pulls enemies in, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK, and explodes after <shuzhi>5</>s, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK. Grants Hyperbody and a shield worth 5% of Max HP for 3.5s.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发多重斩切。
在前方一定距离内产生多道斩切攻击，共造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap normal attack during the short perfect dodge window to trigger Multislash.
Unleash multiple slashes at a set distance in front of the user, dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
使用方向键加闪避按钮触发前闪避的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发上挑。
将目标挑至浮空，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Rising Cut.
Deal damage to a suspended target equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，挥舞大剑可连续进行四次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，造成<shuzhi>强控击飞</>，落地并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, swing a greatsword to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>, <shuzhi>strongly launch</> the target, then launch them upon landing.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，点击普攻可在空中连续进行四次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，造成<shuzhi>强控击倒</>，落地并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and deliver a <shuzhi>knockdown</>, launch the target upon landing.

Desc.SourceString:
普攻第三下后，长按普攻可触发腾空斩。
命中目标会<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标并使拓荒者滞空，总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
After the third normal attack, hold normal attack to trigger Rising Slash.
Upon hit, <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target and go airborne, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</>of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻(存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，触发落月斩。
下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害；落地时对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，造成击飞效果。
触发时离地距离越高，伤害越高，最高可达<shuzhi>600%</>伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Moonset Slash.
While falling, each hit deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and launch targets.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

Desc.SourceString: 处于下蹲状态时靠近敌人身后，点击普攻可触发偷袭，大剑劈斩，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to use Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString: 当拓荒者处于站立或移动状态时，长按普攻，可触发旋风斩，每<shuzhi>0.5</>秒对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，期间免疫控制和硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: While standing still or moving, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Whirlwind, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds to the target. Grant hitstun immunity while in use.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，挥舞盾斧可连续进行四次攻击。

第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{12}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{13}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。

While on the ground, swing the shield axe to attack 4 times in a row.
