Desc.SourceString:
盾形态：地面长按普攻，自身不可移动（松开普攻解除），持续<shuzhi>3</>秒，此状态下自身受到伤害减少<shuzhi>50%</>，在此期间受到任何伤害后松开普攻或者长按时间达到<shuzhi>3</>秒后，向四周发出火焰冲击，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，附带<shuzhi>1</>秒<shuzhi>强控眩晕</>效果。

Desc.LocalizedString:
Shield Form: While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to enter shield form (release to exit) for <shuzhi>3</> seconds, during which the Wanderer is unable to move, and all damage taken is reduced by <shuzhi>50%</>. While in shield form, releasing the normal attack button after taking damage or after holding the button for <shuzhi>3</> seconds unleashes fire crash, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and inflicting a <shuzhi>1</>-second <shuzhi>stun</> effect on the target.
Axe Form: Smash the target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and suspending the target.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻(存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，触发空中分支攻击。

Axe Form: While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and suspend the target.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发闪避攻击。
盾形态：向前发出一道火焰盾，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，击退目标，并产生范围爆炸，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，爆炸附带<shuzhi>0.5</>秒<shuzhi>强控眩晕</>效果，同时使目标在<shuzhi>10</>秒内被治疗效果降低<shuzhi>30%</>。
斧形态：旋转大斧，对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，同时使目标在<shuzhi>10</>秒内被治疗效果降低<shuzhi>30%</>。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Dodge Attack.
Shield Form: Unleash a flaming shield, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knocking back targets. In addition, trigger an explosion that deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, <shuzhi>stun</> targets for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds, and reduce incoming healing effects on targets by <shuzhi>30%</> for <shuzhi>10</> seconds.
Axe Form: Swing an axe to deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>, and reduce incoming healing effects on targets by <shuzhi>30%</> for <shuzhi>10</> seconds.

Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon from another, <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and fires an Arctic Beam, dealing <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage and inflicting <shuzhi>Strong Freeze</> for <shuzhi>3</> seconds, while reducing the target’s Frost Resistance by <shuzhi>50%</> for <shuzhi>10</> seconds. While Outburst is active, swing the maul to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{13}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{14}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{15}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，点击普攻触发跳跃攻击，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
开启喷气状态下，造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害并<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标。
触发时离地距离越高，伤害越高，最高可达<shuzhi>600%</>伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to trigger Jumping Blast. Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>and suspend the target.
While Outburst is active, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空长按，二段跳或附近有目标时在空中短按，攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，触发震荡波，<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标<shuzhi>4</>次，每次造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，消耗<shuzhi>250</>点耐力。
开启喷气状态下，触发震荡波，<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标<shuzhi>5</>次，每次造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
触发时离地距离越高，伤害越高，最高可达<shuzhi>600%</>伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tapping and holding while airborne, double-jumping, short tapping in the air when there are targets nearby, climbing, jumping backward, or attacking while using the Jetpack will trigger a Shockwave. <shuzhi>Strongly suspend</> the target <shuzhi>4</> times, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK+ <shuzhi>{1}</> each time. Cost <shuzhi>250</> endurance.
While Outburst is active, Shockwave <shuzhi>strongly suspends</> the target <shuzhi>5</> times, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of *ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> each time.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

Desc.SourceString: 处于下蹲状态时靠近敌人身后，点击普攻可触发偷袭，挥舞重锤，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to use Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
长按普攻，可触发蓄力重击，最多可蓄力三层，蓄力期间开启霸体和免控效果。
第一层，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并浮空目标；
第二层，对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标；
第三层，对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标。
开启喷气的状态下，长按普攻触发怒气连击，造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并造成<shuzhi>强控浮空</>效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack to trigger Focus Smash (can be charged up to 3 stacks). Grant immunity to all control effects and hyperbody while charging.
First Stack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and suspend the target.
Second Stack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target.
Third Stack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target.
While Outburst is active, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Furious Strikes, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target.

Desc.SourceString: 连续挥舞大剑，对身前范围发射剑气，每次造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，每道剑气造成伤害依次递增<shuzhi>5%</>，技能期间免疫控制效果，冷却<shuzhi>30</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Swing the greatsword to launch sword auras forward, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and dealing increasing damage of <shuzhi>5%</> with each hit. Immune to control effects while active. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 后空翻并向前方射出<shuzhi>3</>支穿透箭，主箭对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，另外两支箭造成60%的伤害，并<shuzhi>强制击退</>目标，目标在击退过程中碰到阻挡则会进入<shuzhi>5</>秒晕眩，冷却<shuzhi>12</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Perform a backflip and fire <shuzhi>3</> piercing shots, with the main shot dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, and the other two shots deal 60% damage. In addition, <shuzhi>knock targets back</> and stun them for <shuzhi>5</> seconds if they collide with an obstacle. Cooldown: <shuzhi>12</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 后空翻并向前方射出<shuzhi>3</>支穿透箭，主箭对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，另外两支箭造成60%的伤害，并<shuzhi>强制击退</>目标，目标在击退过程中碰到阻挡则会进入<shuzhi>5</>秒晕眩，冷却<shuzhi>12</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Perform a backflip and fire <shuzhi>3</> piercing shots, with the main shot dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, and the other two shots deal 60% damage. In addition, <shuzhi>knock targets back</> and stun them for <shuzhi>5</> seconds if they collide with an obstacle. Cooldown: <shuzhi>12</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却15秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避后，点击攻击，可触发蓄力一击效果，小幅击退目标，并对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Tap attack after dodging to trigger Loaded Arrow, knocking the target back by a short distance and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却15秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 后空翻并向前方射出<shuzhi>1</>支穿透箭，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并击退目标，冷却<shuzhi>{2}</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Backflips and fires <shuzhi>1</> piercing shot forward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knocking the target back. <shuzhi>{2}</>-second cooldown.

Desc.SourceString: 后空翻并向前方射出<shuzhi>1</>支穿透箭，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并击退目标，冷却<shuzhi>{2}</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Backflips and fires <shuzhi>1</> piercing shot forward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knocking the target back. <shuzhi>{2}</>-second cooldown.

Desc.SourceString: 使用悬浮滑板在地面和流沙上进行移动，移动时消耗耐力，使用滑板时可快速向前位移一段距离，冷却<shuzhi>90</>秒
Desc.LocalizedString: Use the Hoverboard to quickly hover over the ground and quicksand at the cost of endurance. Cooldown: <shuzhi>90</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 使用后向前冲刺一段距离，之后在阻力作用下逐渐减速直到停止，冲刺期间对碰撞的目标造成<shuzhi>760%</>*攻击力伤害及击飞效果。游泳状态下也可以使用喷气滑板。每<shuzhi>90</>秒获得<shuzhi>1</>次充能。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dashes forward a set distance before gradually stopping, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>760%</> of ATK to targets along the path and knocking them up. Can also be used while swimming. Restores <shuzhi>1</> charge every <shuzhi>90</>s.

Desc.SourceString:
斯帕克向前方射出【火花】存在15秒，在目标和玩家之间反弹并首次命中使目标动作速率减缓（非强控）持续<shuzhi>4</>秒冷却<shuzhi>15</>秒，距离越远伤害越高，命中敌人最多可造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害并施加【炙热】标记持续<shuzhi>25</>秒，同时释放4颗子弹，每颗子弹对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害；斯帕克对【炙热】标记的目标普攻伤害提高<shuzhi>110%</>。若目标存在自己施加的灼烧，则在【火花】命中时触发一次灼烧或点燃剩余总伤害<shuzhi>100%</>的额外伤害（多个灼烧或点燃合并计算）且后续会自动结算一次，结算冷却<shuzhi>6</>秒，技能冷却<shuzhi>30</>秒。
<shuzhi>被动</>：【火花】存在期间，斯帕克普攻/火花每造成1次伤害，玩家累积<shuzhi>1</>点【热能】冷却<shuzhi>0.9</>秒，至多积累<shuzhi>8</>点，当【热能】达到上限时，玩家获得【极限热能】效果，火攻增加<shuzhi>25%</>持续<shuzhi>25</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Fires a spark that lasts for 15 seconds, bouncing between the target and you. Upon the first hit, slows (non-strong control) the target for <shuzhi>4</> seconds with a <shuzhi>15</>-second cooldown. The damage increases with distance, up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, and inflicts an Emblazen mark on the target for <shuzhi>25</> seconds. At the same time, fire 4 projectiles, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>. Normal attacks against marked targets deal <shuzhi>110%</> more damage. If the target is already in burned state inflicted by you, hitting them with spark triggers an extra instance of damage equal to <shuzhi>100%</> of the remaining burn/ignite damage (multiple burn/ignite effects are combined). This additional damage triggers once every <shuzhi>6</> seconds, and the skill has a <shuzhi>30</>-second cooldown.
<shuzhi>Passive</>: When Sparks exist, each time Spark's normal attacks or Sparks deal damage, the Authorizer gains <shuzhi>1</> point of Heat with a cooldown of <shuzhi>0.9</> seconds, up to <shuzhi>8</> points. When Heat reaches the maximum, the Authorizer gains the Ultimate Heat effect, increasing flame ATK by <shuzhi>25%</> for <shuzhi>25</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
斯帕克向前方射出【火花】存在15秒，在目标和玩家之间反弹并首次命中使目标动作速率减缓（非强控）持续<shuzhi>4</>秒冷却<shuzhi>15</>秒，距离越远伤害越高，命中敌人最多可造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害并施加【炙热】标记持续<shuzhi>25</>秒，同时释放4颗子弹，每颗子弹对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害；斯帕克对【炙热】标记的目标普攻伤害提高<shuzhi>110%</>。若目标存在自己施加的灼烧，则在【火花】命中时触发一次灼烧或点燃剩余总伤害<shuzhi>100%</>的额外伤害（多个灼烧或点燃合并计算）且后续会自动结算一次，结算冷却<shuzhi>6</>秒，技能冷却<shuzhi>30</>秒。
<shuzhi>被动</>：【火花】存在期间，斯帕克普攻/火花每造成1次伤害，玩家累积<shuzhi>1</>点【热能】冷却<shuzhi>0.9</>秒，至多积累<shuzhi>8</>点，当【热能】达到上限时，玩家获得【极限热能】效果，火攻增加<shuzhi>25%</>持续<shuzhi>25</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Fires a spark that lasts for 15 seconds, bouncing between the target and you. Upon the first hit, slows (non-strong control) the target for <shuzhi>4</> seconds with a <shuzhi>15</>-second cooldown. The damage increases with distance, up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>, and inflicts an Emblazen mark on the target for <shuzhi>25</> seconds. At the same time, fire 4 projectiles, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>. Normal attacks against marked targets deal <shuzhi>110%</> more damage. If the target is already in burned state inflicted by you, hitting them with spark triggers an extra instance of damage equal to <shuzhi>100%</> of the remaining burn/ignite damage (multiple burn/ignite effects are combined). This additional damage triggers once every <shuzhi>6</> seconds, and the skill has a <shuzhi>30</>-second cooldown.
<shuzhi>Passive</>: When Sparks exist, each time Spark's normal attacks or Sparks deal damage, the Authorizer gains <shuzhi>1</> point of Heat with a cooldown of <shuzhi>0.9</> seconds, up to <shuzhi>8</> points. When Heat reaches the maximum, the Authorizer gains the Ultimate Heat effect, increasing flame ATK by <shuzhi>25%</> for <shuzhi>25</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
<ComLblGreen>悔悟</>：非恩赐共鸣时晚祷普攻命中拥有<shuzhi>「悔悟」标记</>的目标时附带额外伤害，伤害数值=自身附带的守护数量*<shuzhi>7.68%</>*攻击（最多46.08%*攻击），该伤害不会触发额外的攻击效果且视为连携技伤害和武器技能伤害；

恩赐共鸣时晚祷普攻命中拥有<shuzhi>「悔悟」标记</>的目标时附带额外伤害，伤害数值=自身附带和为队友附带的守护数量*<shuzhi>5.52%</>*攻击（最多44.16%*攻击），该伤害不会触发额外的攻击效果且视为连携技伤害和武器技能伤害。
<ComLblGreen>辉光</>：晚祷的所有普攻命中目标后回复<shuzhi>15%</>*攻击的生命。
<ComLblGreen>圣击</>：晚祷的空中攻击和蓄锐可以将充能能力的60%转化为破盾能力。
<ComLblGreen>守护</>：自身生命值每减少<shuzhi>15%</>最大生命值或者获得<shuzhi>300</>点武器充能值，自身获得「悔悟」守护最多<shuzhi>5</>个（后台可以产生），「悔悟」守护持续<shuzhi>25</>秒。如果自身「悔悟」守护已满，新生成的「悔悟」守护会攻击敌方目标，造成<shuzhi>120%</>攻击物理伤害并消失，该伤害不会触发额外的攻击效果。

注：晚祷在旧日幻象中不视为辅助武器
Desc.LocalizedString:
<ComLblGreen>Enlightenment</>: Normal attack (without Benediction Resonance) deals additional damage to targets <shuzhi>marked with Enlightenment</>. The damage equals the number of Guards you carry × <shuzhi>7.68%</> of ATK (up to 46.08% of ATK). This damage is treated as discharge skill and weapon skill damage, and will not trigger additional attack effects. 

With Benediction Resonance, Normal attack deals additional damage to targets <shuzhi>marked with Enlightenment</>. The damage equal to the number of Guards you and your teammates carry × <shuzhi>5.52%</> of ATK (up to 44.16% of ATK). This damage is also treated as discharge skill and weapon skill damage, and will not trigger additional attack effects.
<ComLblGreen>Glowing</>: Normal attack restores HP equal to <shuzhi>15%</> of ATK upon hit.
<ComLblGreen>Sacred Strike</>: Attack in air and Accumulator can convert 60% of charge ability to Shatter. 
<ComLblGreen>Guard</>: For every <shuzhi>15%</> HP lost or <shuzhi>300</> weapon charge gained, gain up to <shuzhi>5</> Enlightenment Guards (applies for the off-hand slot). These Guards last <shuzhi>25</> seconds. If your Enlightenment Guards are full, new ones will attack enemies, dealing physical damage equal to <shuzhi>120%</> of ATK, then disappear. This damage does not trigger additional attack effects.

Note: In Bygone Phantasm, Vesper is not considered a support weapon.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，使用晚祷可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并大幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并浮空目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use Vesper to launch 5 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back significantly. 
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and suspend the target.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and launch the target.

Desc.SourceString:
当玩家滞空时，点击普攻可释放破惘，每次挥拳对目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并消耗<shuzhi>10</>点耐力，最后一击造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害并击飞目标。
释放破惘期间，若目标可被抓取，则将目标抓取并抛掷到地上，总计造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, tap normal attack to unleash Frustration. Each punch deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and consumes <shuzhi>10</> endurance. The last hit deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and launches the target.
When unleashing Frustration, grab the target if possible and throw it to the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> in total.

Desc.SourceString:
长按普攻按钮，进行最多<shuzhi>3</>段蓄力；命中目标造成<shuzhi>强控浮空</>效果，蓄锐攻击期间免疫伤害和控制效果，在被命中前释放，可触发幻时。
一段蓄力命中造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
二段蓄力命中造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
三段蓄力命中造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack for up to <shuzhi>3</> charges. <shuzhi>Strongly suspend</> the target upon hit, and become immune from damage and control effects during an Accumulator attack. Releasing before getting hit can trigger Phantasia.
Phase 1 charged hit: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Phase 2 charged hit: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Phase 3 charged hit: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.

Desc.SourceString: 普攻过程中或闪避后长按普攻不放，可释放瞬光，每次挥拳对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并消耗<shuzhi>10</>点耐力，松手后触发蓄锐。
Desc.LocalizedString: Tap and hold normal attack during normal attacks or after dodging to unleash Shimmer. Each punch deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and consumes <shuzhi>10</> endurance. Release to trigger Accumulator.

Desc.SourceString:
当玩家滞空时长按普攻，可触发空中3段蓄力，松手后重击地面并<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标，在被命中前进入蓄力，可触发幻时。
一段蓄力攻击：对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害；
二段蓄力攻击：对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害；
三段蓄力攻击：对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, tap and hold normal attack to trigger 3 mid-air charges. Release to pummel the ground and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> targets. Releasing before getting hit can trigger Phantasia.
Phase 1 charged attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Phase 2 charged attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Phase 3 charged attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
<ComLblGreen>「宽恕」守护</>：治疗效果溢出时，生成不超过最大生命值<shuzhi>60%</>的生命护盾；晚祷拥有「宽恕」守护，且在不同武器共鸣下激活不同守护效果
<ComLblGreen>恩赐守护</>：技能替换为<shuzhi>辉起</>；自身不再获得「悔悟」守护，改为为队友添加「宽恕」守护，并且每治疗最大生命的<shuzhi>15%</>也可获得一个「宽恕」守护，每个队友最多附带一个「宽恕」守护，如果场上没有未获得「宽恕」守护的队友，则「宽恕」守护对一个敌方单位造成<shuzhi>144</>%攻击物理伤害并消失，该伤害不会触发额外的攻击效果；自身和队友生命值上限提升<shuzhi>12.5%</>（多个不叠加）
<ComLblGreen>强攻守护</>：使用晚祷技能命中时，立刻获得<shuzhi>30%</>最大生命值护盾，冷却<shuzhi>30</>秒
<ComLblGreen>坚毅守护</>：使用晚祷技能命中时，立刻获得治疗，每秒恢复<shuzhi>2%</>最大生命值持续<shuzhi>20</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>30</>秒
<ComLblGreen>均衡守护</>：生命高于<shuzhi>50%</>时，破盾提升<shuzhi>20%</>；生命低于<shuzhi>50%</>时，最终伤害提升<shuzhi>10%</>，破盾提升<shuzhi>10%</>
Desc.LocalizedString:
<ComLblGreen>Forgiveness Guard</>: Excess healing converts into an HP shield, up to <shuzhi>60%</> Max HP. Vesper triggers different effects based on Weapon Resonance when Forgiveness Guard is active.
<ComLblGreen>Benediction Guard</>: Replaces skill with <shuzhi>Shinerise</>. Removes Enlightenment Guard from the Wanderer but grants Forgiveness Guard to allies. For every <shuzhi>15%</> Max HP healed, gains one Forgiveness Guard. Each ally can hold one Forgiveness Guard. If all allies already have a Forgiveness Guard, it deals <shuzhi>144%</> physical damage to an enemy but does not trigger any damage bonus effects. Increases the entire team’s Max HP by <shuzhi>12.5%</> (Unstakable).
<ComLblGreen>Attack Guard</>: When Vesper’s skill hits, gains a Shield equal to <shuzhi>30%</> Max HP. (<shuzhi>30</>s cooldown)
<ComLblGreen>Fortitude Guard</>: When Vesper’s skill hits, restores <shuzhi>2%</> Max HP per second for <shuzhi>20</>s. (<shuzhi>30</>s cooldown)
<ComLblGreen>Balance Guard</>: Above <shuzhi>50%</> HP: Increases Shatter by 2<shuzhi>20%</>; Below <shuzhi>50%</> HP: Increases Final Damage by <shuzhi>10%</> and Shatter by <shuzhi>10%</>.

Desc.SourceString: 跃向目标，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标，并给目标添加「悔悟」标记持续<shuzhi>18</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>20</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Leap toward the target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> it. Inflict an Enlightenment mark on the target for <shuzhi>18</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>20</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 重击地面，<shuzhi>强控击飞</>面前的目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并召唤<shuzhi>锋芒</>最多存在<shuzhi>3</>个，持续<shuzhi>75</>秒（锋芒附近2米范围内最多存在1个），该技能最多可累积使用<shuzhi>3</>次，单次冷却时间<shuzhi>20</>秒；当场上存在2个<shuzhi>锋芒</>时，创建一个<shuzhi>清晖</>，每次触碰<shuzhi>锋芒</>，对移动距离半径内的目标进行一次治疗，恢复目标攻击力<shuzhi>{2}%</>的生命；当场上存在3个<shuzhi>锋芒</>时，创建一个<shuzhi>星云</>，每次触碰<shuzhi>锋芒</>，对移动距离半径内的目标造成（<shuzhi>{3}%</>*攻击力*移动距离/<shuzhi>5</>米）点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Pummel the ground and <shuzhi>strongly launch</> targets in front, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and summoning up to <shuzhi>3</> <shuzhi>Blades</> for <shuzhi>75</> seconds (up to 1 Blade every 2 meters). This skill can be used up to <shuzhi>3</> times, with a cooldown of <shuzhi>20</> seconds each time. When 2 <shuzhi>Blades</> exist on the field, a <shuzhi>Clearshine</> is created. When a <shuzhi>Blade</> is touched, it heals targets within the movement radius, restoring HP equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of the target's ATK. When 3 <shuzhi>Blades</> exist, a <shuzhi>Nebula</> is created. When a <shuzhi>Blade</> is touched, it damages targets within the movement radius, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{3}%</> of ATK × movement distance / <shuzhi>5</>m.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避后，点击普攻，将目标抓取到身边并持续吸附目标<shuzhi>2</>秒，并标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害；闪避后长按普攻可在释放<shuzhi>意识捕获</>后触发<shuzhi>瞬光</>。
Desc.LocalizedString: After dodging, tap normal attack to pull the target to you and draw it in for <shuzhi>2</> seconds, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Tapping and holding normal attack after dodging can trigger <shuzhi>Shimmer</> after unleashing <shuzhi>Mind Capture</>.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒并恢复<shuzhi>250</>点耐力。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds and recover <shuzhi>250</> endurance.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，释放喟叹轻咏，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并给目标添加「悔悟」标记持续<shuzhi>18</>秒，期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, switching to this weapon from another<shuzhi> removes all debuffs from the wielder</> and unleashes Chanting Sigh, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and adding an Enlightenment mark to the target for <shuzhi>18</> seconds, during which damage immunity lasts <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，释放喟叹轻咏，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并给目标添加「悔悟」标记持续<shuzhi>18</>秒，期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, switching to this weapon from another<shuzhi> removes all debuffs from the wielder</> and unleashes Chanting Sigh, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and adding an Enlightenment mark to the target for <shuzhi>18</> seconds, during which damage immunity lasts <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，冲向目标并将目标<shuzhi>强控浮空</>，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，同时留下剑刃风暴，对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，自身在<shuzhi>5</>秒内免疫重伤/冰冻/灼烧/感电效果，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Authorizer</> and allow the Authorizer to rush to the target, <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> the target and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. A bladestorm follows, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>. Gain immunity to Grievous, Freeze, Burn, and Electrify effects for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，冲向目标并将目标<shuzhi>强控浮空</>，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，同时留下剑刃风暴，对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，自身在<shuzhi>5</>秒内免疫重伤/冰冻/灼烧/感电效果，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Authorizer</> and allow the Authorizer to rush to the target, <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> the target and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. A bladestorm follows, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>. Gain immunity to Grievous, Freeze, Burn, and Electrify effects for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，在目标位置降下持续冰雹，对单个目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，冰雹攻击有<shuzhi>10%</>几率使附带<shuzhi>2</>秒<shuzhi>强控冰冻</>效果，同时自身进入强冷状态，造成伤害提高<shuzhi>15%</>，移动速度增加<shuzhi>45%</>，持续<shuzhi>7</>秒，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon from another, <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and summons a hailstorm at the target location, dealing up to <shuzhi>{0}%</>of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage to a single enemy. The hailstorm has a <shuzhi>10%</> chance to inflict <shuzhi>Strong Freeze</> for <shuzhi>2</> second. Enters Cold Front, increasing damage dealt by <shuzhi>15%</> and movement speed by <shuzhi>45%</> for <shuzhi>7</> seconds. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (not applicable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString:
投出手中所有骰子，投出不同数量的骰子有不同的效果；战斗中每次投出骰子时随机从<shuzhi>10</>个增益效果中获得<shuzhi>1</>个，脱战后清除（包括：冰伤提升<shuzhi>10%</>、火伤提升<shuzhi>10%</>、雷伤提升<shuzhi>10%</>、物伤提升<shuzhi>10%</>、异能伤害提升<shuzhi>10%</>、受到的冰伤降低<shuzhi>5%</>、受到的火伤降低<shuzhi>5%</>、受到的雷伤降低<shuzhi>5%</>、受到的物伤降低<shuzhi>5%</>、受到的异能伤害降低<shuzhi>5%</>；投出不同数量骰子时均只随机获得<shuzhi>1</>个增益效果，所有效果均只叠加<shuzhi>1</>层，天选骰子5星时投出3个骰子获得全部元素增伤效果）；每<shuzhi>30</>秒获得一个新骰子，最多积攒<shuzhi>3</>个骰子。<shuzhi>考恩特</>和<shuzhi>考恩特Ⅱ型</>上阵时不可使用骰子：
投出<shuzhi>1</>个骰子时，立刻获得<shuzhi>180</>点武器充能值，如果投出<shuzhi>1</>点或者<shuzhi>6</>点，则获得<shuzhi>热核</>效果：获得<shuzhi>20%</>的伤害提升，持续<shuzhi>35</>秒
投出<shuzhi>2</>个骰子时，立刻获得<shuzhi>180</>点武器充能值和<shuzhi>热核</>效果，如果<shuzhi>2</>个骰子点数相同则获得<shuzhi>聚变</>效果：清除所有武器的技能冷却时间
投出<shuzhi>3</>个骰子时，立刻获得<shuzhi>180</>点武器充能值、<shuzhi>热核</>效果和<shuzhi>聚变</>效果，如果<shuzhi>3</>个骰子点数相同则获得<shuzhi>超频</>效果：<shuzhi>6</>秒内释放连携不扣除充能值
卸下源器天选骰子时，清除源器天选骰子所加的随机增益效果和热核效果
Desc.LocalizedString:
Roll all the dice, and different quantities of dice you cast have different effects. Every time you roll a dice in battle, you will randomly gain <shuzhi>1</> out of <shuzhi>10</> buffs which is cleared after the battle. The buffs include: Frost damage +<shuzhi>10%</>, flame damage +<shuzhi>10%</>, volt damage +<shuzhi>10%</>, physical damage +<shuzhi>10%</>, altered damage +<shuzhi>10%</>, frost damage received −<shuzhi>5%</>, flame damage received −<shuzhi>5%</>, volt damage received −<shuzhi>5%</>, physical damage received −<shuzhi>5%</>, and altered damage received −<shuzhi>5%</>. Only <shuzhi>1</> random buff can be gained when casting dice, and all effects are only stacked <shuzhi>1</> time. At 5 stars, rolling 3 Heaven's Dice will grant all the elemental damage boosts. A new dice are gained every <shuzhi>30</> seconds, and up to <shuzhi>3</> dice can be accumulated. When<shuzhi>Couant</> or <shuzhi>Type II Couant</> is deployed, no dice rolling would be allowed: 
When <shuzhi>1</> dice is cast, immediately get <shuzhi>180</> weapon charge. If the number rolled is <shuzhi>1</> or <shuzhi>6</>, get the <shuzhi>Thermonuclear</> effect: Gain <shuzhi>20%</> damage boost for <shuzhi>35</> seconds.
When <shuzhi>2</> dice are cast, immediately get <shuzhi>180</> weapon charge and the <shuzhi>Thermonuclear</> effect. If the <shuzhi>2</> dice have the same number of points, get the <shuzhi>Fusion</> effect: Clear the cooldown of all weapon skills.
When <shuzhi>3</> dice are cast, immediately get <shuzhi>180</> weapon charge, the <shuzhi>Thermonuclear</> effect, and the <shuzhi>Fusion</> effect. If the <shuzhi>3</> dice have the same number of points, get the <shuzhi>Overclock</> effect: Using discharge skills within <shuzhi>6</> seconds doesn't cost weapon charge.
When the Relic Heaven's Dice is removed, clear the random buffs and Thermonuclear effect added by the Heaven's Dice.

Desc.SourceString: 给自己及周围友方单位添加护盾，可抵挡<shuzhi>120%</>*攻击力伤害，持续<shuzhi>10</>秒，并对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害和<shuzhi>强控击飞</>效果。若释放技能时有立方，每个立方提升<shuzhi>10%</>攻击的护盾上限值并消耗掉立方，冷却<shuzhi>60</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Create a shield for yourself and nearby allies, which blocks up to <shuzhi>120%</> of ATK in damage for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, dealing <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage to nearby targets and <shuzhi>strongly launching</> them. Each cube in possession when this skill is used adds <shuzhi>10%</> of ATK to max shielding and exhaust the cube. Cooldown: <shuzhi>60</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 给自己及周围友方单位添加护盾，可抵挡<shuzhi>800%</>*攻击力伤害，持续<shuzhi>10</>秒，并对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害和<shuzhi>强控击飞</>效果。若释放技能时有立方，每个立方提升<shuzhi>160%</>攻击的护盾上限值并消耗掉立方，冷却<shuzhi>60</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Create shielding for self and nearby allies to block up to <shuzhi>800%</> of ATK in damage for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, deal <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage to nearby targets and <shuzhi>strongly launch</> them. Each cube in possession when this skill is used adds <shuzhi>160%</> of ATK to max shielding and exhaust the cube. Cooldown: <shuzhi>60</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，获得<shuzhi>5</>个立方并发射震荡波和<shuzhi>5</>个立方，震荡波对拓荒者周围的目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>伤害和<shuzhi>强控击飞</>效果，每个立方对的目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，若周围存在友方单位，则使其在<shuzhi>0.5</>秒内免疫伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and gain <shuzhi>5</> cubes, then unleash the <shuzhi>5</> cubes along with a Shockwave. This Shockwave deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets, and <shuzhi>strongly launches</> them into the air. Each cube also deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>. If allies are in the vicinity, they gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，获得<shuzhi>5</>个立方并发射震荡波和<shuzhi>5</>个立方，震荡波对拓荒者周围的目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>伤害和<shuzhi>强控击飞</>效果，每个立方对的目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，若周围存在友方单位，则使友方和自身在<shuzhi>3</>秒内免疫伤害，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Authorizer</> and gain <shuzhi>5</> cubes, then unleash the <shuzhi>5</> cubes along with a Shockwave. This Shockwave deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby enemies, and <shuzhi>strongly launches</> them into the air. Each cube also deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>. If allies are in the vicinity, the allies and the Authorizer gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>3</> seconds. During the skill, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString: 使用破钧普攻命中<shuzhi>5</>次为破钧充电，最多累积<shuzhi>3</>次充电点数，充电后后续使用任意武器闪避技、或天琅禄存技能命中目标会进行放电附加<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的范围雷电伤害，同时添加<shuzhi>{1}%</>*最大生命值的护盾，持续<shuzhi>{2}</>秒
Desc.LocalizedString: When wielding Thunderbreaker, every <shuzhi>5</> hits with normal attack will charge the weapon, stacking up to <shuzhi>3</> charges. After charging, any weapon's dodge skill or Tian Lang's Phecda inflicts additional area volt damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK upon hitting targets and also creates a shield equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of Max HP for <shuzhi>{2}</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，使用破钧进行6次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击退目标。
第六次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use Thunderbreaker to attack 6 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK and knock the target back.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK and knock the target back.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK and knock the target back.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK and knock the target back.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK and launch the target.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第五次攻击对目标最高造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne or after jumping 1 time, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to up to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，长按普攻可触发。
对目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害并吸引怪物向自身聚集。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger.
Deal damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and pull in enemies around you.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻，攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻可触发。
下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害；落地时对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne, or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to surrounding targets.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却25秒，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of targets within the area. Cooldown: 25 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻。
冲刺攻击目标，共造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap normal attack during the short period after dodging.
Dash to attack the target, dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
发动多段连续攻击，对范围内敌方造成至多<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并使一定范围内敌方单位成为感电体（该状态可被驱散），最多存在3个感电体，冷却<shuzhi>25</>秒。
成为感电体的怪物，造成的雷伤降低<shuzhi>{1}%</>（只对施法者自身生效），不可叠加，持续<shuzhi>{2}</>秒。
每次打掉感电体怪物30%最大血量时，激发一次感电体造成<shuzhi>{3}%</>*攻击力的范围伤害
Desc.LocalizedString:
Unleash a barrage of attacks, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to enemies in the area, and transform enemies within a certain range into Electrified Entities (can be dispelled). Up to 3 Electrified Entities can exist at a time. Cooldown: <shuzhi>25</> seconds.
Electrified Entities deal <shuzhi>{1}%</> less volt damage to the caster for <shuzhi>{2}</> seconds. This effect does not stack.
Each time the Wanderer reduces an Electrified Entity's Max HP by 30%, the Electrified Entity is triggered to deal area damage equal to <shuzhi>{3}%</> of ATK 1 time.

Desc.SourceString:
当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，用破钧产生大范围雷电伤害，共造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害
提升自身<shuzhi>{1}%</>最大生命，不叠加，持续<shuzhi>{2}</>秒。同时嘲讽周围怪物，持续<shuzhi>{3}</>秒；同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
Desc.LocalizedString:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and use Thunderbreaker to deal volt damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK in a wide area.
Increase the Wanderer's Max HP by <shuzhi>{1}%</> for <shuzhi>{2}</> seconds. This effect cannot be stacked. Meanwhile, taunt surrounding enemies for <shuzhi>{3}</> seconds, and gain hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5 seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，使用不灭之翼可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并大幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并浮空目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use Unyielding Wing to launch 5 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back significantly.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and suspend the target.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and launch the target.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行5次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，并<shuzhi>强控击倒</>目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air and consume endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and deliver a <shuzhi>knockdown</>.

Desc.SourceString:
使用天鹅弧时长按普攻按钮，将目标聚拢，并对范围内目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，最后一击<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标并造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
<shuzhi>被动</>：成功释放任意武器技能或进入潜态构形<shuzhi>4</>秒后，下一次释放舞意瞬闪期间，免疫伤害
Desc.LocalizedString:
While using Swan Arc, tap and hold normal attack to pull the targets together and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to all targets within range. The last hit <shuzhi>strongly suspends</> the target and deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
<shuzhi>Passive</>: After entering Latent State for <shuzhi>4</> seconds or using any weapon skill, become immune to damage during the next Dancing Flash.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻(存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，会触发重击。
下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并持续消耗耐力。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Pummel.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each hit and continuously consume endurance.

Desc.SourceString: 长按普攻按钮，每次命中对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，最后一击造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，期间获得<shuzhi>霸体</>效果，并持续消耗耐力
Desc.LocalizedString: Tap and hold normal attack to deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each time the target is hit. The last hit deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>. Gain <shuzhi>hyperbody</> during this time and continuously consume endurance.

Desc.SourceString: 向后方闪避之后，可连续点击3次普攻，对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，第一击<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标。
Desc.LocalizedString: After dodging backward, tap normal attack 3 times consecutively to deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target, and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target with the first hit.

Desc.SourceString: 长按前闪避可进入潜态构形并持续消耗耐力，移动速度提升<shuzhi>50%</>，若处于滞寒场域内，则移动速度额外提升<shuzhi>50%</>，离开该状态时对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害并冰冻目标<shuzhi>2</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge before holding to enter Latent State, during which endurance is constantly consumed and speed is increased by <shuzhi>50%</>. Increase speed by an additional <shuzhi>50%</> in the Chilling Field. When exiting Latent State, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to all nearby targets and freeze them for <shuzhi>2</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

Desc.SourceString:
吸附附近的目标，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害并<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标，玩家进入到滞寒场域持续<shuzhi>30</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>25</>秒，技能释放期间获得霸体效果。
<red>被动</>：滞寒场域内释放任意冰武器连携技能，造成一次<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>的“霜冻伤害”并使目标迟缓<shuzhi>2</>秒（迟缓对boss无效）；处于场域内，不灭之翼每触发<shuzhi>12</>次命中效果后会触发空间切割，每2秒对空间内的目标造成1次<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>伤害持续<shuzhi>25</>秒（空间消失也会停止）。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Pull nearby targets together, then deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to them and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> them. The Wanderer enters the Chilling Field for <shuzhi>30</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>25</> seconds. Gain hyperbody when activating the skill.
<red>Passive</>: When using any frost weapon discharge skill in the Chilling Field, deal Hoarfrost Damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> 1 time and slow the target for <shuzhi>2</> seconds (the slow effect is ineffective against bosses). While in the field, for every <shuzhi>12</> times Unyielding Wing's hit effect is triggered, further triggers Spatial Slice, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> 1 time to targets in the space every 2 seconds for <shuzhi>25</> seconds (this also stops when the space disappears).

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，释放连携，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害并<shuzhi>强控击飞</>目标，期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and unleash a discharge skill, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and <shuzhi>strongly launching</> the target. During this period, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，释放连携，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害并<shuzhi>强控击飞</>目标，期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and unleash a discharge skill, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and <shuzhi>strongly launching</> the target. During this period, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，使用狙击枪进行三次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, attack 3 times in a row with the sniper rifle.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and launch the target.

Desc.SourceString:
长按普攻，进入蓄力攻击状态，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点基础伤害，蓄力后最多可造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，若命中怪物头部或者弱点，触发爆头效果（爆头效果对拓荒者无效），造成双倍伤害，并击飞目标。
<shuzhi>被动：</>十字狙射命中灼烧的目标或者命中暴击后，回复自身<shuzhi>300</>点武器充能值，冷却<shuzhi>15</>秒。
<shuzhi>被动：</>使用十字狙射后，自身在<shuzhi>3</>秒内移动速度提高<shuzhi>30%</>。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack to charge an attack, dealing base damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. After charging, deal damage up to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>. Deal double damage for a headshot or when hitting an enemy's weak point, and launch the target (headshots are ineffective against Wanderers).
<shuzhi>Passive:</> Recover <shuzhi>300</> weapon charge when Cross Snipe hits a burning target or lands a critical hit. Cooldown: <shuzhi>15</> seconds.
<shuzhi>Passive:</> Speed is increased by <shuzhi>30%</> for <shuzhi>3</> seconds after using Cross Snipe.

Desc.SourceString: 任意一段普攻后长按普攻，发出镭射弹，命中后爆开，对范围内目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，附带浮空效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: After any normal attack, tap and hold normal attack to fire a laser projectile that explodes upon hitting the target, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target within range and suspending them.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行三次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并击飞目标。

Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and launch the target.

第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并击退目标。

Desc.SourceString:
长按普攻，进入蓄力攻击状态，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点基础伤害，蓄力后最多可造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，若命中怪物头部或者弱点，触发爆头效果（爆头效果对拓荒者无效），造成双倍伤害，并击飞目标。
<shuzhi>被动：</>十字狙射命中灼烧的目标或者命中暴击后，回复自身<shuzhi>300</>点武器充能值，冷却<shuzhi>15</>秒。
<shuzhi>被动：</>使用十字狙射后，自身在<shuzhi>3</>秒内移动速度提高<shuzhi>30%</>。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack to charge an attack, dealing base damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. After charging, deal damage up to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>. Deal double damage for a headshot or when hitting an enemy's weak point, and launch the target (headshots are ineffective against Wanderers).
<shuzhi>Passive:</> Recover <shuzhi>300</> weapon charge when Cross Snipe hits a burning target or lands a critical hit. Cooldown: <shuzhi>15</> seconds.
<shuzhi>Passive:</> Speed is increased by <shuzhi>30%</> for <shuzhi>3</> seconds after using Cross Snipe.

Desc.SourceString: 任意一段普攻后长按普攻，发出镭射弹，命中后爆开，对范围内目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，附带浮空效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: After any normal attack, tap and hold normal attack to fire a laser projectile that explodes upon hitting the target, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target within range and suspending them.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行三次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 3 times in a row in mid-air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and launch the target.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，使用狙击枪进行三次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, attack 3 times in a row with the sniper rifle.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and launch the target.

当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行三次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并击退目标。

While airborne, use normal attack to attack 3 times in a row in mid-air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and launch the target.

Desc.SourceString:
自身向后跳跃，向前方扔出1枚爆破手雷，落地产生爆炸，对目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，附带浮空效果。
<shuzhi>被动：</>使用暮光之弧后，点击普攻可立即释放蓄满阶段的十字狙射。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Leap backward and throw 1 grenade forward, which detonates upon hitting the ground, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets and suspending them in the air.
<shuzhi>Passive:</> After using Twilight Arc, use normal attack to instantly fire a fully charged Cross Snipe.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却15秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
切换模组，改变十字狙射和暮光之弧效果，最多可使用<shuzhi>8</>次十字狙射，技能冷却<shuzhi>14</>秒。
<shuzhi>暴戾烈弹</>：十字狙射效果变成范围火焰爆炸，命中造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点基础伤害，蓄力后最多可造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，命中的目标若不处于灼烧，则给目标添加“十字灼烧”（每秒造成<shuzhi>120%</>攻击力伤害，持续<shuzhi>13</>秒），若目标已经处于灼烧，则给目标添加“十字灼烧”的同时，自身获得<shuzhi>20</>秒“灼烧强化”状态，使目标的灼烧伤害提高<shuzhi>20%</>；暮光之弧变成向前方扔出<shuzhi>3</>枚爆破手雷。
<shuzhi>谲诳魔弹</>：十字狙射效果变成范围瓦斯，命中造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点基础伤害，蓄力后最多可造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，目标处于瓦斯内会减速，减速效果随时间递增，瓦斯持续<shuzhi>7</>秒；暮光之弧可引爆瓦斯（释放瓦斯时十字狙射的蓄力越久，瓦斯爆炸伤害越高），对范围内敌方目标最多造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点爆炸伤害【视为触发一次十字狙射】，并使目标在<shuzhi>10</>秒内火抗减少<shuzhi>10%</>。

<shuzhi>被动：</>确认模组后，会获得对应使用次数的“光学强化”。光学强化：十字狙射蓄力时间缩短<shuzhi>30%</>，蓄力期间免疫控制；每使用<shuzhi>2</>次闪避，回复<shuzhi>1</>次闪避次数（最多可回复<shuzhi>4</>次）。
<shuzhi>被动：</>谲诳魔弹模组期间，十字狙射命中后减少其他火武器<shuzhi>0.7</>秒技能冷却。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Switch modules to change the effects of Cross Snipe and Twilight Arc. Cross Snipe can be used up to <shuzhi>8</> times. Skill cooldown: <shuzhi>14</> seconds.
<shuzhi>Ruthless Bomb</>: The effect of Cross Snipe becomes a flame explosion that deals base damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> within an area. After charging, deal damage up to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>. Upon hitting targets that are not burning, inflict them with Cross Burn, which deals damage equal to <shuzhi>120%</> of ATK every second for <shuzhi>13</> seconds. Upon hitting burning targets, inflict them with Cross Burn, and enter Burn Enhancement for <shuzhi>20</> seconds, which increases burn damage on targets by <shuzhi>20%</>. When using Twilight Arc, you now throw <shuzhi>3</> grenades instead.
<shuzhi>Deceitful Bomb</>: Changes the effects of Cross Snipe into a ranged Gas attack that deals base damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> upon hit. After charging, deal up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>. Targets in the Gas will be slowed. The slow effect becomes stronger over time, and the Gas lasts <shuzhi>7</> seconds. Twilight Arc can detonate the Gas (the longer the charge, the greater the Gas explosion damage), dealing explosion damage up to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> (this is deemed as triggering Cross Snipe 1 time) and reducing the target's flame resistance by <shuzhi>10%</> for <shuzhi>10</> seconds.

<shuzhi>Passive</>: After confirming the module, you will get a number of Optical Enhancement uses corresponding to the number of dodge attempts. Optical Enhancement: Reduces the charging time of Cross Snipe by <shuzhi>30%</>, becoming immune to control effects while charging. Recover <shuzhi>1</> dodge attempt (up to <shuzhi>4</> dodge attempts) every <shuzhi>2</> dodges.
<shuzhi>Passive</>: While the Deceitful Bomb Module is in effect, Cross Snipe has a chance of reducing the cooldown of other flame weapon skills by <shuzhi>0.7</> seconds after hitting a target.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，扔出燃烧弹，开枪引爆，对范围内目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，附带<shuzhi>强制浮空</>效果，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and throw an incendiary bomb that can be detonated by firing at it, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets in the area, and <shuzhi>strongly suspends</> them. Damage immunity lasts <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds when the skill is active (unavailable in Apex League).

在地面时，使用狙击枪进行三次攻击。

<shuzhi>Passive</>: While the Deceitful Bomb Module is in effect, Cross Snipe has a chance of reducing the cooldown of other flame weapon skills by <shuzhi>0.7</> seconds after hitting a target.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，扔出燃烧弹，开枪引爆，对范围内目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，附带<shuzhi>强制浮空</>效果，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and throw an incendiary bomb that can be detonated by firing at it, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets in the area, and <shuzhi>strongly suspends</> them. Damage immunity lasts <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds when the skill is active (unavailable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，进行七次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第六次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第七次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{12}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, launch 7 attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK.
Seventh Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，点击普攻可在空中连续进行七次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第六次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第七次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{12}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne or after jumping 1 time, use normal attack to attack 7 times in a row in mid-air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to<shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK.
Seventh Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，使用普攻第二至第四下时，长按普攻可触发狼噬。
向前快速冲锋，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击退目标。
触发狼噬后，长按普攻可触发上撩。
向上撩爪，造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并浮空目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when using the second to the fourth normal attack to trigger Wolfbite.
Charge forward quickly, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and knocking the target back.
After triggering Wolfbite, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Upswipe.
Swipe upward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK and suspending the target.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，使用普攻第五或第六下时，长按普攻可触发凶狩。
从天而降，自身进入短暂无敌，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并浮空目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack during the fifth or the sixth hit to trigger Menacing Hunt while on the ground.
Descends from above and grants temporary Invincibility, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and suspending the target.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻(存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，触发纷至沓来。
从天而降，落地时对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，附带浮空效果。
触发纷至沓来后，长按普攻可触发怒吼。
向四周发出怒吼，对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，附带击退效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack while airborne (press when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Thick and Fast.
Descends from above, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to surrounding targets and suspending them upon landing.
Hold Normal Attack to trigger Roar after triggering Thick and Fast.
Unleashes a terrifying roar in all directions, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to surrounding targets and knocking them back.

Desc.SourceString:
在空中时，使用破囚第二至第七下时，长按普攻可触发轨音。
在空中多段穿梭，对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并清除目标伤害增益状态。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack when using the second to the seventh Unshackle to trigger Trailing Note while airbone.
Roams through the air multiple times and deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to surrounding targets while removing their damage boost buffs.

Desc.SourceString:
每次普攻命中给目标添加<shuzhi>1</>枚音符，音符持续<shuzhi>15</>秒，最多存在<shuzhi>5</>枚音符；
<shuzhi>狼噬</>、<shuzhi>上撩</>、<shuzhi>轨音</>、<shuzhi>纷至沓来</>、<shuzhi>怒吼</>、<shuzhi>凶狩</>对意识体伤害翻倍；
<shuzhi>凶狩</>命中意识体时回复自身<shuzhi>2%</>最大生命值；
音符添加有<shuzhi>0.5</>秒间隔；
当同一个目标拥有<shuzhi>5</>枚音符时，进入沉醉状态，每秒造成<shuzhi>6%</>*攻击力伤害，持续<shuzhi>45</>秒，视为普攻伤害；
目标处于沉醉状态下时，受到来自施加者的伤害提高<shuzhi>12.5%</>。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hitting the target with normal attack places <shuzhi>1</> note on them that lasts <shuzhi>15</> seconds, stacking up to <shuzhi>5</> notes.
<shuzhi>Wolfbite</>, <shuzhi>Upswipe</>, <shuzhi>Trailing Note</>, <shuzhi>Thick and Fast</>, <shuzhi>Roar</>, and <shuzhi>Menacing Hunt</> deal double damage against consciousnesses.
Hitting consciousness with <shuzhi>Menacing Hunt</> recovers <shuzhi>2%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP.
Notes can only be placed at a <shuzhi>0.5</>-second interval.
If a single target has <shuzhi>5</> notes, the target becomes intoxicated and takes damage (counted as normal damage) equal to <shuzhi>6%</> of ATK every second for <shuzhi>45</> seconds.
When the target is intoxicated, increase the damage they take from the inflictor by <shuzhi>12.5%</>.

Desc.SourceString: 发动一次交叉爪击，对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，附带击倒效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Attack with claws, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to surrounding targets and knocking them down.

Desc.SourceString:
在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却25秒，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
<shuzhi>被动</>：为目标添加一枚音符。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of targets within the area. Cooldown: 25 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.
<shuzhi>Passive</>: Place a musical note on the target.

Desc.SourceString:
唤出意识体分离目标本体，并在自身位置创造持续<shuzhi>{5}</>秒的歌歌世界；
意识体拥有玩家自身<shuzhi>{0}%</>的最大生命值，会受到来自<shuzhi>格莱普尼</>武器造成的非被动类伤害，并将伤害<shuzhi>{1}%</>反馈到本体（玩家为<shuzhi>1%</>），意识体存在期间，玩家受到来自意识体本体伤害降低<shuzhi>{4}%</>，意识体至多存在<shuzhi>{2}</>秒；
意识体回归目标本体后，造成<shuzhi>{3}%</>*攻击力的范围伤害；
意识体回归条件：意识体被击败、超过存在时间、唤出新意识体、目标本体与意识体距离过远；
汪汪当家冷却时间：<shuzhi>45</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Summon a consciousness that is separate from the target. Create a Songworld at the Wanderer's current location that lasts <shuzhi>{5}</> seconds.
The consciousness has HP equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP and may take non-passive damage from <shuzhi>Gleipnir</>, while <shuzhi>{1}%</> of the damage is transferred to the main body (<shuzhi>1%</> for Wanderers). While the consciousness is active, the Wanderer takes <shuzhi>{4}%</> less damage from the consciousness's main body. The consciousness will exist for up to <shuzhi>{2}</>seconds.
After the consciousness returns to the target's main body, deal area damage equal to <shuzhi>{3}%</> of ATK.
The consciousness returns to its main body when it's defeated, when its duration runs out, when a new consciousness is summoned, or when it strays too far from the main body.
Su-Paw-Star cooldown: <shuzhi>45</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，冲向目标并发动攻击，对范围内目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并添加<shuzhi>1</>枚音符，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</>, then rush to the target and attack the targets within range, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and placing <shuzhi>1</> musical note on them. Meanwhile, gain hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5 seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，使用莫比乌斯可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击倒目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并拖拽挑空目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use Mobius to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK and knock the target back.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK and knock the target down.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK and drag and drop the target.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK, then launch the target.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行5次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString: 在地面使用基础手法时长按普攻，可直接根据当前锁定目标触发出其不意，当锁定目标为小体型时，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害并吸附周围目标，当锁定目标为大体型时，对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害并吸附周围目标。
Desc.LocalizedString: While using Basic Technique on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Out of the Blue directly based on the currently locked-on target. Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to smaller locked-on targets and draw in surrounding targets. Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to larger locked-on targets and draw in surrounding targets.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻，攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，会触发重击。
从空中快速下落，落地后造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne, or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Pummel.
Plummet from the skies, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and launching the target.

Desc.SourceString: 在地面长按普攻保持蓄势，松开攻击键时可根据当前锁定目标触发近景魔术，当锁定目标为小体型时，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害并吸附周围目标，当锁定目标为大体型时，对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害并吸附周围目标。
Desc.LocalizedString: Tap and hold normal attack on the ground to charge Anticipation, and release the button to trigger Close-up Magic based on the currently locked-on target. Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to smaller locked-on targets and draw in surrounding targets. Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to larger locked-on targets and draw in surrounding targets.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发偷天换日，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Grand Illusion, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
使用任意武器在前台造成伤害时，会累积<shuzhi>【预热值】</>，冷却<shuzhi>0.3</>秒，每次累积<shuzhi>1.3</>点。<shuzhi>【预热值】</>会显示在<shuzhi>【魔术槽】</>中，至多累积<shuzhi>100</>点。
当<shuzhi>【魔术槽】</>累积到<shuzhi>100</>点<shuzhi>【预热值】</>时，可释放技能，聚集指定范围内怪物并对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，同时自身进入<shuzhi>【魔术演出】</>状态并持续消耗<shuzhi>【预热值】</>，冷却<shuzhi>30</>秒（该冷却不会受到除莫比乌斯自身外其他任何冷却时间清除、重置、变化效果的影响），持续<shuzhi>13</>秒，期间技能按钮替换为切牌按钮。
<shuzhi>【魔术演出】</>期间，每1.5秒可自动获得<shuzhi>【黑桃】</>和<shuzhi>【红桃】</>两种<shuzhi>【扑克纸牌】</>中的一种，即将获得的<shuzhi>【扑克纸牌】</>种类可提前通过切牌按钮进行切换，当前<shuzhi>【扑克纸牌】</>达到<shuzhi>2</>张时，会自动释放对应<shuzhi>【纸牌魔术】</>，冷却<shuzhi>2.9</>秒。
<shuzhi>【魔术演出】</>期间不会继续补充<shuzhi>【魔术槽】</>，且莫比乌斯攻击招式(普攻和闪避攻击)的最终伤害提升<shuzhi>{1}%</>。
不同<shuzhi>【扑克纸牌】</>组合可激活不同的<shuzhi>【纸牌魔术】</>。所有<shuzhi>【纸牌魔术】</>造成的伤害均属于技能伤害
【红桃】+【黑桃】→<ComLblGreen>【意念傀儡】</>
【红桃】+【红桃】→<ComLblGreen>【矛盾侵蚀】</>
【黑桃】+【黑桃】→<ComLblGreen>【纸牌席卷】</>
以任何方式切换到其他武器，或自身阵亡时，退出<shuzhi>【魔术演出】</>状态。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Grants <shuzhi>1.3</> <shuzhi>Warmup Points</> upon dealing damage with any weapon in the main slot. Cooldown: <shuzhi>0.3</>s. <shuzhi>Warmup Points</> are displayed in <shuzhi>Magic Gauge</> and store up to <shuzhi>100</> points.
 Accumulating <shuzhi>100</> <shuzhi>Warmup Points</> in <shuzhi>Magic Gauge</> unlocks a skill that gathers enemies in a designated area, deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to them, and activates <shuzhi>Magic Trick</> while consuming <shuzhi>Warmup Points</>, lasting for <shuzhi>13</>s. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</>s (This is not affected by any cooldown clearing, resetting, or changing effects other than Mobius itself). The Skill button becomes Switch in the meanwhile.
 Grants a <shuzhi>Spade</> or <shuzhi>Heart</> <shuzhi>Playing Card</> every 1.5s during <shuzhi>Magic Trick</>. Press the Switch button to select the type of <shuzhi>Playing Card</> you're about to get. Getting <shuzhi>2</> <shuzhi>Playing Cards</> automatically casts the corresponding <shuzhi>Card Trick</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>2.9</>s.
 Does not charge <shuzhi>Magic Gauge</> and increases the Final Damage of Mobius's Normal Attack and Dodge Attack by <shuzhi>{1}%</> during <shuzhi>Magic Trick</>.
 <shuzhi>Playing Card</> Combos can trigger corresponding <shuzhi>Card Tricks</>. <shuzhi>Card Trick</> damage counts as skill damage.
 Heart + Spade → <ComLblGreen>Psychic Puppet</>
 Heart + Heart → <ComLblGreen>Contradiction Corrosion</>
 Spade + Spade → <ComLblGreen>Card Sweep</>
 <shuzhi>Magic Trick</> ends when switching to other weapons or defeated.

Desc.SourceString: 从礼帽中变出一群蝙蝠守护自身。<shuzhi>【魔术演出】</>期间，只结算<shuzhi>50%</>受到的伤害，剩余<shuzhi>50%</>会在<shuzhi>【魔术演出】</>结束后<shuzhi>20</>秒内以生命流失缓慢结算（延迟结算效果仅非坚毅共鸣时生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: Pull out a colony of bats from your hat to guard the Wanderer. During <shuzhi>Magic Trick</>, only <shuzhi>50%</> of the damage taken will be tallied. The remaining <shuzhi>50%</> will slowly be deducted from your HP <shuzhi>20</> seconds after <shuzhi>Magic Trick</> ends. The delayed tally effect only applies when Fortitude Resonance is not active.

Desc.SourceString: 对一定范围内<shuzhi>1</>个目标身上降下侵蚀之花，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Casts Corrosive Flower on <shuzhi>1</> target within certain distance, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString: 飞出大量纸牌，在目标位置产生纸牌飓风，对目标造成至多<shuzhi>12</>段，总计<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Summon a large number of flying cards, forming a hurricane that swarms to the target location, attacking the target up to <shuzhi>12</> times and dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
使用任意武器在前台造成伤害时，会累积<shuzhi>【预热值】</>，冷却<shuzhi>0.3</>秒，每次累积<shuzhi>1.3</>点。<shuzhi>【预热值】</>会显示在<shuzhi>【魔术槽】</>中，至多累积<shuzhi>100</>点。
当<shuzhi>【魔术槽】</>累积到<shuzhi>100</>点<shuzhi>【预热值】</>时，可释放技能，聚集指定范围内怪物并对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，同时自身进入<shuzhi>【魔术演出】</>状态并持续消耗<shuzhi>【预热值】</>，冷却<shuzhi>30</>秒（该冷却不会受到除莫比乌斯自身外其他任何冷却时间清除、重置、变化效果的影响），持续<shuzhi>13</>秒，期间技能按钮替换为切牌按钮。
<shuzhi>【魔术演出】</>期间，每1.5秒可自动获得<shuzhi>【黑桃】</>和<shuzhi>【红桃】</>两种<shuzhi>【扑克纸牌】</>中的一种，即将获得的<shuzhi>【扑克纸牌】</>种类可提前通过切牌按钮进行切换，当前<shuzhi>【扑克纸牌】</>达到<shuzhi>2</>张时，会自动释放对应<shuzhi>【纸牌魔术】</>，冷却<shuzhi>2.9</>秒。
<shuzhi>【魔术演出】</>期间不会继续补充<shuzhi>【魔术槽】</>，且莫比乌斯攻击招式(普攻和闪避攻击)的最终伤害提升<shuzhi>{1}%</>。
不同<shuzhi>【扑克纸牌】</>组合可激活不同的<shuzhi>【纸牌魔术】</>。所有<shuzhi>【纸牌魔术】</>造成的伤害均属于技能伤害
【红桃】+【黑桃】→<ComLblGreen>【意念傀儡】</>
【红桃】+【红桃】→<ComLblGreen>【矛盾侵蚀】</>
【黑桃】+【黑桃】→<ComLblGreen>【纸牌席卷】</>
以任何方式切换到其他武器，或自身阵亡时，退出<shuzhi>【魔术演出】</>状态。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Grants <shuzhi>1.3</> <shuzhi>Warmup Points</> upon dealing damage with any weapon in the main slot. Cooldown: <shuzhi>0.3</>s. <shuzhi>Warmup Points</> are displayed in <shuzhi>Magic Gauge</> and store up to <shuzhi>100</> points.
 Accumulating <shuzhi>100</> <shuzhi>Warmup Points</> in <shuzhi>Magic Gauge</> unlocks a skill that gathers enemies in a designated area, deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to them, and activates <shuzhi>Magic Trick</> while consuming <shuzhi>Warmup Points</>, lasting for <shuzhi>13</>s. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</>s (This is not affected by any cooldown clearing, resetting, or changing effects other than Mobius itself). The Skill button becomes Switch in the meanwhile.
 Grants a <shuzhi>Spade</> or <shuzhi>Heart</> <shuzhi>Playing Card</> every 1.5s during <shuzhi>Magic Trick</>. Press the Switch button to select the type of <shuzhi>Playing Card</> you're about to get. Getting <shuzhi>2</> <shuzhi>Playing Cards</> automatically casts the corresponding <shuzhi>Card Trick</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>2.9</>s.
 Does not charge <shuzhi>Magic Gauge</> and increases the Final Damage of Mobius's Normal Attack and Dodge Attack by <shuzhi>{1}%</> during <shuzhi>Magic Trick</>.
 <shuzhi>Playing Card</> Combos can trigger corresponding <shuzhi>Card Tricks</>. <shuzhi>Card Trick</> damage counts as skill damage.
 Heart + Spade → <ComLblGreen>Psychic Puppet</>
 Heart + Heart → <ComLblGreen>Contradiction Corrosion</>
 Spade + Spade → <ComLblGreen>Card Sweep</>
 <shuzhi>Magic Trick</> ends when switching to other weapons or defeated.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，释放荼蘼馥郁，落地时对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，甩鞭后对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害并<shuzhi>强控击飞</>目标，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and cast Sleight of Hand. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target. Swinging the whip deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and <shuzhi>strongly launch</> them. Meanwhile, gain hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5 seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，释放荼蘼馥郁，落地时对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，甩鞭后对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害并<shuzhi>强控击飞</>目标，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and cast Sleight of Hand. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target. Swinging the whip deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and <shuzhi>strongly launch</> them. Meanwhile, gain hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5 seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 潜水状态下，可使用小鹈鹕号加快潜水移速，移动时会持续消耗耐力，停止移动时会缓慢恢复耐力，冷却<shuzhi>90</>秒，小鹈鹕号可积攒<shuzhi>2</>次充能使用。使用小鹈鹕号时，小鹈鹕号会自动打开<shuzhi>潜水灯</>，照亮周围
Desc.LocalizedString: When diving, you can use the Mini Pelican to speed up. Consumes endurance continuously when moving, but slowly recovers endurance when you stop moving. Cooldown: <shuzhi>90</> seconds. The Mini Pelican can store <shuzhi>2</> charges. <shuzhi>Diving light</> will be automatically turned on when you use the Mini Pelican, illuminating the surrounding area.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并大幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并浮空目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击倒目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch five consecutive strikes.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back slightly.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back significantly.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target and suspends them.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them down.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use a normal attack to unleash five consecutive strikes, consuming Endurance.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，使用第二次至第五次普攻时，长按普攻可触发炽鸟窜天涯。
向前快速冲锋并浮空自身，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack during the second to fifth ground Normal Attacks to trigger Blazing Wings.
Dashes forward rapidly and leaps into the air, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and <shuzhi>suspending</> them.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，长按普攻可触发熔心亦流情并持续消耗耐力，期间获得霸体，并持续嘲讽周围目标。
操控陵光对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并带动场上羽翎快速旋转。
松开普攻后下落，下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并<shuzhi>强控击倒</>目标。
<shuzhi>被动</>：羽翎快速旋转时，【焰漩】每秒消耗的【羽数】为<shuzhi>【聚羽力劲】</>倍，同时【焰漩】伤害提升至<shuzhi>【聚羽力劲】</>倍。
<shuzhi>【羽数】</>：每秒自动获得<shuzhi>1</>枚，每次造成伤害可获得<shuzhi>1</>枚（冷却<shuzhi>0.5</>秒），【羽数】储存上限为<shuzhi>30</>枚。
<shuzhi>【聚羽力劲】</>=<shuzhi>1</>+羽翎数量。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack while airborne to trigger Molten Heart, granting Hyperbody and taunting nearby targets while consuming Endurance.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK with Vermilion Bird, and spins parasols rapidly.
 Release Normal Attack to fall, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target on hit and <shuzhi>knocking them down</> while falling.
 <shuzhi>Passive</>: Flame Vortex consumes Feathers × <shuzhi>Polyfeather Parasol</> and deals damage × <shuzhi>Polyfeather Parasol</> when parasols are spinning rapidly.
 <shuzhi>Feathers</>: Grants <shuzhi>1</> Feather every second and <shuzhi>1</> upon dealing damage each time (Cooldown: <shuzhi>0.5</>s). Store up to <shuzhi>30</> Feathers.
 <shuzhi>Polyfeather Parasol</> = <shuzhi>1</> + Number of parasols.

Desc.SourceString:
非战斗状态下，在地面长按普攻可在目标位置生成一柄羽翎，持续<shuzhi>15</>秒或进入战斗状态消失。
非战斗状态下，释放技能可移动至羽翎位置，使用二段跳可撑伞滑行，冷却<shuzhi>6</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack on the ground to create a parasol at the target location in a non-combat state. Lasts for <shuzhi>15</>s or until entering combat.
Moves to the parasol's location with the skill in a non-combat state. Casts double-jump to glide. Cooldown: <shuzhi>6</>s.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

Desc.SourceString:
根据羽翎生成顺序依次飞向场上的羽翎，并返回初始位置，飞行轨迹会暂留5秒，附近目标在轨迹范围内降低移速<shuzhi>50%</>，期间自身免疫伤害（巅峰联赛中不生效），冷却<shuzhi>35</>秒。
飞行每经过一次羽翎时，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点范围伤害，并带动该羽翎快速旋转，持续<shuzhi>5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Fly towards the parasols in the order of creation and then return to the initial location. The flight path exists for 5s, reducing Speed of nearby targets along the path by <shuzhi>50%</>. Grants immunity to damage during the flight (unavailable in Apex League). Cooldown: <shuzhi>35</>s.
 Deals AoE damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK each time flying over a parasol and spins it rapidly for <shuzhi>5</>s.

Desc.SourceString:
任意武器普攻命中或者闪避攻击命中时，会在目标附近生成<shuzhi>1</>柄羽翎，持续<shuzhi>20</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>1.5</>秒，最多存在<shuzhi>3</>个。
<shuzhi>【崩炎】</>：使用狂澜覆草芥每经过一次羽翎，额外造成【聚羽力劲】*<shuzhi>30%</>攻击力的伤害；
<shuzhi>【侵蚀】</>：羽翎附近目标对自身造成的火焰伤害降低<shuzhi>10%</>；
<shuzhi>【光焰】</>：羽翎每秒向附近目标施加<shuzhi>6%</>*攻击力点伤害的灼烧，持续<shuzhi>4</>秒；
<shuzhi>【焰漩】</>：场上羽翎每秒消耗<shuzhi>1</>枚【羽数】，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点范围伤害（多柄羽翎不累计伤害值与【羽数】消耗）。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Spawns <shuzhi>1</> parasol on hit with any weapon's Normal Attack or Dodge Attack. Lasts for <shuzhi>20</>s. Cooldown: <shuzhi>1.5</>s. No more than <shuzhi>3</> parasols can exist at a time.
 <shuzhi>Fiery Crash</>: Deals bonus damage equal to Polyfeather Parasol × <shuzhi>30%</> ATK each time passing by a parasol using Devastating Glide.
 <shuzhi>Corrosion</>: Reduces Flame Damage taken from targets near parasols by <shuzhi>10%</>.
 <shuzhi>Lightflare</>: Inflicts Burn dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>6%</> of ATK on targets near parasols every second, lasting for <shuzhi>4</>s.
 <shuzhi>Flame Vortex</>: Existing parasols consume <shuzhi>1</> Feather per second, dealing AoE damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK (unstackable from multiple parasols).

Desc.SourceString:
释放狂澜覆草芥途中经过三次羽翎，返回初始位置后自身获得【陵光御境】，期间自身获得霸体效果和<shuzhi> 50%</>减伤，持续<shuzhi>8</>秒；
当拓荒者潜海时，【陵光御境】每秒对范围内目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并提升自身移速<shuzhi>30%</>。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Grants Vermilion Domain after passing by parasols 3 times during Devastating Glide and returning to the initial location. Grants Hyperbody and <shuzhi>50%</> Damage Reduction for <shuzhi>8</>s.
