 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets within Vermilion Domain, and increases Speed by <shuzhi>30%</> while diving.

Desc.SourceString:
激活坚毅共鸣后：
成功释放任意武器技能嘲讽附近的目标，持续<shuzhi>2.5</>秒；
释放狂澜覆草芥时，陵光御境扩大，附近队友获得霸体与<shuzhi>25%</> 减伤效果；
释放熔心亦流情期间，【陵光御境】不消耗持续时间。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Active Fortitude Resonance:
 Taunts nearby targets for <shuzhi>2.5</>s upon using any weapon skills.
 Expands Vermilion Domain while using Devastating Glide, granting Hyperbody and <shuzhi>25%</> Damage Reduction to nearby teammates.
 Prevents Vermilion Domain from consuming duration during Molten Heart.

Desc.SourceString:
当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒。
<shuzhi>被动</>：命中目标后，使目标对自身伤害降低<shuzhi>【聚羽力劲】*2%</>，持续<shuzhi>20</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
<shuzhi>Removes all carried debuffs</> when <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered upon switching to this weapon. Then deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target. Grants Hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5s.
 <shuzhi>Passive</>: Reduces the target's damage against the caster by <shuzhi>Polyfeather Parasol × 2%</> for <shuzhi>20</>s.

Desc.SourceString:
当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒。
<shuzhi>被动</>：命中目标后，使目标对自身伤害降低<shuzhi>【聚羽力劲】*2%</>，持续<shuzhi>20</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
<shuzhi>Removes all carried debuffs</> when <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered upon switching to this weapon. Then deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target. Grants Hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5s.
 <shuzhi>Passive</>: Reduces the target's damage against the caster by <shuzhi>Polyfeather Parasol × 2%</> for <shuzhi>20</>s.

Desc.SourceString:
使用时会标记当前使用武器，使该武器获得<shuzhi>3</>支针剂，针剂持续存在<shuzhi>200</>秒，并获得<shuzhi>微创</>效果：<shuzhi>5%</>的伤害提升，持续<shuzhi>200</>秒。每次释放标记的武器技能时消耗<shuzhi>1</>支针剂并获得<shuzhi>升限</>效果：获得<shuzhi>20%</>的伤害提升，持续<shuzhi>20</>秒（切换到其他武器时移除升限效果），升限针剂<shuzhi>240</>秒冷却
卸下升限针剂或切换源器组时会移除剩余的针剂、微创和升限效果，重新标记武器时移除原标记的针剂
Desc.LocalizedString:
When used, mark the current weapon and grant it <shuzhi>3</> doses that last <shuzhi>200</> seconds. Also gain the <shuzhi>Micro Attack</> effect: Increase damage dealt by <shuzhi>5%</> for <shuzhi>200</> seconds. Using a marked weapon's skill consumes <shuzhi>1</> dose each time and grants <shuzhi>Overdrive</>: Increase damage dealt by <shuzhi>20%</> for <shuzhi>20</> seconds. Overdrive is removed when switching to other weapons. Overdrive Shot has a <shuzhi>240</>-second cooldown.
When removing Overdrive Shot or switching Relics, the remaining doses, the Micro Attack, and Overdrive effects will all be removed. When a weapon is marked a second time, the doses from the first mark will be removed.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并浮空目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 5 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back. 
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and suspend the target.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and launch the target.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and launch the target.

Desc.SourceString: 在地面普攻时，长按普攻可触发凌刺，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: While using normal attack on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Piercing Cold, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻（存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，可触发料峭。
下落过程中，每次命中对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，落地后对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using a Jetpack to trigger Sharp Chill.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and launch the target.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

Desc.SourceString: 方向键加闪避键触发的前闪避短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发肆雪，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Snowy Flurry, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发数九，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Winter Solstice, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString:
对附近目标造成至多<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并生成两个规律运动的超速悠悠球，冷却<shuzhi>60</>秒，荒寒曳日范围内目标降低移速<shuzhi>50%</>（对玩家、boss不生效）。
每个超速悠悠球每个运动周期（初始4秒）约4次经过运动轨迹中心点，对途径目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点技能伤害，持续<shuzhi>70</>秒，期间释放荒寒曳日将刷新超速悠悠球位置和持续时间（冷却<shuzhi>4</>秒）。
荒寒曳日释放期间自身减伤<shuzhi>50%</>，并回复自身<shuzhi>5%</>最大生命值（不受治疗及被治疗提升效果影响），该回复和减伤在巅峰联赛不生效。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Deal damage to nearby targets up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and create 2 regulation Speedy Yo-yos. Cooldown: <shuzhi>60</> seconds. Reduce the speed of targets within range of Desolate Day by <shuzhi>50%</> (does not affect Wanderers or bosses).
Each Speedy Yo-yo passes through the center of the trajectory about 4 times in each motion cycle, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to targets within the trajectory, for <shuzhi>70</> seconds. The motion cycle lasts for 4 seconds when the weapon is 0 stars. During this period, using Desolate Day will refresh the position and duration of the Speedy Yo-yo. Cooldown: <shuzhi>4</> seconds.
While Desolate Day is in use, reduce damage taken by <shuzhi>50%</> and recover <shuzhi>5%</> of Max HP. This cannot be affected by any healing boost effects. Recovery and damage reduction will not take effect in Apex League.

Desc.SourceString:
释放语冰可获得至多<shuzhi>2</>次新技能归寂,该技能在荒寒曳日处于冷却状态时才可释放。对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点技能伤害。期间自身减伤<shuzhi>50%</>，并回复自身<shuzhi>5%</>最大生命值（不受治疗及被治疗提升效果影响），该回复和减伤在巅峰联赛不生效。
激活坚毅共鸣时：释放归寂嘲讽附近目标，并获得<shuzhi>1</>层格挡盾，至多可获得<shuzhi>3</>层，持续<shuzhi>20</>秒。<shuzhi>格挡值</>为自身<shuzhi>5种抗性之和</>，格挡盾消耗、溢出时对主目标造成<shuzhi>格挡值*200%</>点伤害。
激活恩赐共鸣时：释放归寂对于生命值高于<shuzhi>95%</>的目标造成其<shuzhi>8%</>最大生命值伤害（对玩家无效），该伤害不被伤害提升及降低效果影响。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use Capped Knowledge to obtain up to <shuzhi>2</> uses of the new skill Return to Loneliness. This skill can only be used while Desolate Day is in cooldown. Deal skill damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. While the skill is in use, reduce damage taken by <shuzhi>50%</> and recover <shuzhi>5%</> of Max HP. This cannot be affected by any incoming or outgoing healing boost effects. Recovery and damage reduction will not take effect in Apex League.
While Fortitude Resonance is active: Use Return to Loneliness and taunt nearby targets to gain <shuzhi>1</> stack of blocking shield, up to <shuzhi>3</> stacks, for <shuzhi>20</> seconds. <shuzhi>Blocking points</> are equal to the <shuzhi>sum of the Wanderer's 5 resistance types</>. When the blocking shield is used up or overflows, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>200% of blocking points</> to the main target.
While Benediction Resonance is active: Using Return to Loneliness against targets with greater than <shuzhi>95%</> HP will deal damage equal to <shuzhi>8%</> of their respective Max HP (does not affect Wanderers). This cannot be affected by damage boost or reduction effects.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并击飞目标，期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</>, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to all nearby targets, and launching the target. During this period, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行七次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害。
第六次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{11}</>点伤害。
第七次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{12}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{13}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack on the ground to launch seven consecutive strikes.
First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target.
Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> to the target.
Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</> to the target.
Fourth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</> to the target.
Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</> to the target.
Sixth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{11}</> to the target.
Seventh strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{13}</> to the target.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，点击普攻可在空中连续进行七次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害。
第六次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{11}</>点伤害。
第七次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{12}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{13}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack while airborne or after jumping to unleash seven consecutive strikes in mid-air, consuming Endurance.
First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target.
Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> to the target.
Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</> to the target.
Fourth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</> to the target.
Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</> to the target.
Sixth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{11}</> to the target.
Seventh strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{13}</> to the target.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，使用普攻第二至第六下时，长按普攻可触发凝流漪。
自身浮空，向前方发射大量水波弹，期间持续消耗耐力，每次命中对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害【视为蓄力攻击伤害】，并击退目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack during the second to sixth Normal Attacks on the ground to trigger Converging Ripples.
Leaps into the air and fires several water bombs ahead, consuming Endurance, each hit dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets (counts as Charged Shot damage), knocking them back.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻(存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，触发水降月。
从天而降，落地时对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并浮空目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack while airborne (press when a target is available), or use Normal Attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Moonrain.
Falls from the sky, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target and suspending them.

Desc.SourceString:
在空中时，使用空中普攻第二至第六下时，长按普攻可触发聚泉落。
向前方发射大量水波弹，期间持续消耗耐力，每次命中对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害【视为蓄力攻击伤害】，并击退目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack during the second to sixth Normal Attacks in mid-air to trigger Torrential Convergence.
Fires several water bombs ahead while consuming Endurance, each hit dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets (counts as a charged attack), knocking them back.

Desc.SourceString:
自身激活<shuzhi>恩赐共鸣</>后：
在地面时，长按普攻可选择队友、松开后与其进入链接状态，处于链接/被链接中的目标无法再次链接/被链接，直至一方目标生命值归零/被链接目标链接其他目标/超出链接距离后、结束链接状态；
被链接目标受到的治疗效果提升<shuzhi>50%</>；
额外传递自身<shuzhi>{0}%</>抗性给被链接的友方。
Desc.LocalizedString:
When <shuzhi>Benediction Resonance</> is active:
 Hold Normal Attack on the ground to select a teammate, then release to link with that teammate. When the link is in effect, the pair cannot make a link or be linked again. The link ends when one of the two is defeated/the selected teammate has made another link/it exceeds the range.
 Increases healing received by the linked teammate by <shuzhi>50%</>.
 Transmits an extra <shuzhi>{0}%</> of Resistance to the linked teammate.

Desc.SourceString:
在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
<shuzhi>被动</>：自身回复<shuzhi>200%</>*攻击力点生命值，并清除自身<shuzhi>8</>点灰噬值；激活<shuzhi>恩赐共鸣</>时，自身额外获得<shuzhi>50</>点武器充能值。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Dodges before being hit to trigger Phantasia, slowing the action speed of targets within range. Grants immunity to hitstun while dodging.
 <shuzhi>Passive</>: Restores HP equal to <shuzhi>200%</> of ATK and removes <shuzhi>8</> Graying Bite points. Grants an additional <shuzhi>50</> weapon charge when <shuzhi>Benediction Resonance</> is active.

Desc.SourceString: 向前方快速多次穿梭，对范围内目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Roam ahead several times, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets in the area.

Desc.SourceString: 释放激流喷发，对范围内目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，附带浮空效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Unleash a water jet, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets in the area and suspending them.

Desc.SourceString:
潮汐喷发，对范围内目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标，冷却<shuzhi>30</>秒。

<shuzhi>被动：散流</>
装备<shuzhi>月星钏</>后获得散流技，可在技能列表-＞设置界面于<shuzhi>6</>个散流技中启用至多<shuzhi>2</>个。
操作：点击特殊技能键可释放散流技。
当瀑泷萦携带散流技后，释放时会自动触发该散流技，且技能冷却替换为该散流技的冷却时间。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tidal Eruption: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets within the area and <shuzhi>suspends</> them. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</>s.

 <shuzhi>Passive: Scatter</>
 Grants Scatter when equipped with <shuzhi>Moonstar Bracelet</>. Enable up to <shuzhi>2</> out of <shuzhi>6</> Scatter skills in Skills - Settings.
 Instruction: Press Special Skill to cast Scatter.
 Triggers Scatter Skill upon casting Crashing Falls if it has equipped a Scatter Skill, and replaces its cooldown with the Scatter Skill's.

Desc.SourceString:
浪潮奔涌，对附近目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，自身全元素伤害提升<shuzhi>10%</>，持续<shuzhi>20</>秒。
冷却时间：<shuzhi>14</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Surging Tides: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets, increasing all elemental damage by <shuzhi>10%</> for <shuzhi>20</>s.
Cooldown: <shuzhi>14</>s.

Desc.SourceString:
召唤多个水龙卷，吸附附近目标并造成至多<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，短暂时间后形成大龙卷，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
<shuzhi>涌卷</>有<shuzhi>{4}%</>概率造成双倍伤害。
<shuzhi>涌卷</>造成的伤害视为技能伤害。
冷却时间：<shuzhi>12</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Summons multiple waterspouts, pulling nearby targets together and dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>. A large waterspout is formed shortly after, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets.
 <shuzhi>Vortex</> has a <shuzhi>{4}%</> chance of dealing double damage.
 <shuzhi>Vortex</>'s damage counts as skill damage.
 Cooldown: <shuzhi>12</>s.

Desc.SourceString:
沐浴激流，自身破甲效率提升<shuzhi>{0}%</>，持续<shuzhi>{1}</>秒。
冷却时间：<shuzhi>30</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Bath in Torrents: Increases Shatter Effectiveness by <shuzhi>{0}%</> for <shuzhi>{1}</>s.
 Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</>s.

Desc.SourceString:
水波环绕，月星钏每次攻击清除<shuzhi>{0}</>点灰噬值，持续<shuzhi>{1}</>秒。
冷却时间：<shuzhi>30</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Encompassing Waves: Clears <shuzhi>{0}</> Graying Bite points for <shuzhi>{1}</>s with each attack using Moonstar Bracelet.
 Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</>s.

Desc.SourceString:
对目标释放水牢，持续<shuzhi>3</>秒，期间目标无法移动、释放技能，并在<shuzhi>{0}</>秒内降低目标<shuzhi>{1}%</>的速度。
冷却时间：<shuzhi>15</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Executes Aqua Prison on the target for <shuzhi>3</>s, forbidding them to move or use skills for the duration of Aqua Prison and reducing their Speed by <shuzhi>{1}%</> in <shuzhi>{0}</>s.
 Cooldown: <shuzhi>15</>s.

Desc.SourceString:
生命奥义，自身速度提升<shuzhi>{0}%</>，持续<shuzhi>{1}</>秒，每秒会以<shuzhi>{2}%</>的概率在原地生成一个治疗球。
冷却时间：<shuzhi>15</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Arcane Vitality: Increases Speed by <shuzhi>{0}%</> for <shuzhi>{1}</>s and has a <shuzhi>{2}%</> chance of spawning a healing orb in place every second.
 Cooldown: <shuzhi>15</>s.

Desc.SourceString:
当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，月星吐息，对附近目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，<shuzhi>5%</>最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续<shuzhi>3.5</>秒。

<shuzhi>被动：月星</>
自身激活<shuzhi>恩赐共鸣</>时，<shuzhi>水意烁华</>回复全队成员<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点生命，并给添加<shuzhi>1</>层可抵挡<shuzhi>1</>次伤害的月星守护（层数不可叠加），持续<shuzhi>10</>秒，且每次释放都会使下次<shuzhi>水意烁华</>的治疗效果提高<shuzhi>20%</>，至多可提高<shuzhi>40%</>，持续<shuzhi>30</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
<shuzhi>Removes all carried debuffs</> when <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered upon switching to this weapon. Then unleashes Moonstar's Breath, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. Grants Hyperbody and a shield equal to <shuzhi>5%</> of Max HP for <shuzhi>3.5</>s.

<shuzhi>Passive: Moonstar</>
Heals all team members for <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK with <shuzhi>Shimmering Radiance</> while <shuzhi>Benediction Resonance</> is active. Applies <shuzhi>1</> stack of Moonshield (unstackable) that negates damage <shuzhi>1</> time for <shuzhi>10</>s. Every use of <shuzhi>Shimmering Radiance</> increases the healing effect of the next use by <shuzhi>20%</>, up to <shuzhi>40%</>. This effect lasts for <shuzhi>30</>s.

Desc.SourceString:
吸附附近的目标，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害并<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标，玩家进入到滞寒场域持续<shuzhi>30</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>25</>秒，技能释放期间获得霸体效果。
<red>被动</>：滞寒场域内释放任意冰武器连携技能，造成一次<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>的“霜冻伤害”并使目标迟缓<shuzhi>2</>秒（迟缓对boss无效）；处于场域内，不灭之翼每触发<shuzhi>12</>次命中效果后会触发空间切割，每2秒对空间内的目标造成1次<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>伤害持续<shuzhi>25</>秒（空间消失也会停止）。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Pull nearby targets together, then deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to them and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> them. The Wanderer enters the Chilling Field for <shuzhi>30</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>25</> seconds. Gain hyperbody when activating the skill.
<red>Passive</>: When using any frost weapon discharge skill in the Chilling Field, deal Hoarfrost Damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> 1 time and slow the target for <shuzhi>2</> seconds (the slow effect is ineffective against bosses). While in the field, for every <shuzhi>12</> times Unyielding Wing's hit effect is triggered, further triggers Spatial Slice, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> 1 time to targets in the space every 2 seconds for <shuzhi>25</> seconds (this also stops when the space disappears).

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并浮空目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击倒目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK and knock the target back.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK and suspend the target.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK and knock the target back.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK, then knock the target down.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString: 在地面普攻时，长按普攻可触发迫近，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: While using normal attack on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Advance, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻（存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，可触发降临。
从空中发起俯冲，并消耗耐力，落地后对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Descent.
Dive through the air, consuming endurance and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target upon reaching the ground.

Desc.SourceString:
使用普攻命中<shuzhi>17</>次获得<shuzhi>1</>次<shuzhi>回响</>（至多可累积<shuzhi>2</>次），每次使用绝响进行任意闪避攻击消耗<shuzhi>1</>次<shuzhi>回响</>，为场上所有晶极刺回复<shuzhi>35%</>最大生命值并重置位置；
同时附近每存在一个由自己召唤的晶极刺，自身造成伤害提升<shuzhi>{0}%</>
Desc.LocalizedString:
Landing a hit <shuzhi>17</> times with normal attack accumulates <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Feedback</> (up to a maximum of <shuzhi>2</> accumulations). Each time Lost Art is used to perform any dodge attack, consume <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Feedback</>, recovering <shuzhi>35%</> of Max HP and resetting the position for all Crystamax thorns on the field.
At the same time, for each Crystamax thorn summoned by the Wanderer nearby, increase the Wanderer's damage by <shuzhi>{0}%</>.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

Desc.SourceString:
方向键加闪避键触发的前闪避短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发掠袭，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并浮空目标。
释放掠袭可触发<shuzhi>回响</>。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap normal attack during the perfect dodge window (tap an arrow button before dodging forward) to trigger Pillage, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and suspending them.
Using Pillage can trigger <shuzhi>Feedback</>.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发蜂群，召唤两只阿比斯幻影对前方目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
释放蜂群可触发<shuzhi>回响</>。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack right after dodging to trigger Swarm, summoning two Abyssant illusions which deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead.
Using Swarm can trigger <shuzhi>Feedback</>.

Desc.SourceString: 在地面时，长按任意闪避可触发如梭，向高空冲刺一段距离（在禁用喷气背包的场景不可用）,冷却<shuzhi>7</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Hold Dodge on the ground to trigger Weave, dashing upward for a distance (unavailable where Jetpack is disabled). Cooldown: <shuzhi>7</>s.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，长按普攻，可触发镇封，向前方投射蜂巢意识，将命中的灰域体目标控制为友方（对boss不生效），持续<shuzhi>55</>秒。
再次对目标释放镇封、或持续时间结束时可解除控制状态，并对目标造成控制期间自身造成所有伤害的<shuzhi>45%</>。
蜂巢意识可被其他非灰域体目标阻挡，且控制效果不对该目标生效。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack right after dodging to trigger Seal, launching a hive consciousness forward which controls Grayspace Entities that it hits, turning them into allies for <shuzhi>55</> seconds (does not work on bosses).
The control state is removed when Seal is used again on an affected target or its duration ends, dealing <shuzhi>45%</> of all damage dealt by the Wanderer during the control period.
The hive consciousness can be resisted by non-Grayspace Entity targets, which are not affected by this control effect.

Desc.SourceString: 进行<shuzhi>10</>次高速穿梭，吸附附近目标并对附近目标造成至多<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，落地后对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，冷却<shuzhi>30</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dash rapidly between two points <shuzhi>10</> times, drawing in nearby targets and dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，召唤海拉幻影释放<shuzhi>12</>次雷暴，每次雷暴对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
成功释放海拉之拥后会生成<shuzhi>3</>枚晶极刺（场上至多可存在<shuzhi>5</>枚），晶极刺初始拥有<shuzhi>100%</>最大生命值，每秒损失<shuzhi>{2}%</>生命，仅受<shuzhi>回响</>治疗效果影响，持续<shuzhi>{1}</>秒。附近每存在一个由自己召唤的晶极刺，自身造成伤害提升<shuzhi>2.5%</>
Desc.LocalizedString:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and summon Harrah to cast <shuzhi>12</> Tempest Rounds, each of which deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. Meanwhile, gain hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5 seconds.
After successfully casting Harrah's Embrace, <shuzhi>3</> Crystamax thorns are generated (up to <shuzhi>5</> thorns can be present at a time). The thorns start with <shuzhi>100%</> of Max HP, lose <shuzhi>{2}%</> of their HP per second, and are only affected by the <shuzhi>Feedback</> healing effect. This effect lasts for <shuzhi>{1}</> seconds. For each Crystamax thorn summoned by the wielder in the vicinity, the wielder's damage is increased by <shuzhi>2.5%</>.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并持续击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch five consecutive strikes.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target and continuously knocks them back.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them up.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use a normal attack to unleash five consecutive strikes, consuming Endurance.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，使用第一次至第三次普攻时，长按普攻可触发狂气掘宝。
原地持续攻击前方，并消耗耐力，每次命中对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack during the first to third ground Normal Attacks to trigger Frantic Digging.
 Attacks targets ahead in place continuously and consumes Endurance, each hit dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString:
狂气掘宝持续期间，保持长按普攻可触发章鱼丸沸锅。
持续攻击前方，并消耗耐力，每次命中对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，松开后对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
使用方向键可在章鱼丸沸锅持续期间移动。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack during Frantic Digging to trigger Boiling Octopus Balls.
 Attacks targets ahead continuously and consumes Endurance, each hit dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and extra damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to nearby targets upon release.
 Move with directional buttons while using Boiling Octopus Balls.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，长按普攻或使用第四次普攻时长按，可触发小皮开路。
前进持续攻击前方，并消耗耐力，每次命中对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
使用方向键可在小皮开路持续期间调整前进方向。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack on the ground or hold at the fourth ground Normal Attack to trigger Go on, Pip!.
 Attacks targets ahead continuously while moving forward and consumes Endurance, each hit dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and knocking them back.
 Adjust direction with directional buttons while using Go on, Pip!.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻（存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，可触发龙卷扣杀球。
从天而降，落地后对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack while airborne (press when a target is available), or use Normal Attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Waterspout Spike.
 Falls from the sky, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and knocking them up upon landing.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发回击腕足，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Tentacle Counter, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString: 方向键加闪避键触发的前闪避短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发追击腕足，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack during the short perfect Dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger a Pursuing Tentacle, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString:
自身进入蓄力状态，吸附附近目标且每次命中造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并获得<shuzhi>5</>条<shuzhi>小皮分裂触腕</>，冷却<shuzhi>42</>秒（蓄力状态下即可进入冷却）。
松开后引爆附近目标全部层数的<shuzhi>宝藏标记</>，并使<shuzhi>小皮分裂触腕</>进入狂暴状态，提升<shuzhi>100%</>协同攻击速度，持续<shuzhi>20</>秒。

根据蓄力期间自身头顶的<shuzhi>小章鱼</>数量，可选择不同松开时机；
<shuzhi>完全暴走</>：当<shuzhi>小章鱼</>数量为<shuzhi>2</>时，松开后对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害；
<shuzhi>不完全暴走</>：当<shuzhi>小章鱼</>数量为<shuzhi>1</>或<shuzhi>3</>时，松开后对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害。

<shuzhi>伏行之物</>：进入战斗状态时，自身获得<shuzhi>5</>条<shuzhi>小皮分裂触腕</>，分裂触腕将协同攻击当前锁定目标，每次对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并消耗<shuzhi>1</>条分裂触腕，自身至多可存储<shuzhi>10</>条分裂触腕；
<shuzhi>小皮分裂触腕</>命中目标后，为目标添加<shuzhi>1</>层<shuzhi>宝藏标记</>，持续<shuzhi>20</>秒，至多叠加<shuzhi>3</>层；
<shuzhi>小皮分裂触腕</>以外的伤害每次命中将引爆目标<shuzhi>1</>层<shuzhi>宝藏标记</>，造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害，该效果<shuzhi>0.1</>秒内至多触发<shuzhi>1</>次。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Activates Charge, drawing in nearby targets and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK with each hit, and grants <shuzhi>5</> <shuzhi>Pip Octowhips</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>42</>s (begins while Charging).
 Detonates all stacks of <shuzhi>Treasure Tracers</> on nearby targets and activates Rampage for <shuzhi>Pip Octowhips</>, increasing the speed of coordinated attacks by <shuzhi>100%</> for <shuzhi>20</>s.

 Grants different effects depending on the number of <shuzhi>Minisquids</> above the character upon release.
 <shuzhi>Total Berserk</>: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to nearby targets when there are <shuzhi>2</> <shuzhi>Minisquids</> upon release.
 <shuzhi>Partial Berserk</>: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to nearby targets when there are <shuzhi>1</> or <shuzhi>3</> <shuzhi>Minisquids</> upon release.

 <shuzhi>Prowling Clones</>: Grants <shuzhi>5</> <shuzhi>Pip Octowhips</> when entering combat, which attack locked-on targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK and consuming <shuzhi>1</> Octowhip each time an attack lands. A maximum of <shuzhi>10</> Octowhips can be stored at a time.
 Applies <shuzhi>1</> stack of <shuzhi>Treasure Tracer</> on targets each time they are hit by <shuzhi>Pip Octowhip</>, lasting for <shuzhi>20</>s, up to <shuzhi>3</> stacks.
 Detonates <shuzhi>1</> stack of <shuzhi>Treasure Tracer</> whenever the target receives damage aside from <shuzhi>Pip Octowhip</>, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK. Can be triggered at most <shuzhi>once</> every <shuzhi>0.1</>s.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，自身短暂潜入水面，跃出时对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，落地后对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: <red>Removes all carried debuffs</> when <shuzhi>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered upon switching to this weapon. Then the caster dives into water and leaps out, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby enemies, and deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to nearby targets upon landing. Grants Hyperbody and a Shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5s.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并持续击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 5 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back. 
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and continuously knocking the target back.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and launch the target.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use normal attack to launch 5 attacks in a row in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，使用第一次至第三次普攻时，长按普攻可触发狂气掘宝。
原地持续攻击前方，并消耗耐力，期间自身获得霸体效果，每次命中对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack when using the first to third hits to trigger Frantic Digging while on the ground.
Continuously attacks forward in place while consuming Endurance, granting Hyperbody. Every attack that lands deals damage to nearby targets equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
狂气掘宝持续期间，保持长按普攻可触发章鱼丸沸锅。
持续攻击前方，并消耗耐力，期间自身获得霸体效果，每次命中对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，松开后对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
使用方向键可在章鱼丸沸锅持续期间移动。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack to trigger Boiling Octopus Balls during Frantic Digging.
Continuously attacks forward while consuming Endurance, granting Hyperbody. Every attack that lands deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets once normal attack is released.
Use the directional controls to move during Boiling Octopus Balls.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，长按普攻或使用第四次普攻时长按，可触发小皮开路。
前进持续攻击前方，并消耗耐力，期间自身获得霸体效果，每次命中对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并击退目标。
使用方向键可在小皮开路持续期间调整前进方向。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack or hold during the fourth hit to trigger Go on, Pip! while on the ground.
Continuously moves forward while attacking and consuming Endurance, granting Hyperbody. Every attack that lands deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and knocking them back.
Use the directional controls to move during Go on, Pip!

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻（存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，可触发龙卷扣杀球。
从天而降，落地后对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack while airborne (press when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Waterspout Spike.
Falls from above, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets upon landing, and knocking them up.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发回击腕足，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Tentacle Counter, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> damage to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString: 方向键加闪避键触发的前闪避短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发追击腕足，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Pursuing Tentacle, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString:
自身进入蓄力状态，对附近目标且每次命中造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，冷却<shuzhi>20</>秒（蓄力状态下即可进入冷却）。
松开后引爆附近目标全部层数的<shuzhi>宝藏标记</>，并使<shuzhi>小皮分裂触腕</>进入狂暴状态，提升<shuzhi>100%</>协同攻击速度，持续<shuzhi>12</>秒。

根据蓄力期间自身头顶的<shuzhi>小章鱼</>数量，可选择不同松开时机；
<shuzhi>完全暴走</>：当<shuzhi>小章鱼</>数量为<shuzhi>2</>时，松开后对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害；
<shuzhi>不完全暴走</>：当<shuzhi>小章鱼</>数量为<shuzhi>1</>或<shuzhi>3</>时，松开后对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。

<shuzhi>伏行之物</>：进入战斗状态时，自身获得<shuzhi>15</>条<shuzhi>小皮分裂触腕</>，分裂触腕将协同攻击当前锁定目标，每次对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并消耗<shuzhi>1</>条分裂触腕，自身至多可存储<shuzhi>30</>条分裂触腕；
<shuzhi>小皮分裂触腕</>命中目标后，为目标添加<shuzhi>1</>层<shuzhi>宝藏标记</>，持续<shuzhi>20</>秒，至多叠加<shuzhi>3</>层；
<shuzhi>小皮分裂触腕</>以外的物理伤害每次命中将引爆目标<shuzhi>1</>层<shuzhi>宝藏标记</>，造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害，该效果<shuzhi>0.1</>秒内至多触发<shuzhi>1</>次；
任意武器连携伤害每次命中时，获得<shuzhi>1</>条分裂触腕，该效果<shuzhi>0.1</>秒内至多触发<shuzhi>1</>次。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Enter a charging state and deal damage to nearby targets equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each time an attack lands. Cooldown: <shuzhi>20</> seconds (cooldown starts upon entering charging state).
Upon releasing, detonate all <shuzhi>Treasure Tracers</> on nearby targets and cause <shuzhi>Octowhip</> to enter a Rampage state, increasing the speed of coordinated attacks by <shuzhi>100%</>, lasting for <shuzhi>12</> seconds.

Different release timings can be chosen depending on the number of <shuzhi>Minisquids</> above the Wanderer.
<shuzhi>Total Berserk</>: When the number of <shuzhi>Minisquids</> equals <shuzhi>2</>, release to deal damage to nearby targets equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
<shuzhi>Partial Berserk</>: When the number of <shuzhi>Minisquids</> is <shuzhi>1</> or <shuzhi>3</>, release to deal damage to nearby targets equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.

<shuzhi>Prowling Clones</>: Gain <shuzhi>15</> <shuzhi>Octowhips</> when in combat, which attack locked-on targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK and consuming <shuzhi>1</> Octowhip each time an attack lands. A maximum of <shuzhi>30</> Octowhips can be stored at a time.
<shuzhi>Pip Octowhip</> Place <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Treasure Tracer</> on targets each time they are hit by an Octowhip which lasts for <shuzhi>20</> seconds, for a maximum of <shuzhi>3</> stacks.
Detonate <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Treasure Tracer</> stack whenever physical damage aside from <shuzhi>Octowhip</> is dealt to a target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK. This effect can only be triggered <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>0.1</> seconds.
Gain <shuzhi>1</> Octowhip whenever a discharge skill from any weapon hits a target. This effect can only be triggered <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>0.1</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 在目标位置生成一颗海洋之心，冷却<shuzhi>60</>秒，海洋之心每<shuzhi>2</>秒对附近目标造成<shuzhi>4%</>（巅峰联赛为<shuzhi>0.4%</>）*玩家最大生命值点伤害，伤害元素类型跟随当前武器，持续<shuzhi>45</>秒，且被命中目标受到的伤害提升<shuzhi>5%</>，持续<shuzhi>5</>秒
Desc.LocalizedString: Generate a Thalassic Heart at the target's location. Cooldown: <shuzhi>60</> seconds. Every <shuzhi>2</> seconds, the Thalassic Heart will deal damage to nearby targets equal to <shuzhi>4%</> (<shuzhi>0.4%</> in Apex League) of the Wanderer's Max HP for <shuzhi>45</> seconds. The type of elemental damage dealt will be that of the current weapon. Damage received by targets hit is also increased by <shuzhi>5%</> for <shuzhi>5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
根据羽翎生成顺序依次飞向场上的羽翎，并返回初始位置，飞行轨迹会暂留5秒，附近目标在轨迹范围内降低移速<shuzhi>50%</>，期间自身免疫伤害（巅峰联赛中不生效），冷却<shuzhi>12</>秒。
飞行每经过一次羽翎时，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点范围伤害，并带动该羽翎快速旋转，持续<shuzhi>5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Fly toward the parasols in the same order that they spawned, and return to the original position. The flying trail lasts 5 seconds, and targets near the trail are slowed by <shuzhi>50%</>. While gliding, become immune to damage (unavailable in Apex League). Cooldown: <shuzhi>12</> seconds.
Every time the Wanderer passes through a parasol, deal area damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and make the parasol spin rapidly for <shuzhi>5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
任意武器普攻命中或者闪避攻击命中时，会在目标附近生成<shuzhi>1</>柄羽翎，持续<shuzhi>20</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>1.5</>秒，最多存在<shuzhi>3</>个。
<shuzhi>【崩炎】</>：使用狂澜覆草芥每经过一次羽翎，额外造成【聚羽力劲】*<shuzhi>20%</>攻击力的伤害；
<shuzhi>【侵蚀】</>：羽翎附近目标受到火焰伤害提升<shuzhi>10%</>，受蓄力攻击伤害提升<shuzhi>12%</>；
<shuzhi>【光焰】</>：羽翎每秒向附近目标施加<shuzhi>20%</>*攻击力点伤害的灼烧，持续<shuzhi>4</>秒；
<shuzhi>【焰漩】</>：场上羽翎每秒消耗<shuzhi>1</>枚【羽数】，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点范围伤害（多柄羽翎不累计伤害值与【羽数】消耗）。
Desc.LocalizedString:
When a weapon's normal attack or a dodge attack hits, <shuzhi>1</> parasol spawns near the target for <shuzhi>20</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds. Up to <shuzhi>3</> parasols may be active at any given time.
<shuzhi>Fiery Crash</>: During Devastating Glide, for each parasol passed through, deal additional damage equal to <shuzhi>20%</> of ATK multiplied by the number of Polyfeather Parasol.
<shuzhi>Corrosion</>: Targets near the parasols take <shuzhi>10%</> more flame damage and <shuzhi>12%</> more damage from charged attacks.
<shuzhi>Radiant Flames</>: Parasols deal burn damage to nearby targets equal to <shuzhi>20%</> of ATK every second for <shuzhi>4</> seconds.
<shuzhi>Flame Vortex</>: Active parasols consume <shuzhi>1</> feather every second and deal area damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> (damage and feather cost from multiple parasols don't stack).

Desc.SourceString:
释放狂澜覆草芥途中经过三次羽翎，返回初始位置后自身获得【陵光御境】，期间自身获得<shuzhi> 30%</>减伤，持续<shuzhi>8</>秒；
当拓荒者潜海时，【陵光御境】每秒对范围内的目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并提升自身移速<shuzhi>30%</>。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While using Devastating Glide, pass through 3 parasols before returning to the original position to gain Vermilion Domain, which grants a <shuzhi>30%</> damage reduction for <shuzhi>8</> seconds.
While diving, Vermilion Domain deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets in the area every second and increases the Wanderer's speed by <shuzhi>30%</>.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行七次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{1}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{3}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第六次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{5}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第七次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack on the ground to launch seven consecutive strikes.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{3}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Sixth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{5}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Seventh strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行七次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{1}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{3}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第六次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{5}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第七次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack while airborne to unleash seven consecutive strikes in mid-air, consuming Endurance.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{3}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Sixth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{5}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Seventh strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，使用第二次至第四次普攻时，长按普攻可触发漫书。
回旋攻击，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
触发漫书后，点按普攻可触发染翰。
弧形位移，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{1}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并浮空目标。
触发染翰后，点按普攻可触发落纸。
触发落纸后，长按普攻可触发染翰。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack during the first to fourth ground Normal Attacks to trigger Freewriting.
 Performs a spinning attack, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and knock them back.
 Press Normal Attack to activate Elegant Strokes after triggering Freewriting.
 Moves in an arc, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and suspending them.
 Press Normal Attack to activate Falling Paper after triggering Elegant Strokes.
 Hold Normal Attack to activate Elegant Strokes after triggering Falling Paper.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，触发染翰后点按普攻，或使用第五次至第七次普攻时长按，可触发落纸。
踢飞目标，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并浮空目标，随后释放朱雀攻击，对附近目标造成至多<shuzhi>{1}%</>*攻击力点伤害，最后从天而降，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并浮空目标。
触发落纸后，长按普攻可触发染翰。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack after triggering Elegant Strokes on the ground, or hold Normal Attack during the fifth to the seventh Normal Attacks, to trigger Falling Paper.
 Kicks the target airborne, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and suspending them. Then unleashes a flaming bird to attack nearby targets, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK. Finally falls from above, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and suspending them.
 Hold Normal Attack to activate Elegant Strokes after triggering Falling Paper.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，使用第二次至第六次普攻时，长按普攻可触发点睛。
喷发火焰，对前方目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack during the second to sixth Normal Attacks while airborne to trigger Finishing Touch.
 Erupts flames, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻（存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，可触发断简。
从天而降，落地时对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并浮空目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack while airborne (press when a target is available), or use Normal Attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Fragmented Texts.
 Falls from the sky, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and suspending them.

Desc.SourceString:
每次普攻对锁定目标造成伤害时，<shuzhi>50%</>概率凝聚小篆。
<shuzhi>炎</>：凝聚炎劲，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，每<shuzhi>12</>秒至多凝聚一次；
<shuzhi>破</>：引爆火焰，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{1}%</>*攻击力点伤害，每<shuzhi>7</>秒至多凝聚一次；
<shuzhi>引</>：牵引烈焰，吸附附近目标并造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，每<shuzhi>15</>秒至多凝聚一次。
Desc.LocalizedString:
<shuzhi>50%</> chance to gather Small Seal upon dealing damage to locked-on targets with Normal Attack.
 <shuzhi>Flame</>: Gathers flame power to deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target. Can be triggered at most once every <shuzhi>12</>s.
 <shuzhi>Burst</>: Ignites flames to deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. Can be triggered at most once every <shuzhi>7</>s.
 <shuzhi>Attract</>: Draws in nearby targets with intense flames and deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> to them. Can be triggered at most once every <shuzhi>15</>s.

Desc.SourceString:
拥有<shuzhi>雀羽</>时：
<shuzhi>松彗</>任意攻击可向锁定目标发射一枚<shuzhi>雀羽</>，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力伤害，每<shuzhi>1</>秒至多触发一次。
<shuzhi>雀羽</>初始数量为<shuzhi>30</>枚，自身至多可存储<shuzhi>60</>枚。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While having <shuzhi>Sparrow Feathers</>:
 Launches a <shuzhi>Sparrow Feather</> toward the locked-on target with any attack using <shuzhi>Pine Comet</>, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. Can be triggered at most once every <shuzhi>1</>s.
 The initial number of <shuzhi>Sparrow Feathers</> is <shuzhi>30</>, and a maximum of <shuzhi>60</> can be stored at a time.

Desc.SourceString: 挥毫
Desc.LocalizedString: Brush to Paper

Desc.SourceString:
在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
<shuzhi>被动</>：自身获得<shuzhi>15</>枚<shuzhi>雀羽</>。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Dodges before being hit to trigger Phantasia, slowing the action speed of targets within range. Grants immunity to hitstun while dodging.
<shuzhi>Passive</>: Grants <shuzhi>15</> <shuzhi>Sparrow Feathers</>.

Desc.SourceString:
任意闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发砚滴。
泼洒笔墨，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Inkstone Droplet.
 Splashes ink, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString:
触发砚滴后，长按普攻可触发笔耕。
泼洒笔墨，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack to activate Writing Artisan after triggering Inkstone Droplet.
 Splashes ink, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString:
自身化为多个水墨分身，获得短暂无敌并对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，之后汇聚水墨释放水墨劲力，吸附附近目标并造成至多<shuzhi>{1}%</>*攻击力点伤害，冷却<shuzhi>30</>秒。
四方雀唳汇聚场上的<shuzhi>书法字</>，并释放朱雀化形，对附近目标造成（场上召唤物数量+书法字数量，至多<shuzhi>8</>个）*<shuzhi>{2}%</>攻击力点伤害，自身进入<shuzhi>极致</>状态，增加<shuzhi>{3}%</>移动速度，持续<shuzhi>30</>秒。
根据汇聚的<shuzhi>书法字</>类型及数量，<shuzhi>极致</>状态将额外提供不同效果：
汇聚<shuzhi>2</>个“携”字时，破盾效率提升<shuzhi>{4}%</>；
汇聚<shuzhi>2</>个“技”字时，“四方雀唳”冷却减少<shuzhi>3</>秒；
汇聚<shuzhi>2</>个“闪”字时，获得<shuzhi>{5}</>次闪避次数；
汇聚<shuzhi>2</>个“攻”字时，普攻期间自身获得<shuzhi>{6}%</>减伤；

<shuzhi>被动：书法字</>
释放任意武器连携/技能/闪避/普攻后，将掉落对应的<shuzhi>书法字</>。
<shuzhi>携</>：每使用<shuzhi>1</>次连携掉落<shuzhi>1</>个“携”字，场上至多存在<shuzhi>2</>个；
<shuzhi>技</>：每使用<shuzhi>1</>次技能掉落<shuzhi>1</>个“技”字，场上至多存在<shuzhi>2</>个；
<shuzhi>闪</>：每使用<shuzhi>2</>次闪避掉落<shuzhi>1</>个“闪”字，场上至多存在<shuzhi>2</>个；
<shuzhi>攻</>：每使用<shuzhi>4</>次普攻掉落<shuzhi>1</>个“攻”字，场上至多存在<shuzhi>2</>个。

当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，向前方横扫，对附近目标造成至多<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标同时自身获得<shuzhi>5%</>最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续<shuzhi>3.5</>秒。
激活坚毅共鸣时，充能额外提升50%，伤害增加20%。
Desc.LocalizedString:
<shuzhi>Removes all carried debuffs</> when <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered upon switching to this weapon. Then sweeps forward to deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and knock them back. Grants Hyperbody and a shield worth <shuzhi>5%</> of Max HP for <shuzhi>3.5s</>.
 Increases Charge by 50% and damage by 20% upon activating Fortitude Resonance.

Desc.SourceString: 使用疾行履进入疾风神行状态，可在墙面上自由移动，使用跳跃快速移动小段距离，效果持续<shuzhi>15</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>90</>秒（疾行履仅限九域可用）
Desc.LocalizedString: Speedwalkers can be used to enter the zephyr state, allowing you to move freely on the wall and jump to quickly cover a short distance for <shuzhi>15</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>90</> seconds. Speedwalkers are only usable in Domain 9.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行六次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，并持续击退目标。
第六次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{11}</>点伤害，并击飞目标。

冲拳连打处于<shuzhi>武道家</>/<shuzhi>掠阵</>形态时均可释放；
<shuzhi>武道家</>形态任意闪避攻击后，点按普攻可快速触发第四次攻击。
<shuzhi>武道家</>形态第五次攻击命中后，对目标造成<shuzhi>2</>秒<shuzhi>强控冻结</>效果（巅峰联赛、对boss不生效），并为目标添加<shuzhi>冻瘃</>状态，每秒造成<shuzhi>{12}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{13}</>点伤害，持续<shuzhi>8</>秒，该效果对同一目标<shuzhi>8</>秒内至多触发一次。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 6 consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and continuously knock the target back.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</> and launch the target.

Battering Fist can be used in either the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> or <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form.
After using any dodge attack while in the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> form, use normal attack to quickly trigger the Fourth Attack.
After the Fifth Attack lands a hit while in the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> form, <shuzhi>strongly freeze</> the target for <shuzhi>2</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League and against bosses) and additionally inflict <shuzhi>Chilblain</>, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{13}</> every second for <shuzhi>8</> seconds. This effect can only be triggered on the same target 1 time every <shuzhi>8</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行六次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害。
第六次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{11}</>点伤害。

滞空冲拳处于<shuzhi>武道家</>/<shuzhi>掠阵</>形态时均可释放。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use normal attack to launch 6 consecutive attacks in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</>.

Floating Fist can be used in either the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> or <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，使用第一次至第三次普攻时，长按普攻可触发燕子穿林。
造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害并吸附附近目标，再对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害并击退目标。

燕子穿林处于<shuzhi>武道家</>形态时方可释放；
释放<shuzhi>飞鸢出云</>后，点按普攻也可触发燕子穿林。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Forest-Piercing Swallow can only be used while in the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> form.
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when using the first to third normal attacks to trigger Forest-Piercing Swallow.
Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and draw in nearby targets. Then, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the targets back.

After using <shuzhi>Cloud-Soaring Kite</>, using normal attack can also trigger Forest-Piercing Swallow.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，使用第四次至第五次普攻时，长按普攻可触发腾蛇舞空。
对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并浮空目标。

腾蛇舞空处于<shuzhi>武道家</>形态时方可释放；
释放<shuzhi>燕子穿林</>后，长按普攻也可触发腾蛇舞空。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Sky-Dancing Snake can only be used while in the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> form.
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when using the fourth to fifth normal attacks to trigger Sky-Dancing Snake.
Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and suspend them.

After using <shuzhi>Forest-Piercing Swallow</>, tapping and holding normal attack can also trigger Sky-Dancing Snake.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，使用第一次至第六次普攻时，长按普攻可触发霜天彻地。
在空中掷出武器，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。

霜天彻地处于<shuzhi>武道家</>/<shuzhi>掠阵</>形态时均可释放。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, tap and hold normal attack when using the first to sixth normal attacks to trigger Frost High & Low.
Toss your weapon in the air, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.

Frost High & Low can be used in either the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> or <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻（存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，可触发飞鸢出云。
从天而降，落地后对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并击倒目标。

飞鸢出云处于<shuzhi>武道家</>/<shuzhi>掠阵</>形态时均可释放。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Cloud-Soaring Kite.
Fall from above, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets upon reaching the ground and knock them down.

Cloud-Soaring Kite can be used in either the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> or <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，长按普攻可触发万物归元。
持续吸附附近目标并消耗耐力，期间自身获得霸体效果。

万物归元处于<shuzhi>武道家</>/<shuzhi>掠阵</>形态时均可释放。
Desc.LocalizedString:
When on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Total Rewind.
Continuously draw in nearby targets while consuming endurance, during which the Wanderer gains hyperbody.

Total Rewind can be used in either the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> or <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form.

Desc.SourceString:
在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。

闪避处于<shuzhi>武道家</>/<shuzhi>掠阵</>形态时均可释放；
<shuzhi>武道家</>形态闪避后，自身获得<shuzhi>5</>秒霸体效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

Can be used in either the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> or <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form.
After dodging while in the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> form, gain hyperbody for <shuzhi>5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发挟山超海，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。

挟山超海处于<shuzhi>武道家</>/<shuzhi>掠阵</>形态时均可释放；
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Impossible Feat, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.

Impossible Feat can be used in either the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> or <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form.

Desc.SourceString:
方向键加闪避键触发的前闪避短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发风卷残云，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。

风卷残云处于<shuzhi>武道家</>/<shuzhi>掠阵</>形态时均可释放；
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (tap an arrow button before dodging) to trigger Sweeping Clouds, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.

Sweeping Clouds can be used in either the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> or <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form.

Desc.SourceString:
<shuzhi>骈臻</>拥有<shuzhi>武道家</>与<shuzhi>掠阵</>两种形态，可在技能列表->设置界面中至多启用<shuzhi>1</>种形态，且战斗状态下无法切换。
 
<shuzhi>武道家</>形态：战斗状态下，<shuzhi>骈臻</>闪避攻击/普攻倍率额外提升<shuzhi>40%</>，使用任意武器闪避攻击或普攻<shuzhi>3</>次后，获得<shuzhi>1</>点<shuzhi>内劲</>（至多<shuzhi>10</>点），<shuzhi>内劲</>每<shuzhi>2</>秒至多获得<shuzhi>1</>点，非战斗状态下清除所有<shuzhi>内劲</>点数。
<shuzhi>掠阵</>形态：<shuzhi>应势而动</>命中后进入<shuzhi>蓄势</>状态，每<shuzhi>0.8</>秒获得<shuzhi>1</>点<shuzhi>战意</>（至多<shuzhi>15</>点），持续<shuzhi>60</>秒，非战斗状态下清除所有<shuzhi>战意</>点数。
<shuzhi>被动：寒气</>
装备<shuzhi>骈臻</>时，自身获得无视目标<shuzhi>30%</>冰抗效果，装备后后台可生效。
Desc.LocalizedString:
<shuzhi>Unity</> has 2 forms: <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> and <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</>. Activate up to <shuzhi>1</> of them via the Skills - Settings page. They cannot be switched while in the combat state.

<shuzhi>Martial Artist</> form: While in the combat state, <shuzhi>Unity's</> dodge attack/normal attack multiplier is additionally increased by <shuzhi>40%</>. After using any weapon's dodge attack or normal attack <shuzhi>3</> times, receive <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Internal Strength</> (up to <shuzhi>10</>). Only <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Internal Strength</> can be obtained every <shuzhi>2</> seconds. While not in the combat state, all <shuzhi>Internal Strength</> will be cleared.
<shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form: After <shuzhi>Observe & React</> lands a hit, enter the <shuzhi>Anticipate</> state and receive <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Fighting Spirit</> every <shuzhi>0.8</> seconds (up to <shuzhi>15</>) for <shuzhi>60</> seconds. While not in the combat state, all <shuzhi>Fighting Spirit</> will be cleared.
<shuzhi>Passive</>: Chill</>
When <shuzhi>Unity</> is equipped, ignore <shuzhi>30%</> of targets' Frost Resistance. This effect also works in the off-hand slot.

Desc.SourceString:
对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，冷却<shuzhi>15</>秒。
释放或跃在渊时，<shuzhi>骈臻</>至多消耗<shuzhi>5</>点<shuzhi>内劲</>，每消耗<shuzhi>1</>/<shuzhi>2</>/<shuzhi>3</>/<shuzhi>4</>/<shuzhi>5</>点<shuzhi>内劲</>，本次或跃在渊伤害值替换为原先的<shuzhi>1.2</>/<shuzhi>1.5</>/<shuzhi>2.1</>/<shuzhi>2.8</>/<shuzhi>3.7</>倍。
释放或跃在渊后，自身寒冰伤害提升<shuzhi>20%</>，持续<shuzhi>30</>秒。
释放或跃在渊后，自身回复<shuzhi>2</>次闪避次数。

或跃在渊处于<shuzhi>武道家</>形态时方可释放；
<shuzhi>内劲</>达到<shuzhi>5</>点时，清除或跃在渊冷却时间。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target. Cooldown: <shuzhi>15</> seconds. When using Fire in the Hole, <shuzhi>Unity</> will consume up to <shuzhi>5</> <shuzhi>Internal Strength</>. When it consumes <shuzhi>1</>/<shuzhi>2</>/<shuzhi>3</>/<shuzhi>4</>/<shuzhi>5</> <shuzhi>Internal Strength</>, Fire in the Hole will deal <shuzhi>1.2</>/<shuzhi>1.5</>/<shuzhi>2.1</>/<shuzhi>2.8</>/<shuzhi>3.7</> times of its original damage respectively.
After using Fire in the Hole, increase frost damage by <shuzhi>20%</> for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
After using Fire in the Hole, restore <shuzhi>2</> dodge attempts.

Fire in the Hole can only be used while in the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> form.
When <shuzhi>Internal Strength</> reaches <shuzhi>5</>, reset Fire in the Hole's cooldown.

Desc.SourceString:
对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，冷却<shuzhi>15</>秒。
<shuzhi>蓄势</>状态下，自身释放任意武器技能时，<shuzhi>骈臻</>至多消耗<shuzhi>5</>点<shuzhi>战意</>，每消耗<shuzhi>1</>/<shuzhi>2</>/<shuzhi>3</>/<shuzhi>4</>/<shuzhi>5</>点<shuzhi>战意</>，额外对附近目标造成<shuzhi>242%</>/<shuzhi>503%</>/<shuzhi>1049%</>/<shuzhi>2351%</>/<shuzhi>3930%</>*攻击力点伤害，并对目标每秒造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，持续<shuzhi>5</>秒。
释放任意冰元素武器技能后，自身获得<shuzhi>2</>秒霸体效果。

兵戈铮鸣处于<shuzhi>掠阵</>形态时方可释放。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to the target. Cooldown: <shuzhi>15</> seconds. While in the <shuzhi>Anticipate</> state, when using any weapon skill, <shuzhi>Unity</> will consume up to <shuzhi>5</> <shuzhi>Fighting Spirit</>. When it consumes <shuzhi>1</>/<shuzhi>2</>/<shuzhi>3</>/<shuzhi>4</>/<shuzhi>5</> <shuzhi>Fighting Spirit</>, deal additional area damage equal to <shuzhi>242%</>/<shuzhi>503%</>/<shuzhi>1,049%</>/<shuzhi>2,351%</>/<shuzhi>3,930%</> of ATK, and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> every second for <shuzhi>5</> seconds.
After using any frost weapon skill, gain <shuzhi>2</> seconds of hyperbody.

Clashing of Arms can only be used while in the <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form.

Desc.SourceString:
当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，对附近目标造成至多<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并<shuzhi>强控击飞</>目标，期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。

狴虎履霜处于<shuzhi>武道家</>形态时方可释放。
Desc.LocalizedString:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</>, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and <shuzhi>strongly launching</> them. During this period, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

Snow-Treading Tiger can only be used while in the <shuzhi>Martial Artist</> form.

Desc.SourceString:
当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，对附近目标造成至多<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并<shuzhi>强控击飞</>目标，期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
应势而动命中后，自身寒冰伤害提升<shuzhi>20%</>，持续<shuzhi>30</>秒。
应势而动命中后，自身进入<shuzhi>蓄势</>状态，持续<shuzhi>60</>秒。
使用<shuzhi>骈臻</>期间释放连携技后，自身获得<shuzhi>1000</>点武器充能值，该效果<shuzhi>10</>秒内至多触发一次。

应势而动处于<shuzhi>掠阵</>形态时方可释放。
Desc.LocalizedString:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</>, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and <shuzhi>strongly launching</> them. During this period, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).
After Observe & React lands a hit, increase frost damage by <shuzhi>20%</> for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
After Observe & React lands a hit, enter the <shuzhi>Anticipate</> state for <shuzhi>60</> seconds.
After using <shuzhi>Unity</> to use a discharge skill, receive <shuzhi>1,000</> weapon charge. This effect can only be triggered 1 time every <shuzhi>10</> seconds.

Observe & React can only be used while in the <shuzhi>Sweeping Force</> form.

Desc.SourceString: 使用泡泡枪，短按消耗<shuzhi>1</>点泡泡水，向前吹出少量小泡泡，每个造成攻击*<shuzhi>36%</>伤害。长按<shuzhi>0.5</>秒消耗<shuzhi>5</>点泡泡水，向前吹出大泡泡，对碰到的敌人造成攻击*<shuzhi>540%</>伤害，包裹大部分小型的目标向空中飞去，同一目标<shuzhi>15</>秒内最多被包裹飞起<shuzhi>1</>次，对霸体目标无效，吹出大泡泡冷却<shuzhi>5</>秒。泡泡水每<shuzhi>3</>秒恢复<shuzhi>1</>点，完成击杀时，恢复<shuzhi>10</>点泡泡水，泡泡枪可存储的泡泡水上限为<shuzhi>30</>点。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press to consume <shuzhi>1</> drop of bubble solution and fire small bubbles, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>36%</> of ATK. Hold for <shuzhi>0.5</>s to consume <shuzhi>5</> drops and fire big bubbles, each dealing <shuzhi>540%</> of ATK. Big bubbles can engulf most small targets and knock them up. Each target can be engulfed and knocked up only <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>15</>s, and targets with Hyperbody are unaffected. Big bubbles have a <shuzhi>5</>s cooldown. Bubble solution restores at <shuzhi>1</> drop every <shuzhi>3</>s, with <shuzhi>10</> drops restored after defeating an enemy. Bubble Gun can hold up to <shuzhi>30</> drops.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行五次攻击。
<shuzhi>玄武图腾</>持续期间，御侮第五次攻击最后一段命中后，对锁定目标添加一次蛇噬。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并吸引怪物向自身聚集。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并浮空目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch five consecutive strikes.
 Inflicts Snake Bite on the locked-on target when the last hit of Resistor's fifth strike lands during <shuzhi>Xuanwu Totem</>.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target and draws them in.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target and suspends them.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them up.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use a normal attack to unleash five consecutive strikes, consuming Endurance.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面普攻时，使用第一次至第四次普攻时，长按普攻可触发彼岸一心。
向前方掷出武器，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack during the first to fourth ground Normal Attacks to trigger Othershore Soul.
Tosses weapon ahead, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，长按普攻可触发崩山。
前进持续攻击前方，并消耗耐力，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack to trigger Collapsing Mountain while on the ground.
Attacks ahead while moving forward and consuming Endurance, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻（存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，可触发连亘。
从空中下落，落地后对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack while airborne (press when a target is available), or use Normal Attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger In Continuity.
 Descends from the air, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets upon landing.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

Desc.SourceString:
方向键加闪避键触发的前闪避短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发开云，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
<shuzhi>玄武图腾</>持续期间，开云命中后，对锁定目标添加一次蛇噬。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack during the short perfect Dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Open Clouds, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets.
 Inflicts a Snake Bite upon the locked-on target upon hitting a target with Open Clouds during <shuzhi>Xuanwu Totem</>.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发斩沙，发出一道剑气对前方目标<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
<shuzhi>玄武图腾</>持续期间，斩沙命中后，对锁定目标添加一次蛇噬。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack during the short period after dodging to trigger a Cutting Sand, launching a sword aura that deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead.
 Inflicts a Snake Bite upon the locked-on target upon hitting a target with Cutting Sand during <shuzhi>Xuanwu Totem</>.

Desc.SourceString:
在前方地面斩出裂隙，吸附附近目标，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，冷却<shuzhi>40</>秒，自身获得持续<shuzhi>45</>秒的<shuzhi>8%</>伤害提升，之后召唤玄武图腾，非战斗状态下玄武图腾解除。
玄武图腾落成，获得<shuzhi>5</>秒霸体效果，自动进入<shuzhi>无我之境</>状态（巅峰联赛不生效），持续<shuzhi>30</>秒，并获得<shuzhi>1</>次<shuzhi>冥斩</>。

<shuzhi>执明</>任意普攻或闪避攻击命中首个目标后可触发<shuzhi>冥斩</>，对目标造成<shuzhi>666%</>*攻击力点被动伤害。
<shuzhi>冥斩</>次数用尽、<shuzhi>无我之境</>持续时间结束、或切换武器时，可解除<shuzhi>无我之境</>。

玄武图腾持续期间，使用<shuzhi>执明</>可通过以下方式添加蛇噬：
<shuzhi>绝壑</>命中后，对生命值最高的目标添加一次蛇噬；
<shuzhi>御侮</>第五次攻击最后一段命中后，对锁定目标添加一次蛇噬；
<shuzhi>开云</>命中后，对锁定目标添加一次蛇噬；
<shuzhi>斩沙</>命中后，对锁定目标添加一次蛇噬。
蛇噬对目标造成<shuzhi>300%</>*攻击力点吞噬伤害，并使目标成为蛇链成员。

蛇链可将锁定蛇链成员受到来自拓荒者前台武器的实际伤害<shuzhi>10%</>及<shuzhi>重伤</>状态传导至全部蛇链成员（包括目标本身），蛇链成员至多为<shuzhi>4</>名。
传导伤害元素类型跟随原伤害且无法再次传导，<shuzhi>35</>秒内累计传导伤害不超过拓荒者最高攻击力的<shuzhi>3.6</>倍，<shuzhi>冥斩</>伤害无法传导。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Cuts out a Rift on the ground head, drawing in nearby enemies and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK. Cooldown: <shuzhi>40</>s. Increases damage by <shuzhi>8%</> for <shuzhi>45</>s. Then summons Xuanwu Totem, which expires in non-combat state.
 Grants Hyperbody for <shuzhi>5</>s and activates <shuzhi>Selfless Realm</> (unavailable in Apex League), lasting for <shuzhi>30</>s, upon completing Xuanwu Totem. Also grants <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Dark Slash</> use.

 Triggers <shuzhi>Dark Slash</> upon hitting the first target with <shuzhi>Onyx Tortoise</>'s Normal Attack or Dodge Attack, dealing passive damage equal to <shuzhi>666%</> of ATK.
 <shuzhi>Selfless Realm</> expires when all <shuzhi>Dark Slash</> uses are consumed, the duration of <shuzhi>Selfless Realm</> ends, or weapons are switched.

 Inflict Snake Bite with <shuzhi>Onyx Tortoise</> in these ways during Xuanwu Totem:
 <shuzhi>Absolute Ravine</> inflicts Snake Bite on the target with the highest HP upon hit.
 <shuzhi>Resistor</> inflicts Snake Bite on the locked-on target when the last hit of the fifth strike lands.
 <shuzhi>Open Clouds</> inflicts Snake Bite on the locked-on target upon hit.
 <shuzhi>Cutting Sand</> inflicts Snake Bite on the locked-on target upon hit.
 Snake Bite deals Bite Damage equal to <shuzhi>300%</> of ATK to the target and links them to Serpent Chain.

 Serpent Chain transmits <shuzhi>10%</> of actual damage from the main-slot weapon taken by any linked target and <shuzhi>Grievous</> to all linked targets. Links up to <shuzhi>4</> targets.
 The elements of damage are kept during transmission and can only be transmitted once. The total damage transmitted within <shuzhi>35</>s cannot exceed the character's highest ATK <shuzhi>×3.6</>. <shuzhi>Dark Slash</> damage cannot be transmitted.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，召唤玄武释放范围伤害，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，同时自身获得<shuzhi>5%</>最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续<shuzhi>3.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: <shuzhi>Removes all carried debuffs</> when <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered upon switching to this weapon. Then summons Xuanwu, dealing AoE damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. Grants Hyperbody and a shield equal to <shuzhi>5%</> of Max HP for <shuzhi>3.5</>s.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use normal attack to launch 5 attacks in a row in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，使用第一次至第四次普攻时，长按普攻可触发孟章贯日，并消耗耐力。
向前方发动进攻，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并浮空目标。
触发孟章贯日后，长按普攻可触发霆爆。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when using the first to fourth normal attacks to trigger Azure Dragon Pierces the Sun and consume endurance.
Launch an attack ahead, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and suspending them.
After triggering Azure Dragon Pierces the Sun, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Thunder Burst.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，长按普攻可触发霆爆。
向目标持续发射雷电，并消耗耐力，期间自身获得霸体效果，每次命中对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，同时每<shuzhi>1.5</>秒召唤<shuzhi>1</>条小青龙孟章，协同向目标释放冲击波，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
蓄力攻击以及冲击波每次命中都会使目标雷抗降低<shuzhi>3%</>，至多降低至<shuzhi>15%</>，持续<shuzhi>10</>秒；同时自身每<shuzhi>1.5</>秒获得<shuzhi>10%</>最大生命值护盾，至多获得<shuzhi>30%</>最大生命值护盾，持续<shuzhi>15</>秒。
激活坚毅共鸣后：
霆爆冲击波每次命中嘲讽附近的目标，持续<shuzhi>2</>秒；
霆爆雷抗降低效果替换为全抗降低效果；
霆爆每次产生护盾时，附近队友额外获得至多<shuzhi>10%</>使用者自身最大生命值护盾。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Thunder Burst.
Continuously fire lightning at targets, consuming endurance, during which the Wanderer gains hyperbody. Every attack that lands deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. At the same time, summon <shuzhi>1</> Azura every <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds that fire shockwaves, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets.
Every time charged attack or shockwave lands a hit, reduce the target's volt resistance by <shuzhi>3%</>, up to <shuzhi>15%</> for <shuzhi>10</> seconds. At the same time, the Wanderer gains a shield equal to <shuzhi>10%</> of Max HP every <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds, stacking up to <shuzhi>30%</>, lasting for <shuzhi>15</> seconds from the creation of the first shield.
After activating Fortitude Resonance:
Whenever Thunder Burst's shockwaves land a hit, nearby targets are taunted for <shuzhi>2</> seconds.
Thunder Burst's volt resistance-lowering effect is changed to lowering all resistance instead.
Every time Thunder Burst produces a shield, nearby teammates will additionally receive a shield up to <shuzhi>10%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，使用第一次至第四次普攻时，长按普攻可触发游龙，并消耗耐力。
向前方发动进攻，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并浮空目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, tap and hold normal attack when using the first to fourth normal attacks to trigger Roving Dragon and consume endurance.
Launch an attack ahead, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and suspending them.

Desc.SourceString:
孟章每<shuzhi>3</>次普攻命中后，获得<shuzhi>1</>层青龙之力，至多获得<shuzhi>8</>层，持续<shuzhi>30</>秒。
激活坚毅共鸣后：
每层青龙之力使自身获得<shuzhi>1.5%</>减伤效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Every <shuzhi>3</> normal attacks landed while using Azure Dragon grants <shuzhi>1</> stack of Qinglong's Might, stacking up to <shuzhi>8</> times, for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
After activating Fortitude Resonance:
