Each stack of Qinglong's Might reduces the Wanderer's damage taken by <shuzhi>1.5%</>.

Desc.SourceString: 挥毫
Desc.LocalizedString: Brush to Paper

Desc.SourceString:
在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
<shuzhi>被动：</>向前方发出雷电绣球。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.
<shuzhi>Passive</>: Launch a lightning ball ahead.

Desc.SourceString:
任意闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发电掣。
瞬间出现在雷电绣球位置，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，生成雷池并回到自身起始位置，雷池共计造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点持续伤害并持续吸附附近目标。
<shuzhi>被动：</>电掣期间自身获得霸体效果，电掣命中后获得<shuzhi>1</>层青龙之力。
触发电掣后，长按普攻可触发霆爆。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Lightning Flash.
Instantly appear at lightning ball's location, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and produce a lightning pool, then return to the Wanderer's original location. The lightning pool will deal a total DoT equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and continuously draw in nearby targets.
<shuzhi>Passive:</> During Lightning Flash, the Wanderer receives hyperbody. After Lightning Flash lands a hit, receive <shuzhi>1</> stack of Qinglong's Might.
After triggering Lightning Flash, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Thunder Burst.

Desc.SourceString:
青龙飞天，期间自身获得霸体效果并对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，青龙盘旋持续<shuzhi>8</>秒，期间持续消耗青龙之力并释放至多<shuzhi>8</>道落雷，每道落雷命中对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，青龙退场时再对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，冷却<shuzhi>30</>秒且无法低于<shuzhi>20</>秒，青云慑月至多可积攒<shuzhi>2</>层技能释放次数。
<shuzhi>被动：</>装备<shuzhi>3</>把雷武器时，青云慑月命中后每<shuzhi>2</>秒会对目标造成<shuzhi>600%</>*攻击力点技能伤害，持续<shuzhi>30</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
An azure dragon soars through the sky. During this time, grant hyperbody to the Wanderer and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. The azure dragon will circle for <shuzhi>8</> seconds. During this time, continuously consume Qinglong's Might and summon up to <shuzhi>8</> lightning strikes. Every lightning strike deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets, and when the azure dragon disappears, deal damage again equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> to nearby targets. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds and this cooldown cannot be lowered below <shuzhi>20</> seconds. Azure Moon can accumulate up to <shuzhi>2</> stacks of skill uses.
<shuzhi>Passive:</> When <shuzhi>3</> volt weapons are equipped, after Azure Moon lands a hit, deal skill damage equal to <shuzhi>600%</> of ATK to the target every <shuzhi>2</> seconds for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，汇聚炁，砸向地面后引爆，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并浮空目标，期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
<shuzhi>被动：</>触发幻时时，当前持有孟章或从其他武器切换到孟章，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>20000%</>*攻击力点伤害，该伤害不受除泰坦装备稀有属性以外的增伤效果影响，每个幻时期间至多触发一次。
Desc.LocalizedString:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and gather chi. Then smash the ground, causing an explosion, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and suspending them. During the period, gain damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).
<shuzhi>Passive:</> When Phantasia is triggered, if Azure Dragon is currently equipped or if switching to Azure Dragon from another weapon, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>20,000%</> of ATK to nearby targets. This damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects. This can only be triggered up to 1 time per Phantasia trigger.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行六次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击倒目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击浮空目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击倒目标。
第六次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力的伤害，同时对范围内的队友治疗<shuzhi>{11}%</>*攻击力*妃色幻象数量的生命。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack to launch six consecutive strikes while on the ground.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them down.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target and suspends them.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them down.
 Sixth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK to the target and heals teammates in range for <shuzhi>{11}%</> × ATK × number of Fei Se's Phantasias.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行六次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第六次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力的伤害，同时对范围内的队友治疗<shuzhi>{11}%</>*攻击力*妃色幻象数量的生命。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack while airborne to unleash six consecutive strikes in mid-air, consuming Endurance.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Sixth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK to the target and heals teammates in range for <shuzhi>{11}%</> × ATK × number of Fei Se's Phantasias.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，使用第一次至第三次普攻时，长按普攻可触发金风玉露。
造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，使目标受到的治疗效果降低<shuzhi>50%</>，持续<shuzhi>20</>秒，并浮空目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack during the first to third ground Normal Attacks to trigger Golden Autumn.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK, reduces healing received by <shuzhi>50%</> to the target for <shuzhi>20</>s, and suspends them.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，使用第四次至第六次普攻时，长按普攻可触发环佩铿锵。
吸附附近目标，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击退目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack during the fourth to sixth ground Normal Attacks to trigger Resounding Pendants.
 Draws in nearby targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and knocking them back.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面或当拓荒者滞空时，长按普攻可触发莲步飞天。
腾空持续向前飞行，并消耗耐力，使用方向键可在莲步飞天持续期间调整前进方向。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack on the ground or while airborne to trigger Lotus Aspara.
Launch up and fly forward in the air, consuming Endurance. Adjust direction with directional buttons while Lotus Aspara is active.

Desc.SourceString:
<shuzhi>纤云弄巧</>持续期间，长按普攻可触发落花。
从天而降，落地后对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack during <shuzhi>Shifting Clouds</> to trigger Falling Flowers.
 Falls from the sky, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and knocking them up upon landing.

Desc.SourceString: 捭阖
Desc.LocalizedString: Maneuver

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

Desc.SourceString:
方向键加闪避键触发的前闪避短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发散华，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。

<shuzhi>扶摇</>生成的<shuzhi>蜃楼</>幻境持续期间，任意武器的闪避攻击首次命中目标后，触发移花效果，生成妃色幻象与莲瓣。
<shuzhi>妃色幻象</>：生成时，妃色幻象复制目标<shuzhi>25%</>最大攻击力转化为拓荒者自身<shuzhi>基础全攻</>（不低于<shuzhi>80</>且不超过<shuzhi>170</>，该全攻不显示在拓荒者人物属性中，巅峰联赛不生效），同时全攻提升<shuzhi>{1}%</>，直至妃色幻象消失。每个妃色幻象独立计算，场上至多存在<shuzhi>1</>个妃色幻象。
<shuzhi>莲瓣</>：生成时，莲瓣数量等同于当前场上除重蕊外其他自身武器生成的召唤物数量，生成后，莲瓣数量不随场上召唤物数量的变化而变化。莲瓣属于召唤物。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack during the short perfect Dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger a Scatter, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

 Triggers Flower Graft, creating a Fei Se's Phantasia and Lotus Petals upon the first Dodge Attack hit using any weapon during <shuzhi>Mirage</> created by <shuzhi>Whirling</>.
 <shuzhi>Fei Se's Phantasia</>: Converts <shuzhi>25%</> of the target's Max ATK to the caster's <shuzhi>Base All Attack</> (not lower than <shuzhi>80</> or higher than <shuzhi>170</>; not reflected on the caster's stats and is unavailable in Apex League) and increases All Attack by <shuzhi>{1}%</> until Fei Se's Phantasia disappears. This is calculated independently for each Fei Se's Phantasia. There can be only <shuzhi>1</> Fei Se's Phantasia at a time.
 <shuzhi>Lotus Petal</>: Creates as many Lotus Petals as the Summons created by the caster's weapons other than Endless Bloom. The Lotus Petal count does not change with the number of Summons once created. Lotus Petals are considered as Summons.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发纷飞，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Flutter, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString:
对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并生成蜃楼幻境，至多持续<shuzhi>30</>秒。
扶摇处于冷却状态时，获得新技能惊鸿，蜃楼持续<shuzhi>25</>秒后可释放惊鸿。
蜃楼消失后，立即刷新扶摇的冷却时间，且不受任何其它冷却时间清除、重置、变化效果的影响。

蜃楼持续期间：
每秒对其中目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点心蚀伤害，心蚀伤害视为被动伤害；每秒对其中自身及队友施加芸灼，回复<shuzhi>{3}%</>*攻击力的生命值
Desc.LocalizedString:
Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and creates Mirage, lasting for up to <shuzhi>30</>s.
 Grants the skill Lissom while Whirling is on cooldown, available after Mirage has lasted for <shuzhi>25</>s.
 Resets Whirling's cooldown as soon as Mirage disappears. This is not affected by other cooldown clearing, resetting, or changing effects.

 During Mirage:
 Deals Soulwear damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK (Soulwear counts as passive damage) to targets within it. Applies Cloudshine to the caster and teammates every second, restoring HP equal to <shuzhi>{3}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
扶摇处于冷却状态时，获得新技能惊鸿，蜃楼持续<shuzhi>25</>秒后可释放惊鸿。
移除蜃楼中所有自身生成的<shuzhi>妃色幻象</>与<shuzhi>莲瓣</>，每移除<shuzhi>1</>个<shuzhi>妃色幻象</>或<shuzhi>莲瓣</>对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，之后击碎蜃楼幻境，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Grants the skill Lissom while Whirling is on cooldown, available after Mirage has lasted for <shuzhi>25</>s.
 Clears all <shuzhi>Fei Se's Phantasias</> and <shuzhi>Lotus Petals</> in Mirage created by the caster. Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets For every <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Fei Se's Phantasia</> or <shuzhi>Lotus Petal</> cleared. Then, shatters Mirage, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，同时对范围内的自身及队友回复<shuzhi>{1}%</>*攻击力的生命值，自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
Desc.LocalizedString: <shuzhi>Removes all carried debuffs</> when <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered upon switching to this weapon. Then deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and heals the caster and teammates in range for <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK. Grants Hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5s.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行六次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，并吸引怪物向前方聚集。
第六次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{11}</>点伤害，并击飞目标。
触发剑诀·剑斩月后，长按普攻可触发<shuzhi>剑诀·雪连天</>。

<shuzhi>监兵</>任意普攻命中目标后，为目标添加<shuzhi>1</>层<shuzhi>晶裂</>状态，每秒造成<shuzhi>{12}%</>*攻击力普攻伤害，持续<shuzhi>15</>秒，同一目标每<shuzhi>4</>秒至多添加<shuzhi>1</>层，至多可添加<shuzhi>3</>层，持续时间结束后逐层衰减。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 6 attacks in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and knock the target back.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and draw in enemies to the front of the Wanderer.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</> and launch the target.
After triggering Sword Art: Mooncutter, tap and hold normal attack to trigger <shuzhi>Sword Art: Endless Snow</>.

After any of <shuzhi>Alabaster Tiger's</> normal attacks land a hit, apply <shuzhi>1</> stack of <shuzhi>Crystalline Crack</> to the target, dealing normal attack damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK every second for <shuzhi>15</> seconds. Only <shuzhi>1</> stack of Crystalline Crack can be applied to the same target every <shuzhi>4</> seconds, stacking up to <shuzhi>3</> times. The stacks will disappear one by one after the effect duration is over.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行六次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害。
第六次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{11}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use normal attack to launch 6 consecutive attacks in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面普攻时，长按普攻可触发剑诀·雪连天。
以念御剑，并消耗耐力，期间自身获得霸体效果，每次命中对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
剑诀 · 雪连天结束时释放一道强力剑气，命中对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While using normal attack on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Sword Art: Endless Snow.
Use mind control to manipulate the sword while consuming endurance, during which the Wanderer gains hyperbody. Every attack that lands deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets.
When Sword Art: Endless Snow ends, release a powerful sword aura, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻（存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，可触发剑诀·霜飘落。
下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，落地后对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Sword Art: Falling Frost.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> each time the target is hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者处于二段跳后的滞空时，点击跳跃可触发翩跹落，向高空短暂冲刺后持续滑行，滞空时翩跹落至多可使用<shuzhi>2</>次。
在地面时，翩跹落每<shuzhi>10</>秒回复<shuzhi>1</>次使用次数（切换场景/装卸<shuzhi>监兵</>后使用次数重置）。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While the Wanderer is airborne after double jumping, tap jump to trigger Light Steps. Briefly dash upward before continuously gliding. While airborne, Light Steps can be used up to <shuzhi>2</> times.
While on the ground, Light Steps recovers <shuzhi>1</> use attempt every <shuzhi>10</> seconds (switching areas, switching weapons, or unequipping <shuzhi>Alabaster Tiger</> will reset the use attempts).

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

Desc.SourceString: 方向键加闪避键触发的前闪避短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发剑诀·瀑流云，对命中目标至多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Sword Art: Cloud Shower, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets hit.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发剑诀·魄千寻，发出一道白虎幻影对前方目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Sword Art: Mortal Soul. Release a White Tiger illusion to deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to targets ahead.

Desc.SourceString:
对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害并吸附附近目标，之后结成剑阵唤来大量剑雨，并<shuzhi>强控冻结</>目标（巅峰联赛、对boss不生效）持续<shuzhi>4</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>30</>秒；
成功释放剑诀·凌玄影后使自身散发<shuzhi>寒气</>，每秒对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力伤害，并使目标移动速度降低<shuzhi>30%</>（巅峰联赛、对boss不生效），同时自身寒冰伤害提升<shuzhi>15%</>，持续<shuzhi>35</>秒；
释放剑诀·凌玄影完成后自身生成最大数量<shuzhi>冰刃</>，每<shuzhi>7.5</>秒对当前锁定目标发射<shuzhi>1</>柄，命中目标造成<shuzhi>{5}%</>*攻击力伤害与<shuzhi>温度降低</>效果，<shuzhi>冰刃</>初始至多可生成<shuzhi>3</>柄，非战斗状态下清除全部冰刃。
<shuzhi>温度降低</>：每<shuzhi>3</>秒对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力伤害，持续<shuzhi>12</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and draw them in. Then, form a Sword Array to summon a heavy rain of swords and <shuzhi>strongly freeze</> targets (unavailable in Apex League and against bosses) for <shuzhi>4</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.
After successfully using Sword Art: Shadowy Ice, the Wanderer emits <shuzhi>Cold Air</>, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to nearby targets every second, and also reducing the targets' speed by <shuzhi>30%</> (unavailable in Apex League and against bosses). At the same time, increase the Wanderer's frost damage by <shuzhi>15%</> for <shuzhi>35</> seconds.
After completely executing Sword Art: Shadowy Ice, the Wanderer creates the maximum amount of <shuzhi>Frost Blades</>, firing <shuzhi>1</> blade every <shuzhi>7.5</> seconds at the currently locked-on target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{5}%</> of ATK and inflicting <shuzhi>Temperature Reduction</> on the target. There can be up to <shuzhi>3</> <shuzhi>Frost Blades</> created initially, and all blades will be removed while in the non-combat state.
<shuzhi>Temperature Reduction</>: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK every <shuzhi>3</> seconds to nearby targets for <shuzhi>12</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，召唤剑阵使自身周围寒冷席卷，对附近目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，随后会召唤白虎造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
 <shuzhi>被动</>：剑诀·冰归啸命中后获得<shuzhi>15%</>最终伤害提升，持续<shuzhi>30</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and summon a Sword Array around the Wanderer, engulfing the area in cold and dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. Soon after, summon a White Tiger to deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>, during which damage immunity lasts for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).
<shuzhi>Passive</>: After Sword Art: Icy Beckon lands a hit, increase final damage by <shuzhi>15%</> for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 使用将戴上三重假面中的隐空面具，在大世界探索行动时，不会受到BOSS以外的怪物攻击，被部分怪物发现时将会触发探查，在佩戴隐空面具的状态下，对受面具影响下的怪物发动攻击不会引起其他怪物的围攻。再次使用三重假面可卸下当前面具，进入冷却，冷却时间<shuzhi>20</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Use to put on Triple Mask's Mask of the Void. While exploring the Overworld, you will not be attacked by enemies other than bosses. When discovered by certain enemies, detection will be triggered. While wearing Mask of the Void, enemies under the influence of the mask will not alert other enemies when attacked. Use Triple Mask again to remove the current mask and enter cooldown. Cooldown: <shuzhi>20</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use normal attack to launch 5 attacks in a row in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，使用第一/第二/第三至第四次普攻时，长按普攻可触发黯影爆破，并消耗耐力。
向前方发动进攻，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>/<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>/<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并浮空目标。
触发黯影爆破后，长按普攻可触发裂隙潮涌。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when using the first/second/third/fourth normal attack to trigger Darkshadow Blast and consume endurance.
Launch an attack ahead, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> / <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> / <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> to nearby targets and suspending them.
After triggering Darkshadow Blast, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Rift Surge.

Desc.SourceString:
触发黯影爆破后，长按普攻可触发裂隙潮涌，并消耗耐力。
向前方发动进攻，对附近目标至多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并浮空目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
After triggering Darkshadow Blast, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Rift Surge and consume endurance.
Launch an attack ahead, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and suspending them.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，使用第一/第二/第三至四次普攻时，长按普攻可触发黯影空爆，并消耗耐力。
向前方发动进攻，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>/<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>/<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并浮空目标。
触发黯影空爆后，长按普攻可触发裂隙喷涌。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, tap and hold normal attack when using the first/second/third/fourth normal attack to trigger Darkshadow Burst and consume endurance.
Launch an attack ahead, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> / <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> / <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> to nearby targets and suspending them.
After triggering Darkshadow Burst, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Rift Eruption.

Desc.SourceString:
触发黯影空爆后，长按普攻可触发裂隙潮涌，并消耗耐力。
向前方发动进攻，对附近目标至多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并浮空目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
After triggering Darkshadow Burst, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Rift Surge and consume endurance.
Launch an attack ahead, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets and suspending them.

Desc.SourceString: 在地面时，长按普攻可在当前位置生成一个渊流，点击地图上的标记点可传送至该点位，或对该标记点进行设置，渊流至多可生成<shuzhi>2</>个。
Desc.LocalizedString: While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to create an abyss current at the current location. Tap the mark on the map to transmit to that location, or to change the settings for that abyss current. Up to <shuzhi>2</> abyss currents may be created.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

Desc.SourceString:
任意闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发涡旋力场。
在目标位置生成暗物质，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，当附近目标经过暗物质时，会形成涡旋力场吸附目标。
自身途经涡旋力场时，自身获得持续<shuzhi>15</>秒的次元守护，可抵挡<shuzhi>1</>次来自锁定目标的伤害（不高于自身<shuzhi>300%</>最大生命值），次元守护每<shuzhi>15</>秒至多获得<shuzhi>1</>次。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Vortex Field.
Create Dark Matter at the target location, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets. When nearby targets come close to the Dark Matter, a Vortex Field will form and draw them in.
When the Wanderer passes by the Vortex Field, gain Dimensional Guard for <shuzhi>15</> seconds, blocking damage from the locked-on target <shuzhi>1</> time (no more than <shuzhi>300%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP). Dimensional Guard can only be triggered <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>15</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
<shuzhi>[组队玩法]</>中，紫竹任意闪避后，召唤<shuzhi>1</>只蝴蝶跟随自身，持续<shuzhi>60</>秒。
自身激活强攻共鸣/均衡共鸣时：蝴蝶环绕当前锁定目标，飞行轨迹形成线谱，并对经过线谱的目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力伤害；
自身激活坚毅共鸣时：对经过线谱的目标添加<shuzhi>2</>秒<shuzhi>65%</>迟缓效果，对经过线谱的自身及队友添加<shuzhi>10%</>最大生命值护盾，每秒至多可添加<shuzhi>1</>次且至多可叠加<shuzhi>2</>层，持续<shuzhi>15</>秒；
自身激活恩赐共鸣时：当队友重伤倒地时，消耗蝴蝶立即扶起队友。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While in <shuzhi>team play</>, after dodging with Purple Bamboo, summon <shuzhi>1</> butterfly that follows the Wanderer for <shuzhi>60</> seconds.
After activating Attack Resonance or Balance Resonance, the butterfly flies around the locked-on target and creates a composition with its trails, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets that pass through it.
After activating Fortitude Resonance, place a <shuzhi>65%</> delay on targets that pass through the composition for <shuzhi>2</> seconds, and grant a shield equal to <shuzhi>10%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP to the Wanderer and teammates for <shuzhi>15</> seconds when they pass through the composition. This effect can occur up to <shuzhi>1</> time per second, stacking up to <shuzhi>2</> times.
After activating Benediction Resonance, consume the butterfly to immediately help up a knocked-down teammate.

Desc.SourceString:
激活超维领域，自身获得短暂无敌并对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并对目标添加<shuzhi>3</>秒<shuzhi>65%</>迟缓效果（组队玩法中对boss不生效），同时使场上<shuzhi>虚影</>立刻释放一次技能，冷却<shuzhi>60</>秒。
自身升空释放领域，使附近目标进入高维空间，高维空间至多持续<shuzhi>60</>秒，期间自身获得霸体效果，紫竹对高维空间内目标造成的伤害无视护盾。
高维空间每秒汇聚<shuzhi>2</>+空间内目标数*<shuzhi>1</>点能量，能量每汇聚满<shuzhi>45</>点后触发维度坍缩，对高维空间内目标造成（<shuzhi>0.06%</>*空间内自身（不包含虚影）累计实际伤害+<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力）伤害（视为基础倍率，受增伤效果影响），伤害类型视为被动伤害，维度坍缩至多<shuzhi>4</>次后高维空间消失。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Activate the Hyperdimensional Field, gaining temporary invincibility, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets, and placing a <shuzhi>65%</> delay for <shuzhi>3</> seconds on the targets (ineffective against bosses in team play). Also, trigger <shuzhi>Void Trace</> to use an ability. Cooldown: <shuzhi>60</> seconds.
Ascend into the air and generate a field, placing nearby targets into a High-Dimensional Space that lasts up to <shuzhi>60</> seconds, during which the Wanderer gains hyperbody, and Purple Bamboo's damage dealt to targets in the High-Dimensional Space ignores shields.
The High-Dimensional Space gains energy equal to <shuzhi>2</> plus <shuzhi>number of targets</> every second in the Space, and triggers Dimensional Collapse at <shuzhi>45</> energy, dealing damage equal to (<shuzhi>0.06%</> of actual damage dealt by the Wanderer (excluding Void Trace) plus <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK) to targets in the Space (counted as base multiplier, affected by damage boost). Counts as passive damage. The High-Dimensional Space fades after <shuzhi>4</> Dimensional Collapses.

Desc.SourceString:
当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，从次元中生成锁链束缚目标，添加<shuzhi>3</>秒<shuzhi>65%</>迟缓效果（组队玩法中对boss不生效），并对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。

<shuzhi>被动：虚影</>
调谐禁锢可在场上生成<shuzhi>1</>具虚影，协同攻击当前锁定目标，场上至多可存在<shuzhi>1</>具虚影，非战斗状态下虚影持续<shuzhi>20</>秒。
每装备<shuzhi>1</>把不同元素武器或异能武器，虚影伤害提升<shuzhi>10%</>，此外，虚影伤害不受除寄宿效果、谐调禁锢效果、泰坦装备稀有属性以外的增伤效果影响，也不会触发额外攻击效果。
<shuzhi>紫竹</>闪避长按可触发降神效果（巅峰联赛不生效），自身附身于虚影之上，可操控虚影移动，同时虚影协同替换为虚影普攻与虚影技能。
降神后虚影进入狂暴状态，移动速度、受到伤害降低、破防值、充能值提升<shuzhi>50%</>，虚影普攻、虚影技能造成的伤害额外提升虚影当前已损失最大生命值百分比。
<shuzhi>虚影协同</>：间歇性的协同攻击，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%~{3}%</>*虚影攻击力伤害；
<shuzhi>虚影光环</>：每秒对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*虚影攻击力伤害；
<shuzhi>虚影普攻</>：点击普攻连续进行的四次攻击，每次攻击对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{5}%~{6}%</>*虚影攻击力伤害；
<shuzhi>虚影技能</>：消耗<shuzhi>25%</>虚影最大生命值，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{7}%~{8}%</>*虚影攻击力伤害，同时自身在<shuzhi>60</>秒内暴击率提高<shuzhi>30%</>；
<shuzhi>虚影解除</>：虚影受到致命伤害、玩家装卸紫竹、降神状态下长按任意闪避可触发虚影解除。

<shuzhi>被动：暝伥</>
从其它武器切换至紫竹后，根据该武器的元素类型，调谐禁锢将额外提供不同效果。
<shuzhi>寒冰</>：召唤晦暝 · 白虎精英，造成<shuzhi>{9}%</>*攻击力点范围伤害，自身获得<shuzhi>60%</>最大生命值护盾，持续<shuzhi>30</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。同时在锁定目标附近生成冰暴，每秒对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力伤害，伤害类型视为普攻伤害，持续<shuzhi>60</>秒；
<shuzhi>火焰</>：召唤暝伥 · 玄鸦，造成<shuzhi>{11}%</>*攻击力点范围伤害，对附近目标添加灼烧，每秒造成<shuzhi>{12}%</>*攻击力伤害，持续<shuzhi>10</>秒，伤害类型视为被动伤害；
<shuzhi>雷电</>：召唤暝伥 · 龙骧，造成<shuzhi>{13}%</>*攻击力点伤害，非降神期间每秒消耗<shuzhi>5%</>虚影最大生命值，对附近目标造成等额伤害，伤害类型视为普攻伤害（巅峰联赛不生效）；
<shuzhi>物理</>：召唤晦暝 · 狰，造成<shuzhi>{14}%</>*攻击力点范围伤害，自身获得<shuzhi>30</>秒横扫效果，暴击时对附近目标额外造成<shuzhi>{15}%</>*攻击力伤害，伤害类型视为普攻伤害，每<shuzhi>0.85</>秒至多触发<shuzhi>1</>次；
<shuzhi>异能</>：召唤晦暝 · 饕餮，造成<shuzhi>{16}%</>*攻击力点范围伤害，虚影额外继承玩家<shuzhi>100%</>攻击力，虚影解除时会额外对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{17}%</>*虚影攻击力伤害，伤害类型视为技能伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the wielder</> and create chains from another dimension to bind the target upon switching to this weapon, delaying them by <shuzhi>65%</> for <shuzhi>3</> seconds (ineffective against bosses in team play), dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby targets, and becoming immune to damage for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

<shuzhi>Passive: Void Trace</>
Confining Tune creates <shuzhi>1</> Void Trace that launches coordinated attacks at the current locked-on target. Only <shuzhi>1</> Void Trace may be active, and it fades after <shuzhi>20</> seconds when not in combat.
For every <shuzhi>1</> weapon of a different element or altered weapon equipped, increase Void Trace's damage dealt by <shuzhi>10%</>. Void Trace's damage is also not affected by damage boosts, except for Inhabit, Confining Tune, and rare stats on titan equipment, and won't trigger additional attack effects.
Hold dodge when wielding <shuzhi>Purple Bamboo</> to trigger Possession (unavailable in Apex League) and Possess Void Trace, gaining the ability to control its movements. Coordinated Void becomes normal attack and skills.
While under Possession, Void Trace becomes frenzied, increasing speed, damage reduction, shatter, and weapon charge by <shuzhi>50%</>. Its normal attack and its skill damage increase by the same percentage as Max HP lost at the time.
<shuzhi>Coordinated Void</>: A periodic coordinated attack from Void Trace, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}% to {3}%</> of Void Trace's ATK.
<shuzhi>Void Halo</>: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of Void Trace's ATK every second to nearby targets.
<shuzhi>Void Attack</>: Tap normal attack to launch 4 consecutive attacks, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{5}% to {6}%</> of Void Trace's ATK.
<shuzhi>Void Skill</>: Consume <shuzhi>25%</> of Void Trace's Max HP and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{7}% to {8}%</> of Void Trace's ATK, increasing Void Trace's Crit Rate by <shuzhi>30%</> for <shuzhi>60</> seconds.
<shuzhi>Void Relief</>: Can be triggered when Void Trace takes lethal damage, when the Wanderer equips or unequips Purple Bamboo, or when holding dodge during Possession.

<shuzhi>Passive: Dark Wretch</>
When switching to Purple Bamboo from other weapons, Confining Tune will grant additional effects based on the element of the weapon.
<shuzhi>Frost</>: Summon Darkness: Alabaster Elite and deal area damage equal to <shuzhi>{9}%</> of ATK. Also, gain a shield equal to <shuzhi>60%</> of Max HP for <shuzhi>30</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League). Create a hail storm by the locked-on target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK to nearby targets every second for <shuzhi>60</> seconds. Counts as normal attack damage.
<shuzhi>Flame</>: Summon Black Crow Dark Wretch and deal area damage equal to <shuzhi>{11}%</> of ATK. Burn nearby targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK every second for <shuzhi>10</> seconds. Counts as passive damage.
<shuzhi>Volt</>: Summon Longxiang Dark Wretch and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{13}%</> of ATK. When not under Possession, consume <shuzhi>5%</> of Void Trace's Max HP every second and deal the same damage to nearby targets. Counts as normal attack damage (unavailable in Apex League).
<shuzhi>Physical</>: Summon Darkness: Hornmane and deal area damage equal to <shuzhi>{14}%</> of ATK. Gain sweeping for <shuzhi>30</> seconds, dealing additional damage equal to <shuzhi>{15}%</> of ATK to nearby targets on a critical hit. Counts as normal attack damage. Can only be triggered <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>0.85</> seconds.
<shuzhi>Altered</>: Summon Darkness: Taotie and deal area damage equal to <shuzhi>{16}%</> of ATK. Void Trace inherits an additional <shuzhi>100%</> of the Wanderer's ATK. Deal additional damage equal to <shuzhi>{17}%</> of Void Trace's ATK to nearby targets during Void Relief. Counts as skill damage.

Desc.SourceString: 立刻对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并且向四周射出<shuzhi>6</>个回旋飞刃，每个飞刃造成<shuzhi>{1}%</>*攻击力的伤害，释放的飞刃在外停留较长时间，冷却<shuzhi>25</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target immediately and fire <shuzhi>6</> returning blades, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK and lingering for an extended period of time. Cooldown: <shuzhi>25</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，挥舞双刀可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第五次攻击会同时向前扔出一轮飞刃，最多造成<shuzhi>{9}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
使用普攻命中目标背部时，可触发目标流血，对目标每秒造成<shuzhi>8%</>*攻击力的伤害，持续30秒，不可叠加。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Swing Dual Blades to unleash five consecutive strikes while on the ground.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back slightly.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back slightly.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back slightly.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back slightly.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back slightly.
 The fifth strike also throws Flying Blades forward, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{9}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back slightly.
 Inflicts Bleed on targets when hitting them from behind with Normal Attack, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>8%</> of ATK for 30s. Unstackable.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，点击普攻可在空中连续进行4次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne or after jumping 1 time, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row in mid-air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
普攻第三下后，长按普攻可触发闪击。
命中目标会<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标，总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack to trigger Rapid Lunge after the third hit.
<shuzhi>Suspends</> the target upon hit, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻(存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，会触发旋转利刃。
下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack while airborne (press when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Spiral Drive.
Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK with each hit while falling.

Desc.SourceString: 处于下蹲状态时靠近敌人身后，点击普攻可触发偷袭，双刀刺击，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to trigger Sneak Attack and stab with dual blades, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
使用方向键加闪避按钮触发前闪避的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发飞刃。
对单个目标瞬切斩多次，总共造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，瞬切斩过程中免疫控制效果。并且在随后的<shuzhi>30</>秒内，使用疾雷双刃时提升<shuzhi>10%</>暴击率。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Flying Blades.
Phase a target several times, dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK. Gain immunity to control effects while phasing, and in the next <shuzhi>30</> seconds, increase crit rate by <shuzhi>10%</> while using Thunderblades.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却15秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，闪烁到目标位置发动攻击，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，同时给目标添加电刑效果（<shuzhi>5</>秒后额外造成已损失血量<shuzhi>15%</>的雷电伤害，最高不超过拓荒者攻击力的<shuzhi>350%</>，并掷出<shuzhi>3</>个飞刃围绕拓荒者旋转，对每次触碰的目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and blink to the target location to attack, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and electrocuting the target (after <shuzhi>5</> seconds, deal additional volt damage equal to <shuzhi>15%</> of the HP lost, up to <shuzhi>350%</> of the Wanderer's ATK). Toss <shuzhi>3</> flying blades that orbit around the Wanderer, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to those that touch them. Meanwhile, gain hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5 seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，挥舞短剑可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害，造成<shuzhi>击飞</>效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, swing the dagger to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK and <shuzhi>launch</> the target.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空后，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并造成<shuzhi>强控击倒</>效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK and deliver a <shuzhi>knockdown</>.

Desc.SourceString:
普攻后长按可触发气旋。
命中目标会浮空目标，气旋可对单个目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold the normal attack button after normal attacks to trigger Cyclone.
Upon hit, suspend the target and deal <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to a single target.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻，攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，会触发落斩。
下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害；落地时对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击退目标。
触发时离地距离越高，伤害越高，最高可达<shuzhi>600%</>伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne, or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Diving Edge.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK upon each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to surrounding targets and knock them back.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

Desc.SourceString: 处于下蹲状态时靠近敌人身后，点击普攻可触发偷袭，刺出短剑，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to trigger Sneak Attack and stab with the dagger, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却25秒，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of targets within the area. Cooldown: 25 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发飞身一击。
拓荒者向前挥刀冲刺对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标并使自己滞空，再次对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Leap Attack.
The Wanderer swings their blade forward and deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target, <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> them while going airborne. Then, deal additional damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target.

Desc.SourceString:
挥舞短剑穿梭于目标之间，最多可对<shuzhi>5</>个目标总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，技能期间免疫控制效果，且受到伤害减少<shuzhi>50%</>，对同一目标造成的伤害依次递减<shuzhi>20%</>，穿梭完成后斩击前方空间，造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的范围伤害，并浮空目标，冷却<shuzhi>20</>秒。
技能每次对敌人造成伤害后，获得一层“气势”效果，每层持续<shuzhi>60</>秒，最多<shuzhi>14</>层，层数叠满后，获得“御气”效果：短剑普攻伤害提升<shuzhi>{1}%</>，持续<shuzhi>{3}</>秒，飞击、气旋和落斩伤害提高<shuzhi>{1}%</>，持续<shuzhi>{4}</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Swings the blade while roaming through targets, dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to up to <shuzhi>5</> targets (damage dealt by each consecutive hit on the same target will be reduced by <shuzhi>20%</> from the previous hit). After Roam has concluded, slash the space in front, dealing AoE damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK and suspending targets hit. Grants immunity to control effects while skill is in use, and reduces all damage taken by <shuzhi>50%</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>20</>s.
 Grants 1 stack of Power Surge upon damaging enemies with skills, lasting for <shuzhi>60</>s and up to <shuzhi>14</> stacks. Grants Vital Drive at full stacks, increasing Normal Attack damage using sword by <shuzhi>{1}%</> for <shuzhi>{3}</>s, and the damage of Jumping Strike, Cyclone, and Diving Edge by <shuzhi>{1}%</> for <shuzhi>{4}</>s.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，冲向目标并将目标<shuzhi>强控浮空</>，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，同时留下剑刃风暴，对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，自身在<shuzhi>5</>秒内免疫重伤/冰冻/灼烧/感电效果，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</>, then rush to the target and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> them, dealing <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK, leaving behind a Bladestorm that deals <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK, while gaining immunity to grievous/freeze/burn/electrify effects for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. Meanwhile, gain hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5 seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，冲向目标并将目标<shuzhi>强控浮空</>，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，同时留下剑刃风暴，对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，自身在<shuzhi>5</>秒内免疫重伤/冰冻/灼烧/感电效果，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Authorizer</> and allow the Authorizer to rush to the target, <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> the target and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. A bladestorm follows, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>. Gain immunity to Grievous, Freeze, Burn, and Electrify effects for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，挥舞大剑可连续进行四次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害，造成<shuzhi>强控击飞</>，落地并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, swing the greatsword to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK, <shuzhi>strongly launch</> the target, then launch them upon landing.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，点击普攻可在空中连续进行四次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害，造成<shuzhi>强控击倒</>，落地并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK and <shuzhi>knockdown</> the target, then launch them upon landing.

Desc.SourceString:
普攻第三下后，长按普攻可触发腾空斩。
命中目标会<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标并使拓荒者滞空，总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
腾空斩每段攻击均为自己附加一层“霜寒”效果，最多<shuzhi>2</>层，累积<shuzhi>2</>层后获得“冰风”效果，释放落月斩后回复<shuzhi>250</>点耐力。
Desc.LocalizedString:
After the third normal attack, hold normal attack to trigger Rising Slash.
Upon hit, <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target and go airborne, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</>of ATK.
Each Rising Slash attack places a stack of Icy Chill, stacking up to <shuzhi>2</> times. Upon accumulating <shuzhi>2</> stacks, the Wanderer gains the Glacial Wind effect, recovering <shuzhi>250</> endurance after using Moonset Slash.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻(存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，触发落月斩。
下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害；落地时对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，造成击飞效果。
触发时离地距离越高，伤害越高，最高可达<shuzhi>600%</>伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack while airborne (press when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Moonset Slash.
Each hit deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK while falling. Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK and knocks surrounding targets up upon landing.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

Desc.SourceString: 处于下蹲状态时靠近敌人身后，点击普攻可触发偷袭，大剑劈斩，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to trigger Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString: 当拓荒者处于站立或移动状态时，长按普攻，可触发旋风斩，每<shuzhi>0.5</>秒对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Hold Normal Attack to trigger Whirlwind while standing still or moving, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK every <shuzhi>0.5</>s to the target.

Desc.SourceString: 冰冷的寒气能够冻结玩家自身周围的水面，仅“蔷薇之锋”处于前台时生效。
Desc.LocalizedString: Freeze the water nearby the Wanderer with chilling air. Only effective while Rosy Edge is in the main slot.

Desc.SourceString: 连续挥舞大剑，对身前范围发射剑气，每次造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力伤害，技能期间免疫控制效果。每次造成伤害获得一层抗性提升效果（提升值根据角色等级变化，且冰抗获得额外提升），最多叠加9层，持续<shuzhi>40</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>45</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Swing the greatsword consecutively and launch sword auras forward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK each time. While the skill is active, become immune to control effects. When dealing damage each time, gain 1 stack of resistance boost (based on Wanderer's Level) and additional frost resistance for <shuzhi>40</> seconds, stacking up to 9 times. Cooldown: <shuzhi>45</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，并获得<shuzhi>15%</>最大生命值百分比的护盾，持续<shuzhi>9</>秒。重击地面，形成冰墙，对范围内敌人造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并浮空目标，附带<shuzhi>50%</>减速，且无法使用闪避和跳跃技能，冰墙可以阻挡子弹，冰墙持续<shuzhi>5</>秒，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
Desc.LocalizedString: <red>Removes all carried debuffs</> when <shuzhi>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered upon switching to this weapon, then grants a shield equal to <shuzhi>15%</> of Max HP for <shuzhi>9</>s. Smashes the ground to form an ice barrier, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to enemies in range, suspending them, reducing their Speed by <shuzhi>50%</>, and preventing them from dodging or jumping. The ice barrier blocks projectiles and lasts for <shuzhi>5</>s. Grants Hyperbody and a shield worth 5% of Max HP for 3.5s.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却25秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of targets in the area. Cooldown: 25 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
使用方向键加闪避按钮触发前闪避的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发破斩。
破斩命中目标总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并造成<shuzhi>击飞</>效果。
释放破斩后，获得“耐力消耗降低”效果，降低<shuzhi>{1}%</>耐力消耗，仅蔷薇之锋处于前台时生效，持续<shuzhi>20</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Devastate.
Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK in total and <shuzhi>launch</> targets.
After using Devastate, reduce endurance consumption by <shuzhi>{1}%</> for <shuzhi>20</> seconds. Only effective while Rosy Edge is in the main slot.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发半月斩。
挥舞大剑向前方斩出剑气，每道剑气造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
释放半月斩后，获得“耐力消耗降低”效果，降低<shuzhi>{1}%</>耐力消耗，仅蔷薇之锋处于前台时生效，持续<shuzhi>20</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Crescent Slash.
Swing the greatsword to unleash sword auras forward, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.
After using Crescent Slash, reduce endurance consumption by <shuzhi>{1}%</> for <shuzhi>20</> seconds. Only effective while Rosy Edge is in the main slot.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第五次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 5 attacks in a row.
First Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.
Second Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK.
Third Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK.
Fourth Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK.
Fifth Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString: 长按普攻，进入蓄力攻击状态，松手时发射子弹，可对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害;<shuzhi>18</>秒后（或目标死亡时）爆炸，对附近的敌方单位造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力伤害，期间目标每受到钴蓝<shuzhi>5</>次伤害，伤害范围扩大一倍（最多扩大<shuzhi>3</>次），并提升伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Tap and hold normal attack to charge an attack and release to fire rounds, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK, plus an explosion <shuzhi>18</> seconds later (or if the target is defeated), dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to nearby enemies. Every <shuzhi>5</> times the target takes damage from Cobalt-B, the damaging range is doubled (up to <shuzhi>3</> times) and the damage dealt is increased.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，可以发动跳跃攻击。
向前方扔出一枚炸弹，对前方圆形范围内的敌人造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标，消耗<shuzhi>250</>点耐力。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne or after jumping once, launch Jumping Blast.
Toss a bomb forward that deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to enemies in a circle ahead, knocking them back a short distance. Consume <shuzhi>250</> endurance.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者使用二段跳之后，可以在空中发动空中攻击。
向下方发射出一道原能光线，并向前扫射，对扫过的敌人造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
After double-jumping, launch Aerial Discharge in mid-air.
Fire an Omnium beam downward. The beam then sweeps forward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to enemies affected.

Desc.SourceString: 在普通攻击过程中，长按普攻，向前方扫射，对扫过的敌人总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的范围伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Tap and hold normal attack during a normal attack to unleash Suppressing Fire in front, dealing area damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to enemies affected in total.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
On the ground, use normal attack to launch 5 attacks in a row.
The first attack deals total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.
The second attack deals total damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</>.
The third attack deals total damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</>.
The fourth attack deals total damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</> .
The fifth attack deals total damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</>.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，向前方发出<shuzhi>3</>枚榴弹，命中总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的范围伤害，附带<shuzhi>击飞</>效果，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and throw <shuzhi>3</> grenades forward, dealing AoE damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK in total and <shuzhi>launching</> the target. Meanwhile, gain hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5 seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却25秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of targets in the area. Cooldown: 25 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避后立刻使用普通攻击可触发近身破击。
对身前扇形范围内的目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack right after dodging to trigger Close Quarters.
Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets in a frontal cone area.

Desc.SourceString: 对正前方扇形范围内的目标持续射击，总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，冷却<shuzhi>25</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Continuously shoot targets in a frontal cone area, dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK. Cooldown: <shuzhi>25</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 对正前方扇形范围内的目标持续射击，总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，冷却<shuzhi>60</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Continuously inflict damage in a frontal cone area, dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>60</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，挥舞镰刀可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害，<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标并使拓荒者滞空。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, swing the scythe to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK, and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK, <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target and go airborne.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，在空中连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并将目标击落，触发时离地距离越高，伤害越高，最高可达<shuzhi>600%</>伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne or after jumping once, attack 5 times in a row in mid-air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK, and knock the target down. The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the more damage is dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻(存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，触发飞镰重击。
下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害；落地时对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并造成<shuzhi>强控击倒</>效果。
触发时离地距离越高，伤害越高，最高可达<shuzhi>600%</>伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Asunder.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK with each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to surrounding targets and deliver a <shuzhi>knockdown</>.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

Desc.SourceString:
普攻第四下后，长按普攻可触发回旋链刃。
切换为链刃状态，对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并将附近的怪物拉扯至身边。
Desc.LocalizedString:
After the fourth normal attack, tap and hold the normal attack button to trigger Returning Chainblade.
Transform into a chainblade, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to surrounding targets and pulling them in.

Desc.SourceString: 处于下蹲状态时靠近敌人身后，点击普攻可触发偷袭，挥舞镰刀，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to trigger Sneak Attack and swing the scythe, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
使用方向键加闪避按钮触发前闪避的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发闪击。
命中目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并将附近的怪物拉扯至身边。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Rapid Lunge.
Deal up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and pull in nearby enemies.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避时在原地召唤蝙蝠领域，将目标拉扯至中心。闪避时的短暂时间内点击普攻，挥舞镰刀，对身前目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: When dodging, summon a domain of the bat that pulls the target into the center. Tap normal attack during the short period after dodging to swing the scythe, dealing <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，形成焰镰领域，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，领域存在<shuzhi>10</>秒，每隔<shuzhi>2</>秒生成焰镰，焰镰会牵引岩浆，形成熔岩喷发，造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害与浮空，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and create a Flaming Scythe Domain, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK. Lasts for <shuzhi>10</> seconds. Additionally, spawn a Flaming Scythe every <shuzhi>2</> seconds. The scythes summon volcanic eruptions from the ground, which deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to targets and suspend them. Meanwhile, gain hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5 seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，形成焰镰领域，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，领域存在<shuzhi>10</>秒，每隔<shuzhi>2</>秒生成焰镰，焰镰会牵引岩浆，形成熔岩喷发，造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害与浮空，技能期间免疫伤害持续<shuzhi>2.6</>秒（巅峰联赛不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Authorizer</> and create a Flaming Scythe field, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. The field lasts for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, in which volcanic eruptions occur every <shuzhi>2</> seconds, knocking enemies airborne and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>. During the skill, gains damage immunity for <shuzhi>2.6</> seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString: 挥舞镰刀，超大范围切斩，对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，冷却<shuzhi>30</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Wield the scythe in a wide-area sweep, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to surrounding targets. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 挥舞镰刀，超大范围切斩，对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，冷却<shuzhi>45</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Swing the scythe, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>45</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时点击普攻，操控斯帕克可连续进行5次攻击。
第一次攻击对每个目标总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对每个目标总计造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对每个目标总计造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对每个目标总计造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第五次攻击对每个目标总计造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并造成<shuzhi>击飞</>效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, tap the normal attack button to command Spark to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK against each target.
Second Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK against each target.
Third Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK against each target.
Fourth Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK against each target.
Fifth Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK against each target and <shuzhi>launches</> them.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时点击普攻，操控斯帕克可连续进行4次攻击。
第一次攻击对每个目标总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对每个目标总计造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对每个目标总计造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对每个目标总计造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, tap the normal attack button to command Spark to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK against each target.
Second Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK against each target.
Third Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK against each target.
Fourth Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK against each target.

Desc.SourceString: 长按普攻或者在触发“禁锢领域”后长按普攻，持续射出火焰光束对瞄准方向的目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害并消耗耐力。对处于“禁锢领域”中的目标造成伤害提升<shuzhi>50%</>
Desc.LocalizedString: Tap and hold normal attack, or do so after triggering Lockdown Zone to continuously fire searing energy beams at enemies in a target direction, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and consuming endurance. Increase damage by <shuzhi>50%</> to targets within Lockdown Zone.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻，触发火焰坠落。
被能量体包裹，快速坠落至地面，对周围的目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne to trigger Blazing Dive.
Envelop the body in energy before rapidly plunging into the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString: 普攻第二段后任意段长按，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并将锁定目标禁锢（非强控）并灼烧<shuzhi>4</>秒（对玩家生效时间减半），每秒造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害（对boss不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: After the second normal attack, hold the button during any attack to deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target. The locked-on target is confined and burned for <shuzhi>4</> seconds (duration is halved against Wanderers), and damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK is dealt to the target every second (ineffective against bosses).

Desc.SourceString: 斯帕克向前方射出【火花】存在12秒，在目标和玩家之间反弹，距离越远伤害越高，命中敌人最多可造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害并施加【炙热】标记持续<shuzhi>4</>秒（炙热标志对同一个目标在12秒内无法再次添加），同时释放4颗子弹，每颗子弹对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害；斯帕克对【炙热】标记的目标普攻伤害提高<shuzhi>{1}%</>。若目标存在斯帕克施加的灼烧，则在【火花】命中时触发一次灼烧和火元素点燃剩余总伤害<shuzhi>{3}%</>的额外伤害（仅计算由斯帕克添加的灼烧效果）结算冷却<shuzhi>5</>秒，技能冷却<shuzhi>40</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Spark fires out Sparks forward that last for 12 seconds, bouncing between the target and the Wanderer. The damage increases with the distance traveled, up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK. Targets hit receive an Emblazen mark for <shuzhi>4</> seconds, which cannot be reapplied to the same target within 12 seconds. At the same time, Spark fires 4 bullets, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK. Spark's normal attacks deal <shuzhi>{1}%</> more damage to targets marked with Emblazen. If the target is under burn effect inflicted by Spark, being hit by Sparks will trigger the burn effect 1 time and ignite, causing additional damage equal to <shuzhi>{3}%</> of the total remaining damage (only accounting for the burn effects applied by Spark). Tally cooldown: <shuzhi>5</> seconds. Skill cooldown: <shuzhi>40</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避后，将多莉抛出并存在<shuzhi>10</>秒，吸附附近敌人造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害并嘲讽敌人<shuzhi>2</>秒（嘲讽在组队状态下不生效），使其转向攻击多莉。
Desc.LocalizedString: Throw Dolly after dodging. Dolly remains for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, drawing in nearby enemies, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and taunting them for <shuzhi>2</> seconds, causing them to divert their attacks to Dolly (cannot taunt enemies when in a team).

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，斯帕克开启蓄力形态，持续向前方射出大范围火焰光束，并在结束时爆炸，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害；爆炸时给所有伤害目标添加灼烧效果，每秒造成<shuzhi>{1}%</>*攻击力的伤害，持续<shuzhi>{2}</>秒，该灼烧效果属于连携伤害，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</>. Spark enters a charged state, continuously blasting wide-area searing energy beams forward, ending with an explosion, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK. The beams inflict burn to all targets hit upon explosion, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK per second for <shuzhi>{2}</> seconds. The burning effect is counted as discharge damage. Meanwhile, gain hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5 seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 斯帕克向前方射出【火花】存在12秒，在目标和玩家之间反弹，距离越远伤害越高，命中敌人最多可造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害并施加【炙热】标记持续<shuzhi>4</>秒（炙热标志对同一个目标在12秒内无法再次添加），同时释放4颗子弹，每颗子弹对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害；斯帕克对【炙热】标记的目标普攻伤害提高<shuzhi>{1}%</>。若目标存在斯帕克施加的灼烧，则在【火花】命中时触发一次灼烧和火元素点燃剩余总伤害<shuzhi>{3}%</>的额外伤害（仅计算由斯帕克添加的灼烧效果）结算冷却<shuzhi>5</>秒，技能冷却<shuzhi>40</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Spark fires out Sparks forward that last for 12 seconds, bouncing between the target and the Wanderer. The damage increases with the distance traveled, up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK. Targets hit receive an Emblazen mark for <shuzhi>4</> seconds, which cannot be reapplied to the same target within 12 seconds. At the same time, Spark fires 4 bullets, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK. Spark's normal attacks deal <shuzhi>{1}%</> more damage to targets marked with Emblazen. If the target is under burn effect inflicted by Spark, being hit by Sparks will trigger the burn effect 1 time and ignite, causing additional damage equal to <shuzhi>{3}%</> of the total remaining damage (only accounting for the burn effects applied by Spark). Tally cooldown: <shuzhi>5</> seconds. Skill cooldown: <shuzhi>40</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 斯帕克向前方射出【火花】存在12秒，在目标和玩家之间反弹，距离越远伤害越高，命中敌人最多可造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害并施加【炙热】标记持续<shuzhi>4</>秒（炙热标志对同一个目标在12秒内无法再次添加），同时释放4颗子弹，每颗子弹对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害；斯帕克对【炙热】标记的目标普攻伤害提高<shuzhi>{1}%</>。若目标存在斯帕克施加的灼烧，则在【火花】命中时触发一次灼烧和火元素点燃剩余总伤害<shuzhi>{3}%</>的额外伤害（仅计算由斯帕克添加的灼烧效果）结算冷却<shuzhi>5</>秒，技能冷却<shuzhi>40</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Spark fires out Sparks forward that last for 12 seconds, bouncing between the target and the Wanderer. The damage increases with the distance traveled, up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK. Targets hit receive an Emblazen mark for <shuzhi>4</> seconds, which cannot be reapplied to the same target within 12 seconds. At the same time, Spark fires 4 bullets, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK. Spark's normal attacks deal <shuzhi>{1}%</> more damage to targets marked with Emblazen. If the target is under burn effect inflicted by Spark, being hit by Sparks will trigger the burn effect 1 time and ignite, causing additional damage equal to <shuzhi>{3}%</> of the total remaining damage (only accounting for the burn effects applied by Spark). Tally cooldown: <shuzhi>5</> seconds. Skill cooldown: <shuzhi>40</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，使用流泉彻心进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use Heartstream to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK and launch the target.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne or after jumping 1 time, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
动心流模式下，普通攻击中，长按普攻可触发。
向前冲刺并旋转自身进行多段攻击，对目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack to trigger the skill while in Excited Flow mode.
Dashes forward with a swirling multi-attack, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.

Desc.SourceString:
静心流模式下，普通攻击中或立即长按普攻可触发。
长按攻击键保持蓄势，松开攻击键对目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。攻击判定期间受到攻击，可格挡自身最大生命值<shuzhi>{1}%</>的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
In the Silent Flow mode, hold normal attack immediately or while launching normal attacks to trigger the skill.
Hold attack to keep the Anticipation. Release to deal damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target. When hit during the attacking period, block damage up to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of Max HP.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻，攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻可触发。
下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害；落地时对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack while airborne, or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger.
Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK each hit while falling. Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to surrounding targets upon landing.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却25秒，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of targets within the area. Cooldown: 25 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
向前闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻。
冲刺并转身攻击目标，共造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap normal attack during the short period after dodging.
Dash and spin to attack the target, dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString: 向目标方向突进并短暂定身路径上的敌方，延迟对路径上的敌方造成至多<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并回复<shuzhi>{1}%</>技能伤害的生命值，冷却<shuzhi>25</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dash toward the target and temporarily immobilize enemies along the path, dealing delayed damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and recovering HP equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of skill damage. Cooldown: <shuzhi>25</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
释放静心流技能进入蓄力状态，持续嘲讽周围目标，最多蓄力<shuzhi>3</>秒，蓄力期间吸收伤害，最多吸收<shuzhi>{4}%</>最大生命值伤害，蓄力结束时根据吸收的伤害量对目标造成一次<shuzhi>{9}%</>*冰攻+<shuzhi>{5}%</>*吸收的伤害量的寒冰伤害，冷却<shuzhi>25</>秒。

激活坚毅共鸣时进入静心流状态，<shuzhi>动心流·凝泉掠影</>替换为<shuzhi>静心流·聚凝泉涌</>，非坚毅共鸣时为动心流状态
释放不破咲技能获得跟随自身的剑影，释放不破咲分支技或者连携技时剑影会释放【涌动】，对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*冰攻范围伤害，【涌动】冷却<shuzhi>{3}</>秒。
动心流状态下：玩家使用任意武器造成伤害时剑影释放【流转】，对首个命中的目标造成<shuzhi>{1}%</>*冰攻伤害并回复伤害值<shuzhi>{7}%</>的生命值，每次伤害吸血量不超过：攻击*技能倍率*1.25*吸血率，冷却<shuzhi>{6}</>秒。
静心流状态下：剑影释放【涌动】后，玩家获得<shuzhi>3</>次格挡能力，持续<shuzhi>10</>秒，格挡量最大不超过自身最大生命值的<shuzhi>{8}%</>，每次成功格挡对目标造成一次<shuzhi>{0}%</>*冰攻的【反击】伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use Silent Flow skills to begin charging for up to <shuzhi>3</> seconds, continuously taunting surrounding targets and absorbing damage up to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of Max HP. At the end of the charge, deal frost damage equal to <shuzhi>{9}%</> of frost ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}%</> of absorbed damage to targets. Cooldown: <shuzhi>25</> seconds.

Enter Silent Flow when Fortitude Resonance is activated. <shuzhi>Excited Flow: Flashing Stream</> is replaced by <shuzhi>Silent Flow: Concentrated Stream</>. Enter Excited Flow when Fortitude Resonance is not activated.
The Wanderer can gain Sword Shadow that follows them around when using Saki Fuwa's skills. Sword Shadow will release Surge when the Wanderer uses Saki Fuwa's branch skills or discharge skills, dealing area damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of frost ATK. Cooldown of Surge: <shuzhi>{3}</> seconds.
While in Excited Flow: Sword Shadow will release Flow when the Wanderer deals damage with any weapon, which deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of frost ATK on the first target hit and recovers HP equal to <shuzhi>{7}%</> of the damage. Each hit's maximum lifesteal cannot exceed: ATK × skill multiplier × 1.25 × lifesteal rate. Cooldown: <shuzhi>{6}</> seconds.
While in Silent Flow: After Sword Shadow releases Surge, the Wanderer gains <shuzhi>3</> blocks for <shuzhi>10</> seconds. The maximum block capacity cannot exceed <shuzhi>{8}%</> of Max HP. Each successful block deals Counterattack damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of frost ATK to the target.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，向目标冲刺并发动一套连击，共造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。同时获得大幅抗性提升（提升值根据角色等级变化），且冰抗获得额外提升，持续<shuzhi>{1}</>秒。同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and dash toward the target with a combo attack, dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK. Greatly increase resistance (based on the Wanderer's level) and gain an additional boost to frost resistance for <shuzhi>{1}</> seconds. Meanwhile, gain hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5 seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
寒冰切割：使用巴尔蒙克造成的所有伤害无视目标<shuzhi>{9}%</>的寒冰抗性。

在地面时，使用巴尔蒙克进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击倒目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Frost Slash: All damage dealt with Balmung ignores <shuzhi>{9}%</> of the target's frost resistance.

While on the ground, use Balmung to attack 5 times.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK and knock the target down.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne or after jumping 1 time, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
普通攻击中，长按普攻可触发凌空斩。
前冲一段距离横劈后再将目标攻击至浮空，自身随之滞空，对目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While using normal attack, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Soaring Slash.
Lunge forward with a horizontal swipe, then suspend the target before going airborne with the target. Deal damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻，攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，会触发螺旋切割。
下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害；落地时对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne, or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Helix Slash.
While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to surrounding targets.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发多重斩切。
在前方一定距离内产生多道斩切攻击，共造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Multislash.
Unleash multiple slashes at a set distance in front of the user, dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString: 斩切自身周围的空间，共造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，附带浮空和击飞效果，冷却<shuzhi>{1}</>秒。释放技能<shuzhi>“芬布尔之冬”</>后在自身周围形成大范围冰域，持续<shuzhi>{2}</>秒。冰域内使用巴尔蒙克闪避不消耗闪避次数。
Desc.LocalizedString: Slash the space around the Wanderer, dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK while suspending and launching targets. Cooldown: <shuzhi>{1}</> seconds.
