After using <shuzhi>Fimbulwinter</>, a large Frost Domain will be formed around the Wanderer for <shuzhi>{2}</> seconds. Dodge attempts will not be consumed while dodging with Balmung within the Frost Domain.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，向前方冲刺攻击，短暂控制周围的敌人后发起一道大范围的斩击，击飞命中的目标，共造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and dash forward and attack, temporarily controlling surrounding enemies before unleashing a wide-area slash. Launch targets into the air and deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK. Meanwhile, gain hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5 seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发多重斩切。
在前方一定距离内产生多道斩切攻击，共造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap normal attack during the short perfect dodge window to trigger Multislash.
Unleash multiple slashes at a set distance in front of the user, dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
使用方向键加闪避按钮触发前闪避的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发上挑。
将目标挑至浮空，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Rising Cut.
Deal damage to a suspended target equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，挥舞法杖可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害。

While on the ground, swing the staff to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.

Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK.

First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻，会触发落月击。
落地时对周围目标每<shuzhi>0.2</>秒造成一次伤害，共计<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne to trigger Moonfall.
Upon landing, deal damage once every <shuzhi>0.2</> seconds to surrounding targets, for a total of <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
普攻第三下后，长按普攻可触发分支攻击，消耗<shuzhi>350</>点耐力。
第一下分支将前方附近的怪物聚拢并<shuzhi>强制浮空</>，最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二下分支对目标位置及其附近的敌方单位最多造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并降低敌方<shuzhi>{3}%</>移动速度，持续3秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
After the third normal attack, tap and hold the normal attack button to trigger branch attacks, consuming <shuzhi>350</> points of endurance.
First Attack: Pull in enemies in front of the user, <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> them and dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.
Second Attack: Deal damage up to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK at the target location and to nearby enemies, reducing enemies' speed by <shuzhi>{3}%</> for 3 seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却25秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of targets in the area. Cooldown: 25 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
使用方向键加闪避按钮触发前闪避的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发涌现。
释放能量波动命中目标最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Surge.
Energy pulse deals damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets hit.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发后闪攻击。
拓荒者向前放释放一个能量球，对经过的敌方单位最多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Evasive Blast.
Fire an energy orb forward, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets in its path.

Desc.SourceString:
释放治疗领域，持续治疗周围的全体队友，跟随拓荒者移动，每<shuzhi>0.5</>秒治疗一次，每次治疗<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的的生命，持续<shuzhi>6</>秒，治疗领域同时对敌人每<shuzhi>0.5</>秒造成一次<shuzhi>{1}%</>*攻击力的伤害，冷却<shuzhi>25</>秒。
治疗领域仅“零度指针”处于前台时生效。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Create a healing zone that moves with the Wanderer and heals nearby allies for <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds for <shuzhi>6</> seconds. The healing zone deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK to enemies every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>25</> seconds.
The healing zone is only effective while Absolute Zero is in the main slot.

Desc.SourceString:
释放治疗领域，持续治疗周围的全体队友，跟随拓荒者移动，每<shuzhi>0.5</>秒治疗一次，每次治疗<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的的生命，持续<shuzhi>6</>秒，治疗领域同时对敌人每<shuzhi>0.5</>秒造成一次<shuzhi>{1}%</>*攻击力的伤害，冷却<shuzhi>25</>秒。
治疗领域仅“零度指针”处于前台时生效。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Create a healing zone that moves with the Wanderer and heals nearby allies for <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds for <shuzhi>6</> seconds. The healing zone deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK to enemies every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>25</> seconds.
The healing zone is only effective while Absolute Zero is in the main slot.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，设置权杖持续清除拓荒者和友方的负面效果，并每秒治疗附近拓荒者和友方目标<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的生命，持续<shuzhi>7</>秒，权杖同时对范围内敌人造成每秒<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and the staff continues to remove debuffs from the Wanderer and allies, healing the Wanderer and nearby allies by <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK per second for <shuzhi>7</> seconds. The staff also deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK every second to enemies within range. Meanwhile, gain hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5 seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，设置权杖持续清除拓荒者和友方的负面效果，并每秒治疗附近拓荒者和友方目标<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的生命，持续<shuzhi>7</>秒，权杖同时对范围内敌人造成每秒<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and the staff continues to remove debuffs from the Wanderer and allies, healing the Wanderer and nearby allies by <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK per second for <shuzhi>7</> seconds. The staff also deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK every second to enemies within range. Meanwhile, gain hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5 seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，挥舞盾斧可连续进行四次攻击。
盾形态：第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并造成<shuzhi>击飞</>效果。
斧形态：第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{12}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{14}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击退目标。
盾形态普攻与闪避攻击命中敌人后为敌人添加一层标记，最多<shuzhi>8</>层，标记叠满后，敌人进入“火焰焚身”状态，斧形态普攻和闪避攻击对“火焰焚身”状态下敌人造成伤害提升<shuzhi>{16}%</>，同时斧形态普攻和闪避攻击获得<shuzhi>{17}%</>的吸血和嘲讽效果，每次伤害吸血量不超过：攻击*技能倍率*1.25*吸血率。“火焰焚身”持续<shuzhi>{18}</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, swing the shield axe to attack 4 times in a row.
Shield Form: First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK and <shuzhi>launch</> the target.
Axe Form: First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{14}%</> of ATK and knock the target back.
After hitting the enemy with normal attacks and dodge attacks in shield form, inflict 1 stack of a mark on the enemy, up to <shuzhi>8</> stacks. After reaching max stacks, inflict Immolation on the enemy. Normal attacks and dodge attacks made in axe form against Immolating enemies deal <shuzhi>{16}%</> extra damage. Normal attacks and dodge attacks made in axe form gain <shuzhi>{17}%</> lifesteal and taunt. The max lifesteal amount for each hit: ATK × skill multiplier × 1.25 × lifesteal rate. Immolation lasts for <shuzhi>{18}</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，在空中连续进行三次攻击。
盾形态：第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
斧形态：第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne or after jumping 1 time, attack 3 times in a row in mid-air.
Shield Form: First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to<shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK.
Axe Form: First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
盾形态：地面长按普攻，自身不可移动（松开普攻解除），持续<shuzhi>3</>秒，此状态下自身受到伤害减少<shuzhi>{3}%</>，在此期间受到任何伤害后松开普攻或者长按时间达到<shuzhi>3</>秒后，向四周发出火焰冲击，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，附带<shuzhi>1</>秒<shuzhi>强控眩晕</>效果。
斧形态：用力前砸，对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并浮空目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Shield Form: While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to enter shield form (release to exit) for <shuzhi>3</> seconds, during which the Wanderer is unable to move, and all damage taken is reduced by <shuzhi>{3}%</>. While in shield form, releasing the normal attack button after taking damage or after holding the button for <shuzhi>3</> seconds unleashes a flmake shockwave, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and inflicting a <shuzhi>1</>-second <shuzhi>stun</> effect on the target.
Axe Form: Smash the target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK and suspending the target.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻(存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，触发空中分支攻击。
盾形态：下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害；落地时对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并浮空目标。
斧形态：下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害；落地时对周围目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并浮空目标。
触发时离地距离越高，伤害越高，最高可达<shuzhi>600%</>伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger aerial branch attacks.
Shield Form: While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK and suspend the target.
Axe Form: While falling, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK and suspend the target.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</>.

Desc.SourceString:
盾形态：处于下蹲状态时靠近敌人身后，点击普攻可触发偷袭，挥舞盾牌对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
斧形态：处于下蹲状态时靠近敌人身后，点击普攻可触发偷袭，奋力前砸，对目标造成<shuzhi>{1}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Shield Form: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to trigger Sneak Attack and swing a shield, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.
Axe Form: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to trigger Sneak Attack and launch a powerful swing in front of you, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发闪避攻击。
盾形态：向前发出一道火焰盾，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，击退目标，并产生范围爆炸，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，爆炸附带<shuzhi>1</>秒<shuzhi>强控眩晕</>效果，同时使目标在<shuzhi>10</>秒内被治疗效果降低<shuzhi>30%</>。
斧形态：旋转大斧，对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，同时使目标在<shuzhi>10</>秒内被治疗效果降低<shuzhi>30%</>。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger a dodge attack.
Shield Form: Unleash a flame shield, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and knocking the target back. Trigger an explosion, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK. The explosion inflicts a <shuzhi>1</>-second <shuzhi>stun</> on the target, and for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, reduces the target's healing received by <shuzhi>30%</>.
Axe Form: Swing the axe, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK and reducing the target's healing received for the next <shuzhi>10</> seconds by <shuzhi>30%</>.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却25秒，使一定范围内目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of targets in the area. Cooldown: 25 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
盾之变：盾形态切换至斧形态，砸地对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并附带玩家自身<shuzhi>{1}%</>最大生命值的额外伤害，附带<shuzhi>强控浮空</>效果，同时在地面形成持续<shuzhi>5</>秒的大范围火焰地带，使目标持续灼烧，总共造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
斧之变：斧形态切换至盾形态，盾插地，对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并附带玩家自身<shuzhi>{1}%</>最大生命值的额外伤害，附带击退效果，同时命中的目标在<shuzhi>5</>秒内无法切换武器。
冷却<shuzhi>40</>秒，盾之变与斧之变共用冷却。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Shield Conversion: Switch from shield form to axe form and smash the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK, plus additional damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP, and <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> the target. Leave a large flame zone for <shuzhi>5</> seconds that burns the target, dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK.
Axe Conversion: Switch from axe form to shield form and slam it to the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target, plus additional damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP, and knocking them back. Prevent the target from switching weapons for <shuzhi>5</> seconds upon being hit.
Cooldown: <shuzhi>40</> seconds. Shield Conversion and Axe Conversion share a cooldown.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，发出火焰冲击波，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并附带玩家自身<shuzhi>{1}%</>最大生命值的额外伤害，嘲讽敌人，持续<shuzhi>5</>秒；并获得大幅抗性提升（提升值根据角色等级变化）且火抗获得额外提升，持续<shuzhi>{2}</>秒，根据嘲讽到的目标数量，在一定范围内散落盾形态凝聚物，存在<shuzhi>25</>秒，自身拾取后获得<shuzhi>{3}</>秒<shuzhi>{4}%</>最大生命值的生命护盾（可叠加）且立即恢复一次闪避次数，单次释放连携技生成的凝聚物数量上限为<shuzhi>3</>个，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or when <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and unleash a flame shockwave, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus additional damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP. Taunt enemies for <shuzhi>5</> seconds, greatly increase resistance (based on the Wanderer's level), and gain an additional boost to flame resistance for <shuzhi>{2}</> seconds. Scatter shield-shaped objects based on the number of targets taunted, which last within the area for <shuzhi>25</> seconds. Upon pickup, each object provides a stackable HP shield equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of Max HP for <shuzhi>{3}</> seconds and immediately restores 1 dodge attempt. The maximum number of shield-shaped objects that are scattered in each use of the discharge skill is <shuzhi>3</>. Meanwhile, gain hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5 seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
<ComLblGreen>圣击</>：晚祷的空中攻击和重击可以将充能能力的50%转化为破盾能力。
<ComLblGreen>守护</>：自身生命值每减少<shuzhi>8%</>最大生命值，获得1个「辉光」，最多获得<shuzhi>5</>个（后台可以产生），「辉光」持续<shuzhi>25</>秒。获得<shuzhi>5</>个「辉光」时，使用<shuzhi>3</>段蓄力重击或者<shuzhi>3</>段蓄锐时消耗所有「辉光」额外造成<shuzhi>250%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
<ComLblGreen>Sacred Strike</>: Vesper's aerial attack and Pummel can convert 50% of charge to shatter.
<ComLblGreen>Guard</>: For every <shuzhi>8%</> HP the Wanderer loses, obtain 1 Glowing, up to a maximum of <shuzhi>5</> (can be produced in the off-hand slot). Glowing lasts for <shuzhi>25</> seconds. When <shuzhi>5</> Glowing are obtained, using <shuzhi>3</> Focus Smashes or <shuzhi>3</> Accumulators will consume all Glowing to additionally deal damage equal to <shuzhi>250%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，使用晚祷可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并大幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并浮空目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use Vesper to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK and knock the target back significantly.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK and suspend the target.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK, then launch the target.

Desc.SourceString:
当玩家滞空时，点击普攻可释放破惘，每次挥拳对目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并消耗<shuzhi>10</>点耐力，最后一击造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害并击飞目标。
释放破惘期间，若目标可被抓取，则将目标抓取并抛掷到地上，总计造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, tap normal attack to unleash Frustration. Each punch deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and consumes <shuzhi>10</> endurance. The last hit deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK and launches the target.
During Furstration' activation, if the target can be pulled, pull the target and slam them to the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK in total.

Desc.SourceString:
长按普攻按钮，进行最多<shuzhi>3</>段蓄力；命中目标造成<shuzhi>强控浮空</>效果，蓄锐攻击期间获得霸体和减伤效果，在被命中前释放，可触发幻时。
一段蓄力命中造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
二段蓄力命中造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
三段蓄力命中造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack for up to <shuzhi>3</> charges. <shuzhi>Suspends</> the target upon hit, granting Hyperbody and Damage Reduction during Accumulator. Releasing before getting hit can trigger Phantasia.
Phase 1: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.
Phase 2: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK.
Phase 3: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString: 普攻过程中或闪避后长按普攻不放，可释放瞬光，每次挥拳对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并消耗<shuzhi>10</>点耐力，松手后触发蓄锐。
Desc.LocalizedString: Hold Normal Attack during normal attacks or after dodging to unleash Shimmer. Each punch deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and consumes <shuzhi>10</> Endurance. Release to trigger Accumulator.

Desc.SourceString:
当玩家滞空时长按普攻，可触发空中3段蓄力，松手后重击地面并<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标，在被命中前进入蓄力，可触发幻时。
一段蓄力攻击：对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害；
二段蓄力攻击：对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害；
三段蓄力攻击：对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack to trigger a 3-phase air charge while airborne. Release to pummel the ground and <shuzhi>suspend</> targets. Charge before getting hit can trigger Phantasia.
Phase 1: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.
Phase 2: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK.
Phase 3: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
晚祷在触发恩赐共鸣的情况下激活守护效果
<ComLblGreen>恩赐守护</>：技能替换为<shuzhi>辉起</>
Desc.LocalizedString:
Upon triggering Benediction Resonance, Vesper activates Guard effect.
<ComLblGreen>Benediction Guard</>: Replace the skill with <shuzhi>Shinerise</>.

Desc.SourceString: 跃向目标，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标，为附近的所有友方角色附加星寰<shuzhi>{1}%</>*攻击力的护盾，持续<shuzhi>{2}</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>30</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Leaps toward the target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> the target. Grants nearby allies a shield equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of the caster's ATK for <shuzhi>{2}</>s. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</>s.

Desc.SourceString: 重击地面，<shuzhi>强控击飞</>面前的目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并召唤<shuzhi>锋芒</>最多存在<shuzhi>3</>个，持续<shuzhi>75</>秒（锋芒附近3米范围内最多存在1个），该技能最多可累积使用<shuzhi>3</>次，单次冷却时间<shuzhi>15</>秒；当场上存在2个<shuzhi>锋芒</>时，创建一个<shuzhi>清晖</>，每次触碰<shuzhi>锋芒</>，对移动距离半径内的目标进行一次治疗，恢复目标攻击力*（<shuzhi>{2}%</>+<shuzhi>{3}%</>*移动距离/米）的生命；当场上存在3个<shuzhi>锋芒</>时，创建一个<shuzhi>星云</>，每次触碰<shuzhi>锋芒</>，对移动距离半径内的目标造成攻击力*（<shuzhi>{4}%</>+<shuzhi>{5}%</>*移动距离/米）的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Pummel the ground and <shuzhi>strongly launch</> targets in front, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and summoning up to <shuzhi>3</> <shuzhi>Blades</> that last for <shuzhi>75</> seconds (up to 1 Blade every 3 meters). This skill can be used up to <shuzhi>3</> times, with a cooldown of <shuzhi>15</> seconds each time. When 2 <shuzhi>Blades</> exist on the field, a <shuzhi>Clearshine</> appears. Interacting with a <shuzhi>Blade</> heals targets within the movement radius, restoring HP equal to (<shuzhi>{2}%</> + <shuzhi>{3}%</> × movement distance/meter) of the target's ATK. When 3 <shuzhi>Blades</> exist, a <shuzhi>Nebula</> appears. Interacting with a <shuzhi>Blade</> deals damage to targets within the movement radius equal to (<shuzhi>{4}%</> + <shuzhi>{5}%</> × movement distance/meter) of ATK.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避后，点击普攻，将目标抓取到身边并持续吸附目标<shuzhi>2</>秒，并标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害；闪避后长按普攻可在释放<shuzhi>意识捕获</>后触发<shuzhi>瞬光</>。
Desc.LocalizedString: After dodging, tap normal attack to pull the target closer and keep drawing them in for <shuzhi>2</> seconds, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK. Tapping and holding normal attack after dodging will trigger <shuzhi>Shimmer</> after using <shuzhi>Mind Capture</>.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，冷却25秒，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果，持续<shuzhi>0.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of targets within the area. Cooldown: 25 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，释放喟叹轻咏，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害和短暂迟缓效果，并为附近的所有友方角色附加持续恢复状态：每秒恢复星寰<shuzhi>{1}%</>*攻击力的生命，持续<shuzhi>{2}</>秒，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, switching to this weapon from another <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the wielder</> and unleashes Chanting Sigh, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK, inflicting Slow on the enemy for a short time, and granting healing over time for all allies nearby: Recover HP by <shuzhi>{1}%</> of Lyra's ATK per second for <shuzhi>{2}</>s, and receive hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5s.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，释放喟叹轻咏，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害和短暂迟缓效果，并为附近的所有友方角色附加持续恢复状态：每秒恢复星寰<shuzhi>{1}%</>*攻击力的生命，持续<shuzhi>{2}</>秒，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, switching to this weapon from another <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the wielder</> and unleashes Chanting Sigh, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK, inflicting Slow on the enemy for a short time, and granting healing over time for all allies nearby: Recover HP by <shuzhi>{1}%</> of Lyra's ATK per second for <shuzhi>{2}</>s, and receive hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5s.

Desc.SourceString: 召唤机器人张开一个持续<shuzhi>5</>秒的护盾。护盾<shuzhi>5</>秒后或者承受一次攻击后消失，消失时击退周围敌方目标并造成<shuzhi>286%</>*攻击力伤害。若护盾在生成后<shuzhi>2</>秒内打碎，还会额外眩晕敌方目标<shuzhi>2</>秒。冷却时间<shuzhi>30</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Summons a droid and generates a shield for <shuzhi>5</>s. The shield disappears after <shuzhi>5</>s or when struck once. When it vanishes, it knocks back nearby enemies, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>286%</> of ATK. If broken within <shuzhi>2</>s of creation, the shield stuns enemies for <shuzhi>2</>s. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</>s.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，<shuzhi>强控浮空</>近身范围的目标并造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并在周围目标头顶创建大锤从天而降，再次造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> nearby targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>. Also summon a hammer to fall on nearby targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</>. Meanwhile, gain hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5 seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，挥舞大锤可连续进行四次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并击飞目标。
开启喷气状态下，挥舞大锤可连续进行四次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{9}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{11}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{12}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{13}</>点伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标可造成<shuzhi>{14}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{15}</>点伤害，并造成<shuzhi>强控浮空</>效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, swing the maul to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and launch the target.
While Outburst is active, swing the maul to attack 4 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{9}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{11}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{13}</> and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{14}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{15}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时或使用一段跳之后，点击普攻触发跳跃攻击，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
开启喷气状态下，造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害并<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标。
触发时离地距离越高，伤害越高，最高可达<shuzhi>600%</>伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to trigger Jumping Blast. Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>and suspend the target.
While Outburst is active, deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空长按，二段跳或附近有目标时在空中短按，攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，触发震荡波，<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标<shuzhi>4</>次，每次造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，消耗<shuzhi>250</>点耐力。
开启喷气状态下，触发震荡波，<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标<shuzhi>5</>次，每次造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害。
触发时离地距离越高，伤害越高，最高可达<shuzhi>600%</>伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tapping and holding while airborne, double-jumping, short tapping in the air when there are targets nearby, climbing, jumping backward, or attacking while using the Jetpack will trigger a Shockwave. <shuzhi>Strongly suspend</> the target <shuzhi>4</> times, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK+ <shuzhi>{1}</> each time. Cost <shuzhi>250</> endurance.
While Outburst is active, Shockwave <shuzhi>strongly suspends</> the target <shuzhi>5</> times, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of *ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> each time.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to <shuzhi>600%</> damage.

Desc.SourceString: 处于下蹲状态时靠近敌人身后，点击普攻可触发偷袭，挥舞重锤，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to use Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</>.

Desc.SourceString:
长按普攻，可触发蓄力重击，最多可蓄力三层，蓄力期间开启霸体和免控效果。
第一层，对目标造成<shuzhi>125%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{1}</>点伤害，并浮空目标；
第二层，对目标造成<shuzhi>200%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{3}</>点伤害，并<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标；
第三层，对目标造成<shuzhi>395%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{5}</>点伤害，并<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标。
开启喷气的状态下，长按普攻触发怒气连击，造成<shuzhi>127.9%</>*攻击力+<shuzhi>{7}</>点伤害，并造成<shuzhi>强控浮空</>效果。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack to trigger Focus Smash (can be charged up to 3 stacks). Grant immunity to all control effects and hyperbody while charging.
First Stack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>125%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> and suspend the target.
Second Stack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>200%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{3}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target.
Third Stack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>395%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{5}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target.
While Outburst is active, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Furious Strikes, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>127.9%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{7}</> and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air, consuming endurance.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，使用第二次至第四次普攻时，长按普攻可触发快射协议，并消耗耐力。
向前方发动进攻，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并浮空目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, tap and hold normal attack when using the second to fourth normal attacks to trigger Rapid Fire Protocol and consume endurance.
Launch an attack ahead, dealing damage equal to  <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and suspending them.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，长按普攻可触发蓄力攻击。
向目标发射蓄力弹，命中对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。蓄力时长越长伤害越高，蓄力3秒可达到最大倍率，为初始伤害的5倍。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger a charged attack.
Fire a charged shot at the target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby enemies. The longer the charged attack is held, the higher the damage, reaching a maximum multiplier after 3 seconds, for up to 5 times the initial damage.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，使用第二次至第四次普攻时，长按普攻可触发空中分支，并消耗耐力。
向前方发动进攻，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并浮空目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, tap and hold normal attack when using the second to fourth normal attacks to trigger an aerial branch attack and consume endurance.
Launch an attack ahead, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and suspending them.

Desc.SourceString: 滞空时长按闪避，可触发俯冲协议，落地造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Hold dodge while in mid-air to trigger Diving Protocol, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK upon landing.

Desc.SourceString:
自身当前血量百分比越低造成伤害越高，<shuzhi>50%</>血量时增伤<shuzhi>20%</>达到最大值（使用EP-7000天火时生效）。
战斗状态下，自身不处于<shuzhi>帕帕出场</>状态时，每<shuzhi>8</>秒帕帕会出现发射一枚重装能源弹Ⅰ型，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: The lower the Wanderer's HP percentage is, the greater the damage dealt, reaching a maximum damage boost of <shuzhi>{0}%</> at <shuzhi>50%</> HP (effective when using EP-7000 Skyfire). During combat, if the Wanderer is not in the <shuzhi>Poppa is Here</> state, Poppa will appear every <shuzhi>8</> seconds to launch a Heavy Energy Round I, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString: 大世界、地面、非战斗状态长按闪避后布置一个烟花，短暂延迟后释放，烟花的款式随机。
Desc.LocalizedString: When in the overworld, on the ground, and in the non-combat state, hold dodge to place fireworks of a random style that explode after a short delay.

Desc.SourceString: 大世界、地面、非战斗状态长按闪避后布置一个烟花，短暂延迟后释放，烟花的款式随机。
Desc.LocalizedString: When in the overworld, on the ground, and in the non-combat state, hold dodge to place fireworks of a random style that explode after a short delay.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

Desc.SourceString:
使用方向键加闪避按钮触发前闪避的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发突袭协议。
召唤星际导弹，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Assault Protocol.
Summon a missile from space and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of  ATK to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发推进协议。
发射镭射光线，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
<shuzhi>帕帕出场</>状态下，触发突袭协议后，长按普攻可连续发射爆能弹。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Propulsion Protocol.
Fire a laser beam and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets.
While <shuzhi>Poppa is Here</> is active, after triggering Assault Protocol, tap and hold normal attack to continuously fire explosive shots.

Desc.SourceString: 当拓荒者滞空时，也可使用闪避攻击。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge attacks can be used while the Wanderer is airborne.

Desc.SourceString:
在内心与现实中来回穿梭，在自身周围构筑<shuzhi>8</>枚心之镜壁（视为召唤物），对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，期间霸体，释放成功后自身进入<shuzhi>15</>秒帕帕出场状态，获得高速飞行能力（飞行时消耗耐力），冷却<shuzhi>45</>秒。
帕帕出场状态下，普攻更换为发射爆能弹，命中对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{1}%</>*攻击力的伤害，同时恢复耐力，爆能弹击中地面后会传送至心之镜壁中，随后发射向锁定目标。自身与命中目标的高度差越高造成伤害越低，至多减少<shuzhi>50%</>。每次爆能弹命中，会消耗自身<shuzhi>{2}%</>当前生命值（会随自身与目标的高度增加），组队玩法和PVP玩法内翻倍。
每飞行10米可获得1次强化俯冲协议效果（冷却{3}秒，最多可积攒2次），俯冲伤害提高<shuzhi>{4}%</>且范围扩大，且命中目标可恢复较多耐力。
【火力支援！】帕帕出场状态结束后，会在自身周围随机掉落一件作战物资，存在20秒，拾取后可获得对应效果（仅EP-7000天火使用期间生效）。可能出现的物资：
EP-73爆能弹弹夹：地面普攻附带<shuzhi>{5}%</>*攻击力的额外伤害，冷却<shuzhi>{6}</>秒，持续<shuzhi>{7}</>秒。
EP-76挂载导弹：每次普攻命中有<shuzhi>{8}%</>概率恢复1次闪避次数，且每次释放闪A附带1次<shuzhi>{9}%</>*攻击力的额外伤害，持续<shuzhi>{10}</>秒。
EP-79超能狙击弹：地面蓄力攻击（蓄力3秒以上触发）附带<shuzhi>{11}%</>*攻击力的额外伤害，如果爆头还会造成额外伤害，持续<shuzhi>{12}</>秒（触发3次后效果消失）。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Roams between the mind and reality and creates <shuzhi>8</> Heart Mirror Walls (count as summons), dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. Grants Hyperbody in the meanwhile. Activates Poppa is Here for <shuzhi>15</>s after casting the skill, granting Speed Flight (fly consumes Endurance). Cooldown: <shuzhi>45</>s.
 Replaces Normal Attack with Explosive Shots during Poppa is Here, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK to nearby targets upon hit and restoring Endurance. Explosive Shots are transmitted into a Heart Mirror Wall upon hitting the ground and then fired towards the locked-on target. Their damage is reduced based on the height difference between the caster and the target, up to <shuzhi>50%</>. Each Explosive Shot hit costs <shuzhi>{2}%</> of the caster's current HP (increases with the height difference). The cost doubles in PvP and team modes.
 Grants 1 Enhanced Diving Protocol (up to 2, with a cooldown of {3}s) for each 10 meters flown. Increases Diving Damage by <shuzhi>{4}%</>, expands its range, and restores more Endurance on hit.
 [Firepower Supply] Drops a random combat supply near the caster after Poppa is Here ends. It exists for 20s and grants certain effects once picked up (only effective while using EP-7000 Skyfire). Possible supplies:
 EP-73 Explosive Shot Magazine: Deals bonus damage equal to <shuzhi>{5}%</> of ATK with Normal Attack on the ground. Lasts for <shuzhi>{7}</>s. Cooldown: <shuzhi>{6}</>s.
 EP-76 Mounted Missiles: Has a <shuzhi>{8}%</> chance of restoring 1 Dodge attempt for each Normal Attack hit. Deals bonus damage equal to <shuzhi>{9}%</> of ATK with each Dodge Attack. Lasts for <shuzhi>{10}</>s.
 EP-79 Psionic Sniper Round: Deals bonus damage equal to <shuzhi>{11}%</> of ATK with Charged Shot on the ground (triggered after charging for at least 3s), with additional damage if it's a headshot. Lasts for <shuzhi>{12}</>s (expires after 3 triggers).

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，启动卫星离子束，从空间站发射集束粒子，落地爆炸，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the Wanderer</> and activate the Satellite Ionic Beam upon switching to this weapon, summoning an ionic beam from the space station and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK. At the same time, gain a shield equal to 5% of Max HP and hyperbody for 3.5 seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行六次攻击（场上至多存在<shuzhi>24</>个冰核）。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并生成<shuzhi>1</>个冰核。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并生成<shuzhi>2</>个冰核。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并生成<shuzhi>1</>个冰核。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并生成<shuzhi>3</>个冰核。
第六次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack to launch six consecutive strikes while on the ground (up to <shuzhi>24</> ice cores can exist at a time).
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and generates <shuzhi>1</> ice core.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and generates <shuzhi>2</> ice cores.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target and generates <shuzhi>1</> ice core.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target and generates <shuzhi>3</> ice cores.
 Sixth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK to the target.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行六次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第六次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack while airborne to unleash six consecutive strikes in mid-air, consuming Endurance.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Sixth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK to the target.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，使用第二次第四次第五次普攻时，长按普攻可触发冰棱刺，后跳滞空持续蓄力，在此期间“坏家伙”可将自身破盾能力转化为额外伤害能力，进行最多<shuzhi>3</>段蓄力；
一段蓄力命中造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
二段蓄力命中造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
三段蓄力命中造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack during the second, fourth, or fifth ground Normal Attacks to trigger Frozen Spike and jump backward, charging in mid-air (up to <shuzhi>3</> Charges). In the meantime, Wicked's Shatter converts into bonus damage.
First Charge: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.
Second Charge: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target.
Third Charge: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，使用普攻时，长按普攻可触发灭顶之灾。
从天而降，骑枪插地对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack while airborne to trigger Death From Above.
Falls from the sky and thrusts the spear into the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，长按普攻可触发锁猎蓄力，<shuzhi>4</>秒内伤害随蓄力时间增加，期间自身获得霸体，随后朝目标方向掷出武器，<shuzhi>命中后</>至多对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，锁猎蓄力期间瞄准区域内某一目标<shuzhi>2.5</>秒后，可触发辅助瞄准，掷出武器可自动命中目标头部（辅助瞄准丢失目标不影响蓄力进度）。
锁猎掷出武器后，新增特殊技能按键，点击可触发<shuzhi>技能-落影瞬杀</>。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack on the ground to start Fixate Charge, increasing damage over a <shuzhi>4</>-second period, granting Hyperbody in the meanwhile. Then tosses the weapon in the target direction, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets <shuzhi>upon hit</>. Triggers aim assist after aiming at a target for <shuzhi>2.5</>s during Fixate Charge, which guarantees headshot upon release. Losing the target during aim assist does not affect the Charge progress.
 Press the special skill button after tossing the weapon using Fixate to trigger <shuzhi>Shadow Execution</>.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，长按普攻瞄准上空可触发霜华剜骨，期间自身获得霸体，朝目标方向射出投枪，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
霜华剜骨掷出武器后，不可触发<shuzhi>技能-落影瞬杀</>。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack on the ground and aim upward to trigger Boneshaver, which grants Hyperbody in the meanwhile and launchs the javelin in the target direction, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets.
 Can't trigger <shuzhi>Shadow Execution</> after tossing the weapon using Boneshaver.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，长按后闪避可触发持续<shuzhi>40</>秒的匿形，自身进入隐身状态（单人模式下生成冰雕吸引附近目标注意，冰雕至多持续<shuzhi>10</>秒，期间若退出隐身则提前消失），移动速度提升<shuzhi>30%</>，触发匿形后受到攻击会格挡至多<shuzhi>1</>次自身<shuzhi>5%</>最大生命值伤害（该效果每<shuzhi>10</>秒至多触发<shuzhi>1</>次），匿形期间使用<shuzhi>武器-坏家伙</>造成任意伤害、受到攻击、切换武器时破隐，解除匿形状态。
<shuzhi>猎杀</>：匿形期间使用<shuzhi>武器-坏家伙</>造成任意伤害<shuzhi>命中目标时</>，可触发狂猎效果，重置<shuzhi>技能-极地之噬</>的冷却时间，自身根据破隐前匿形时长获得指数增长的<shuzhi>7.5%</>~<shuzhi>30%</>最终伤害提升，持续<shuzhi>7</>秒（匿形<shuzhi>4</>秒后触发满额增伤，通过<shuzhi>普攻-锁猎</>触发猎杀的此次伤害，也可享受到该增伤效果），狂猎每<shuzhi>35</>秒至多触发<shuzhi>1</>次。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold post-dodge on the ground to enter Concealment for <shuzhi>40</>s and become Invisible (create an ice sculpture that attracts enemy attention for up to <shuzhi>10</>s in solo mode; disappears early when existing from invisibility), increasing Speed by <shuzhi>30%</>. In Concealment, the caster can block <shuzhi>1</> instance of damage equal to <shuzhi>5%</> of Max HP (at most <shuzhi>once</> every <shuzhi>10</>s). Concealment breaks when launching an attack and dealing damage with <shuzhi>Wicked</>, being attacked, or switching weapons.
 <shuzhi>Hunting</>: Triggers Fevered Hunt when <shuzhi>hitting a target</> with <shuzhi>Wicked</> while in Concealment, resetting the cooldown of <shuzhi>Arctic Bite</>. Grants a Final Damage boost that scales exponentially with the duration of Concealment before breaking, from <shuzhi>7.5%</> up to <shuzhi>30%</>, lasting for <shuzhi>7</>s (maxes out after <shuzhi>4</>s in Concealment). Applies the same damage bonus to the attack that triggers Hunting through <shuzhi>Fixate</>. Fevered Hunt triggers at most <shuzhi>once</> every <shuzhi>35</>s.

Desc.SourceString: 方向键加闪避键触发的前闪避短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发寒意纷至，旋转骑枪横挥，对前方目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并生成<shuzhi>2</>个冰核（场上至多存在<shuzhi>24</>个冰核）。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack during the short perfect Dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Impending Chill, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead and creating <shuzhi>2</> ice cores (up to <shuzhi>24</> ice cores may exist on the field at any given time).

Desc.SourceString: 后闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发死命翩然，向前撑枪跳跃，落地斜斩对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并生成<shuzhi>1</>个冰核（场上至多存在<shuzhi>24</>个冰核）。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack during the short period after post-dodge to leap forward and slash upon landing, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and creating <shuzhi>1</> ice core (up to <shuzhi>24</> ice cores can exist at a time).

Desc.SourceString: 长按闪避，进入匿行的瞬间，点击普攻，可快速触发<shuzhi>普攻-锁猎</>，攻击命中造成攻击<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，掷出武器后，将新增特殊技能按键，点击可触发<shuzhi>技能-落影瞬杀</>。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack upon entering Concealment from holding Dodge to quickly trigger <shuzhi>Fixate</>, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK. After tossing the weapon, a new skill button for <shuzhi>Shadow Execution</> becomes available.

Desc.SourceString: 挥动长枪撕开空间，期间自身获得霸体，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并生成<shuzhi>10</>秒的空洞，期间持续吸附附近目标，同时生成<shuzhi>6</>个冰核（场上至多存在<shuzhi>24</>个冰核），冷却<shuzhi>35</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Swings the Long Spear to tear through space and grants Hyperbody, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and creating a tear that lasts for <shuzhi>10</>s, which draws in nearby targets. Also creates <shuzhi>6</> ice cores (up to <shuzhi>24</> ice cores can exist at a time). Cooldown: <shuzhi>35</>s.

Desc.SourceString:
<shuzhi>普攻-锁猎</>掷出武器命中空洞时寒气爆发，对空洞附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，施加<shuzhi>强控冻结</>效果（每<shuzhi>35</>秒至多触发<shuzhi>1</>次，对<shuzhi>Boss</>不生效），持续<shuzhi>3</>秒，同时吸附并引爆附近所有冰核。
<shuzhi>冰核引爆</>：每个冰核对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Triggers Chill when the weapon hits the tear using <shuzhi>Fixate</>, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to enemies near the tear and <shuzhi>freezing</> them for <shuzhi>3</>s (triggers up to <shuzhi>once</> every <shuzhi>35</>s. Does not work on <shuzhi>Bosses</>). Also draws in and detonates all the nearby ice cores.
 <shuzhi>Ice Core Detonation</>: Each ice core deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString:
移动到武器位置进行快速打击，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害（不触发释放技能的额外效果）。
落影瞬杀命中目标时，若幻时未处于冷却状态，则立即创建一片时停区域（组队玩法内不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Moves to the weapon's location to strike rapidly, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets (does not trigger additional effects from skills).
 Creates a Chrono Zone if Phantasia is not cooling down upon hitting a target with Shadow Execution (unavailable in Team modes).

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，雅诺旋转骑枪插地，对前方范围目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并生成<shuzhi>6</>个冰核（场上至多存在<shuzhi>24</>个冰核），同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: <shuzhi>Removes all carried debuffs</> when <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered upon switching to this weapon. Then Yanuo thrusts the spear into the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets ahead in range and generating <shuzhi>6</> ice cores (up to <shuzhi>24</> ice cores can exist at a time). Grants Hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5s.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击飞目标。

普攻或者闪避攻击命中目标后获得短暂抗性和霸体值提升效果（提升值根据角色等级变化），且物抗获得额外提升
触发<shuzhi>挥枪弄影</>后，长按普攻可触发普攻分支<shuzhi>神枪狂澜</>。

当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害并击飞目标。

普攻或者闪避攻击命中目标后获得短暂抗性和霸体值提升效果（提升值根据角色等级变化），且物抗获得额外提升
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use a normal attack to unleash five consecutive strikes, consuming Endurance.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them up.

 Grants a brief Resistance and Hyperbody boost upon hitting a target with a Normal or Dodge Attack (scales with character level) and further increases Physical Resistance.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面普攻时，使用第一次至第四次普攻中，长按普攻可触发<shuzhi>神枪狂澜</>。
连续多次攻击，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
<shuzhi>神枪狂澜</>可清除目标伤害增益类BUFF
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack during the first to fourth ground normal attacks to trigger <shuzhi>Reverent Spear: Raging Wave</>.
 Launches multiple strikes, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. <shuzhi>Reverent Spear: Raging Wave</> removes damage-boosting buffs from targets.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻（存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，可触发<shuzhi>骑枪刺袭</>。
从空中下落，落地后对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack while airborne (press when a target is available), or use Normal Attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using a Jetpack to trigger <shuzhi>Charging Spear: Assassinate</>.
 Descends from the air, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets upon landing.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

Desc.SourceString:
方向键加闪避键触发的前闪避短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发<shuzhi>长枪掠袭</>，对前方附近目标造成至多<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
普攻或者闪避攻击命中目标后获得短暂抗性和霸体值提升效果（提升值根据角色等级变化），且物抗获得额外提升
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger <shuzhi>Extending Spear: Plunder</>, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead.
 Grants a brief Resistance and Hyperbody boost upon hitting a target with a Normal or Dodge Attack (scales with character level) and further increases Physical Resistance.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发<shuzhi>跃动猛击</>，对前方附近目标造成至多<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
普攻或者闪避攻击命中目标后获得短暂抗性和霸体值提升效果（提升值根据角色等级变化），且物抗获得额外提升
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack during the short period after dodging to trigger a <shuzhi>Leaping Slam</>, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead.
 Grants a brief Resistance and Hyperbody boost upon hitting a target with a Normal or Dodge Attack (scales with character level) and further increases Physical Resistance.

Desc.SourceString:
向目标投出朗基努斯之枪，总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害并吸附附近目标，冷却<shuzhi>35</>秒。该技能无法被刷新。
释放成功后会为自身启动A.T力场，持续18秒。A.T力场耐久值上限为执行者<shuzhi>15%</>最大生命值（组队玩法内为<shuzhi>30%</>），A.T力场存在期间，执行者受到伤害时会根据耐久值剩余百分比为执行者抵挡相同比例的伤害，同时降低A.T力场的耐久值（耐久值最低为上限值的10%），A.T力场只会在持续时间过后消失。激活坚毅共鸣时，A.T存在期间造成仇恨增加<shuzhi>50%</>。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Throws a Spear of Longinus at the target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and pulling in nearby enemies. Cooldown: <shuzhi>35</>s. This skill cannot be refreshed.
 Activates an A.T. Field for 18s. Durability is capped at <shuzhi>15%</> of the caster’s Max HP (<shuzhi>30%</> in Team Mode). While active, the field absorbs damage based on its remaining durability when the caster takes damage, reducing its durability accordingly (minimum 10% of the cap). Expires only after the duration ends. Activating Fortitude Resonance increases aggro by <shuzhi>50%</> while the field is active.

Desc.SourceString:
当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，召唤福音战士释放范围伤害，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害并嘲讽<shuzhi>6</>秒，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒。
释放成功后自身获得<shuzhi>5</>层复仇，每次对怪物造成伤害时会消耗一层复仇，同时向命中目标释放一根朗基努斯之枪造成<shuzhi>{1}%</>*攻击力的范围伤害（为被动伤害），最短触发间隔3秒。复仇存在期间若受到伤害也可消耗一层复仇获得格挡效果，每次最多格挡自身最大生命值<shuzhi>4%</>的伤害（通过这种方式消耗复仇层数时最短间隔为0.5秒）
Desc.LocalizedString:
<shuzhi>Removes all carried debuffs</> when <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered upon switching to this weapon, then summons an Evangelion to deal AoE damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and taunts them for <shuzhi>6</>s. Grants Hyperbody and a shield worth 5% of Max HP for 3.5s.
 Grants <shuzhi>5</> stacks of Vengeance upon activation. Each hit consumes 1 stack to unleash the Spear of Longinus, dealing AoE damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK (passive damage, minimum cooldown: 3s). While Vengeance is active, consuming 1 stack upon taking damage blocks damage equal to <shuzhi>4%</> of Max HP (minimum cooldown: 0.5s).

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行六次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第五次攻击后摇出现闪光时点按触发第六次攻击，第六次攻击射出强力能量箭并释放数根追踪箭对目标造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力的伤害并在首次命中目标处生成一个缓速磁场，持续<shuzhi>{1}</>秒，【缓速磁场---范围内的敌方目标移动和攻击速度减少<shuzhi>{11}%</>，组队玩法内持续时长减半】。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack to launch six consecutive strikes while on the ground.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back slightly.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back slightly.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back slightly.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back slightly.
 Press to trigger the sixth attack when the flash appears after the fifth post-attack delay. Sixth Attack: Fires a powerful energy arrow and releases Homing Arrows that deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK to targets, generating a slowing magnetic field at the location of the first target hit for <shuzhi>{1}</>s. Enemies within the area have their Speed and Attack Speed reduced by <shuzhi>{11}%</>. Duration is halved in Team Mode.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行六次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第五次攻击后摇出现闪光时点按触发第六次攻击，第六次攻击射出强力能量箭并释放数根追踪箭对目标造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力的伤害并在首次命中目标处生成一个缓速磁场，持续<shuzhi>{1}</>秒，【缓速磁场---范围内的敌方目标移动和攻击速度减少<shuzhi>{11}%</>，组队玩法内持续时长减半】。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Unleashes five consecutive strikes while airborne by using a normal attack, consuming Endurance.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target;
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Press to trigger the sixth attack when the flash appears after the fifth post-attack delay. Sixth Attack: Fires a powerful energy arrow and releases Homing Arrows that deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK to targets, generating a slowing magnetic field at the location of the first target hit for <shuzhi>{1}</>s. Enemies within the area have their Speed and Attack Speed reduced by <shuzhi>{11}%</>. Duration is halved in Team Mode.

Desc.SourceString:
普攻时使用第一次至第五次普攻中，长按普攻可触发<shuzhi>后跃箭</>。
后跳过程中向前方射击，对命中目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
【特殊能量】：使用<shuzhi>救赎</>技能、连携和闪避攻击时可获得较多能量，普攻可获得较少能量，最大能量值为100。
若此时特殊能量高于<shuzhi>{1}</>，则自动触发能量消耗状态：
处于能量消耗状态且<shuzhi>救赎</>位于前台时，每0.5秒消耗<shuzhi>{2}</>点特殊能量，点按普攻可触发<shuzhi>闪身速射</>。该状态下<shuzhi>后跃箭</>和<shuzhi>闪身速射</>的暴击率提升<shuzhi>{3}%</>、暴击伤害提升<shuzhi>{4}%</>
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack during the first to fifth normal attack to trigger <shuzhi>Backjump Arrow</>.
 Leaps backward and fires forward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to hit targets.
 Special Energy: Generates a large amount of Special Energy when using <shuzhi>Salvation</>'s Skill, Discharge Skill, or Dodge Attack, and a small amount when performing Normal Attacks. Max Special Energy: 100.
 Automatically enters the Energy Consumption state when Special Energy exceeds <shuzhi>{1}</>.
 Consumes <shuzhi>{2}</> Special Energy every 0.5s while in Energy Consumption state and <shuzhi>Salvation</> is in the main slot. Press Normal Attack to trigger <shuzhi>Dodging Rapidfire</>. Increases the Crit Rate of <shuzhi>Backjump Arrow</> and <shuzhi>Dodging Rapidfire</> by <shuzhi>{3}%</> and their Crit Damage by <shuzhi>{4}%</> during this state.

Desc.SourceString:
处于能量消耗状态时，点击普攻可连续进行三次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack while in Energy Consumption state to launch three consecutive strikes.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target.

Desc.SourceString: 长按普攻，进入蓄力攻击状态，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*点伤害。蓄力时间越长伤害越高，蓄力达到2.3秒时伤害达到最高。
Desc.LocalizedString: Hold Normal Attack to charge an attack, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK. Damage increases with charge time, reaching its maximum at 2.3s.

Desc.SourceString: 召唤0号机重击敌人，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并为自身回复<shuzhi>{1}</>点特殊能量。冷却20秒，不受其他任何冷却时间清除、重置、变化效果的影响。
Desc.LocalizedString: Summons a Mecha to pummel enemies, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. Restores <shuzhi>{1}</> Special Energy. Cooldown: 20s.（This is not affected by other cooldown clearing, resetting, or changing effects.)

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，召唤0号机使用盾牌砸地，释放冲击波对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并为自身回复<shuzhi>{1}</>点特殊能量，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: <shuzhi>Removes all carried debuffs</> when <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered upon switching to this weapon, then summons a Mecha to deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. Restores <shuzhi>{1}</> Special Energy. Grants Hyperbody and a shield worth 5% of Max HP for 3.5s.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避之后的短暂时间内，点按普攻，可触发<shuzhi>三连射</>，对首次命中目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并为自身回复<shuzhi>{1}</>点特殊能量。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack during the short period after Dodge to trigger <shuzhi>Triple Shot</>, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the first target hit. Restores <shuzhi>{1}</> Special Energy.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避后在恰当时机点按普攻，可触发<shuzhi>蓄力连珠</>，射出强力能量箭并释放数根追踪箭对目标造成总共<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，为自身回复<shuzhi>20</>点特殊能量，并获得一次格挡能力，可格挡最多不超过自身最大生命值<shuzhi>{1}%</>的伤害，持续<shuzhi>30</>秒，玩家至多同时拥有3次格挡能力。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press to trigger <shuzhi>Charged Shots</> when using Normal Attack after a well-timed Dodge. Fires powerful energy arrows that release Homing Arrows, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets. Restores <shuzhi>20</> Special Energy and grants 1 Blocking Barrier for <shuzhi>30</>s, blocking damage up to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of the caster's Max HP. Up to 3 Blocking Barriers can exist simultaneously.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，使用不灭之翼可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并大幅击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并小幅击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并浮空目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Use Unyielding Wing to launch five consecutive strikes while on the ground.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back slightly.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back significantly.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back slightly.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target and suspends them.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them up.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行5次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并<shuzhi>强控击倒</>目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack while airborne to unleash five consecutive strikes in mid-air, consuming Endurance.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target and <shuzhi>knocks them down</>.

Desc.SourceString:
使用天鹅弧时长按普攻按钮，将目标聚拢，并对范围内目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，最后一击<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标并造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
<shuzhi>被动</>：成功释放任意武器技能或进入潜态构形<shuzhi>4</>秒后，下一次释放舞意瞬闪期间，免疫伤害
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack while using Swan Arc to pull the targets together and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to all targets within range. The last hit <shuzhi>suspends</> the target and deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK.
 <shuzhi>Passive</>: Grants immunity to damage while using Dancing Flash the next time after using any weapon skill or entering Latent State for <shuzhi>4</>s.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻(存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，会触发重击。
下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并持续消耗耐力。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack while airborne (press when a target is available), or use Normal Attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Pummel.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK on each hit while falling and consumes Endurance.

Desc.SourceString: 长按普攻按钮，每次命中对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，最后一击造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，期间获得<shuzhi>霸体</>效果，并持续消耗耐力
Desc.LocalizedString: Hold Normal Attack to deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK upon each hit. The last hit deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK. Grants <shuzhi>Hyperbody</> in the meanwhile and consumes Endurance.

Desc.SourceString: 向后方闪避之后，可连续点击3次普攻，对目标总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，第一击<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack 3 times after dodging backward to deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK in total to the target and <shuzhi>suspend</> them with the first hit.

Desc.SourceString: 长按前闪避可进入潜态构形并持续消耗耐力，移动速度提升<shuzhi>50%</>，若处于滞寒场域内，则移动速度额外提升<shuzhi>50%</>，离开该状态时对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害并冰冻目标<shuzhi>2</>秒（巅峰联赛等PVP玩法中对玩家目标不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: Hold pre-dodge to enter Latent State, consuming Endurance and increasing Speed by <shuzhi>50%</> (plus another <shuzhi>50%</> in Chilling Field). Upon leaving this state, deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and freezes them for <shuzhi>2</>s (not effective against players in PvP modes such as Apex League).

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

Desc.SourceString:
对范围内的目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害并<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标，玩家进入到滞寒场域持续<shuzhi>15</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>35</>秒，技能释放期间获得霸体效果。
<red>被动</>：处于场域内，不灭之翼每触发<shuzhi>15</>次命中效果后会触发空间切割，每<shuzhi>{1}</>秒对空间内的目标造成1次<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害持续<shuzhi>{2}</>秒（空间消失也会停止）。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the targets in the area and <shuzhi>suspends</> them. Lasts for <shuzhi>15</>s after the player enters the Chilling Field. Cooldown: <shuzhi>35</>s. Grants Hyperbody in the meanwhile.
 <red>Passive</>: Triggers Spatial Slice for every <shuzhi>15</> Unyielding Wing hit effects in the field. Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK every <shuzhi>{1}</>s for <shuzhi>{2}</>s (or until the field disappears).

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，释放连携，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害并<shuzhi>强控击飞</>目标，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
Desc.LocalizedString: <shuzhi>Removes all carried debuffs</> when <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered upon switching to this weapon. Then unleashes Discharge, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and <shuzhi>knocking them up</>. Grants Hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5s.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，释放连携，对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害并<shuzhi>强控击飞</>目标，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
Desc.LocalizedString: <shuzhi>Removes all carried debuffs</> when <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered upon switching to this weapon. Then unleashes Discharge, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and <shuzhi>knocking them up</>. Grants Hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5s.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
普攻与闪避攻击命中时获得<shuzhi>1</>层增幅（每0.7秒最多获得1层），增幅累积达到得<shuzhi>7</>层时获得锋略：造成伤害提升<shuzhi>12%</>，持续40秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch five consecutive strikes.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Grants <shuzhi>1</> stack of boost upon hitting a target with Normal or Dodge Attack (at most 1 every 0.7s). <shuzhi>7</> stacks of boost convert into Sharp Blade, increasing damage by <shuzhi>12%</> for 40s.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行四次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
普攻与闪避攻击命中时获得<shuzhi>1</>层增幅（每0.7秒最多获得1层），增幅累积达到得<shuzhi>7</>层时获得锋略：造成伤害提升<shuzhi>12%</>，持续40秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack while airborne to unleash four consecutive strikes in mid-air, consuming Endurance.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Grants <shuzhi>1</> stack of boost upon hitting a target with Normal or Dodge Attack (at most 1 every 0.7s). <shuzhi>7</> stacks of boost convert into Sharp Blade, increasing damage by <shuzhi>12%</> for 40s.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者进行地面攻击时，长按普攻，进入审局状态，持续凝聚棋子于身后，释放时，射出所有的棋子追击目标，每颗棋子造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
审局状态下每获得一个棋子时获得<shuzhi>1</>层增幅（每0.7秒最多获得1层），增幅累积达到得<shuzhi>7</>层时获得锋略：造成伤害提升<shuzhi>12%</>，持续40秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack to activate the Review Board while launching ground attacks. Gather pieces that pursue targets after being launched, with each piece dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.
 Grants <shuzhi>1</> stack of boost upon gaining 1 piece in Review Board (at most 1 every 0.7s). <shuzhi>7</> stacks of boost convert into Sharp Blade, increasing damage by <shuzhi>12%</> for 40s.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，使用普攻时，长按普攻可触发历世心游。
从天而降，落地后甩出双鱼附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack while airborne to trigger Generational Leap.
 Falls from the sky and hurls the twin fish towards nearby targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to them and knocking them up upon landing.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

Desc.SourceString: 方向键加闪避键触发的前闪避短暂时间内，点击普攻，向前方目标掷出黑子，汇聚小范围的目标，对前方目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (press an arrow button before dodging) to place black pieces in front. The pieces briefly draw in nearby targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets in front.

Desc.SourceString: 后闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，向前方落下<shuzhi>3</>颗白子，每颗白子落下时对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的的范围伤害，留下可触发的陷阱，当目标靠近时爆炸对目标造成短暂的缓速效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Use normal attack during the short period after dodging backward to place <shuzhi>3</> white pieces in front. Each white piece deals area damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets upon landing. They leave behind a trap that explodes when a target approaches, briefly slowing them.

Desc.SourceString: 腾空而起，将战场化为棋盘，悬浮于空中（期间不可移动），获得高空视角，攻击替换为落子，技能替换为亦胜半子，点触棋盘依次落下18枚棋子，对棋盘内所有目标造成<shuzhi>167.6%</>*攻击力的伤害，并短暂缓速目标。技能期间获得昭世，受到伤害降低<shuzhi>30%</>，受到致命伤害时，抵挡该次伤害，生命回复<shuzhi>10%</>，生效后移除昭世。技能冷却<shuzhi>45</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Leaps into the air, transforming the battlefield into a Go board, and floats in mid-air (unable to move during this time). Gains an elevated view. During this period, attacks become Go pieces, and skills are replaced with Half-Piece Advantage. Press the Go board to place 18 pieces in order, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>167.6%</> of ATK to all targets on the board and briefly slowing them down. Grants Shine Forth during the skill, which reduces damage taken by <shuzhi>30%</>. Also blocks 1 instance of lethal damage and restores <shuzhi>10%</> HP instead, which consumes Shine Forth. Cooldown: <shuzhi>45</>s.

Desc.SourceString: 从高空坠落，落地对棋盘内所有目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，双鱼向外环游，推开短距离内的目标造成<shuzhi>{1}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Falls from the sky, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to all targets on the board. The twin fish then circle outward, pushing away nearby targets and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，释放场域，于前方落下棋子，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: <shuzhi>Removes all carried debuffs</> when <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered upon switching to this weapon. Then creates a field where Go pieces fall, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. Grants Hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5s.

Desc.SourceString:
对范围内的目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害并<shuzhi>强控浮空</>目标，玩家进入到滞寒场域持续<shuzhi>15</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>35</>秒，技能释放期间获得霸体效果。
<red>被动</>：处于场域内，不灭之翼每触发<shuzhi>15</>次命中效果后会触发空间切割，每<shuzhi>{1}</>秒对空间内的目标造成1次<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害持续<shuzhi>{2}</>秒（空间消失也会停止）。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the targets in the area and <shuzhi>suspends</> them. Lasts for <shuzhi>15</>s after the player enters the Chilling Field. Cooldown: <shuzhi>35</>s. Grants Hyperbody in the meanwhile.
 <red>Passive</>: Triggers Spatial Slice for every <shuzhi>15</> Unyielding Wing hit effects in the field. Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK every <shuzhi>{1}</>s for <shuzhi>{2}</>s (or until the field disappears).

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行六次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击退目标，期间霸体。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击退目标，期间霸体。
第六次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力的伤害，并击倒目标，期间霸体。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack to launch six consecutive strikes while on the ground.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back;
 Fourth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back. Grants Hyperbody in the meanwhile.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back. Grants Hyperbody in the meanwhile.
 Sixth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them down. Grants Hyperbody in the meanwhile.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行6次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力的伤害，期间霸体。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力的伤害，期间霸体。
第六次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力的伤害并击倒目标，期间霸体。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack while airborne to unleash six consecutive strikes in mid-air, consuming Endurance.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target. Grants Hyperbody in the meanwhile.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target. Grants Hyperbody in the meanwhile.
 Sixth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them down. Grants Hyperbody in the meanwhile.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面普攻时，使用第一次至第四次普攻中，长按普攻可触发凝滞朔风。
抡动静澜掀起冰霜旋风，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack during the first to fourth ground Normal Attacks to trigger Still North Wind.
 Swings forth Calm Waters to stir up Frosty Whirlwind, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，长按普攻可触发雪暴飓风。
自身伴随静澜旋转攻击，并消耗耐力，每次命中对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack to trigger Snowstorm Hurricane while on the ground.
 Performs a spinning attack with Calm Waters and consumes Endurance, each hit dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻（存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，可触发凌空落锚。
从空中下落，落地过程中对命中的敌人每次造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，落地后对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack while airborne (press when a target is available), or use Normal Attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Skyfall Anchor.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK on each hit while falling. Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to nearby targets upon landing.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

Desc.SourceString: 方向键加闪避键触发的前闪避短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发轮舞之锚，对前方目标造成至多<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，释放期间霸体。命中带有10层及以上寒袭效果目标时造成一次<shuzhi>200%</>*攻击力的冻结伤害，单个目标8秒内只能受到一次该伤害
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack during the short perfect Dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Anchor of Cyclicity, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead. Grants Hyperbody in the meanwhile. Deals freeze damage equal to <shuzhi>200%</> of ATK upon hitting a target with 10 stacks of Chilling Strike or more. A single target can only take this damage once every 8s.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发霜碇流星，对前方目标造成至多<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害。命中带有10层及以上寒袭效果目标时造成一次<shuzhi>200%</>*攻击力的冻结伤害，单个目标8秒内只能受到一次该伤害
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Cold Anchor Meteor, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead. Deals freeze damage equal to <shuzhi>200%</> of ATK upon hitting a target with 10 stacks of Chilling Strike or more. A single target can only take this damage once every 8s.

Desc.SourceString:
将静澜两端分别甩出攻击附近目标，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力的伤害，冷却<shuzhi>28</>秒。
并引爆目标身上的寒袭效果（层数清零），造成<shuzhi>40%</>攻击力*层数的伤害。技能释放期间霸体。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hurls the both ends of Calm Waters towards nearby targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK. Cooldown: <shuzhi>28</>s.
 Resets the Chilling Strike stacks on the target, dealing damage equal to the number of stacks × <shuzhi>40%</> of ATK. Grants Hyperbody in the meanwhile.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，向前方投出静澜，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
Desc.LocalizedString: <shuzhi>Removes all carried debuffs</> when <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered upon switching to this weapon. Then throws Calm Waters ahead, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. Grants Hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5s.

Desc.SourceString:
操控飞引仪向空中发射一枚能够延伸出能量绳索的空间锚定组件，通过拖拽能量绳索在地面与空中自由移动。
地面移动：向前发射一枚空间锚定组件，随后借力向前跳起，消耗<shuzhi>15</>点能量值。
空中移动：在空中生成一枚空间锚定组件，随后顺势向前摆荡，消耗<shuzhi>12</>点能量值，摆荡经过一定角度后，可以再次点按，触发空中加速，向前弹射一段距离。
能量值上限为<shuzhi>100</>点，每秒回复<shuzhi>0.75</>点能量值。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Instructions to control the Flight Apparatus and launch a spatial anchoring module that extends energy tethers into the air, allowing free movement between the ground and sky.
Ground Movement: Launch a spatial anchoring module ahead using the Flight Apparatus and use the momentum to propel yourself forward, consuming <shuzhi>15</> energy.
Aerial Movement: Generate a spatial anchoring module in the air using the Flight Apparatus, then swing forward using the momentum, consuming <shuzhi>12</> energy. After swinging through a certain distance in the arc, press again to trigger mid-air acceleration, propelling you forward a distance.
The maximum energy is <shuzhi>100</>, with a regeneration rate of <shuzhi>0.75</> energy per second.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击飞目标。

当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While the Wanderer is airborne, use normal attack to launch 5 consecutive attacks in the air, consuming END.
First Attack: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and knocks the target back.
Second Attack: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK and knocks the target back. 
Third Attack: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK and knocks the target back.
Fourth Attack: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK and knocks the target back.
Fifth Attack: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK and knocks the target up.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面普攻时，使用第一次至第三次普攻中，长按普攻可触发巨型糖果连击。
持续挥动棒球棍大力砸地，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，结束后打出终结一击，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击飞敌人。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack during the first to third ground normal attack to trigger Giant Candy Combo.
 Swings the bat continuously to strike the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. Finishes with a powerful final swing, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and knocking them up.
