Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，长按普攻可触发蓄力攻击。
抬起棒球棍，在原地蓄力，并消耗耐力，随着蓄力时长的增长，伤害与命中效果均获得提升，随后向前挥动棒球棍，命中后对至多附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害并击飞目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack to trigger a charged attack while on the ground.
 Lifts the bat and begins charging in place, consuming Endurance. The longer the charge, the greater the damage and impact. After charging, swings the bat forward, dealing up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets upon hit and knocking them up.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻（存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，可触发下落攻击。
从空中下落，落地过程中对命中的敌人每次造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，落地后对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack while airborne (press when a target is available), or use Normal Attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using a Jetpack to trigger Falling Attack.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK on each hit while falling. Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to nearby targets upon landing.

Desc.SourceString:
在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
<red>被动</>：释放<shuzhi>3</>次闪避后，回复自身<shuzhi>1</>次闪避次数。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Dodges before being hit to trigger Phantasia, slowing the action speed of targets within range. Grants immunity to hitstun while dodging.
 <red>Passive</>: Restores <shuzhi>1</> Dodge attempt after dodging <shuzhi>3</> times.

Desc.SourceString: 方向键加闪避键触发的前闪避短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发前闪避攻击，对前方目标至多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack during the short perfect Dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger a pre-Dodge attack, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发后闪避攻击，对前方目标至多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack during the short period after dodging to trigger a post-dodge attack, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead.

Desc.SourceString: 长按技能进入蓄力状态，蓄力期间受到伤害降低<shuzhi>50%</>，根据蓄力时间，松手时触发多段技能，至多触发二段技能。一段技能对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，二段技能对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，且为命中敌人附加混乱效果，使敌人每秒受到<shuzhi>17.5%</>*攻击力伤害，持续<shuzhi>20</>秒，期间<shuzhi>跳跳糖</>普攻与闪避攻击命中携带有混乱效果目标有<shuzhi>20%</>几率对其造成<shuzhi>300%</>*攻击力的重击效果，每<shuzhi>7</>秒至多触发一次。技能冷却<shuzhi>40</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: Hold the skill button to enter a charging state, reducing damage taken by <shuzhi>50%</> while charging. Releases the button to trigger multi-stage attacks based on charge duration, up to two stages in total. The first-stage attack deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets, and the second-stage attack deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK, inflicting Disorient on hit. Disoriented enemies take damage equal to <shuzhi>17.5%</> of ATK every second for <shuzhi>20</>s. During this effect, Normal and Dodge Attacks from <shuzhi>Poppin' Stick</> hitting disoriented targets have a <shuzhi>20%</> chance to deliver a heavy attack, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>300%</> of ATK. Triggers up to once every <shuzhi>7</>s. Cooldown: <shuzhi>40</>s.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，向前方挥动棒球棍，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: <shuzhi>Removes all carried debuffs</> when <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered upon switching to this weapon, then swings the bat forward to deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. Grants Hyperbody and a shield worth 5% of Max HP for 3.5s.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第四次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并牵引目标
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击飞目标
<shuzhi>技能-超速模式</>期间，进行第五段攻击时，长按普攻可衔接第1段攻击
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch five consecutive strikes.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target and pulls them in.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them up.
 Hold Normal Attack during the fifth strike to chain it with the first strike during <shuzhi>Superspeed Mode</>.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击飞目标
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第四次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
<shuzhi>空音斩</>：第二次与第三次攻击在命中敌人时，会触发切割效果，攻击时间延长同时伤害段数提升：
第二次攻击命中敌人时，对目标造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第二次攻击命中敌人时，对目标造成<shuzhi>{12}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use a normal attack to unleash five consecutive strikes, consuming Endurance.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them up.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 <shuzhi>Silent Slash</>: Triggers Slash when the second and the third strikes hits enemies, extending the attack's duration and increasing the number of strikes.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK to the target upon hit and knocks them back.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{12}%</> of ATK to the target upon hit and knocks them back.

Desc.SourceString:
<shuzhi>技能-超速模式</>期间，在地面普攻时，使用第一次至第二次普攻中，长按普攻可触发<shuzhi>双斩次音</>。
对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack during the first to second ground Normal Attacks while <shuzhi>Superspeed Mode</> is active to trigger <shuzhi>Twin Slashes</>.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and knock them back.

Desc.SourceString:
<shuzhi>技能-超速模式</>期间，触发<shuzhi>双斩次音</>后，继续长按普攻可触发<shuzhi>连斩次音</>。
对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点基础伤害，同时消耗所有<shuzhi>过载</>效果，造成一次<shuzhi>过载</>层数*<shuzhi>20.3%</>*攻击力的额外伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Keep holding Normal Attack after triggering <shuzhi>Twin Slashes</> while <shuzhi>Superspeed Mode</> is active to trigger <shuzhi>Linked Slashes</>.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and consumes all stacks of <shuzhi>Overload</>, dealing bonus damage equal to the number of <shuzhi>Overload</> stacks × <shuzhi>20.3%</> × ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面普攻时，使用第三次至第四次普攻中，长按普攻可触发涡骑音。
对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack during the third to fourth ground Normal Attacks to trigger Whirlpool Rider.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时，在云骑音释放期间长按普攻（或存在敌方目标时点按），可触发下落攻击-瀑骑音。
从空中下落，落地过程中对命中的敌人每次造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，落地后对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack while using Cloud Riding airborne (press when a target is available) to trigger Falling Attack - Waterfall Rider.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK on each hit while falling. Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to nearby targets upon landing.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻，攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，可触发下落攻击-行骑音。
从空中下落，落地过程中对命中的敌人每次造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，落地后对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack while airborne, or use Normal Attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Falling Attack - Traveling Rider.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK on each hit while falling. Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to nearby targets upon landing.

Desc.SourceString: 方向键加闪避键触发的前闪避短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发前闪避攻击，对前方目标至多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack during the short perfect Dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger a pre-Dodge attack, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发后闪避攻击，对前方目标至多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack during the short period after dodging to trigger a post-dodge Attack, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead.

Desc.SourceString:
长按前闪避进入音驰骑空，移动速度提升并持续消耗耐力攻击前方，每次命中对附近目标造成<shuzhi>31.5%</>*攻击力点伤害；
音驰骑空状态下跳跃消耗耐力，落地后获得短暂加速，在大世界进入音驰骑空<shuzhi>10</>秒后，音驰骑空造成的伤害可以对非BOSS敌人造成<shuzhi>700%</>*攻击力的伤害（巅峰联赛不生效）
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold pre-dodge to enter Sonic Skyrider, increasing Speed and consuming Endurance to attack targets ahead, each hit dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>31.5%</> of ATK to nearby targets.
 Consumes Endurance to jump during Sonic Skyrider and grants a temporary speed boost upon landing. After entering Sonic Skyrider for <shuzhi>10</>s in the Overworld, Sonic Skyrider deals damage equal to <shuzhi>700%</> of ATK against non-boss enemies (unavailable in Apex League).

Desc.SourceString:
进入超速模式，自身获得短暂无敌并对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并对目标添加<shuzhi>3</>秒<shuzhi>65%</>迟缓效果（组队玩法中对boss不生效）；
超速模式期间<shuzhi>普攻-风骑音</>与<shuzhi>普攻-云骑音</>每段攻击，附加<shuzhi>超音</>效果，造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点额外伤害，<shuzhi>超音</>视为技能伤害。同时每段攻击获得<shuzhi>1</>层过载效果，至多叠加<shuzhi>6</>层（每<shuzhi>0.5</>秒至多获得<shuzhi>1</>层）。
每次诺菈普攻命中或者受到治疗时（非过量治疗），获得<shuzhi>1</>层<shuzhi>疾风</>效果，最多叠加<shuzhi>5</>层，在超速模式结束<shuzhi>3</>秒后，移除所有未被转化的<shuzhi>疾风</>效果。
进入超速模式<shuzhi>5</>秒后，获得新技能<shuzhi>瞬骑音</>（超速模式期间可释放），期间切换武器将无法获得/使用该技能。释放<shuzhi>瞬骑音</>后，将提前结束超速模式。
超速模式持续<shuzhi>12</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>30</>秒（不受任何冷却时间清除、重置、变化效果的影响）。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Enters Superspeed Mode, granting Invincibility for a short period, and deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets, inflicting a <shuzhi>65%</> Slow for <shuzhi>3</>s (not effective against bosses in team modes).
 Applies <shuzhi>Supersound</> to each strike of <shuzhi>Windrider</> and <shuzhi>Cloud Riding</> during Superspeed Mode, dealing bonus damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK (<shuzhi>Supersound</> counts as skill damage). Grants <shuzhi>1</> stack of Overload with each hit, up to <shuzhi>6</> stacks (at most <shuzhi>1</> stack every <shuzhi>0.5</>s).
 Grants <shuzhi>1</> stack of <shuzhi>Raging Wind</> each time Nola lands a Normal Attack or receives healing (not excess healing), up to <shuzhi>5</> stacks. All unconverted <shuzhi>Gale</> stacks are removed <shuzhi>3</>s after Superspeed Mode ends.
 Grants the new skill <shuzhi>Flash Rider</> (available during Superspeed Mode) <shuzhi>5</>s into Superspeed Mode. Switching weapons disables this skill. Using <shuzhi>Flash Rider</> will end Superspeed Mode immediately.
 Superspeed Mode lasts for <shuzhi>12</>s. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</>s. This is not affected by other cooldown clearing, resetting, or changing effects.

Desc.SourceString: 超速模式期间可释放，对附近目标进行多段连斩，造成总计<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。释放该技能会消耗所有<shuzhi>疾风</>效果，转化为<shuzhi>破风领域</>效果，每<shuzhi>0.4</>秒对周围目标造成<shuzhi>59.1%</>攻击力+<shuzhi>11.8%</>攻击力*<shuzhi>疾风</>层数的异能伤害，视为技能伤害，持续<shuzhi>2</>秒
Desc.LocalizedString: Available during Superspeed Mode. Slashes nearby targets consecutively, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK in total. Using this skill converts all <shuzhi>Raging Wind</> stacks into <shuzhi>Frostbite Realm</>, dealing Altered Damage equal to <shuzhi>59.1%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>11.8%</> of ATK × the number of <shuzhi>Gale</> stacks every <shuzhi>0.4</>s for <shuzhi>2</>s (counts as skill damage).

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，同时自身获得<shuzhi>5%</>最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续<shuzhi>3.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: <shuzhi>Removes all carried debuffs</> when <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered upon switching to this weapon. Then deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. Grants Hyperbody and a shield equal to <shuzhi>5%</> of Max HP for <shuzhi>3.5</>s.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
破城之锋所有攻击过程中包含巨剑形态和长剑形态，巨剑形态攻击可造成<shuzhi>30%</>攻击力的额外伤害，每<shuzhi>10</>秒触发一次；长剑形态攻击积攒电刃值，叠满<shuzhi>5</>层获得电刃强化，下次技能伤害提升<shuzhi>30%</>，脱战后清除电刃强化和电刃值。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch five consecutive strikes.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Siege Edge can switch between the Greatsword and Longsword forms. In the Greatsword form, it deals bonus damage equal to <shuzhi>30%</> of ATK, triggering once every <shuzhi>10</>s. In the Longsword form, it accumulates Electroblade stacks with attacks and enhance Electroblade when reaching <shuzhi>5</> stacks, increasing the damage of the next skill by <shuzhi>30%</>. This effect and all the stacks are cleared once leaving combat.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第四次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use a normal attack to unleash five consecutive strikes, consuming Endurance.
First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
Fourth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面普攻时，使用第一次至第二次普攻中，长按普攻可触发崩雷裁断。
舞动破城之锋向前方连续下劈，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack during the first to second ground Normal Attacks to trigger Thunderous Cutter.
 Slashes downward with Siege Edge, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面普攻时，使用第三次至第四次普攻中，长按普攻可触发电掣一挑。
发动迅猛的上挑攻击，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack during the third to fourth ground Normal Attacks to trigger Lightning Thrust.
 Performs a quick rising cut, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，长按普攻可触发阳电射击。
向目标发射蓄力弹，命中目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack to trigger Solar Shot while on the ground.
 Fires a charged shot at the target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target upon hit.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻（存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，可触发凌空落锚。
从空中下落，落地过程中对命中的敌人每次造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，落地后对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack while airborne (press when a target is available), or use Normal Attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Skyfall Anchor.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK on each hit while falling. Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to nearby targets upon landing.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

Desc.SourceString: 方向键加闪避键触发的前闪避短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发脉冲回旋，对前方目标至多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Pulsing Whirl, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发撤步射击，对命中目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Step-Back Shot, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the hit target.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避之后的短暂时间内，长按普攻，可触发磁电炮击，根据蓄力时长分为威力递增的三级，对前方目标至多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，蓄力至最大可斩杀<shuzhi>10%</>血量以下的非boss目标（对玩家不生效）。
Desc.LocalizedString: Hold Normal Attack right after dodging to trigger Magnetoelectric Artillery, which has three Charge levels and deals damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead. When fully charged, it can execute non-boss targets (excluding players) with less than <shuzhi>10%</> HP.

Desc.SourceString: 将破城之锋切换为长剑形态，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害（不积攒<shuzhi>电刃值</>），冷却<shuzhi>40</>秒（不受任何冷却时间清除、重置、变化效果的影响）。
Desc.LocalizedString: Switches Siege Edge to the Longsword form, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets (does not accumulate <shuzhi>Electroblade</>). Cooldown: <shuzhi>40</>s. This is not affected by other cooldown clearing, resetting, or changing effects.

Desc.SourceString:
当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，破城之锋切换为电磁炮形态发动强力炮击，对前方目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，同时自身获得<shuzhi>5%</>最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续<shuzhi>3.5</>秒。
释放磁雷光炮后，自身进入电磁扰动状态，持续<shuzhi>20</>秒，状态开始时玩家获得<shuzhi>5</>秒的霸体状态（巅峰联赛中为<shuzhi>4</>秒）。电磁扰动状态下破城之锋的攻击会对目标施加静电状态，减速<shuzhi>15%</>，持续<shuzhi>20</>s。电磁扰动状态下附近范围内的怪物，每秒受到<shuzhi>20%</>攻击力点伤害，视为连携伤害             
连携被动：电磁扰动状态下破城之锋攻击<shuzhi>20%</>概率会造成静电链，冷却<shuzhi>0.25</>秒，视为连携伤害；
静电链：最多攻击<shuzhi>7</>个目标，造成<shuzhi>8%</>*攻击力点伤害，击杀目标后会再次触发静电链，触发间隔<shuzhi>0.1</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
<shuzhi>Removes all carried debuffs</> when <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered upon switching to this weapon. Then Siege Edge switches to the EM Blaster form and unleashes a powerful blast, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead. Grants Hyperbody and a shield equal to <shuzhi>5%</> of Max HP for <shuzhi>3.5</>s.
 Activates Electromagnetic Disruption after using Magnetic Ray Cannon, lasting for <shuzhi>20</>s. Grants Hyperbody for <shuzhi>5</>s (<shuzhi>4</>s in Apex League) in the beginning. Siege Edge inflicts Static upon targets under Electromagnetic Disruption, slowing them by <shuzhi>15%</> for <shuzhi>20</>s. When Electromagnetic Disruption is active, nearby enemies take damage equal to <shuzhi>20%</> of ATK per second (counts as Discharge Damage).
 Discharge Passive: Siege Edge's attack has a <shuzhi>20%</> chance of triggering Chain Static under Electromagnetic Disruption. Cooldown: <shuzhi>0.25</>s. Counts as Discharge Damage.
 Chain Static: Attacks up to <shuzhi>7</> targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>8% </>of ATK. Defeating a target triggers Chain Static again. Cooldown: <shuzhi>0.1</>s.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch five consecutive strikes.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行四次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack while airborne to unleash four consecutive strikes in mid-air, consuming Endurance.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面普攻时，使用第一次至第三次普攻中，长按普攻向前旋进小段距离造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并进入蓄势状态：
蓄势状态下立即松开可触发腾空斩，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，自身腾空并浮空命中目标，触发腾空斩后，点击普攻继续触发<shuzhi>普攻-天火</>；
蓄势状态持续<shuzhi>1.2</>秒后，维持长按触发乱风斩，每次斩击对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并消耗耐力，乱风斩期间松开可触发十字斩，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack during the first to third ground Normal Attack to spin forward for a small distance, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK, and triggers Anticipation.
 Release Anticipation immediately to cast Rising Slash, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and suspending targets hit when the caster also leaps into the air. After casting Rising Slash, press Normal Attack to cast <shuzhi>Heavenly Fire</>.
 Keep holding Anticipation for over <shuzhi>1.2</>s to cast Turbulence, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK with each hit and consuming Endurance. Release during Turbulence to cast Cross Slash, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，使用第一次至第三次普攻中，长按普攻可触发问斩。
快速落地并对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack during the first to third Normal Attacks while airborne to trigger Executioner's Judgement.
Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets upon a rapid landing.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

Desc.SourceString:
方向键加闪避键触发的前闪避短暂时间内，点击普攻可触发刀下鬼，对前方目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
将点击普攻改为长按，可在触发刀下鬼后继续触发<shuzhi>普攻-燎原</>。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack during the short perfect Dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Phantom Under the Blade, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead.
 Hold Normal Attack, instead of pressing, to trigger <shuzhi>Scorch the Land</> after casting Phantom Under the Blade.

Desc.SourceString:
后闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻可触发蹈汤火，向前斩出两道剑气命中目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
触发蹈汤火后，点击普攻可触发<shuzhi>普攻-焚身</>的第三次攻击。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack during the short period after post-dodge to trigger Walking Through Fire, launching 2 sword auras that deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the hit target.
 Press Normal Attack to trigger <shuzhi>Burning Sacrifice</>'s third strike after casting Walking Through Fire.

Desc.SourceString:
双击闪避，快速向前突进，对前方目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
<shuzhi>技能-分饰</>状态下，引风吹火将替换为冲上云霄，快速向高空突进并吸附附近目标，造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害并浮空目标，同时所有<shuzhi>技能-残影</>触发一次<shuzhi>闪避-所向无前</>，触发冲上云霄后，点击普攻可触发星火坠震，快速下落并对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害，同时所有<shuzhi>技能-残影</>触发一次<shuzhi>闪避-所向无前</>。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Double press Dodge to dash forward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead.
 Replaces Fanning the Flames with Up to the Skies when <shuzhi>Role Play</> is active, dashing into mid-air and pulling in nearby enemies, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK and suspending them, and all the <shuzhi>Afterimages</> cast <shuzhi>Unstoppable Momentum</> once. After casting Up to the Skies, press Normal Attack to cast Falling Star Impact, falling rapidly and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK, and all the <shuzhi>Afterimages</> cast <shuzhi>Unstoppable Momentum</> once.

Desc.SourceString: 在地面时，长按闪避进入蓄力状态，松开后可触发所向无前，向前方突进，对前方目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，所向无前发动时，场上每个<shuzhi>技能-残影</>都会朝向自身触发一次额外的所向无前，触发后<shuzhi>技能-残影</>会快速消散，击杀目标时，重置残影持续时间，可响应下一次所向无前。
Desc.LocalizedString: Hold Dodge to charge on the ground. Release to trigger Unstoppable Momentum, dashing forward and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK. When Unstoppable Momentum is activated, each <shuzhi>Afterimage</> on the field triggers an additional Unstoppable Momentum towards you and then quickly dissipates. Killing a target resets the <shuzhi>Afterimage</> duration, allowing for another Unstoppable Momentum.

Desc.SourceString:
后退抛掷武器，唤出火焰幻影斩击，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，多个幻影汇聚后自身突进与幻影发动合击，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害并击飞目标，冷却<shuzhi>40</>秒。同时自身进入分饰状态，持续<shuzhi>23</>秒，分饰施加时获得霸体状态持续<shuzhi>7</>秒。
<shuzhi>分饰</>：期间自身获得霸体，使用普攻、闪避攻击（可触发<shuzhi>闪避-所向无前</>的攻击除外）命中时可生成残影触发协同攻击，造成本次攻击<shuzhi>40%</>的伤害，残影持续<shuzhi>30</>秒，场上至多存在<shuzhi>5</>个残影，残影视为召唤物。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Throws the weapon while stepping back and summons Flame Phantom, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. Once multiple Phantoms are gathered, perform a strike with them, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and knocking them up. Cooldown: <shuzhi>40</>s. The caster enters Role Play for <shuzhi>23</>s, gaining Hyperbody for the first <shuzhi>7</>s.
 <shuzhi>Role Play</>: Grants Hyperbody. Creates an Afterimage upon hitting targets with Normal Attack and Dodge Attack (except with attacks that trigger <shuzhi>Unstoppable Momentum</>), dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>40%</> of the caster's attack. The Afterimage lasts for <shuzhi>30</>s. Up to <shuzhi>5</> Afterimages can exist at a time and count as summons.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，并持三刀蓄力，短暂蓄力后向前突入进行连续斩击，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒
Desc.LocalizedString: <shuzhi>Removes all carried debuffs</> when <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered upon switching to this weapon. Then dashes forward after a short charge, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. Grants Hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5s.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行四次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标，获得<shuzhi>2</>层<shuzhi>威能刻度</>
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标，获得<shuzhi>2</>层<shuzhi>威能刻度</>
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标，获得<shuzhi>2</>层<shuzhi>威能刻度</>
第四次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标，获得<shuzhi>4</>层<shuzhi>威能刻度</>
<shuzhi>普攻-魔力释放</>每次命中，会为目标添加一层<red>时机谬误</>：降低目标<shuzhi>3%</>全攻（该全攻降低不显示在拓荒者人物属性中），持续<shuzhi>10</>秒，至多叠加<shuzhi>4</>层。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack to launch four consecutive strikes while on the ground.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back. Also grants <shuzhi>2</> stacks of <shuzhi>Power Scale</>.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back. Also grants <shuzhi>2</> stacks of <shuzhi>Power Scale</>.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back. Also grants <shuzhi>2</> stacks of <shuzhi>Power Scale</>.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back. Also grants <shuzhi>4</> stacks of <shuzhi>Power Scale</>.
 Inflicts a stack of <red>Temporal Fallacy</> to the target upon a <shuzhi>Magic Unleashed</> hit, reducing the target's All Attack by <shuzhi>3%</> (not reflected on the caster's stats) for <shuzhi>10</>s, up to <shuzhi>4</> stacks.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可连续进行四次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标，获得<shuzhi>2</>层<shuzhi>威能刻度</>
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标，获得<shuzhi>2</>层<shuzhi>威能刻度</>
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标，获得<shuzhi>2</>层<shuzhi>威能刻度</>
第四次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标，获得<shuzhi>4</>层<shuzhi>威能刻度</>
<shuzhi>普攻-翔空魔舞</>每次命中，会为目标添加一层<red>时机谬误</>：降低目标<shuzhi>3%</>全攻（该全攻降低不显示在拓荒者人物属性中），持续<shuzhi>10</>秒，至多叠加<shuzhi>4</>层。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack while airborne to unleash four consecutive strikes, consuming Endurance.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back. Also grants <shuzhi>2</> stacks of <shuzhi>Power Scale</>.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back. Also grants <shuzhi>2</> stacks of <shuzhi>Power Scale</>.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back. Also grants <shuzhi>2</> stacks of <shuzhi>Power Scale</>.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back. Also grants <shuzhi>4</> stacks of <shuzhi>Power Scale</>.
 Inflicts a stack of <red>Temporal Fallacy</> to the target upon an <shuzhi>Aerial Waltz</> hit, reducing the target's All Attack by <shuzhi>3%</> (not reflected on the caster's stats) for <shuzhi>10</>s, up to <shuzhi>4</> stacks.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面普攻时，使用第三次至第四次普攻中，长按普攻可触发<shuzhi>棘轮炸弹</>。
对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
<shuzhi>普攻-棘轮炸弹</>命中后，<red>时机谬误</>效果短暂提升为降低目标<shuzhi>5%</>全攻（该全攻降低不显示在拓荒者人物属性中），同时添加<shuzhi>10%</>减速效果，持续<shuzhi>10</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack during the third to fourth ground Normal Attacks to trigger <shuzhi>Fated Wheel</>.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and knock them back.
 Enhances <red>Temporal Fallacy</>, reducing All Attack of the target by <shuzhi>5%</> (not reflected on the caster's stats) and inflicting a <shuzhi>10%</> Slow effect for <shuzhi>10</>s, upon a <shuzhi>Fated Wheel</> hit.

Desc.SourceString:
<red>时之魔女</>状态下，在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行四次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标，获得<shuzhi>2</>层<shuzhi>威能刻度</>
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标，获得<shuzhi>2</>层<shuzhi>威能刻度</>
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并牵引目标，获得<shuzhi>2</>层<shuzhi>威能刻度</>
第四次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击飞目标，获得<shuzhi>4</>层<shuzhi>威能刻度</>
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack during <red>Witch of Time</> to launch four consecutive strikes while on the ground.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back. Also grants <shuzhi>2</> stacks of <shuzhi>Power Scale</>.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back. Also grants <shuzhi>2</> stacks of <shuzhi>Power Scale</>.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target and draws them in. Also grants <shuzhi>2</> stacks of <shuzhi>Power Scale</>.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them up. Also grants <shuzhi>4</> stacks of <shuzhi>Power Scale</>.

Desc.SourceString:
<red>时之魔女</>状态下，当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可连续进行四次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标，获得<shuzhi>2</>层<shuzhi>威能刻度</>
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标，获得<shuzhi>2</>层<shuzhi>威能刻度</>
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并牵引目标，获得<shuzhi>2</>层<shuzhi>威能刻度</>
第四次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击飞目标，获得<shuzhi>4</>层<shuzhi>威能刻度</>
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack while airborne during <red>Witch of Time</> to unleash four consecutive strikes, consuming Endurance.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back. Also grants <shuzhi>2</> stacks of <shuzhi>Power Scale</>.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back. Also grants <shuzhi>2</> stacks of <shuzhi>Power Scale</>.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target and draws them in. Also grants <shuzhi>2</> stacks of <shuzhi>Power Scale</>.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them up. Also grants <shuzhi>4</> stacks of <shuzhi>Power Scale</>.

Desc.SourceString: <red>时之魔女</>状态下且拥有<shuzhi>12</>层<shuzhi>威能刻度</>时，长按普攻或在地面普攻时长按，消耗所有<shuzhi>威能刻度</>触发凝滞激流，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害；
Desc.LocalizedString: Hold Normal Attack or hold while performing Normal Attack on the ground during <red>Witch of Time</> with <shuzhi>12</> <shuzhi>Power Scale</> stacks to consume all <shuzhi>Power Scale</> stacks and trigger Stagnant Stream, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻，攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，可触发俯冲掠袭。
下落过程中，每次命中对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，落地后对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack while airborne, or use Normal Attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using Jetpack to trigger Divebomb.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK on each hit while falling. Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to nearby targets upon landing.

Desc.SourceString: 方向键加闪避键触发的前闪避短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发前闪避攻击，对前方目标至多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack during the short perfect Dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger a pre-Dodge Attack, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发后闪避攻击，对前方目标至多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack during the short period after dodging to trigger a post-dodge Attack, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead.

Desc.SourceString: 长按闪避进入驭空幻想，移动速度提升并持续消耗耐力；结束驭空幻想时，对前方目标至多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Hold Dodge to enter Airborne Fantasy, increasing speed and continuously consuming endurance. Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead upon ending Airborne Fantasy.

Desc.SourceString:
消耗所有<shuzhi>威能刻度</>，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害；
进入<red>时之魔女</>状态，部分普攻模式改变，并根据消耗的<shuzhi>威能刻度</>层数，每消耗<shuzhi>1</>层最终伤害提升<shuzhi>1%</>，持续<shuzhi>40</>秒；期间释放<shuzhi>普攻-凝滞激流</>，可获得新技能<shuzhi>零点光束</>（每个<red>时之魔女</>状态下仅可获取并释放<shuzhi>1</>次，且期间切换武器将无法获取或使用），冷却<shuzhi>40</>秒（不受任何冷却时间清除、重置、变化效果的影响）。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Consumes all <shuzhi>Power Scale</> stacks, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.
 Activates <red>Witch of Time</>, changing some Normal Attacks and increasing Final Damage by <shuzhi>1%</> for <shuzhi>40</>s for <shuzhi>each</> <shuzhi>Power Scale</> stack consumed. While in this state, using <shuzhi>Stagnant Stream</> grants a new skill: <shuzhi>Sub-Zero Beam</> (can only be obtained and used <shuzhi>1</> time in each <red>Witch of Time</>, and switching weapons during this state will prevent obtaining or using it). Cooldown: <shuzhi>40</>s. This is not affected by other cooldown clearing, resetting, or changing effects.

Desc.SourceString: <red>时之魔女</>状态下可释放，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害与<shuzhi>2</>秒冰冻效果，同时获得<shuzhi>12</>层<shuzhi>威能刻度</>。
Desc.LocalizedString: Available during <red>Witch of Time</>: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets, inflicts Freeze for <shuzhi>2</>s, and grants <shuzhi>12</> stacks of <shuzhi>Power Scale</>.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，立即获得<shuzhi>3</>秒霸体效果，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，同时自身获得<shuzhi>5%</>最大生命值的护盾，持续<shuzhi>3.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: <shuzhi>Removes all carried debuffs</> when <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered upon switching to this weapon. Then grants Hyperbody for <shuzhi>3</>s and deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. Grants a shield worth <shuzhi>5%</> of Max HP for <shuzhi>3.5</>s.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch five consecutive strikes.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第四次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use a normal attack to unleash five consecutive strikes, consuming Endurance.
First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
Fourth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面普攻时，使用第一次至第二次普攻中，长按普攻可触发狂刃流闪。
舞动赤风，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack during the first to second ground Normal Attacks to trigger Furious Flurry.
 Swings Scarlet Gale, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，长按普攻可触发猎风。
向目标发射子弹，命中目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack to trigger Gust Hunter while on the ground.
 Fires a shot at the target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target upon hit.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻（存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，可触发覆地万钧。
从空中下落，落地过程中对命中的敌人每次造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，落地后对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack while airborne (press when a target is available), or use Normal Attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Thousand-Ton Slam.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK on each hit while falling. Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to nearby targets upon landing.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

Desc.SourceString: 方向键加闪避键触发的前闪避短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发飞光重踢，对前方目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack during the short perfect Dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Glimmering Kick, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发枪影重重，对命中目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Hail of Shadows, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the hit target.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避之后的短暂时间内，长按普攻，可触发枪影无踪，对前方目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Hold Normal Attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Unseen Shadows, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead.

Desc.SourceString:
对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，冷却<shuzhi>35</>秒（不受任何冷却时间清除、重置、变化效果的影响）。
并获得提升<shuzhi>连携-斩风断雷</>伤害<shuzhi>12%</>的效果，持续<shuzhi>35</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. Cooldown: <shuzhi>35</>s. This is not affected by other cooldown clearing, resetting, or changing effects.
 Also increases <shuzhi>Windcutting Thunder</>'s damage by <shuzhi>12%</> for <shuzhi>35</>s.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，对前方目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，同时自身获得<shuzhi>5%</>最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续<shuzhi>3.5</>秒。并且在之后6秒触发同心化刃，对选中目标造成一次范围伤害（视为连携伤害）。
Desc.LocalizedString: <shuzhi>Removes all carried debuffs</> when <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered upon switching to this weapon. Then deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target. Grants Hyperbody and a shield equal to <shuzhi>5%</> of Max HP for <shuzhi>3.5</>s. Triggers Blade of Unity after 6s, dealing AoE damage to the selected target (counts as Discharge Damage).

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害。当存在追猎目标时，点击普攻将进行追击，出现在目标附近，造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力点伤害，追击每<shuzhi>3</>秒触发一次，追击命中目标后获得<shuzhi>1</>层狂热，狂热累计<shuzhi>3</>层时，使用次元封锁替换空迁追印。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch five consecutive strikes.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK on the fifth Normal Attack. When a Pursuit Prey target is present, pressing Normal Attack triggers a Pursuit that appears near the target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK. Pursuit is triggered once every <shuzhi>3</>s. Hitting a target with a Pursuit grants <shuzhi>1</> Frenzy stack. Upon reaching <shuzhi>3</> stacks, Chase of Nought is replaced with Dimensional Seal.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害。当存在追猎目标时，点击普攻将进行追击，出现在目标附近，造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力点伤害，追击每<shuzhi>3</>秒触发一次，追击命中目标后获得<shuzhi>1</>层狂热，狂热累计<shuzhi>3</>层时，使用次元封锁替换空迁追印。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use a normal attack to unleash five consecutive strikes, consuming Endurance.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK on the fifth Normal Attack. When a Pursuit Prey target is present, pressing Normal Attack triggers a Pursuit that appears near the target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK. Pursuit is triggered once every <shuzhi>3</>s. Hitting a target with a Pursuit grants <shuzhi>1</> Frenzy stack. Upon reaching <shuzhi>3</> stacks, Chase of Nought is replaced with Dimensional Seal.

Desc.SourceString: 长按普攻或在地面普攻时，使用第一次至第三次普攻中，长按普攻向后翻跃掷出湮灭之星，释放子弹造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，命中锁定目标时，为目标施加追猎标记。当存在追猎目标时，点击普攻将进行追击，追击命中目标后获得<shuzhi>1</>层狂热，狂热累计<shuzhi>3</>层时，使用次元封锁替换空迁追印。长按普攻触发次元封锁，闪现至锁定目标前方，抓取目标残像纳入黑洞（次元封锁持续期间免疫目标伤害），牵引后爆炸对大范围目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Hold Normal Attack or hold during the first to third hits on the ground to backflip and trigger Star of Oblivion, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK. Hitting a locked target applies a Pursuit mark. When a target has a Pursuit mark, press the normal attack to perform a Pursuit. Hitting the target with a Pursuit grants <shuzhi>1</> stack of Frenzy. At <shuzhi>3</> stacks of Frenzy, Dimensional Lock replaces Chase of Nought. Hold the normal attack to trigger Dimensional Lock, teleporting in front of the locked target and pulling its afterimage into a black hole (immune to damage from that target during Dimensional Lock). After pulling, the black hole explodes, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to targets in a large area.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，长按普攻可触发寂空降临。
快速落地并对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack while airborne to trigger Descent of Stillness.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets upon a rapid landing.

Desc.SourceString:
界域展开后，万籁回响替换虚空撕裂。在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害。当存在追猎目标时，点击普攻将进行追击，俯冲向目标附近，造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力点伤害，追击每<shuzhi>3</>秒触发一次，追击命中目标后获得<shuzhi>1</>层狂热，狂热累计<shuzhi>3</>层时，使用次元封锁替换空迁追印。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Deploys Boundary Zone, replacing Void Shredder with Echo of Infinity. Press Normal Attack to launch five consecutive strikes while on the ground.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK on the fifth Normal Attack. When a Pursuit Prey target is present, pressing Normal Attack triggers a Pursuit that dives next to the target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK. Pursuit is triggered once every <shuzhi>3</>s. Hitting a target with a Pursuit grants <shuzhi>1</> Frenzy stack. Upon reaching <shuzhi>3</> stacks, Chase of Nought is replaced with Dimensional Seal.

Desc.SourceString:
界域展开后，寂灭空天替换空影裁决。当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害。当存在追猎目标时，点击普攻将进行追击，俯冲向目标附近，造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力点伤害，追击每<shuzhi>3</>秒触发一次，追击命中目标后获得<shuzhi>1</>层狂热，狂热累计<shuzhi>3</>层时，使用次元封锁替换空迁追印。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Deploys Boundary Zone, replacing Reckoning of Shadow with Silent End. Press Normal Attack mid-air to launch five consecutive strikes, consuming Endurance.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK on the fifth Normal Attack. When a Pursuit Prey target is present, pressing Normal Attack triggers a Pursuit that dives next to the target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK. Pursuit is triggered once every <shuzhi>3</>s. Hitting a target with a Pursuit grants <shuzhi>1</> Frenzy stack. Upon reaching <shuzhi>3</> stacks, Chase of Nought is replaced with Dimensional Seal.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

Desc.SourceString: 后闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻可触发断空跃击，向前断空跃击命中目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Shortly after a back dodge, click the normal attack to trigger Shattering Leap, which deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.

Desc.SourceString: 界域展开后，幻空回响替换断空跃击。闪避之后的短时间内，点击普攻触发幻空回响，释放多枚飞弹追击目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，对主目标附加追猎标记，下次攻击替换为追击。
Desc.LocalizedString: When Realm is used, Echo of Emptiness replaces Shattering Leap. Shortly after a Dodge, click the normal attack to trigger Echo of Emptiness, releasing multiple missiles that pursue the target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK. Applies a Pursuit mark to the main target, and the next attack is replaced with Pursuit.

Desc.SourceString:
短按技能，向前跳跃，唤出数柄湮灭之星刃插入地面，对命中目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，落下黑光造成爆炸，对范围内目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，完成技能获得<shuzhi>环形黑星-再现</>并创建界域，技能冷却<shuzhi>40</>秒。
<shuzhi>环绕之星-再现</>：界域内，使用的前<shuzhi>1</>次追加攻击造成伤害时额外造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害（该伤害视为普攻伤害）。界域存在期间，累计玩家造成的所有伤害，当使用空刃泯灭或连携导致界域破碎时，对范围内所有目标造成累计伤害100%的伤害，最高不可超过个人攻击*<shuzhi>500%</>的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press to leap forward, summoning multiple Star of Oblivion blades that pierce the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK, followed by a dark explosion dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to targets in the area. Completing the skill grants <shuzhi>Dark Star: Rebirth</> and creates a Boundary Zone. Cooldown: <shuzhi>40</>s.
 <shuzhi>Dark Star: Rebirth</>: Deals additional damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK (counts as Normal Attack damage) with the <shuzhi>previous</> extra attack used inside the Boundary Zone. While the Boundary Zone exists, all damage dealt by the caster is accumulated. Deals 100% of the accumulated damage to all targets within the range when the Boundary Zone is broken by Obliteration Blade or a Discharge Skill, up to <shuzhi>500%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
长按技能，短暂蓄力后，展开界域（界域范围内所有敌方怪物受到缓速效果，界域存在期间，武器切回湮灭之星时，不消耗能量自动释放裂空连携，破碎界域），发射飞弹造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，命中锁定目标时为目标附加追猎印记，将攻击替换为刃型，替换闪避攻击为幻空回响，<shuzhi>10</>秒后将技能替换为空刃泯灭（完成万籁回响最后一段攻击，立即替换技能为空刃泯灭），获得<shuzhi>环形黑星-再现</>；
<shuzhi>环绕之星-再现</>：界域内，使用的前<shuzhi>1</>次追加攻击造成伤害时额外造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害（该伤害视为普攻伤害）。界域存在期间，累计玩家造成的所有伤害，当使用空刃泯灭或连携导致界域破碎时，对范围内所有目标造成累计伤害100%的伤害，最高不可超过个人攻击*<shuzhi>500%</>的伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold the skill to briefly charge, then deploy the Boundary Zone. Enemies inside the zone are slowed. Switching back to Star of Oblivion during its duration consumes no energy to release Shattered Realm, which fires missiles dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK. Hitting locked-on targets marks them as Pursuit Prey, changes attacks to Blade-type, and replaces Dodge Attack with Echo of Emptiness. After <shuzhi>10</>s, the skill transforms into Obliteration Blade (finishing the last hit of Echo of Infinity immediately replaces the skill with Obliteration Blade) and grants <shuzhi>Dark Star: Rebirth</>.
 <shuzhi>Dark Star: Rebirth</>: Deals additional damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK (counts as Normal Attack damage) with the <shuzhi>previous</> extra attack used inside the Boundary Zone. While the Boundary Zone exists, all damage dealt by the caster is accumulated. Deals 100% of the accumulated damage to all targets within the range when the Boundary Zone is broken by Obliteration Blade or a Discharge Skill, up to <shuzhi>500%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString: 短按技能，召唤裂空向前突进在身前放置奇点，自身向后蓄力短暂时间向前突进穿过奇点，突进对穿过目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，奇点扩张凝滞范围内地方怪物，奇点扩张至最大时，折回斩击造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，同时解除界域效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press to summon Voidpiercer to dash forward, placing a Singularity ahead. After a brief charge, Voidpiercer pierces through the Singularity, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to enemies in her path. The Singularity immobilizes enemies within range, expands to maximum size, then collapses in a slashing attack, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK and ending the Boundary Zone.

Desc.SourceString: 使用裂空时，可在开启地图时获取所有世界boss的生存信息，通过地图中选择对应的世界boss直接进行神临，传送到boss上空并落地（Boss重生中任然可以使用此法进行传送，一分钟可使用一次）。
Desc.LocalizedString: Allows viewing the survival status of all World Bosses on the map when using Voidpiercer. Selecting a World Boss on the map triggers Divine Arrival, transmitting above the Boss and landing. Divine Arrival can be used once per minute, and remains available during the Boss's respawn.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，化身裂空，展开巨型黑洞，对范围内目标造成<shuzhi>100%</>减速效果，压缩黑洞从手中射出造成范围爆炸，对命中目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: <red>Removes all carried debuffs</> when <shuzhi>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered upon switching to this weapon, then transforms into Voidpiercer and generates a giant black hole, reducing targets' Speed by <shuzhi>100%</>. Compresses the black hole and launches it to cause an AoE explosion, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK on hit. Grants Hyperbody and a shield worth 5% of Max HP for 3.5s.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行六次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第六次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack to launch six consecutive strikes while on the ground.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Sixth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK to the target.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行六次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第四次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第六次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack while airborne to unleash six consecutive strikes in mid-air, consuming Endurance.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Sixth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK to the target.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，使用第三次普攻时，长按普攻可触发蕴境一世界。
向地面掷出规衡，组成双头旋刃，螺旋向外，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并使目标浮空。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack at the third ground Normal Attack to trigger Realm of the Profound.
 Throws Equilibrium toward the ground, forming a whirling blade that spins outward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and suspending targets in the air.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，使用普攻时，长按普攻可触发明月叶飞落。
从天而降，落地后对释放规衡附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击飞目标，规衡扩散与收束期间轻微拉扯附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack while airborne to trigger Falling Moonleaf.
 Falls from the sky and uses Equilibrium, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and knocking them up upon landing. Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to nearby targets when Equilibrium expands and converges.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

Desc.SourceString: 方向键加闪避键触发的前闪避短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发风舞万千影，甩出规衡，对前方目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Dancing Shadows and fling out Equilibrium, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead.

Desc.SourceString: 后闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发斩云弄刀影，随机发射<shuzhi>8</>对飞刀随机追击前方目标，命中目标，总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点的范围伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Use normal attack during the short period after dodging backward to trigger Cloud Carver, randomly throwing <shuzhi>8</> pairs of homing blades that go after random targets ahead, dealing total area damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK upon hit.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避之后的短暂时间内，长按普攻，可触发熠起寒光芒，持续发射飞刀追击前方目标，命中目标后爆炸总计造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点的伤害，抬起时，跃起向前方掷出规衡，造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点的伤害。长按至多持续<shuzhi>3</>秒，便会自动掷出规衡。
Desc.LocalizedString: Hold normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Frigid Brilliance, continuously throwing homing blades that go after targets ahead, exploding upon hit and dealing total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK. Upon release, leap and fling out Equilibrium ahead, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK. Can hold for up to <shuzhi>3</> seconds, after which time Equilibrium will automatically be thrown.

Desc.SourceString: 在地面或当拓荒者滞空时，后闪避长按可触发飞漩穿云逝，在短暂的蓄力后，释放可化身流光向前飞射，<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，持续长按蓄力可以延长飞射距离，长按最多持续<shuzhi>1.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: While on the ground or airborne, dodge backward and hold dodge to trigger Cloud-Piercing Whirl. After briefly charging, release to transform into a beam of light and fly forward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK. Charging for longer increases the flight distance. Can hold for up to <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds.

Desc.SourceString:
对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并且获得<shuzhi>5</>秒的霸体效果，<shuzhi>连旋动九天</>结束时获得<shuzhi>2</>把<shuzhi>灼刃</>，同时进入灼影酝玄心状态，持续<shuzhi>30</>秒（<shuzhi>灼刃</>每<shuzhi>30</>秒最多获得一次），冷却<shuzhi>40</>秒。
<shuzhi>灼刃</>：规衡对目标造成闪避攻击伤害时，消耗<shuzhi>1</>把<shuzhi>灼刃</>，对目标额外造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，造成伤害后恢复<shuzhi>1</>点闪避次数。该伤害视为技能伤害，且每<shuzhi>2.8</>秒至多触发<shuzhi>1</>次。
<shuzhi>灼影酝玄心</>：规衡普攻命中时叠加<shuzhi>1</>层灼心，最多<shuzhi>3</>层，每层增加灼刃伤害<shuzhi>{4}%</>。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and grants Hyperbody for <shuzhi>5</>s. Grants <shuzhi>2</> <shuzhi>Searing Blades</> and enters Shadowflare for <shuzhi>30</>s after <shuzhi>Enduring Rotation</> ends (<shuzhi>Searing Blades</> can be obtained at most once every <shuzhi>30</>s). Cooldown: <shuzhi>40</>s.
 <shuzhi>Searing Blade</>: Consumes <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Searing Blade</> when hitting a target with Equilibrium's Dodge Attack, dealing bonus damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK. Restores <shuzhi>1</> Dodge attempt after dealing this damage. Counts as skill damage and can trigger at most <shuzhi>once</> every <shuzhi>2.8</>s.
 <shuzhi>Shadowflare</>: Applies <shuzhi>1</> stack of Blazing Core when hitting a target with Equilibrium's Normal Attack, up to <shuzhi>3</> stacks, each stack increasing Searing Blade's damage by <shuzhi>{4}%</>.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，高速旋转规衡，在身周卷起气刃，化身风暴向前推进，造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: <shuzhi>Removes all carried debuffs</> when <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered upon switching to this weapon. Then rapidly spins Equilibrium to stir up a storm, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. Grants Hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5s.

Desc.SourceString: 向指定位置发射一枚能量弹，命中“野兽”类型怪物后可以将其控制为友方（对boss无效，且仅在大世界生效），持续<shuzhi>30</>秒，冷却时间<shuzhi>60</>秒，能量弹再次命中受到控制的目标后，目标所受控制解除，同时受到控制的怪物数量上限为<shuzhi>1</>只，最多可存储<shuzhi>2</>次充能。
Desc.LocalizedString: Launch an energy bullet to a specified location. When it hits a "beast" type enemy, it can be controlled as an ally (ineffective against bosses, and only effective in the Overworld) for <shuzhi>30</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>60</> seconds. If the energy bullet hits a controlled target again, you will lose control. The maximum number of controlled enemies is <shuzhi>1</> with a maximum of <shuzhi>2</> charges that can be stored.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并浮空目标。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击倒目标。
第四次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并浮空目标。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击倒目标。

触发流萤电波后，长按普攻可触发<shuzhi>幻想律动</>。

战斗状态下，<shuzhi>武器-契约徽章玫茨</>处于后台时，玫茨仍然会留在场上协同攻击，玫茨属于召唤物，每次命中对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{10}%</>*攻击力点伤害，元素类型跟随当前武器。
激活<shuzhi>恩赐共鸣</>时：
流萤电波第一次攻击可以指定至多<shuzhi>1</>名队友成为挚友，并使挚友身边额外召唤至多<shuzhi>1</>只玫茨跟随，释放玫茨光环每秒为附近队友回复<shuzhi>40%</>*自身攻击力的生命值并提升<shuzhi>5%</>最终伤害，该效果不可叠加，玫茨在自身重伤倒地、超出与自身距离后会解除跟随挚友状态。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch five consecutive strikes.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and suspends them.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target and suspends them.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.

 Hold Normal Attack to activate <shuzhi>Phantasmic Rhythm</> after triggering Firefly Wave.

 While in combat, when <shuzhi>Pactcrest ☆ Metz</> is in the off-hand slot, Metz remains on the battlefield to perform coordinated attacks. Metz is considered a summon, and each attack deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{10}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. The elemental damage type dealt matches that of the current weapon.
 Active <shuzhi>Benediction Resonance</>:
 The first attack from Firefly Wave appoints up to <shuzhi>1</> teammate as a "Bestie" and summons up to <shuzhi>1</> Metz to follow them. Using Metz Halo recovers HP equal to <shuzhi>40%</> of the caster's ATK for nearby teammates every second, and increases their Final Damage by <shuzhi>5%</>. This effect does not stack. Metz stops following the Bestie if the caster is knocked down or if Metz moves too far from the caster.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第四次攻击至多对目标造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use a normal attack to unleash five consecutive strikes, consuming Endurance.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，长按普攻可触发粉钻级连锁乱打。
指挥玫茨贴身攻击目标，期间自身获得霸体，并消耗耐力，每次命中对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack to trigger Pink Chain Frenzy while on the ground.
 Commands Metz to attack a target, granting Hyperbody and consuming Endurance during the attack. Each hit deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面普攻时，使用第一次至第四次普攻时，长按普攻可触发幻想律动。
化身为玫茨，冲击前方目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，再奋力一扑，对命中目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack during the first to fourth ground normal attacks to trigger Phantasmic Rhythm.
 Transforms into Metz and dash forward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the targets ahead, then pounces on them, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻（存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，可触发使魔天坠。
下落过程中，每次命中目标对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack while airborne (press when a target is available), or use Normal Attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using a Jetpack to trigger Familiar Descent.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK on each hit while falling.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

Desc.SourceString: 方向键加闪避键触发的前闪避短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发蹭蹭闪光，对命中目标至多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Strolling Flash, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets hit.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发玫茨磁磁磁，使玫茨冲撞地面对前方目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack during the short period after dodging to trigger MetzZZz. Metz crashes into the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets in front.

Desc.SourceString:
百万玫茨冲击波释放成功时，自身进入契约增幅状态，持续<shuzhi>20</>秒。同时为队友增加<shuzhi>{4}%</>最终伤害，持续<shuzhi>7</>秒，并清除队友<shuzhi>{6}</>点灰噬值。
激活<shuzhi>非恩赐共鸣</>时：
对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害,冷却<shuzhi>32</>秒,百万玫茨冲击波处于冷却状态时，契约增幅状态下<shuzhi>3S</>后获得<shuzhi>1</>次玫茨蓄能波：对附近目标造成<shuzhi>350%</>*攻击力伤害。玫茨蓄能波能每<shuzhi>20</>秒至多获得<shuzhi>1</>次。
契约增幅状态下若再次释放百万玫茨冲击波，契约增幅状态持续时间以及伤害累计进度将会重置。
契约增幅状态自然结束时，结算未释放的玫茨蓄能波，对附近目标造成积攒次数*<shuzhi>231%</>*攻击力伤害。

激活<shuzhi>恩赐共鸣</>时：
释放技能造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。回复自身与附近队友<shuzhi>600%</>*攻击力生命值，额外回复挚友<shuzhi>10%</>最大生命值，解除自身与附近队友的负面状态与控制效果（不包括灰噬效果），并在<shuzhi>3</>秒内免疫负面状态与控制效果，冷却<shuzhi>15</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Enters the Pact Amplification state for <shuzhi>20</>s upon casting Million-Metz Shockwave. Grants all teammates <shuzhi>{4}%</> Final Damage for <shuzhi>7</>s and clears <shuzhi>{6}</> stacks of Graying Bite from them.
 Active <shuzhi>non-Benediction Resonance</>:
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. Cooldown: <shuzhi>32</>s. While Million-Metz Shockwave is on cooldown, grants <shuzhi>1</> Metz Energy Wave <shuzhi>3s</> after entering Pact Amplification, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>350%</> of ATK to nearby targets. Each Metz Energy Wave can be gained up to <shuzhi>once</> every <shuzhi>20</>s.
 Casts Million-Metz Shockwave again during Pact Amplification to reset the duration and accumulated damage of Pact Amplification.
 Accumulates unused Metz Energy Waves when Pact Amplification ends naturally, dealing damage equal to unused charges × <shuzhi>231%</> of ATK.

 Active <shuzhi>Benediction Resonance</>:
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK when casting skills. Restores HP equal to <shuzhi>600%</> of ATK to the caster and nearby teammates, and restores <shuzhi>10%</> of the Bestie's Max HP. Removes debuffs and control effects from the caster and nearby teammates (excluding Graying Bite), and grants immunity to debuffs and control effects for <shuzhi>3</>s. Cooldown: <shuzhi>15</>s.

Desc.SourceString:
当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，召唤奇约交响结界，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，同时自身获得<shuzhi>5%</>最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续<shuzhi>3.5</>秒。

激活<shuzhi>恩赐共鸣</>时：
奇约交响结界会将命中的附近目标及非队友玩家变身为玫茨（对Boss不生效，巅峰联赛不生效），持续<shuzhi>4</>秒，每个目标每<shuzhi>60</>秒至多可变身<shuzhi>1</>次。
Desc.LocalizedString:
<red>Removes all carried debuffs</> when <shuzhi>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered upon switching to this weapon, then summons the Strange Symphonic Realm, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby enemies. Grants Hyperbody and a shield worth <shuzhi>5%</> of Max HP for <shuzhi>3.5</>s.

 Active <shuzhi>Benediction Resonance</>:
 The Strange Symphonic Realm transforms nearby targets hit and non-teammate players into Metz (not effective against bosses, and not applicable in Apex League) for <shuzhi>4</>s. Each target can be transformed up to <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>60</>s.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击飞目标
第四次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并牵引目标
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击飞目标
<shuzhi>技能-阿尔法攻击模式</>期间，第一/三/五次普攻索敌能力提高。

当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击飞目标
第四次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并牵引目标
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击飞目标

在地面普攻时，使用第一次至第四次普攻中，长按普攻可触发特殊攻击模式-引雷。
对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack during the first to fourth ground normal attacks to trigger Special Attack – Thunderbringer.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString:
强化状态下，当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击飞目标
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第四次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标

<shuzhi>技能-阿尔法攻击模式</>期间可释放，拥有<red>阿尔法能量</>时，滞空或在空中普攻使用第一次至第五次普攻中，长按普攻触发特殊攻击模式-暴雨，同时消耗一点<red>阿尔法能量</>。
对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害（该伤害视为技能伤害）。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Activates by consuming <red>Alpha Energy</> during <shuzhi>Alpha Attack</>. Hold the normal attack button while airborne or during the first to fifth aerial normal attacks to trigger Special Attack – Rainstorm, consuming 1 <red>Alpha Energy</>.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets (counts as skill damage).

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻，攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，可触发常规攻击模式-落雷。
下落过程中，每次命中对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，落地后对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
落地时若拥有<red>阿尔法能量</>，消耗一点<red>阿尔法能量</>，额外造成一次<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害（该伤害视为技能伤害）。<shuzhi>技能-阿尔法攻击模式</>期间该技能索敌能力提升。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack while airborne, or use Normal Attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using Jetpack to trigger General Attack - Lightning Strike.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK on each hit while falling. Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to nearby targets upon landing. Consumes 1 <red>Alpha Energy</> to deal bonus damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK once upon landing when <red>Alpha Energy</> is available (counts as skill damage). Restores 1 Dodge attempt. Greatly increases target acquisition during <shuzhi>Alpha Attack</>.

Desc.SourceString:
方向键加闪避键触发的前闪避短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发前闪避攻击，对前方目标至多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
拥有<red>阿尔法能量</>时，消耗一点<red>阿尔法能量</>，额外造成一次<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害（该伤害视为技能伤害），同时回复自身<shuzhi>1</>次闪避次数。<shuzhi>技能-阿尔法攻击模式</>期间该技能索敌能力大幅提升。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger a pre-dodge attack, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead.
 Consumes 1 <red>Alpha Energy</> to deal bonus damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK once when <red>Alpha Energy</> is available (counts as skill damage). Restores <shuzhi>1</> Dodge attempt. Greatly increases target acquisition during <shuzhi>Alpha Attack</>.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发后闪避攻击，对前方目标至多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
拥有<red>阿尔法能量</>时，消耗一点<red>阿尔法能量</>，额外造成一次<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害（该伤害视为技能伤害），同时回复自身<shuzhi>1</>次闪避次数。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack during the short period after dodging to trigger a post-dodge attack, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead.
 Consumes 1 <red>Alpha Energy</> to deal bonus damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK once when <red>Alpha Energy</> is available (counts as skill damage). Restores <shuzhi>1</> Dodge attempt.

Desc.SourceString: 方向键加闪避键触发的前闪避短暂时间内，长按闪避可触发高速巡航模式-云（巅峰联赛无法使用），并持续消耗耐力，期间长按跳跃键可快速上升，并且耐力消耗增加；<shuzhi>高速巡航模式-云</>持续期间不受任何移速提升效果的影响。
Desc.LocalizedString: Hold the dodge button within the perfect dodge window (use the movement button before dodging) to activate Highspeed Cruise Mode - Cloud (not applicable in Apex League), continuously consuming Endurance. While in <shuzhi>Highspeed Cruise Mode - Cloud</>, holding the jump button enables rapid ascent at an increased Endurance cost, and the Wanderer is unaffected by any Speed bonuses.

Name.SourceString: 极限攻击模式转换-蓄雷

Desc.SourceString:
进入<shuzhi>阿尔法攻击模式</>，自身获得短暂无敌并对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，最终伤害提升<shuzhi>6%</>，持续<shuzhi>45</>秒；
激活<shuzhi>阿尔法充能系统</>，当<shuzhi>武器-镇魂曲</>处于前台时，每<shuzhi>3</>秒获得一点<red>阿尔法能量</>，同时最多拥有<shuzhi>4</>点，<shuzhi>阿尔法攻击模式</>结束或<shuzhi>武器-镇魂曲</>被切换到后台时，<shuzhi>阿尔法充能系统</>与<red>阿尔法能量</>将被移除；<shuzhi>阿尔法攻击模式</>期间首次获得<red>阿尔法能量</>时，获得技能<shuzhi>极限攻击模式-狂岚</>（阿尔法攻击模式期间可释放），期间切换武器将无法获得/使用<shuzhi>极限攻击模式-狂岚</>；
<shuzhi>技能-阿尔法攻击模式</>期间，<shuzhi>武器-镇魂曲</>首次切换到后台时，激活<shuzhi>辅助攻击系统S.A.S</>立刻对附近敌人进行一次打击，后续每间隔<shuzhi>8</>秒自动对附近敌人进行打击，造成<shuzhi>300%</>*攻击力雷电伤害（此伤害为技能伤害），至多打击<shuzhi>3</>次；技能冷却<shuzhi>40</>秒（不受任何冷却时间清除、重置、变化效果的影响）。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Enters <shuzhi>Alpha Attack</> and grants temporary Invincibility, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and increasing Final Damage by <shuzhi>6%</> for <shuzhi>45</>s.
 Grants 1 <red>Alpha Energy</> every <shuzhi>3</>s while <shuzhi>Alpha Charge</> is active and <shuzhi>Requiem</> is equipped in the main slot, up to <shuzhi>4</> Energy. Removes <shuzhi>Alpha Charge</> and all stored <red>Alpha Energy</> when <shuzhi>Alpha Attack</> ends or when <shuzhi>Requiem</> is switched to the off-hand slot. Grants 1 cast of <shuzhi>Extreme Attack – Windward</> upon first gaining <red>Alpha Energy</> during <shuzhi>Alpha Attack</> (usable during Alpha Attack). Switching weapons disables the acquisition and use of <shuzhi>Extreme Attack – Windward</>.
 Activates <shuzhi>S.A.S Support Strike</> when <shuzhi>Requiem</> is first switched to the off-hand slot during <shuzhi>Alpha Attack</>, immediately striking nearby enemies. Automatically strikes nearby enemies every <shuzhi>8</>s thereafter, dealing Volt Damage equal to <shuzhi>300%</> of ATK (counts as skill damage), up to <shuzhi>3</> times. Cooldown: <shuzhi>40</>s （This is not affected by other cooldown clearing, resetting, or changing effects.).

Desc.SourceString:
<shuzhi>技能-阿尔法攻击模式</>期间可释放，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
拥有<red>阿尔法能量</>时，消耗一点阿尔法能量，额外造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害（该伤害视为技能伤害）。

Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets while <shuzhi>Alpha Attack</> is active.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，同时自身获得<shuzhi>5%</>最大生命值的护盾，持续<shuzhi>3.5</>秒。

Grants Hyperbody and a shield worth <shuzhi>5%</> of Max HP for <shuzhi>3.5</>s.

耳光变形扫射前方扇形区域，对目标造成至多<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。

SLAP transforms to unleash spray fire in a cone-shaped area in front, dealing damage equal to up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，长按普攻可触发打你打你打你。
向瞄准方向发射子弹，每次命中目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack to trigger Frenzy Smack while on the ground.
 Fires a shot in the aimed direction, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target with each hit.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻（存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，可触发耳光带我飞。

Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack while airborne (press when a target is available), or use Normal Attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Flap & SLAP.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK on each hit while falling. Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to nearby targets upon landing.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

Desc.SourceString: 方向键加闪避键触发的前闪避短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发转圈打你，对前方目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack during the short perfect Dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Spinning Strike, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发后坐力太大，对前方目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Recoil Rush, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead.

Desc.SourceString: 长按闪避可触发耳光带我飞，使用耳光水平飞行。
Desc.LocalizedString: Hold Dodge to trigger Flap & SLAP, flying horizontally with SLAP.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避之后的短暂时间内，长按普攻，可触发我蹦——！，转动方向选择投射朝向后松开普攻即可将自身投射出去。
Desc.LocalizedString: Tap and hold normal attack right after dodging to trigger Haaa-yaa! Aim the projection direction by rotating, then release normal attack to launch yourself.

Desc.SourceString:
对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，冷却<shuzhi>30</>秒（不受任何冷却时间清除、重置、变化效果的影响）。
释放胡萝卜快打后获得<shuzhi>25</>秒<shuzhi>10%</>伤害提升。并对当前锁定目标添加胡萝贝贝雷，持续<shuzhi>25</>秒，拥有胡萝贝贝雷的目标每受到<shuzhi>35</>次耳光的伤害会产生一次<shuzhi>技能-响亮大耳光</>，造成<shuzhi>600%</>攻击力的大范围爆炸伤害（技能伤害），最多触发<shuzhi>2</>次。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</>s. This is not affected by other cooldown clearing, resetting, or changing effects.
 Increases damage by <shuzhi>10%</> for <shuzhi>25</>s after casting Carrot Kombat, inflicting the locked-on target with Carrot Grenade for <shuzhi>25</>s. Launches a <shuzhi>Loud Slap</> at the target with Carrot Grenade for every <shuzhi>35</> instances of SLAP damage they take, dealing a large AoE explosion damage (skill damage) equal to <shuzhi>600%</> of ATK. Triggers up to <shuzhi>twice</>.
