Desc.LocalizedString:
While using normal attack on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when using the first to second normal attacks to trigger Swift Twirl.
 Performs a rapid triangular sprint attack. Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby enemies.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面普攻时，使用第三次至第四次普攻中，长按普攻可触发节奏浪潮。
持续原地旋转一段时间后，向前方发动一次强力攻击，对附近目标共造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While using normal attack on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when using the third to fourth normal attacks to trigger Rhythm Wave.
 Launches a powerful attack forward after spinning for some time. Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby enemies.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻（存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，可触发完美着陆。
从空中下落，落地过程中对命中的敌人每次造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，落地后对附近目标共造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Perfect Landing.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK on each hit while falling. Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK in total to nearby targets upon landing.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

Desc.SourceString: 方向键加闪避键触发的前闪避短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发翻转逆袭，对前方目标至多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack during the short perfect Dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Reversal Strike, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发旋跃冲锋，对命中目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Swirl Sprint, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the hit target.

Desc.SourceString: 方向键加闪避键触发的前闪避短暂时间内，长按闪避可触发喷气滑行模式（巅峰联赛无法使用），并持续消耗耐力，期间短按跳跃键可滑行至墙体上继续滑行；喷气滑行模式持续期间不受任何移速提升效果的影响。
Desc.LocalizedString: Hold the dodge button within the perfect dodge window (use the movement button before dodging) to activate Slide Mode (unavailable in Apex League), continuously consuming endurance. While in Slide Mode, pressing the jump button allows Lyncis to slide on the wall. During this mode, speed boost won't take effect.

Desc.SourceString:
琳赛踩动滑板开始环形加速，到达最高点后开始滑行降落，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，获得热点嗅觉状态，期间获得持续<shuzhi>6</>秒的霸体，冷却<shuzhi>35</>秒（不受任何冷却时间清除、重置、变化效果的影响）。
热点嗅觉状态:获得热点追踪效果，持续<shuzhi>25</>秒，期间切换其它武器将提前结束该状态，<shuzhi>武器-哧溜</>驻场时每<shuzhi>6</>秒获得<shuzhi>1</>点<shuzhi>热点指数</>，拥有热点指数时技能替换为焦点冲击，消耗<shuzhi>1</>点热点指数可释放焦点冲击对附近目标造成<shuzhi>880%</>*攻击力点伤害，焦点冲击每<shuzhi>2</>秒至多释放一次，每次热点嗅觉状态下最多获得<shuzhi>2</>点热点指数。
热点嗅觉状态结束时，琳赛会自动释放<shuzhi>技能-焦点冲击</>，对附近目标造成未使用的热点指数*<shuzhi>880%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Rides the skateboard in a circular motion, gaining speed until reaching the peak, then glides down to land, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby enemies, and grants Hotspot Detector, and Hyperbody which lasts <shuzhi>6</>s. Cooldown: <shuzhi>35</>s. This is not affected by other cooldown clearing, resetting, or changing effects.
 Hotspot Detector: Gains the Hotspot Tracker effect for <shuzhi>25</>s (switching to another weapon will immediately end this status), getting <shuzhi>1</> <shuzhi>Hotspot Index</> every <shuzhi>6</>s when <shuzhi>Swish</> is on-field. The skill is replaced by Focused Impact when owning Hotspot Index. Consume <shuzhi>1</> Hotspot Index to cast Focused Impact to deal damage equal to <shuzhi>880%</> of ATK to nearby enemies. Focused Impact can be cast up to once every <shuzhi>2</>s. Up to <shuzhi>2</> Hotspot Index can be obtained during each Hotspot Detector status.
 Lyncis automatically casts <shuzhi>Focused Impact</> after Hotspot Detector status ends, dealing damage equal to the unused Hotspot Index × <shuzhi>880%</> of ATK to nearby enemies.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，琳赛加速腾空，高速冲击地面后进行一段极速滑行，对附近目标共造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: <shuzhi>Removes all carried debuffs</> when <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered upon switching to this weapon. Then Lyncis leaps into the air to launch a strike from above and glides on the ground, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK in total to nearby targets. Grants Hyperbody and a shield equal to 5% of Max HP for 3.5s.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第四次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch five consecutive strikes.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第四次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use a normal attack to unleash five consecutive strikes, consuming Endurance.
First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
Fourth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面处于<shuzhi>技能-光刃超频</>状态下时，点击普攻可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第四次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击飞目标
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground and under <shuzhi>Photon Surge</>, use normal attack to launch five consecutive strikes.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them up.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空处于<shuzhi>技能-光刃超频</>状态下时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第二次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第三次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第四次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第五次攻击对目标造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击飞目标
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne and under <shuzhi>Photon Surge</>, use a normal attack to launch five consecutive strikes, consuming Endurance.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Second strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Third strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them up.

Desc.SourceString:
<shuzhi>技能-光刃超频</>期间可释放，拥有<red>超频新星</>时，在地面使用第一次至第五次普攻中长按或直接长按普攻触发，同时消耗一层<red>超频新星</>，在每次<shuzhi>技能-光刃超频</>期间内，仅能触发一次。
对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，释放后自身受到的最终伤害降低<shuzhi>5%</>，持续<shuzhi>35</>秒，此效果不可叠加。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Can be activated during <shuzhi>Photon Surge</>. When <red>Overnova</> is active, holding the skill button during any of the first five ground hits or holding the normal attack button will trigger the effect, consuming 1 <red>Overnova</> stack. This effect can only trigger once per <shuzhi>Photon Surge</>.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and reduces Final Damage taken by <shuzhi>5%</> for <shuzhi>35</>s. Unstackable.

Desc.SourceString:
<shuzhi>技能-光刃超频</>期间可释放，拥有<red>超频新星</>时，在地面使用第一次至第五次普攻中长按、<shuzhi>利刃在握</>释放中长按或直接长按普攻触发，同时消耗一层<red>超频新星</>，在每次<shuzhi>技能-光刃超频</>期间内，仅能触发一次。
对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，释放后自身受治疗效果提升<shuzhi>15%</>，持续<shuzhi>35</>秒，此效果不可叠加。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Can be activated during <shuzhi>Photon Surge</>. While <red>Overnova</> is active, holding the skill button during any of the first five ground hits or while casting <shuzhi>Edge Grip</>, or holding the normal attack button, will trigger the effect and consume 1 <red>Overnova</> stack. This effect can only trigger once per <shuzhi>Photon Surge</>.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and increases healing received by <shuzhi>15%</> for <shuzhi>35</>s. Unstackable.

Desc.SourceString:
<shuzhi>技能-光刃超频</>期间可释放，拥有<red>超频新星</>时，在地面使用第一次至第五次普攻中长按、<shuzhi>增幅闪击</>释放中长按或直接长按普攻触发，同时消耗一层<red>超频新星</>，在每次<shuzhi>技能-光刃超频</>期间内，仅能触发一次。
对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，释放后嘲讽附近敌人，持续<shuzhi>1.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Can be activated during <shuzhi>Photon Surge</>. While <red>Overnova</> is active, holding the skill button during any of the first five ground hits or while casting <shuzhi>Amplified Lunge</>, or holding the normal attack button, will trigger the effect and consume 1 <red>Overnova</> stack. This effect can only trigger once per <shuzhi>Photon Surge</>.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and taunts nearby enemies for <shuzhi>1.5</>s.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻，攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，可触发天降裁决。
下落过程中，每次命中对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，落地后对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold normal attack while airborne, or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using Jetback to trigger Skyfall Verdict.
Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK on each hit while falling. Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to nearby targets upon landing.

Desc.SourceString: <shuzhi>闪避-流星寰域</>状态期间，滞空时点按普攻触发飒沓流星；对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并为目标添加陨星锁；此次攻击命中后，回复一次跳跃次数。
Desc.LocalizedString: During <shuzhi>Meteor Realm</>, press Normal Attack while airborne to trigger Meteor Rush, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and inflicting Starfall Shard. Restores a leap attempt upon a successful hit.

Desc.SourceString: <shuzhi>闪避-流星寰域</>状态期间，滞空时长按普攻触发疾冲瞬身；对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，如果命中带有<shuzhi>陨星锁</>的非BOSS敌人将造成<shuzhi>1000%</>*攻击力的伤害（仅大世界生效，对机甲怪不生效）；此次攻击命中后，回复一次跳跃次数。
Desc.LocalizedString: During <shuzhi>Meteor Realm</>, hold Normal Attack while airborne to trigger Flash Step, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>1,000%</> of ATK upon hitting non-Boss enemies inflicted with <shuzhi>Starfall Shard</> (only effective in the Overworld and not applicable to Mecha enemies). Restores a leap attempt upon a successful hit.

Desc.SourceString: 方向键加闪避键触发的前闪避短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发前闪避攻击，对前方目标至多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack during the short perfect Dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger a pre-Dodge attack, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发后闪避攻击，对前方目标至多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack during the short period after dodging to trigger a post-dodge attack, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead.

Desc.SourceString:
方向键加闪避键触发的前闪避短暂时间内，长按闪避可进入流星寰域状态（巅峰联赛无法使用），持续消耗耐力，并持续获得<shuzhi>星流</>；流星寰域持续期间不受任何移速提升效果的影响。
流星寰域期间，点按跳跃键，会打断此次摆荡，同时会将拓荒者朝向同步到当前镜头朝向；
流星寰域期间，点按闪避即可继续进行摆荡，在摆荡开始时会检索当前所处环境，如果当前存在可用的点位，则此次摆荡过程不消耗耐力，如果当前环境不存在可用点位，武器-双星会从虚空中选取合适的锚点打点摆荡，在此情况下摆荡会正常消耗耐力；
流星寰域期间，接触水面后，会进入短暂打水漂状态，在此期间点按闪避会快速弹起至空中；
流星寰域期间，推动摇杆时接触墙面，会进入墙面自由移动状态，在墙体上朝向左/右侧快速移动时，点按跳跃会快速脱离墙体；
脱离流星寰域状态后，将移除所有<shuzhi>星流</>。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold the dodge button during the perfect dodge window (use the movement button before dodging) to activate Meteor Realm (unavailable in Apex League). Continuously consumes Endurance and gains <shuzhi>Starflow</>. While Meteor Realm is active, speed boost won't take effect.
During Meteor Realm, press the jump button to interrupt your current swing and instantly align your direction with the camera. 
While Meteor Realm is active, press the dodge button to continue swinging. At the start of the swing, the environment will be scanned. If a valid anchor point is detected, the swing does not consume Endurance. If none is found, Twin Stars will create an anchor from the void, and Endurance will be consumed as usual. 
During Meteor Realm, touching the water surface triggers a brief skipping state. Press dodge during this time to leap upward quickly. 
While in Meteor Realm, move toward a wall to enter wall glide mode. While gliding left or right, press jump to quickly leap off the surface.
All <shuzhi>Starflow</> will be cleared when Meteor Realm ends.

Desc.SourceString:
<shuzhi>闪避-流星寰域</>状态期间，长按跳跃进入矢量跃迁状态，期间持续消耗<shuzhi>星流</>；矢量跃迁持续期间不受任何移速提升效果的影响。
矢量跃迁期间，推动摇杆时转动镜头，会进行快速转向。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold the jump button during <shuzhi>Meteor Realm</> to enter Vector Leap, continuously consuming <shuzhi>Starflow</> while active. While Vector Leap is active, speed boost won't take effect.
During Vector Leap, moving the joystick while rotating the camera causes a rapid directional shift.

Desc.SourceString:
进入光刃超频状态，自身获得短暂无敌并对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，激活<shuzhi>坚毅共鸣</>时破盾效率额外提升<shuzhi>12%</>，持续<shuzhi>35</>秒；冷却<shuzhi>35</>秒（不受任何冷却时间清除、重置、变化效果的影响）。	
光刃超频状态下，使用<shuzhi>武器-双星</>进行普攻或闪避攻击时，每<shuzhi>4</>秒可以获得<shuzhi>1</>点<red>超频新星</>效果（每次光刃超频状态下至多可获得<shuzhi>3</>点），累计获取<shuzhi>3</>点<red>超频新星</>且战场统御处于冷却状态时，获得技能<shuzhi>光棱剑幕</>（光刃超频期间可释放）；光刃超频状态结束或<shuzhi>武器-双星</>被切换到后台时，<red>超频新星</>效果将被移除，同时无法获得/使用技能<shuzhi>光棱剑幕</>。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Enters Photon Surge, granting temporary invincibility and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. Increases Shatter by <shuzhi>12%</> for <shuzhi>35</>s upon activating <shuzhi>Fortitude Resonance</>. Cooldown: <shuzhi>35</>s. This is not affected by other cooldown clearing, resetting, or changing effects.	
 Grants <shuzhi>1</> <red>Overnova</> every <shuzhi>4</>s while using <shuzhi>Twin Stars</> for Normal or Dodge Attacks during Photon Surge, up to <shuzhi>3</> points during each Photon Surge. Reach <shuzhi>3</> <red>Overnova</> while Field Mastery is on cooldown to gain <shuzhi>Prism Blades</> (available during Photon Surge). Removes all <red>Overnova</> when Photon Surge ends or <shuzhi>Twin Stars</> is switched to the off-hand slot, and prevents gaining or casting <shuzhi>Prism Blades</>.

Desc.SourceString: <shuzhi>技能-光刃超频</>期间可释放，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets while <shuzhi>Photon Surge</> is active.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，同时自身获得<shuzhi>5%</>最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续<shuzhi>3.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: <shuzhi>Removes all carried debuffs</> when <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered upon switching to this weapon. Then deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. Grants Hyperbody and a shield equal to <shuzhi>5%</> of Max HP for <shuzhi>3.5</>s.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成共<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力伤害
第二次攻击对目标至多造成共<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力伤害
第三次攻击对目标至多造成共<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力伤害
第四次攻击对目标至多造成共<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力伤害，并击飞目标
第五次攻击对目标至多造成共<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力伤害，并击飞目标
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch five consecutive strikes.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK in total to the target.
 Second strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK in total to the target.
 Third strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK in total to the target.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK in total to the target and knocks them up.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK in total to the target and knocks them up.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标至多造成共<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力伤害
第二次攻击对目标至多造成共<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力伤害
第三次攻击对目标至多造成共<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力伤害
第四次攻击对目标至多造成共<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力伤害，并击退目标
第五次攻击对目标至多造成共<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力伤害，并击退目标
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use a normal attack to unleash five consecutive strikes, consuming Endurance.
 First strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK in total to the target.
 Second strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK in total to the target.
 Third strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK in total to the target.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK in total to the target and knocks them back.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK in total to the target and knocks them back.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面处于<shuzhi>技能-联动作战</>状态下时，点击普攻可连续进行五次强化攻击。
第一次攻击对目标造成共<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力伤害，并小幅击退目标
第二次攻击对目标至多造成共<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力伤害，并小幅击退目标
第三次攻击对目标至多造成共<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力伤害，并小幅击退目标
第四次攻击对目标至多造成共<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力伤害，并击飞目标
第五次攻击对目标至多造成共<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力伤害，并击飞目标
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground and under <shuzhi>Joint Combat</>, use normal attack to launch five consecutive enhanced strikes.
 First strike: Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK in total to the target and knocks them back slightly.
 Second strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK in total to the target and knocks them back slightly.
 Third strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK in total to the target and knocks them back slightly.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK in total to the target and knocks them up.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK in total to the target and knocks them up.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空并处于<shuzhi>技能-联动作战</>状态下时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标至多造成共<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力伤害，并小幅击退目标
第二次攻击对目标至多造成共<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力伤害，并小幅击退目标
第三次攻击对目标至多造成共<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力伤害，并小幅击退目标
第四次攻击对目标至多造成共<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力伤害，并击退目标
第五次攻击对目标至多造成共<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力伤害，并击退目标
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne and under <shuzhi>Joint Combat</>, use a normal attack to launch five consecutive strikes, consuming Endurance.
 First strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK in total to the target and knocks them back slightly.
 Second strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK in total to the target and knocks them back slightly.
 Third strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK in total to the target and knocks them back slightly.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK in total to the target and knocks them back.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK in total to the target and knocks them back.

Desc.SourceString: 在地面或处于普攻1、2、3段时，长按普攻可以发动<shuzhi>弓步长刺</>，突进至目标面前并对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Hold Normal Attack on the ground or during the first to third ground Normal Attacks to trigger <shuzhi>Stride Lance</>, dashing forward and dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻，攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，可触发星沉月落。
下落过程中，每次命中对目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力伤害，落地后对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack while airborne, or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using Jetback to trigger Starfall Moon.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK on each hit while falling. Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to nearby targets upon landing.

Desc.SourceString: 方向键加闪避键触发的前闪避短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发挺身直刺，对前方目标至多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack during the short perfect Dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger a Bold Thrust attack, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发闪身刺击，对前方目标至多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack during the short period after dodging to trigger a Blink Strike, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead.

Desc.SourceString: 在施展任意闪避攻击，且拥有<shuzhi>技能-突袭就绪</>效果时，点击普攻可触发交错轮舞，对前方区域内的所有目标至多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力伤害（该伤害视为普攻伤害）、交错轮舞释放期间点击普攻，可直接释放强化普攻第五段。
Desc.LocalizedString: Press Normal Attack while using Dodge Attack and <shuzhi>Instant Raid</> is active to trigger Spiral Waltz, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK (counts at Normal Attack damage) to all the targets in the area ahead. Press Normal Attack during Spiral Waltz to unleash the fifth strike of enhanced Normal Attack.

Desc.SourceString: 获得短暂无敌并对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力伤害，进入持续<shuzhi>35</>秒的<shuzhi>联动作战</>状态，冷却时间为<shuzhi>35</>秒。联动作战状态下角色获得持续<shuzhi>7</>秒的霸体，使用武器<shuzhi>AF-010 侍者</>施展的普攻将升级为<shuzhi>行进协奏</>，驱使机甲进行协同攻击，伤害段数增加。进入联动作战状态<shuzhi>8</>秒后，获得<shuzhi>突袭就绪</>效果，人物可施展闪避攻击派生技能-<shuzhi>交错轮舞</>，并解锁技能-<shuzhi>瞬身连击</>。（武器-AF-010侍者被切换到后台时移除联动作战与突袭就绪状态）
Desc.LocalizedString: Grants temporary Invincibility and deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby enemies, then enters <shuzhi>Joint Combat</> for <shuzhi>35</>s (Cooldown: <shuzhi>35</>s). Joint Combat: Grants Hyperbody for <shuzhi>7</>s. Upgrades Normal Attack to <shuzhi>March Sync</> when <shuzhi>AF-010 Servion</> is in the main slot, summoning a Mecha to assist in combat and providing bonus damage instances. Grants <shuzhi>Instant Raid</> <shuzhi>8</>s after entering Joint Combat, enabling the Dodge Attack skill <shuzhi>Spiral Waltz</> and unlocking <shuzhi>Swish Combo</>. Switching AF-010 Servion to the off-hand slot removes both Joint Combat and Instant Raid.

Desc.SourceString: <shuzhi>技能-突袭就绪</>效果持续期间可释放，对附近目标至多造成共<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力伤害；技能结束后移除突袭就绪与联动作战效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Can be activated during <shuzhi>Instant Raid</>. Deals damage equal to up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. Removes Instant Raid and Joint Combat effects when the skill ends.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力伤害，同时自身获得<shuzhi>5%</>最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续<shuzhi>3.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: <shuzhi>Removes all carried debuffs</> when <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered upon switching to this weapon. Then deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets. Grants Hyperbody and a shield equal to <shuzhi>5%</> of Max HP for <shuzhi>3.5</>s.

Desc.SourceString: 开启阻断装置形成跟随自己的大范围空间，空间内敌方单位降低<shuzhi>75%</>受治疗效果，不可叠加。持续<shuzhi>15</>秒，冷却<shuzhi>45</>秒
Desc.LocalizedString: Enabling the Blocker Device creates a wide-area effect around the caster. Healing received by enemies within this area is reduced by <shuzhi>75%</> for <shuzhi>15</>s (Unstackable). Cooldown: <shuzhi>45</>s.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。

While on the ground, use normal attack to launch five consecutive strikes.
First strike: Deals up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK, knocking targets back.
Second strike: Deals up to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK, knocking targets back.
Third strike: Deals up to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK, knocking targets back.
Fourth strike: Deals up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK, knocking targets back.
Fifth strike: Deals up to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK, knocking targets back.

当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行五次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第二次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标

第四次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第五次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack while airborne to perform 5 consecutive hits, costing Endurance.
The 1st hit deals damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and knocks the target back.
The 2nd hit deals damage up to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK and knocks the target back.
The 3rd hit deals damage up to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK  and knocks the target back.
The 4th hit deals damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK and knocks the target back.
The 5th hit deals damage up to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK and knocks the target back.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面普攻时，使用第一次至第二次普攻中，长按普攻可触发掠影突袭。
莱可西丝向前方进行快速旋转斩击，落地斜劈，对附近目标共造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold normal attack between the first and second ground attacks to trigger Wraith Dash.
 Performs a rapid spinning slash forward, finishing with a downward diagonal strike, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby enemies.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面普攻时，使用第三次至第四次普攻中，长按普攻可触发跃光奔袭。
莱可西丝蓄力，完成后向前冲刺横斩，对附近目标共造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold normal attack between the first and second ground attacks to trigger Glint Assault.
 Dashes forward and slash after charging, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby enemies.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻（存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，可触发曳光落霓。
从空中下落，落地过程中对命中的敌人每次造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，落地后对附近目标共造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold normal attack while airborne (press when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Neon Crash.
Plunge from the above, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to hit enemies during the plunge. Upon landing, deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to nearby targets.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

Desc.SourceString: 方向键加闪避键触发的前闪避短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发由心一击，对前方目标至多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger True Strike, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to frontal targets.

Desc.SourceString: 闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发会心一闪，对命中目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
Desc.LocalizedString: Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Critical Flash, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the hit target.

Desc.SourceString:
莱可西丝向前挑起敌人，向前快速连续斩击，对附近目标共造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，获得<shuzhi>斩断！心之锁</>状态，冷却<shuzhi>32</>秒（不受任何冷却时间清除、重置、变化效果的影响）。
<shuzhi>斩断！心之锁</>状态：莱可西丝可在<shuzhi>普攻-掠影突袭</>下长按触发<shuzhi>爱之狂想</>，释放完<shuzhi>爱之狂想</>后可在<shuzhi>普攻-掠影突袭</>下长按触发<shuzhi>溢彩波涌</>，释放完<shuzhi>溢彩波涌</>后可在<shuzhi>普攻-掠影突袭</>下长按触发<shuzhi>辉光撼心</>(<shuzhi>斩断！心之锁</>状态切换武器会移除），上述特殊攻击总计共可使用<shuzhi>3</>次，持续<shuzhi>32</>秒，释放上述技能时莱可西丝处于霸体状态。
<shuzhi>爱之狂想</>：莱可西丝蓄力完成后向前上挑，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>260.7%</>*攻击力点伤害。
<shuzhi>溢彩波涌</>：莱可西丝蓄力完成后向前强力上挑，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>451.5%</>*攻击力点伤害，并对队友添加<shuzhi>心起晦落</>效果：当灰噬值达到80点时触发，削减自身<shuzhi>50</>点灰噬值。
<shuzhi>辉光撼心</>：莱可西丝蓄力完成后向前超级上挑，对附近目标造成<shuzhi>610.6%</>*攻击力点伤害，并对队友治疗<shuzhi>1200%</>*攻击力点生命值。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Launches enemies upward, then performs rapid consecutive slashes forward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>{1}</> to nearby enemies and inflicting <shuzhi>Armor Dissolve</>. Gains the <shuzhi>Sever! Heart Lock</> state, granting Hyperbody for <shuzhi>25</>s. Cooldown: <shuzhi>25</>s (This is not affected by other cooldown clearing, resetting, or changing effects).
<shuzhi>Sever! Heart Lock</> Status: Hold to trigger <shuzhi>Love Rhapsody</> while in <shuzhi>Wraith Dash</>. After casting <shuzhi>Love Rhapsody</>, hold again under <shuzhi>Wraith Dash</> to trigger <shuzhi>Prism Tide</>. After casting <shuzhi>Prism Tide</>, hold once more under <shuzhi>Wraith Dash</> to trigger <shuzhi>Radiant Shock</>. (The <shuzhi>Sever! Heart Lock</> status is removed when switching weapons.) These special attacks can be used a total of <shuzhi>3</> times and last for <shuzhi>25s</>.
<shuzhi>Love Rhapsody</>: Strikes forward and upward after charging, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>5,200%</> of ATK to nearby enemies.
<shuzhi>Prism Tide</>: Strikes powerfully forward and upward after charging, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>27,000%</> of ATK to nearby enemies.
<shuzhi>Radiant Shock</>: Strikes powerfully forward and upward after charging, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>40,000%</> of ATK to nearby enemies.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，莱可西丝向前发射心型光波，蓄力完成后斩击光波，光波爆炸对附近目标共造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，同时自身获得5%最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续3.5秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon from another, <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the Authorizer</>. Launches a heart-shaped energy wave forward, then slashes the charged wave upon full charge. The wave explodes, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby enemies. Gains damage immunity for 3.5s during the skill.

Desc.SourceString:
在地面时，点击普攻可连续进行五次攻击。
第一次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第三次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第四次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{6}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第五次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{8}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
<shuzhi>基本功积累</>：第<shuzhi>1</>/<shuzhi>2</>/<shuzhi>3</>/<shuzhi>4</>/<shuzhi>5</>段对应获得<shuzhi>5</>/<shuzhi>5</>/<shuzhi>5</>/<shuzhi>10</>/<shuzhi>25</>点基本功积累。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While on the ground, use normal attack to launch five consecutive strikes.
 First strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Second strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Third strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Fourth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Fifth strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 <shuzhi>Prelude</>: <shuzhi>5</> points from the <shuzhi>1st</> instance, <shuzhi>5</> points from the <shuzhi>2nd</> instance, <shuzhi>5</> points from the <shuzhi>3rd</> instance, <shuzhi>10</> points from the <shuzhi>4th</> instance, and <shuzhi>25</> points from the <shuzhi>5th</> instance.

Desc.SourceString:
当拓荒者滞空时，点击普攻可在空中连续进行两次攻击，并消耗耐力。
第一次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第二次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标
第二次攻击后继续攻击会触发<shuzhi>下落攻击</>，下落攻击后继续攻击会直接进入<shuzhi>普攻第四段</>。
<shuzhi>基本功积累</>：第<shuzhi>1</>/<shuzhi>2</>段对应获得<shuzhi>5</>/<shuzhi>5</>点基本功积累。
Desc.LocalizedString:
While airborne, use a normal attack to unleash two consecutive strikes, consuming Endurance.
 First strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Second strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Chain into <shuzhi>Falling Attack</> after the second strike, then directly into the <shuzhi>fourth instance of the normal attack</>.
 <shuzhi>Prelude</>: <shuzhi>5</> points from the <shuzhi>1st</> instance, <shuzhi>5</> points from the <shuzhi>2nd</> instance.

Desc.SourceString:
当<shuzhi>技能-默契积累</>达到<shuzhi>2</>并在地面使用任意段普攻时，长按普攻可触发瑰丽共鸣。
海伦与波吕克斯协同攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold Normal Attack on the ground after launching any instance of a normal attack with <shuzhi>2</> <shuzhi>Encore</> points to trigger Radiant Resonance.
 Helene and Pollux's coordinated attack deals damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.

Desc.SourceString:
滞空时长按普攻（存在敌方目标时点按），攀爬，反向跳攻击或使用喷气背包普攻，可触发凌空纵跃-落。
从空中下落，落地过程中对命中的敌人每次造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，落地后对附近目标共造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
<shuzhi>基本功积累</>：获得<shuzhi>10</>点基本功积累。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold normal attack while airborne (press when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Sky Bound - Descent.
 Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK on each hit while falling. Deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK in total to nearby targets upon landing.
 <shuzhi>Prelude</>: Grants <shuzhi>10</> Prelude points.

Desc.SourceString: 在被命中前闪避，可触发幻时，使一定范围内的目标动作速率变缓；闪避过程中，免疫硬直效果。
Desc.LocalizedString: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging.

Desc.SourceString:
方向键加闪避键触发的前闪避短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发贵宾之礼，对前方目标至多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
<shuzhi>基本功积累</>：释放时获取<shuzhi>17</>点基本功积累。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack during the short perfect Dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Royal Gift, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets ahead.
 <shuzhi>Prelude</>: Grants <shuzhi>17</> Prelude points upon use.

Desc.SourceString:
闪避之后的短暂时间内，点击普攻，可触发死亡舞剧，对命中目标造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害。
<shuzhi>基本功积累</>：释放时获取<shuzhi>17</>点基本功积累。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press Normal Attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Death Waltz, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the hit target.
 <shuzhi>Prelude</>: Grants <shuzhi>17</> Prelude points upon use.

Desc.SourceString: 长按闪避，可以在前方召唤波吕克斯蹦床，蹦床最多存在<shuzhi>3</>个。
Desc.LocalizedString: Hold Dodge to summon a Pollux Trampoline in front. Up to <shuzhi>3</> trampolines can be active at once.

Desc.SourceString:
点按技能时海伦召唤波吕克斯真身发动强力攻击。
每次攻击消耗<shuzhi>50</>点基本功积累并获得<shuzhi>1</>点默契积累，两次攻击后波吕克斯陷入沉睡，技能进入冷却，冷却时间<shuzhi>35</>秒。
第一次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
<shuzhi>默契积累</>：<shuzhi>2</>点默契积累解锁普攻分支。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Press the skill to summon Pollux to launch a mighty strike.
 Consumes <shuzhi>50</> Prelude points and grants <shuzhi>1</> Encore point with each attack. After two attacks, Pollux falls asleep and the skill enters cooldown. Cooldown: <shuzhi>35</>s.
 First strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Second strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 <shuzhi>Encore</>: <shuzhi>2</> Encore points unlock Normal Attack branch.

Desc.SourceString:
长按技能时海伦召唤并操控波吕克斯真身。
期间可以操控波吕克斯小范围移动，连续点按技能波吕克斯将发动循环的两次攻击。
跳跃和闪避可以退出该状态。
召唤波吕克斯对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第一次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{2}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
第二次攻击对目标至多造成<shuzhi>{4}%</>*攻击力点伤害，并击退目标。
Desc.LocalizedString:
Hold the skill to summon and control Pollux.
 During this time, Pollux can be moved within a small range; pressing the skill repeatedly makes Pollux perform two consecutive cycllic attacks.
 Jumping or Dodging exits this state.
 Summons Pollux, dealing damage up to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 First strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.
 Second strike: Deals damage up to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK to the target and knocks them back.

Desc.SourceString: 当<red>武器充能满</>或触发<red>幻时</>时，从其他武器切换到该武器时<shuzhi>清除自身负面状态</>，海伦召唤人偶剧场，幕布升起后，波吕克斯出现向前方发动攻击，对附近目标共造成<shuzhi>{0}%</>*攻击力点伤害，同时自身获得<shuzhi>5%</>最大生命值的护盾和霸体状态，持续<shuzhi>3.5</>秒。
Desc.LocalizedString: When <red>the weapon is fully charged</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, upon switching to this weapon from another, <shuzhi>removes all debuffs from the player</>. Helene summons the Puppet Theater. As the curtain rises, Pollux appears and attacks forward, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby enemies. Grants Hyperbody and a shield equal to <shuzhi>5%</> of Max HP for <shuzhi>3.5</>s.
